1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo kha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya la li ta bistA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas
1b3(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
2a1(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ tshe
2a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming
2a3(mdo sde): chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang / tshe dang
2a4(mdo sde): ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
2a5(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
2b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
2b2(mdo sde): pa ka pi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
2b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
2b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol
2b5(mdo sde): tu 'gro ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan
2b6(mdo sde): pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /
3a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ byang chub sems
3a2(mdo sde): dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par
3a3(mdo sde): rtse ba| byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems
3a4(mdo sde): dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs
3a5(mdo sde): par khong du chud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad
3a6(mdo sde): thob pa| byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag
3b1(mdo sde): ste| 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang
3b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
3b5(mdo sde): dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal
3b6(mdo sde): po'i blon po chen po dang / chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon
3b7(mdo sde): po dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dpyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim
4a1(mdo sde): gror byas/ bla mar byas/ bsti stang du byas| mchod pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni| bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing
4a2(mdo sde): mang ba dang / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing / bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam
4a3(mdo sde): pa dang / grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang pad+ma la chus mi gos pa ltar thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang /
4a4(mdo sde): sgra dang snyan pa ni 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
4a5(mdo sde): pa| bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
4a6(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to/ /de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa/ bdud
4a7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu lha dang mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad
4b1(mdo sde): nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to/ /de thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs
4b2(mdo sde): su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa
4b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma
4b4(mdo sde): t hag tu skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang
4b5(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag
4b6(mdo sde): par bskul to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de las skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa/ /'od
4b7(mdo sde): bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa/ /sku lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi ba po/ /shAkya'i seng+ge thub dang phrad par gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag
5a1(mdo sde): kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang / /mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /chos la rang byung mnga' dbang mdzad la rton/ /gang zhig gdul ka'i sems
5a2(mdo sde): la mnga' mdzad de/ /gang zhig bdud kyi rnyi las grol ba'i thugs/ /de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyi/ /rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du dengs/ /mtshungs
5a3(mdo sde): med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste/ /mun sel tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa/ /de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis dengs//
5a4(mdo sde): de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong / /de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms/ /de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas/ /de ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston pa'o/ /gnas
5a5(mdo sde): g tsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa
5a6(mdo sde): de lta bu de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bskal pa grangs med/ tshad med/ bgrang ba las shin
5a7(mdo sde): tu 'das pa dag las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
5b1(mdo sde): bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang / chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de nas de'i
5b2(mdo sde): nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' bo dang / shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan+dan dang / mchod byas
5b3(mdo sde): dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog 'phags shing shin tu 'phags
5b4(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa dag gis lha'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
5b5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
5b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
5b7(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang / ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / mngal gyi
6a1(mdo sde): gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstan pa/ rigs bzang por skye ba'i sa'i mthu kun tu bstan pa/ byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad
6a2(mdo sde): par gyis shin tu 'da' ba bstan pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / ral gri'i thabs
6a3(mdo sde): dang | 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa kun tu bstan pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / yul gyi
6a4(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes pa yongs su
6a5(mdo sde): brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig pa bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs
6a6(mdo sde): pa bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa nges par bstan pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon chad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom
6a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla ma dang / chos kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / yon tan gyi tog dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'od zer chen po dang / drang srong lha dang /
6b1(mdo sde): dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rdo rje mkhregs dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon dang / gser mdog dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / byi ru'i rgya
6b2(mdo sde): mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzugs bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / drang srong sbed dang / dmag tshogs las rgyal dang / mtho ba dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mdzod
6b3(mdo sde): spu gzi brjid dang / shin tu rgyas dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan dang / blta na bzang dang / seng+ge'i gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros brtan pas byin dang /
6b4(mdo sde): sos ka'i spos dri dang / bden pa'i phyogs grags rgya chen dang / 'od ldan dang / skar rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang / 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / drag
6b5(mdo sde): shul gzi brjid dang / rin chen gzi brjid dang / tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang / sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang / ri rab me tog dang / rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang /
6b6(mdo sde): dge ba tshul bzang dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'brug sgra dang / kha dog mdzes dang / tshe'i gzi brjid dang / ngom bag glang po'i 'gros dang /
6b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang /
7a1(mdo sde): gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa lags
7a2(mdo sde): na| de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha
7a3(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i 'di'ang brjod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /
7a4(mdo sde): bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi brtson
7a5(mdo sde): 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs
7a6(mdo sde): pa'ang kun tu bstan pa'i slad du da bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse
7a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs
7b1(mdo sde): shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
7b2(mdo sde): tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / me tog man+dA ra ba dag gis kyang mngon par gtor te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i
7b3(mdo sde): nam nangs pa dang / smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
7b4(mdo sde): zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
7b5(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag/ mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' bo dang / shin tu dga' bo dang /
7b6(mdo sde): tsan+dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po zhes bya ba nas/
7b7(mdo sde): de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
8a1(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
8a2(mdo sde): legs par bstan du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse bar mdzad pa dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha
8a3(mdo sde): dang mi rnams dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ zhes gsol pa dang /
8a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
8a5(mdo sde): la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong dag kye nga ni mdang sum 'dir/ /gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur
8a6(mdo sde): cing / /nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la/ /rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la/ /dri med dpal 'bar lha yi
8a7(mdo sde): bu lhags nas/ /dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te/ /dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan+dan dang / /dga' bo rab tu sems
8b1(mdo sde): zhi mchod byas dang / /shin tu dga' bo zhi ba lha yi bu/ /bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams/ /nga yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te/ /nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par
8b2(mdo sde): gyur| |sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar gus bcas par/ /de dag 'dir ni nga la gsol ba btab/ /'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du/ /rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang
8b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa/ /shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di/ /thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun bzung bzhed pas/ /phas kyi rgol
8b4(mdo sde): dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad la/ /theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing / /thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol/ /lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de snang phyir/ /
8b5(mdo sde): mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad pas na/ /thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas/ /dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor/ /de phyir dge slong shin tu rgyas pa'i
8b6(mdo sde): mdo| |'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa/ /gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig /gleng gzhi'i le'u ste/ dang
8b7(mdo sde): po'o|| / /dge slong dag /de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa'
9a1(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa/ mchod par bya bas mchod pa/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te
9a2(mdo sde): brjod cing bsngags pa/ bsam pa thob pa/ smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye
9a3(mdo sde): shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang
9a4(mdo sde): ldan pa| sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol
9a5(mdo sde): tu son pa/ tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa dang / rig
9a6(mdo sde): pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
9a7(mdo sde): dang | dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/ bsod
9b1(mdo sde): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad du smras
9b2(mdo sde): pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba/ drang zhing ma yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang /
9b3(mdo sde): dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la
9b4(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug
9b5(mdo sde): chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar
9b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste ston pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas
9b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis gsungs pa gzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrul pa med pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas su med pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par
10a1(mdo sde): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas
10a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po/ chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir
10a3(mdo sde): rgol ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa/ g.yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa/ ye shes mchog
10a4(mdo sde): gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus
10a5(mdo sde): mngon par brlan pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ze'u 'bru dang ldan pa/ yon tan
10a6(mdo sde): gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod
10a7(mdo sde): pa'i gsung gi ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/ 'jig rten na shes pas thu bor gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ skyes bu chen po'i pad+ma/
10b1(mdo sde): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul
10b2(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang bsnyer ba/ bsdu
10b3(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/
10b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi ze ba can/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi
10b5(mdo sde): kha gdangs ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri
10b6(mdo sde): sul gyi phug na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye
10b7(mdo sde): ba'i stobs dang ldan pa/ skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang spu g.yo ba med pa/ rtsal la zhum pa med pa/ mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dwags mang po'i tshogs rab tu
11a1(mdo sde): 'joms pa/ bdag med par sgra brjod pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa/ skyes bu seng+ge dang / rnam par grol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab
11a2(mdo sde): kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog dang rab rib med par byed pa/ stobs
11a3(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po nyi ma/ nag po'i phyogs med pa/ dkar po'i phyogs yongs
11a4(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa/ blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa/ lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam
11a5(mdo sde): par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/ mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 'byed pa
11a6(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po zla ba/ 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/
11a7(mdo sde): blo dpyad thogs pa med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pa'i khyad par du pogs dbyung
11b1(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba/
11b2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/ thos pas mi ngoms pas
11b3(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba/ blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam
11b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma
11b5(mdo sde): med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sbyin pa legs par byin pa/ sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/ lhag
11b6(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba/ gos par bya ba bsgos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges
11b7(mdo sde): par byas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu
12a1(mdo sde): bsten pa/ legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
12a2(mdo sde): bsten pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bsten par gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon
12a3(mdo sde): lam btab pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/ yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par
12a4(mdo sde): byas pa| yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/ sangs
12a5(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa/ rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ sems can tshad med
12a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ tshe
12a7(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs pa/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/ lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni
12b1(mdo sde): ' di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der
12b2(mdo sde): shin tu mchod pa/ gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong rab tu gnas pa/ stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs
12b3(mdo sde): pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA
12b4(mdo sde): ra ba chen po chal par bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/ me tog a ti muk+ta dang / tsam+pa ka dang / skya snar dang / sa brtol dang / btang
12b5(mdo sde): bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / tin+du ka dang / a sa na dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / sA la dang /
12b6(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog smad 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna
12b7(mdo sde): ma'i me tog dang / paR+shi ka dang / ta ra ni dang / ba li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / mchog tu dri zhim dang / da nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da
13a1(mdo sde): dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla bre chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/ bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang /
13a2(mdo sde): ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur ba dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig
13a3(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltad mor bya ba/ chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa/ nga rgyal
13a4(mdo sde): dang | rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba med par gyur pa/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa rgya che zhing
13a5(mdo sde): gsal ba/ skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de
13a6(mdo sde): dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga'
13a7(mdo sde): dran rtogs dang / /blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa/ /mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba/ /mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod/ /rgya chen
13b1(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba/ /dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs/ /sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod/ /zhi gnas
13b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang / /dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams spyad pa/ /spyod rigs cher byung dgongs
13b3(mdo sde): mdzod dgongs par mdzod/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse mdzad gyur cing / /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyed kyis mchod/ /dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig
13b4(mdo sde): grags mtha' yas/ /de dus lags kyi btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /rga shi nyon mongs 'jigs mdzad rdul bral ba/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha min dbang po
13b5(mdo sde): dag kyang sdod lags kyi/ /'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod/ /bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang / /rgya mtsho chu yis ji bzhin mi ngoms kyi/ /ngoms pa
13b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi thugs dam dge ba ste/ /yun ring skom nyen skye bo tshim par mdzod/ /smad pa med pa'i grags ba mnga' ba khyod/ /chos la dgyes par khyod dgyes 'dod mi dgyes/ /'on
13b7(mdo sde): kyang dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod/ /lha rnams bye ba khyod las chos thos pas/ /ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags 'on gyis
14a1(mdo sde): kyang / /dal dang mi ldan gyur pa'i ngan song du/ /gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsol/ /dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten
14a2(mdo sde): dag gi sangs rgyas gzigs gyur cing / /de dag rnams la chos gsan chos mchog de/ /'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod/ /dpal ldan khyod kyi bsod nams dpal
14a3(mdo sde): gyis ni| |dga' ldan pho brang shin tu mdzes mod kyi/ /'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na/ /dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob/ /brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub reg
14a4(mdo sde): ces te| |'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang 'khod pa/ /du ma thams cad mngon par rab tu dga'/ /mgon po khyod kyis
14a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi las rnams bcom/ /khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham mdzad de/ /khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra/ /de dus lags kyi btang snyoms ma
14a6(mdo sde): mdzad cig / nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'jig rten la/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzad de/ /bdud rtsi'i char ba mngon par rab tu phob/ /lha mi rnams kyis nyon
14a7(mdo sde): mongs zhi bar mdzod/ /khyod ni sman pa khams pa mkhas pa ste/ /yun ring nad pa sman pas por ba yi/ /sems can rnam thar gsum gyi sbyar sman gyis/ /mya ngan 'das
14b1(mdo sde): pa'i bde la myur du khod/ /seng+ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas/ /wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gi /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i sgra ni rab bsgrags te/ /mu stegs can gzhan
14b2(mdo sde): wa rnams skrag par mdzod/ /sa yi dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi/ /stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron me bsnams/ /phyag mthil dam pas sa la brdab mdzad de/ /'di rnams
14b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod/ /gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'bul ba yi/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po sdod cing mchis/ /khyod bltams gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi/ /brgya
14b4(mdo sde): byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis/ /blo gros bzang po rigs chen rigs ldan pa/ /gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /spyod pa ston 'gyur dam pa rigs
14b5(mdo sde): skyes pa| |rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs/ /snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che/ /bzhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin/ /nor bu rin chen lta bur dri med
14b6(mdo sde): thugs| |dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob/ /glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi/ /tshigs su bcad pa mang po byung gyur nas/ /'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzad
14b7(mdo sde): ces| |snying rje'i yid dang ldan la skul bar byed/ /yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus
15a1(mdo sde): de lta bus yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhal med khang chen po de nas byung ste chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzang chen po gang du byang chub
15a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs so/ /zhugs nas kyang seng+ge'i khri chos bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug
15a3(mdo sde): go / de nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal pa mnyam pa theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzang de nyid du zhugs so/ /gang yang byang
15a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag kyang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bsal cing lha'i bu phal
15a5(mdo sde): rnams kyang bsal nas lha'i bsam pa mthun pa'i 'khor can du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang khang bzang der zhugs nas so so ci rigs par rang rang
15a6(mdo sde): gi seng+ge'i khri la 'khod par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i tshe gnas gtsang
15a7(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag dzam+bu'i gling du lhags nas lha'i kha dog mi snang bar byas te bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas bram ze rnams rig byed slob tu 'dzud de/ gang
15b1(mdo sde): zhig rnam pa 'di lta bur mngal du zhugs par gyur na/ de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de dag dang ldan na/ rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur
15b2(mdo sde): gyi| gsum du 'gyur ba med do/ /de gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po
15b3(mdo sde): che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / nor
15b4(mdo sde): bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na
15b5(mdo sde): ' di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs
15b6(mdo sde): kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong yod pa/ mu khyud dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ thams cad gser las grub
15b7(mdo sde): pa| mgar bas ma byas pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas 'di snyam
16a1(mdo sde): du sems te/ bdag gis thos pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te dbu zungs
16a2(mdo sde): su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che byung bar gyur na/ de na 'khor
16a3(mdo sde): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos te/ bdag gi drung du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/ bdag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin
16a4(mdo sde): du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag
16a5(mdo sde): pa g.yas bas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de bskor zhing 'di skad du/ btsun pa/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyis bskor cig /chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya
16a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshig smras pa dang / de nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bskor bas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs
16a7(mdo sde): par 'gro ste/ rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dang lhan cig rjes su 'gro'o/ /sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gnas
16b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi khams
16b2(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes bkang ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni dngul sil mas bkang ste thogs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsu
16b3(mdo sde): zhing 'di skad du/ lha 'dir legs par gshegs so/ /lha tshur gshegs su gsol/ /lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legs shing nyams dgyes la
16b4(mdo sde): skye bo mang po dang / mis gtams pa lags te/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas
16b5(mdo sde): rims kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du/ khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos kyis gyis shig /chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/ /khyed srog chags ma gsod cig /ma byin
16b6(mdo sde): par ma len cig / 'dod pa la log par g.yem par ma byed cig /brdzun du ma smra zhig /phra ma ma zer cig /ngag rtsub po ma smra zhig /tshig kyal pa ma smra zhig /brnab sems can
16b7(mdo sde): du ma gyur cig / gnod sems can du ma gyur cig /log par lta bar ma gyur cig /srog gcod pa la byams par ma gyur cig /log par lta ba can gyi bar la byams par ma
17a1(mdo sde): gyur cig / nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung nga re/ chos ma yin par spyod pa la byams par ma byed cig ces bsgos nas rgyal po rgyal rigs sbyi bo
17a2(mdo sde): nas dbang bskur bas de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o/ /shar phyogs
17a3(mdo sde): kyi rgya mtsho la song nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo/ /rgal nas kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/ 'khor los bsgyur
17a4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o/ /snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin
17a5(mdo sde): du nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o/ /byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho
17a6(mdo sde): la song nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la rgal lo/ /rgal nas kyang nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i
17a7(mdo sde): steng du nyams pa med par gnas te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i
17b1(mdo sde): rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad thal
17b2(mdo sde): kar gyur pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ gtsug gser gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs
17b3(mdo sde): pa| rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' las 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya ba'o/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi
17b4(mdo sde): bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe nyi ma shar khar glang po rin po che de la zhon tes chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i
17b5(mdo sde): mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas khye'u sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa
17b6(mdo sde): de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rta
17b7(mdo sde): rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyur ba/ mgo nag pa/ rngog ma lcang lor 'dug pa/ zhon na gus par byed pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas
18a1(mdo sde): pa| gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' las 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can
18a2(mdo sde): te| 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ba'o/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe nyi ma
18a3(mdo sde): shar khar rta rin po che de la zhon nas sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor
18a4(mdo sde): nas khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin
18a5(mdo sde): po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad du sngo ba/ bai DUR+Ya'i
18a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin zur brgyad du 'dug pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro/ /gang
18a7(mdo sde): g i tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe mtshan mo nam gyi gung la mun pa mun nag gi nang du nor bu rin
18b1(mdo sde): rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te skyed mos tshal gyi sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir song na/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs
18b2(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra 'khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /nor bu rin po che'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar
18b3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong / gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad smra ste/ bzhin bzang dag longs/ las kyi mtha' dag byos shig/
18b4(mdo sde): tshong 'dus dag khrom/ nyi ma shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /
18b5(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi po nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin
18b6(mdo sde): po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ tshul dang mthun pa/ rgyal rigs su skyes pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/
18b7(mdo sde): ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi nag pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ tshul du shis pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de'i spu'i khung
19a1(mdo sde): thams cad nas tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ kha nas ut+pa la'i ngad ldang ba/ ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ de grang ba'i dus na ni lus la
19a2(mdo sde): reg na dro ba/ dro ba'i dus na/ lus la reg na bsil ba ste/ de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'dod chags su mi byed na/
19a3(mdo sde): lus kyis lta ci smos te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin
19a4(mdo sde): po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa/ gsal
19a5(mdo sde): ba| yid gzhungs pa/ lha'i mig dang ldan pa 'byung ngo / /de lha'i mig des dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i gter dag kyang mthong / bdag po
19a6(mdo sde): med pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/ de bdag po med pa'i gter gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 'khor los sgyur
19a7(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/
19b1(mdo sde): 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa'o/ /de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po des
19b2(mdo sde): bsam pa tsam gyis bsko bar bya ba'i dpung rnams sko'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
19b3(mdo sde): rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la bu stong 'byung ste/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab
19b4(mdo sde): tu 'joms pa sha stag ste/ des rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la
19b5(mdo sde): chos kyis legs par phab ste gnas so/ /gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/ 'dren pa
19b6(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro zhes rig byed 'don du 'dzud do/ /de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dzam+bu'i gling du lhags shing
19b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dag la skul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag /da ste lo bcu gnyis na byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug gi /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'or
20a1(mdo sde): cig ces zer ro/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na mjug ma sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ri la rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya
20a2(mdo sde): ba 'dug pas sgra de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'jim pa la bya ba de bzhin du 'dug ste/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so/ /gyen du 'phags nas
20a3(mdo sde): kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so/ /de'i mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag
20a4(mdo sde): tu gyur pa gang yin pa thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' zhig sa la lhags nas rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes zhes
20a5(mdo sde): grag ste yod do/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe yul wA ra NA si'i ri dwags kyi nags drang srong ltung ba na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas nam
20a6(mdo sde): mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te sgron ma bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de dag gi mkhris pa
20a7(mdo sde): dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' zhig sa
20b1(mdo sde): la lhags so/ /de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes de phyin chad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba'ang drang srong lhung pa drang srong pa zhes ming du chags par gyur to/ /mi 'jigs
20b2(mdo sde): pa byin pa'i ri dwags dag kyang de na gnas pas de phyin chad ri dwags kyi nags zhes bya ba'ang ri dwags kyi nags ri dwags kyi nags zhes ming du chags par gyur to/ /dge slong
20b3(mdo sde): dag / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni rnam par blta pa chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus la rnam
20b4(mdo sde): par lta ba dang / gling la rnam par lta ba dang / yul la rnam par lta ba dang / rigs la rnam par lta ba'o/ /dge slong dag /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par blta
20b5(mdo sde): ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi /gang gi tshe 'jig rten gsal bar kun nas gnas
20b6(mdo sde): par gyur te/ skye ba snang bar gyur/ rga ba snang bar gyur/ na ba snang bar gyur/ 'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go /dge slong
20b7(mdo sde): dag / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi gling du mi skye/ shar gyi lus 'phags
21a1(mdo sde): por mi skye/ nub kyi ba lang spyod du mi skye/ byang gi sgra mi snyan du mi skye'o/ /lho'i 'dzam+bu gling nyid du skye'o/ /dge slong dag /ci'i phyir byang chub sems
21a2(mdo sde): dpa' yul rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkugs
21a3(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can legs par bstan pa dang / nyes par bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i skal ba med pa dag yod pa dag tu mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa'
21a4(mdo sde): ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o/ /dge slong dag /ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rigs dma'
21a5(mdo sde): ba gdol ba'i rigs sam/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/ g.yung rigs su mi skye'i/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kho na ste/
21a6(mdo sde): rigs gnyis su skye'o/ /de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye'o/ /gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs
21a7(mdo sde): su skye ste/ dge slong dag /da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag /don gyi dbang de la brten
21b1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa rnam par blta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to/ /'phags
21b2(mdo sde): pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gcig la gcig 'di
21b3(mdo sde): skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur/ yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi lhums su 'jug par 'gyur zhes 'dri'o/ /de la la la na re/
21b4(mdo sde): yul ma ga d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyal la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas
21b5(mdo sde): su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni ma'i rgyud kyis dag pa'ang ma yin/ pha'i rgyud kyis dag pa'ang
21b6(mdo sde): ma yin la/ bsod nams chung dus byung gi /bsod nams rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma yin zhing / rgod la mi brtan te mi gnas pa yin la/ yul de'ang nye 'khor gseg
21b7(mdo sde): mas gang ba/ skyed mos tshal dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dag kyang mi mngal/ ri brag ltar mtha' 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun ba ma yin no/ /
22a1(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang zhing bzhon pa mang la nor che ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhungs su
22a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun par ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ko sa la'i rigs ni gdol ba'i rigs
22a3(mdo sde): las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/ pha dang mas dag pa'ang ma yin la/ dma' ba la mos pa ste/ rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/ nor dang rin po che'i gter yang
22a4(mdo sde): tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ rgyal po bad sa'i rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la
22a5(mdo sde): lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang de'i
22a6(mdo sde): tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po bad sa'i rigs ni phal pa ste/ gtum la gzi brjid 'bar ba'ang ma yin zhing / skyes pa gzhan
22a7(mdo sde): las skye ba grub pa/ pha ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las kyis grub pa ma yin la/ de'i rgyal po'ang chad par smra ba ste/ de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhe zer
22b1(mdo sde): ro| |la la na re/ grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ nyams dga' la skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu
22b2(mdo sde): gang ba| stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/ me
22b3(mdo sde): tog gi ra ba dang / nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la/ lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su
22b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med
22b5(mdo sde): do| |chos spyod pa med do/ /gong ma dang / bar ma dang / rgan pa dang / gtso bo dag la'ang rim gror bya ba med cing / re re zhing yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o/ /bdag
22b6(mdo sde): ni rgyal po'i snyam su sems pas slob mar khas len pa med cing / chos khams len pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/ /la
22b7(mdo sde): la na re/ grong khyer 'phags rgyal na rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che zhing bzhon pa mang ba/ pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba thob pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems
23a1(mdo sde): dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
23a2(mdo sde): ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la brlang zhing gzu lums can rgod pa ste/ las yod par lta ba'ang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de'ang byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums
23a3(mdo sde): su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ grong khyer bcom brlag 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo
23a4(mdo sde): mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba yin pas/ rgyal po lag bzang sde dpa' ba'i bdag po'i rgyal po'i pho brang de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i
23a5(mdo sde): gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du
23a6(mdo sde): skyes pa ste/ mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi rigs te/ de'i phyir de'ang
23a7(mdo sde): tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ grong khyer ha sti na pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skya ba seng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud las skyes pa/ dpa' zhing rtul phod pa
23b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'joms pa ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas
23b2(mdo sde): kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skya bseng gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag gis ni rigs kyi rgyud
23b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/ g.yul ngor brtan pa la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer/ 'jigs sde la ni rlung gi bu zhes zer/ srid sgrub la ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/
23b4(mdo sde): rigs med dang / lhar bcas la ni tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/ de'i phyir rigs de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes
23b5(mdo sde): zer ro| |la la na re/ grong khyer bcom brlag 'di ni shin tu'ang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi snyed du rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa'ang
23b6(mdo sde): yin la| rgyal pod de'ang glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / dpung gi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
23b7(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad shin tu mang ba/ rgyal po dang blon po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs
24a1(mdo sde): dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa/ mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i
24a2(mdo sde): gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ de'ang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod
24a3(mdo sde): mod kyi| de ni shin tu rgas bas bu skyed pa'i mthu'ang med la/ bu'ang mang bas de'i phyir rigs de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os
24a4(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes zer ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha de dag gis dzam+bu'i gling gi yul chen po bcu drug po thams cad na rgyal po'i rigs mthon po mthon
24a5(mdo sde): po'i rigs gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la bltas na/ thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/ de dag de ltar sems pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe lha'i
24a6(mdo sde): bu ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig yod pa des byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang /
24a7(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor chen po yod pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag tshur shog /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/ rigs rin po che yon tan ji lta
24b1(mdo sde): bur phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang / legs so/ /zhes te/ de dag thams cad kyang thal mo
24b2(mdo sde): sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin te dris pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ rigs rin po che yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa
24b3(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / lha'i tshogs chen po de dag la rnam par bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs
24b4(mdo sde): po dag / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
24b5(mdo sde): lta ste| rigs de ni/ btsun pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa yin/ rigs de ni phran tshegs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni
24b6(mdo sde): rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung
24b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/
25a1(mdo sde): rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes pa mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bud med mang ba
25a2(mdo sde): yin| rigs de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhum pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni tshul khrims dang
25a3(mdo sde): ldan ba yin/ rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni blon pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing
25a4(mdo sde): longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi srog la lta ba yin/ rigs de
25a5(mdo sde): ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'dun pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba yin/
25a6(mdo sde): rigs de ni gti mug gis mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin/ rigs de ni gti mug
25a7(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa yin/ rigs de ni lag sbabs che ba yin/ rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos
25b1(mdo sde): ba yin| rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de
25b2(mdo sde): ni drang srong mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mchod rten mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mtshun rjed pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khon du 'dzin pa
25b3(mdo sde): med pa yin/ rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni
25b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rigs kyi nang na gtso bor bya ba yin/ rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin/ rigs de ni dbang che bar grags
25b5(mdo sde): pa yin| rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni
25b6(mdo sde): nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/ rigs de ni dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram
25b7(mdo sde): dang / dngul dang / rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba yin/ rigs de ni glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mong dang / ba lang dang / lug shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bran pho dang /
26a1(mdo sde): bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yin/ rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa
26a2(mdo sde): yin| rigs de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/ rigs de ni byang chub
26a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i
26a4(mdo sde): skye rgu dang bcas pa'i nang na rigs las smos pa'i skyon gyi kha na ma tho ba thams cad dang bral ba ste/ grogs po dag /gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung
26a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni| rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/ /grogs po dag /srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang gi mngal du
26a6(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa
26a7(mdo sde): tha ma pa ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i bud med kyi mngal du 'jug go / kun gyis mngon par rig pa dang / spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa
26b1(mdo sde): dang / cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ming phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / sngon chad ma btsas pa dang /
26b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / mthun par 'dzin pa dang / gsal ba dang / dul ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang /
26b3(mdo sde): mang du thos pa dang / mkhas pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / mi khro ba dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / ca co med
26b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi shas chung ba dang / bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang /
26b5(mdo sde): khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go /grogs po
26b6(mdo sde): dag / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/ /grogs po
26b7(mdo sde): dag / byang chub sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi /byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma ba ni zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste rgyas pa la
27a1(mdo sde): skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ ma gso sbyong blangs pa'i mngal du 'jug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems
27a2(mdo sde): dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang / ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di rnam pa ji snyed du bstan pa de lta
27a3(mdo sde): bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig la yod snyam du sems so/ /de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la zhugs ba na/ de dag 'di snyam ste/ shAkya'i grong khyer 'di
27a4(mdo sde): 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/ nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba yin la/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang ma'i rgyud kyis dag pa/ pha'i
27a5(mdo sde): rgyud kyis dag pa/ chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/ las kyi mtha' la nyon mongs pa med pa/ dpe byad bzang pa/ shin tu mdzangs pa/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/
27a6(mdo sde): grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa/ nor dang / gter dang / rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ las yod par
27a7(mdo sde): lta ba| sdig pa'i lta ba med pa/ shAkya'i yul kun na'ang rgyal po de gcig pur zad de/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim
27b1(mdo sde): gror bya zhing mchod pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang yang mi rga na/ ha cang yang mi gzhon zhing gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzo shes pa/ dus
27b2(mdo sde): shes pa| bdag shes pa/ chos shes pa/ sems shes pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ mtshan shes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis rjes su ston pa'o/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong
27b3(mdo sde): khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa rnams kyi gnas te/ gang dag der skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang skal ba 'dra ba dag go /rgyal po zas gtsang ma de
27b4(mdo sde): l a lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo zhig yod pa'ang phyug cing gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs
27b5(mdo sde): pa| sngon chad ma btsas pa/ bu dang bu mo med pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ bu don la bris pa ltar blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo ltar rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bud med kyi skyon
27b6(mdo sde): rnams dang bral ba/ bden par smra ba/ mi drag pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi gcor ba/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gyo mo'i sgra lta bu med pa/ ca co med pa/ 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong
27b7(mdo sde): bar smra ba/ mi des pa dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang / khro ba med pa/ phrag dog med pa/ dus su smra ba/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/
28a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ khyos chog par 'dzin pa/ khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/ skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral ba/ mgo
28a2(mdo sde): dang / rna ba dang / sna gnas su phebs pa/ bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i skra dang ldan pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ smin tshugs legs pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ bzhin
28a3(mdo sde): 'dzum pa/ gsod por smra ba/ 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ drang ba/ gya gyu med pa/ sgyu med pa/ g.yo med pa/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes
28a4(mdo sde): pa| mi rgod pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ kha ngan mi smra ba/ 'chal ba'i tshig med pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi shas chung ba/ dang des shing bzod pa dang ldan pa/
28a5(mdo sde): rkang lag dang / mig dang / blo shin tu bsrungs pa/ rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par
28a6(mdo sde): dag pa| sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug pa/ yan lag shin tu brtan pa/ 'ja'i dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/ yan
28a7(mdo sde): lag la smad du med pa/ mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/ blta na mdzes pa/ mgul rim bzhin du 'dug pa/ rgyan dam pa dang ldan pa/ sna ma'i me tog dang par+shi ka ltar so
28b1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phrag pa legs par byin gyis 'tsham pa/ rim gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung pa dang ldan pa/ rked pa gzhu'i 'chang bzung ltar phra ba/ gzhogs
28b2(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa/ lte ba khung zab pa/ sta zur 'jam zhing yangs la zlum zhing brtan par grub pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshungs par med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ glang po'i
28b3(mdo sde): sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/ byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/ 'gro ba'i mig tu sdug
28b4(mdo sde): pa| mig gi dbang po nyams pa med pa/ yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che'i gzugs las kyang khyad par 'phags pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ sgyu 'phrul
28b5(mdo sde): sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pas sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar btags pa/ sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/ dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
28b6(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul du tshul dang mthun gyi/ gang byang chub sems dpas rigs dag pa bstan pa de ni shAkya'i rigs
28b7(mdo sde): nyid la snang gi/ gzhan la ni ma yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa'i sems can chos mtho khang bzang na/ /chos bzang seng+ge'i khri la rab tu 'dug /byang chub sems
29a1(mdo sde): dpa' grags chen ldan pa dang / /skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams drang srong 'khor/ /de na 'dug cing de ni 'di snyam sems/ /rigs gang rnam dag rab tu
29a2(mdo sde): shes dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye dang tshul mthun gang / /pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di kun tu rnam bltas na/ /rgyal rigs rgyal
29a3(mdo sde): rgyud che ba gang yin pa/ /kun kyang skyon dang bcas par rjes bsam nas/ /shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong / /zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs nang rigs dang ldan/ /
29a4(mdo sde): mi dbang rgyud na rnam dag cho rigs can/ /'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug pa med pa ste/ /skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can/ /ser skyar brjod pa'i grong khyer sems can
29a5(mdo sde): gzhan| |kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan/ /skyed mos kun dga' gzhal med khang gis brgyan/ /skye ba'i sar ni ser skyar brjod pa mdzes/ /kun kyang tshan chen
29a6(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog /'phong rtsal bslab pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang / /srog gi don du gzhan la gnod mi byed/ /zas
29a7(mdo sde): gtsang rgyal po'i bud med dben pa ste/ /bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin/ /yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs/ /de yi ming yang lha mo sgyu 'phrul te/ /
29b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha yi bu mo bzhin/ /'byes pa'i lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug /lha dang mi rnams gang yang rung ba dag /sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngoms de med kyang
29b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags zhen med sdang bas zhe sdang med/ /de ni 'jam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan/ /mi brlang mi rtsub shin tu des pa ste/ /de ni bzhin 'dzum khro gnyer rab tu spangs/ /ngo tsha khrel
29b3(mdo sde): yod chos spyod ldan pa ste/ /nga rgyal med cing ma khengs rgod pa med/ /phrag dog med cing sgyu dang g.yo med de/ /gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan/ /las yod lta zhing
29b4(mdo sde): log pa'i sbyor ba spangs/ /bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams/ /sa la gang yod bud med skyon mang tshogs/ /de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin/ /mi yi 'jig
29b5(mdo sde): rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag na bud med bzhin/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med ga la lhag /drang srong chen po'i mar ni de 'os te/ /tshe rabs lnga brgya kho
29b6(mdo sde): nar tshang bar yang / /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to/ /de dang der ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste/ /de phyir yon tan ldan pa'i ma yi 'os/ /dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs
29b7(mdo sde): gnas| |brtul zhugs rjes spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod/ /rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na/ /'dod pa ma spyad zla ba sum cu gnyis/ /gang gi phyogs na de 'dug
30a1(mdo sde): 'greng ba'am/ /nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur ba'i gnas dag kyang / /de yi las dge gzhol ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar
30a2(mdo sde): gyur| |lha dang lha min mi rnams gang yang rung / /'dod chags sems kyis blta bar nus pa med/ /spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan/ /de la kun kyang ma
30a3(mdo sde): dang bu mor lta/ /sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyus/ /rgyal po'i srid ni rab yangs rnam par 'phel/ /khams kyi rgyal po'ang 'jug par mi byed cing / /rgyal po'i grags
30a4(mdo sde): dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel/ /de ltar sgyu 'phrul snod du mthun gyur cing / /de ltar sems can dam pa mchog mdzes pas/ /de gnyis yon tan mchog dang ldan pas
30a5(mdo sde): na| |'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma yi 'os/ /lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste/ /glang po khri yi stobs bdog ma gtogs par/ /dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di na mi mchog
30a6(mdo sde): de| |'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med/ /de skad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya chen dag /shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' bar
30a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa yi/ /yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer/ /rigs yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub
30b1(mdo sde): s ems dpas skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po chu dang rgyal dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa gang du byang chub sems
30b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'dug ste/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' de gzhal med khang chen po der song nas phyin pa
30b3(mdo sde): dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ khyed rnams 'dir 'du bar gyis shig /shi 'pho ba'i rnam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos rjes su dran pa rjes su
30b4(mdo sde): bstan pa tha ma'i chos mnyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig / de skad kyi tshig thos nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas te
30b5(mdo sde): gzhal med khang chen po der 'dus so/ /der byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis
30b6(mdo sde): brlabs par gyur nas de de tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du blta na sdug la/ de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
30b7(mdo sde): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rang rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par
31a1(mdo sde): sman pa'i rgyu mthun pas yongs su brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting ba/ lha'i spos
31a2(mdo sde): zhim po du mas bsgom pa/ bdug spos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/ lha'i me tog kha dog du ma'i dgra ma pa bkram pa/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma
31a3(mdo sde): 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba du ma'i sgra 'byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rin
31a4(mdo sde): po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong du mas yongs su gsal bar gyur pa/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong du mas
31a5(mdo sde): kun nas bkab pa/ dar brgya stong du mas rab tu dpyangs pa/ dar gyi phreng ba lnga ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong du mas glu blangs gar byas/
31a6(mdo sde): rol mo byas pa/ yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas rjes su bsrungs pa/ brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/ tshangs pa
31a7(mdo sde): brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
31b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pas dgongs pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung
31b2(mdo sde): ba de lta bu la 'dug go / dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs
31b3(mdo sde): po dag / byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs
31b4(mdo sde): bcu kun na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma la mngon du phyogs pa/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
31b5(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/ de nas lha'i 'khor
31b6(mdo sde): de thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/ mthong bar gyur nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de
31b7(mdo sde): legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthong
32a1(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas
32a2(mdo sde): yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa 'chi 'pho'i
32a3(mdo sde): rnam par lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig / grogs po dag /chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho'i
32a4(mdo sde): dus la bab pa'i tshe lha'i 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ba ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grogs po dag /dad pa ni chos snang ba'i
32a5(mdo sde): sgo ste| bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /dang ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnyog pa can dang bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus
32a6(mdo sde): shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus kyi nyes pa rnam
32a7(mdo sde): pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang
32b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ yid kyi brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba
32b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
32b3(mdo sde): skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang
32b4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas
32b5(mdo sde): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par 'tshe ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro/ /
32b6(mdo sde): dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dga' ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro/ /mi rtag par so sor rtog
32b7(mdo sde): pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal du so sor rtog pa ni
33a1(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam kun tu chad par 'gyur ro/ /bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la mngon par zhen pa
33a2(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ro/ /zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rjes su chags pa 'bar ba med par 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ nang nye bar
33a3(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyi rol nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bden pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lha dang mi rnams la mi slu bar 'gyur ro/ /
33a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la slu ba med par 'gyur ro/ /chos spyad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos la rten par 'gyur ro/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba
33a5(mdo sde): ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /byas pa gzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams chud mi za bar
33a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la bstod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /
33a7(mdo sde): sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan
33b1(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
33b2(mdo sde): zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'khon du mi 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gyod pa med par 'gyur
33b3(mdo sde): ro| |mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ the tshom med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro/ /mi sdug par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa spong bar
33b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gnod sems med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi shes pa rnam par
