33b5(mdo sde): sel bar 'gyur ro/ /chos don du gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ don la rton par 'gyur ro/ /chos 'dod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa
33b6(mdo sde): tshol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ /
33b7(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyur lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa ni chos snang
34a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo ste/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtho bar sems pa med
34a2(mdo sde): cing dma' bar sems pa med par 'gyur ro/ /phung po la mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/ /khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos
34a3(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro/ /skye mched bsal ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lam sgom par 'gyur ro/ /mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo
34a4(mdo sde): ste| 'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/ /lus la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dben par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang
34a5(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /sems la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/ /chos la
34a6(mdo sde): song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rab rib dang bral ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dge ba'i chos thams
34a7(mdo sde): cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro/ /dad
34b1(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par
34b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dran pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las legs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par grol bar
34b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi dbang po ni/ chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngon sum gyi ye shes su 'gyur ro/ /dad pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdud kyi stobs las yang dag par
34b4(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge
34b5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi thul bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa yang dag byang
34b6(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams
34b7(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub
35a1(mdo sde): kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
35a2(mdo sde): bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /btang snyoms yang
35a3(mdo sde): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skye bo thams cad la smod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur
35a4(mdo sde): ro| |yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i dag ni chos snang
35a5(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ yi ge dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i
35a6(mdo sde): sgo ste/ las med cing rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshol ba thams cad rgyun du chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i rtsol
35a7(mdo sde): ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med par 'gyur ro/ /
35b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems mi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dkon mchog
35b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
35b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha
35b4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed
35b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing tshul khrims 'tshal ba'i sems
35b6(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang /
35b7(mdo sde): rgyags pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gnod sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i
36a1(mdo sde): chos brtsams pa thams cad nyams su lon par 'gyur zhing le lo can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
36a2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thams cad bskyed cing sems g.yeng pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /
36a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing shes rab kyi 'chal pa'i sems can
36a4(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
36a5(mdo sde): cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni/ chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad sdud cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
36a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang
36a7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho
36b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
36b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /lhag mthong gi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang
36b3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro/ /rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo
36b4(mdo sde): ste| sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed par
36b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang
36b6(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sa nas sar
36b7(mdo sde): 'phar ba'i ye shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngal du
37a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / btsas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud gdul ba dang / byang chub
37a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo
37a3(mdo sde): brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par bya ba'o/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpas
37a4(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i 'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /
37a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyangs pa byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnam la chos kyi mig
37a6(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis bus mo nub tsam du yog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang
37a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang gi tshe na dga' ldan gnas mchog nas/ 'dren pa
37b1(mdo sde): skyes bu seng+ge 'chi 'pho'i tshe/ /lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni/ /bag med mtha' dag rnam par spongs zhes smra/ /lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa/ /yid kyis bsam pas
37b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba dpal ldan pa/ /thams cad las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ /de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin/ /de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis/ /sngon gyi dge bsags 'di
37b3(mdo sde): ni zad gyur te/ /gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba/ /ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re/ /nga la gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni/ /chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la/ /
37b4(mdo sde): nan tan gyis ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang / /bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad mi rtag brtan pa min/ /ther zug ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste/ /smig
37b5(mdo sde): rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra/ /glog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag gi dga' ba ni/ /lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur/ /gang dag
37b6(mdo sde): rdul med 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur/ /lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni/ /gar gyi ltad mo ba dang mtshungs shing 'dra/ /dper na
37b7(mdo sde): 'dus pa dag ni khri las su/ /phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor bar byed dang mtshungs/ /dge ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing / /phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par/ /
38a1(mdo sde): 'dus byas dag la grogs yod ma yin te/ /mdza' bshes nye du med cing 'khor kyang med/ /de lta bas na lhan cig mthun byos la/ /phan tshun byams sems
38a2(mdo sde): phan pa'i sems byos te/ /chos kyi spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis/ /spyad pa legs par spyad la gdung pa med/ /thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing / /bzod dang
38a3(mdo sde): des pa phun sum tshogs bgyis te/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun dang / /de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis/ /rtag pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la/ /
38a4(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing / /bdag po med la bem por gyur pa yi/ /chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag par gyis/ /nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang //
38a5(mdo sde): spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams gang mthong ba/ /kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ /thos dang tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung / /sems can don dang phan
38a6(mdo sde): dang byams don du/ /nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang / /bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang / /yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis/ /ngag dang skad dang sgra
38a7(mdo sde): rnams tsam gyis ni/ /dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyi/ /nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub byos la/ /ji ltar smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos/ /gzhan gyis gleng
38b1(mdo sde): ba'i skabs ni ma dbye bar/ /bdag ni rtag tu sgrim pas 'bad par gyis/ /la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin/ /ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba med/ /sngon chad 'khor
38b2(mdo sde): bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag / myong par gang gyur de ni dran par gyis/ /khyed cag log pa nyid du nges pas na/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'dod chags bral ma thob/ /de lta bas na dal
38b3(mdo sde): dang bshes gnyen dang / /tshul dang mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang / /chos mnyan dam pa thob par byas nas ni/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis/ /nga rgyal
38b4(mdo sde): dang ni rgyags dang dregs thongs la/ /rtag tu mnyen zhing drang la g.yo med cing / /mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te/ /lam rtogs bya ba'i phyir ni sbyor bar gyis/ /gti mug
38b5(mdo sde): rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang / /shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis/ /bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra ba rnams/ /ye shes rdo rje yis ni rnam par khrol/ /shin tu mang
38b6(mdo sde): por smra ba ci dgos te/ /don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la/ /khyed cag gnas par byas par ma gyur na/ /de la chos kyis lan pa ma yin no/ /gang tshe ngas ni byang chub thob gyur
38b7(mdo sde): te| |'chi med 'gro ba'i chos char 'bebs pa'i tshe/ /rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyed/ /chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shog cig /chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste/ bzhi
39a1(mdo sde): pa'o|| ||dge slong dag / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan/ yang dag
39a2(mdo sde): par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas/ bzod par byas nas lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/
39a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag /kho bo ni dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro'o/ /kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang / snyan par
39a4(mdo sde): smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun par bya ba bzhi la mgron du bos la/ grogs po dag /da kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
39a5(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni kho bos byas pa ma shes shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i
39a6(mdo sde): bu de dag du zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mi bzhugs na/ dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par
39a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di khyed la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes
39b1(mdo sde): de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gi mgo las thod dang cod pan phog ste byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam
39b2(mdo sde): pa khyod ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas byang
39b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis
39b4(mdo sde): ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/ de la kha cig na re/ bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro/ /la la na re/ brgya byin gyi gzugs su/ la la na re/
39b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ sgra gcan gyi gzugs su/ la la na re/ dri za'i
39b6(mdo sde): gzugs su/ la la na re/ mi'am ci'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ zla ba'i gzugs
39b7(mdo sde): su| la la na re/ nyi ma'i gzugs su/ la la na re/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid
40a1(mdo sde): d am pa zhes bya ba sngon dang srong las shi 'phos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces
40a2(mdo sde): s mras so| |bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi rig byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa'i rigs
40a3(mdo sde): so| |de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/ glang po dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa/ /mche ba drug can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs/ /mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes/ /'gram nas
40a4(mdo sde): zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan pa'o/ /rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi/ /bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur
40a5(mdo sde): zhes| |yang dag nyid du lung ni ston par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus la bltas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du
40a6(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der snga ltas brgyad bstan to/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim de rtswa dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / dri
40a7(mdo sde): ma med la chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas shing / rlung rdul can dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang
40b1(mdo sde): bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sdeg sbrul med cing me tog gis kun tu gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba dang po'o/ /ri'i rgyal
40b2(mdo sde): po gangs ri la bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa
40b3(mdo sde): s gro gshog sna tshogs mdzes pa yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs
40b4(mdo sde): bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang gi steng dag tu gnas shing dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde
40b5(mdo sde): ba skyes nas rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' rab nyams dga' ba dang / nags tshal
40b6(mdo sde): nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ldon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me
40b7(mdo sde): tog rgyas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma
41a1(mdo sde): 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi
41a2(mdo sde): pa'o| |rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de na mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag
41a3(mdo sde): yod pa de dag kyang yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam
41a4(mdo sde): pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag na rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar ba'i sil
41a5(mdo sde): khrol dang / pheg rdob la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur te/ 'di ni snga
41a6(mdo sde): ltas byung ba drug pa'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
41a7(mdo sde): la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha bye zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag cing rab tu gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba
41b1(mdo sde): bdun pa'o/ /nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing / lus dang sems dga' bskyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba brgyad pa'o/ /'phags
41b2(mdo sde): pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/ lus byug pas byugs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/
41b3(mdo sde): gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing btsun spu dang bcas la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa thob nas bud med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar
41b4(mdo sde): te lhan cig tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma rol mo bya ba'i khang bzang na bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/ g.yas rol na khri bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la 'dug nas 'dzum
41b5(mdo sde): pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing rab tu dang ba'i mdog gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal po sa bdag legs par bdag la gsan du
41b6(mdo sde): gsol/ /rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la da gnod zhig/ bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba/ /de dag bdag la gsan cing thugs dgyes rangs par
41b7(mdo sde): mdzod/ /lha bdag bsnyen gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol/ /bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te/ /srog chags gnod pa spangs
42a1(mdo sde): shing bsam pa rtag dag pas/ /ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi/ /rku sems rnam par spangs te 'dod dang dregs pa spangs/ /
42a2(mdo sde): rgyal po 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid/ /bden la gnas shing phra ma mchis zhe gcod spang / /mi dge kyal pa'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do/ /gnod
42a3(mdo sde): sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyas pa dang / /brnab sems kun spangs rang gi nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi/ /yang dag sbyor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spang / /
42a4(mdo sde): dge bcu'i las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi/ /bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis/ /mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sred
42a5(mdo sde): ma mdzad/ /rgyal po khyod la yun ring mi dger 'gyur du mchi/ /bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod/ /rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags
42a6(mdo sde): deng myur stsol/ /khang bzang bsil khang ldan pa dang skya ldan pa'i nang / /me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar/ /grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bde
42a7(mdo sde): dgar gnas snyam bgyid/ /skyes pa nyug rum rnams dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang / /bud med pa la pa rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal/ /snyan cing yid mchi sgra snyan
42b1(mdo sde): nyan pa ma gtogs par/ /gzugs dang sgra bsung yid du mi mchi bdag mi 'tshal/ /bcings dang btson rar stsal ba thams cad dgye bar gsol/ /nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams
42b2(mdo sde): nor dang ldan par mdzod/ /zas skom rad pa shing rta khyogs dang bzhon pa rta/ /'grol bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal ba mdzod/ /pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag /
42b3(mdo sde): ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing / /phan tshun byams pa'i yid ldan phan dang nges sems kyis/ /dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar mthun zhing bde spyod
42b4(mdo sde): mdzod| |rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis bda' ba dang / /gnod pa bgyid dang rdeg btsog sdigs ru mi mdzad par/ /kun la'ang dang ba'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs
42b5(mdo sde): te| |lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs/ /rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas/ /smras pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya/ /khyod kyi bsam
42b6(mdo sde): pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsam zhing / /khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no/ /rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni/ /khang bzang dam pa'i steng
42b7(mdo sde): du phun sum tshogs pa shoms/ /me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs/ /gdugs dang ba dan ta la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis/ /'thab phod stong phrag
43a1(mdo sde): nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can/ /mda' mdung lcags mda' mdud thung ral gri thogs pa dag/ yid 'ong sgra gcan ngang skya ldan pa bskor bgyis te/ /
43a2(mdo sde): lha mo 'jigs pa med pa bya phyir srung zhing gnas/ /khrus byas spos byugs gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan/ /bud med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo
43a3(mdo sde): 'dra| |yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te/ /lha mo der zhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/ /lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsa spras pa/ /khri la gos
43a4(mdo sde): mchog mang pos yid 'ong ma la bshams te/ /mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen klong byas nas/ /'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/ /dge slong
43a5(mdo sde): dag / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
43a6(mdo sde): dbang byed dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang / mdun na 'don tshangs bzang dang / 'od bkod pa
43a7(mdo sde): dang / 'od gsal dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mthar thug dang / 'og min pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha brgya stong
43b1(mdo sde): mang po 'dus te gcig la gcig 'di skad cas smras so/ /grogs po dag /bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig bu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/ bdag
43b2(mdo sde): cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/ bdag cag la mi cha'i/ grogs po dag /khyed kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / lhums
43b3(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa dang / bltams pa dang / thor bu dang / byis pa'i nang na rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / rol mo gzigs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba
43b4(mdo sde): dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
43b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du phan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / phangs pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems kyis
43b6(mdo sde): rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis//
43b7(mdo sde): gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring byed par spro/ /su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi brjid dang / /stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod/ /gang zhig lha yi pho
44a1(mdo sde): brang 'di dag na/ /lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi/ /lha yi bde bas dga' bar 'dod pa dag /dri med zla ba'i zhal gyis zhabs 'bring gyis/ /de
44a2(mdo sde): bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog / lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na/ /gser mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na/ /dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i
44a3(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring gyis/ /gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du/ /dga' tshal me tog man+dAr 'dab rgyas su/ /lha mo lhan cig rtse bar 'dod pa dag /skyes bu chen po 'di yi zhabs
44a4(mdo sde): 'bring gyis/ /'thab bral bdag po'am dga' ldan bdag po'am/ /yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / /'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'os 'dod pa dag /grags pa mtha'
44a5(mdo sde): yas 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/ /gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang / /dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod cing / /yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa/ /
44a6(mdo sde): yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/ /bdud kyi dbang po zhe sdang yid med pa/ /rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin pa'i/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar
44a7(mdo sde): phyin 'dod na/ /phan pa mdzad pa 'di dang lhan cig dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par su 'dod pa/ /de ni tshad med bzhi
44b1(mdo sde): yi gzi mnga' ba/ /skyes bu chen po'i zhabs 'bring deng nas gyis/ /'on tang gang zhig mi yi nang dag tu/ /'khor los bsgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod na/ /rin chen 'byung gnas
44b2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs bden sbyin pa/ /bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring gyis/ /gang zhig sa bdag de bzhin tshong dpon bu/ /phyug cing skyid la nor mang tshogs chen dang / /dgra
44b3(mdo sde): yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa/ /de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig dengs/ /gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang / /snyan pa grags dang spobs dang yon tan
44b4(mdo sde): dang / /gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa/ /de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song / /lha dang mi yi 'dod pa gang yin dang / /srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams cad
44b5(mdo sde): dang / /bsam gtan bde dang dben pa'i bde 'dod pa/ /de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zhabs 'bring gyis/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spang ba dang / /nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod
44b6(mdo sde): cing / /zhi ba rab zhi nyer zhi yid ldan pa/ /de ni thugs dul zhabs 'bring myur du song / /gang zhig slob dang mi slob rang rgyal dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod cing / /
44b7(mdo sde): stobs bcus seng+ge'i sgra sgrog su 'dod pa/ /de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung song / /gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gcod cing / /bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang / /
45a1(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na/ /'gro lam mthar 'byin 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/ /gang zhig bde gshegs yongs su mchod pa dang / /
45a2(mdo sde): thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang / /dge 'dun yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/ /skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang / /
45a3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par dgrol ba dang / /nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa/ /de ni sems can dag pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis/ /'gro ba kun na yid 'ong
45a4(mdo sde): sdug mdzes shing / /gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang / /bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'grel 'dod pa/ /de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song / /
45a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang / /zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba yi/ /rnam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de/ /sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du
45a6(mdo sde): myur du song / /yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang / /srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /yon tan thams cad rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa/ /de ni brtul zhugs
45a7(mdo sde): grub mkhas gan du song / /tshig de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha 'bum
45b1(mdo sde): dang / dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang / 'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang / tshangs ris kyi lha drug khri brgya stong dang /
45b2(mdo sde): 'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang
45b3(mdo sde): po 'dus par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag cag rnams kyi bsam
45b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag ci 'dra yi/ /tshig 'di lha yi dbang po dag gis gsan du gsol/ /'dod pa'i dga' 'byor bsam gtan bde ba mchog spangs te/ /sems can dag pa dam pa 'di
45b5(mdo sde): yi zhabs 'bring bgyi/ /lhums su gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs dang bltams pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin tu mchod par bgyi/ /bsod nams dag gis
45b6(mdo sde): bsrungs pa'i drang srong yongs bsrungs na/ /zhe sdang sems kyis sus kyang glags rnyed 'gyur ma mchis/ /glu dbyangs sil snyan rol mo'i dbyangs sgra legs bsgrags pas/ /yon
45b7(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de/ /gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par/ /lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi/ /rgyal po'i
46a1(mdo sde): pho brang me tog sil mas rgyas par dgang / /a ga ru mchog nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi/ /de yi dri tshor lha mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing / /nad
46a2(mdo sde): med rims nad bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi/ /me tog mnad ra dang kun nas 'du ba dang / /sim byad rab tu sim byed s+tha la rnam snang dang / /me tog bzang pos 'phrin
46a3(mdo sde): las dge las byung ba de/ /mchod pa'i slad du ser skya'i grong kun dgang bar bgyi/ /ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum ma gos bzhugs/ /ji srid rga shi mthar 'byin
46a4(mdo sde): bltams par gyur gyi bar/ /de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyis zhabs 'bring bgyi/ /blo gros che mnga' mchod par bgyi bar bdag cag sems/ /bltams nas gom pa
46a5(mdo sde): bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis/ /lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba/ /sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi/ /lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen
46a6(mdo sde): legs par thob/ /ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su mthun mdzad cing / /'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la/ /ji srid cig na rgyal srid kun spangs
46a7(mdo sde): khab nas 'byung / /de srid dus su dang ba'i sems kyis zhabs 'bring bgyi/ /ji srid cig na rin bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs/ /ji srid cig na bdud bcom byang chub
46b1(mdo sde): reg 'gyur cing / /tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa/ /de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med btul
46b2(mdo sde): gyur te| |stong gsum 'dir ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las nam lags nas/ /zhi zhing bsal ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa/ /de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen gtang mi
46b3(mdo sde): bgyi| |dge slong dag / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can
46b4(mdo sde): dag pa mchog dam pa 'di lta bu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa mchog
46b5(mdo sde): t u bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas
46b6(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur te/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dam pa skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang bzang chen po dang skya ldan zhes bya ba lha'i
46b7(mdo sde): dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas lha'i bu mo gos lhug lhug po gyon pa/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu
47a1(mdo sde): brgyan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal mchog gi steng na 'dug pa mthong nas phan tshun mdzub mos ston cing / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de
47a2(mdo sde): gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams/ /yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas/ /de tshe de dag 'di snyam
47a3(mdo sde): sems gyur te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyur ji 'dra snyam/ /lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams/ /the tshom skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /me tog de bzhin byug
47a4(mdo sde): pa thogs nas su/ /sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags/ /lhug lhug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong nas/ /
47a5(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te/ /mi yi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer/ /bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa/ /lha yi bu mo gzugs
47a6(mdo sde): mchog yid 'ong snyam/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na/ /lha yi lus kyang zil gyis non par mthong / /'di ni gang zag mchog gi yum 'gyur du/ /yon
47a7(mdo sde): tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os/ /nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar/ /lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin/ /rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man chad du/ /yan lag
47b1(mdo sde): yid 'ong lha las lhag pa ste/ /mig gis blta na ngoms par 'gyur ma yin/ /yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /'di yi kha bzhin lus mdzes sdug pa ni/ /nam mkha'i
47b2(mdo sde): dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra/ /nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung / /gser sbram btso ma bzang po'i gser bzhin du/ /lha mo 'di
47b3(mdo sde): yi kha dog rnam par mdzes/ /'di yi skra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste/ /bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lcang lor 'khyil/ /'di yi mig ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /rnam dag so ni nam
47b4(mdo sde): mkha'i skar ma bzhin/ /rked pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yangs/ /phrag pa zlum zhing tshigs rnams mngon pa med/ /brla legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra ste/ /byin pa shin tu
47b5(mdo sde): legs pa byin gyis phra/ /rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste/ /'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor nges/ /de ltar rnam mang du mar bltas byas nas/ /me tog gtor te
47b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas ni/ /grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te/ /skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong / /de nas phyogs bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang / /'thab bral
47b7(mdo sde): rab dang brgya byin 'phrul ba dang / /lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang / /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye ches smras pa/ /skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed dengs la/ /skyes bu dam pa
48a1(mdo sde): de la srung ba gyis/ /'gro ba dag la yid kyis sdang ma byed/ /mi rnams la yang gtse ba ma byed cig /lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa/ /der ni
48a2(mdo sde): mthun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun/ /mda' gzhu ral gri mdud thung mtshon thogs la/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te blta par gyis/ /de ltar shi 'pho'i dus shes lha'i
48a3(mdo sde): bu rnams/ /me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni/ /sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dengs/ /smra ba'i seng+ge dus ni deng
48a4(mdo sde): legs kyi/ /'jig rten kun la thugs rje brtse bskyed de/ /mi dbang sems can dag pa 'chi 'pho ston/ /mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/ /dge slong dag /
48a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa
48a6(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas
48a7(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i
48b1(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna
48b2(mdo sde): tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/ /de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga'
48b3(mdo sde): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / byang
48b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams
48b5(mdo sde): cad kyis yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis
48b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe byang chub sems
48b7(mdo sde): d pas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la tha gru che ba 'dir sngon chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od las
49a1(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/
49a2(mdo sde): snang ba med pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang 'od dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid
49a3(mdo sde): kyis lam mer ma gyur/ thal ler ma gyur/ lhang nger ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag skyes ba de dag rang rang gis lag pa brkyang pa'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang
49a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing / der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas gcig gis gcig mthong zhing gcig gis
49a5(mdo sde): gcig shes te 'di skad du kye grogs po dag / sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so/ /kye grogs po dag /sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes
49a6(mdo sde): zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos /
49a7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu
49b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur
49b2(mdo sde): to| |dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs dma' na byang
49b3(mdo sde): phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba/ tshim par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ dang bar 'gyur ba/
49b4(mdo sde): sim par 'gyur ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/ bsngags par 'os pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mnyan na btang mi bra ba/ mi mthun pa med pa/ sdang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grag
49b5(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /skad cig de la sems can gang la'ang gnod pa'am/ 'jigs pa'am/ sdang ba'am/ bag non pa med par gyur to/ /skad cig de la nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang /
49b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can
49b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/ zhe sdang gis
50a1(mdo sde): gnod par mi 'gyur/ gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / phrag dog gam/ ser sna'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa'am/ rgyags pa'am/ khro
50a2(mdo sde): ba'am| gnod sems sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la phan tshun pha ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du
50a3(mdo sde): shes su gyur nas byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/ /lha dang mi'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par
50a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po de 'degs shing khyer bar gyur to/ /
50a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon dag nas byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon
50a6(mdo sde): par bstod pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad dge las bsags pa dang / /yun ring dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang / /khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs pas/ /de ring mchod pa rgya
50a7(mdo sde): chen byung bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na/ /lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di/ /sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras
50b1(mdo sde): bu lags/ /gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcad de/ /srang la bcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang / /sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ /yi dwags 'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom
50b2(mdo sde): thob| |bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas na/ /tshul khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ /mi khom ngan song yongs su dag
50b3(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni bzod pa bsgoms/ /bzod pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ /lha dang mi kun byams pa'i
50b4(mdo sde): sems su gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /brtson 'grus ma god dam pa bsgoms pas na/ /brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ /sku ni ri rab bzhin
50b5(mdo sde): du mdzes par grub/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /nyon mongs sbyang slad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzad pas/ /bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ /'gro
50b6(mdo sde): ba dag la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgoms mdzad pa'i/ /shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras
50b7(mdo sde): bu des| |'od gsal dam pa rnam par snang zhing mdzes/ /byams pa'i go man bas nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing / /sems can kun la thugs rje ches byung ba/ /dgyes pa
51a1(mdo sde): mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa/ /bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis 'phags shing / /
51a2(mdo sde): gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel pa/ /'dren pa stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i/ /thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes mchog la
51a3(mdo sde): mkhas| |bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslab pa/ /rgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs sgrol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs
51a4(mdo sde): dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas/ /'chi 'pho 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho ba ston/ /'jig rten chos kyi rjes su mthun mdzad kyang / /'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi
51a5(mdo sde): mnga'| |gang dag khyod ni nyan tam bltar lhags pa/ /de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab/ /khyod la chos nyid thos te gang dad cing / /dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos
51a6(mdo sde): ci 'tshal/ /dga' ldan gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur/ /dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/ /nyon mongs gnyid
51a7(mdo sde): kyis log las sad par mdzad/ /deng ni pho brang 'byor cing rgyas gyur la/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur/ /lha yi bu mos sil snyan sgra phyung bas/ /rgyal po'i
51b1(mdo sde): khab na sgra snyan grag par 'gyur/ /bsod nams gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba/ /bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa/ /de yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 'byor/ /dpal gyis
51b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum ni zil gyis gnon/ /mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis/ /de phyi phyin chad pho brang dam pa 'dir/ /lus can rnams la 'dod sdang 'thab rtsod med/ /kun kyang
51b3(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyis sri zhur bcas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung pas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum
51b4(mdo sde): tshogs| |rin chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba pa/ /lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcan/ /mi mchog srung ba gang dag
51b5(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams/ /de dag ring por mi thogs thar pa 'thob/ /gus dang sri zhu la ni gnas nas su/ /'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /kun kyang byang chub tu ni
51b6(mdo sde): yongs su bsngo/ /mi yi dam pa khyod ltar myur du shog /bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// //dge slong dag/ de ltar dgun 'das te dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha
51b7(mdo sde): chung gi tshe skar ma sa ga la bab pa dus kyi dam pa la shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas grang dro dang / mun pa dang / rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu
52a1(mdo sde): s kyes pas khebs par gnas pa'i tshe 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyis mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas tshes
52a2(mdo sde): b co lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i rum du byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te dran zhing shes bzhin du
52a3(mdo sde): glang po'i phrug gu thal dkar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/ mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nying lag
52a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa med par byas te ma'i glo g.yas pa nas zhugs so/ /zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas pa logs su brten te gnas kyi/ glo g.yon pa
52a5(mdo sde): logs su nam yang ma brten to/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo / /glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug /rkang lag rab mdzes
52a6(mdo sde): mgo bo dmar sdug pa/ /'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa/ /glang po mchog cig khong du song snyam byed/ /des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang / /ma mthong
52a7(mdo sde): ma thos myong bar ma gyur te/ /lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas/ /bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos
52b1(mdo sde): lhug lhug por gyon cing thogs pa las lus dang / sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / nyams bde ba thob nas mal dam pa de las langs te bud med kyi tshogs
52b2(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas khang bzang de'i steng nas babs te/ shing mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song nas de mya ngan 'tshang gi gnas tshal du bde
52b3(mdo sde): bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya btang nas rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ lha mos khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po zas
52b4(mdo sde): gtsang mas tshig de thos nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / 'khor dang / gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis
52b5(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song ngo / /song nas kyang bdag gi lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du
52b6(mdo sde): 'gro ma nus te/ de mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas cung zad cig bsam ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /bdag ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin
52b7(mdo sde): pa| |deng ltar lus lci bdag gis myong mi dran/ /bdag gi khyim du'ang 'gro bar deng ma nus/ /kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag nam mkha'i dkyil
53a1(mdo sde): na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan ldan pa 'jig rten
53a2(mdo sde): gsum gyis mchod/ /byams dang snying rje thob pas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te/ /rgyal po
53a3(mdo sde): khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du zhugs/ /de tshe rang gi mgo cog sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te/ /rgyal po rim gror bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs/ /nga rgyal
53a4(mdo sde): dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ngor bltas te/ /ngas ni khyod la ci bya ci sbyar khyod kyis nga la smros/ /lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags
53a5(mdo sde): pa ste| |rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mtshe ba drug ldan che ba nyid/ /glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ /bdag gi rum du zhugs kyi de yi
53a6(mdo sde): lo rgyus gsan par gsol/ /stong gsum khams 'di mdzes bar rab rib ma mchis bdag gis mthong / /bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod//
53a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang bdag la khro zhing 'tshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis/ /zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid/ /bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la
53b1(mdo sde): dge 'am dong 'am ci/ /bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa/ /rig byed rmi lam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan/ /rgyal po myur du bram ze 'dir
53b2(mdo sde): ni legs par dgug tu gsol/ /de skad tshig thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la/ /bram ze rig byed bstan bcos gzhung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer/ /sgyu 'phrul bram ze
53b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/ /kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gson/ /bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' stsal du gsol/ khyod kyis
53b4(mdo sde): rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs/ thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o/ /lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/ /rkang lag legs shing rab
53b5(mdo sde): 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid/ /glang po dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ /bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis/ /de skad tshig thos
53b6(mdo sde): nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras/ /rigs la dngo ba ma mchis dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par gyur/ /khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur/ /
53b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba che ba nyid/ /gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal srid pho brang spangs gyur te/ /'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung
54a1(mdo sde): gyur na| |de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad 'gyur/ /de skad tshig
54a2(mdo sde): snyan lung bstan te/ /rgyal po'i pho brang zan zos nas/ /bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su/ /bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo / /dge slong dag /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram za mtshan
54a3(mdo sde): dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang / rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa dag las de skad kyi tshig thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs la rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
54a4(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas bram ze de dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas bya dga' byin te bkye'o/ /de nyid kyi tshe
54a5(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhi na grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la
54a6(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni/ bzhon pa/
54a7(mdo sde): spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos| phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/ byug ba 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa
54b1(mdo sde): rnams la ni gnas/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin no/ /dge slong dag /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug
54b2(mdo sde): na bde zhing nyon mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/
54b3(mdo sde): thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig /bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang bsham mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang
54b4(mdo sde): ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams ngan/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang / /byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni/ /rnam par rgyal tsam bdag
54b5(mdo sde): gis dbul/ /de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/ /brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur/ /
54b6(mdo sde): 'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan khang / /rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal bo zas gtsang ma'i ga na du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /
54b7(mdo sde): grags pa che mnga' sngon chad ni/ /dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa/ /pho brang dam pa dgyes pa de/ /rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po
55a1(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te skad ces smras so/ /dpal ldan yid las grub ba'i khang / /de ni rin chen rang bzhin te/ /byang chub sems dpa'
55a2(mdo sde): mchod don du/ /rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dod
55a3(mdo sde): pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa/ /gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa/ /bdag gi gzhal med khang drung na/ /'od dang mdog kyang stor bar snang / /de bas dpal ldan bdag gis
55a4(mdo sde): dbul| |byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ /rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang / /de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis/ /lha yi me tog rab bkang ste/ /lha yi spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i//
55a5(mdo sde): pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul/ /der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis/ /dge slong dag /de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
55a6(mdo sde): mchod pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang mi'i las ni 'das kyi/ lha yir ni ma
55a7(mdo sde): gyur pa bshams par gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpas bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par bstan to/ /byang
55b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe glo g.yas phyogs logs su skyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyang so so
55b2(mdo sde): nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dug gi / gzhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ting 'dzin bkod pa che la gnas
55b3(mdo sde): gyur te| |sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas/ /lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par byas/ /rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub/ /de nas 'khor de'i
55b4(mdo sde): nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bro na skyo zhing 'byol na/ de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum cu rtsa
55b5(mdo sde): gsum mam/ 'tha' bral lam/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri nga ba dang bral ba/ 'jig rten thams cad
55b6(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums mi'i lus dri mi zhim par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang / de nas
55b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang /
56a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las
56a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te
56a3(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu'ang ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do/ zhes de skad du smra bar ni bdag la spro ba
56a4(mdo sde): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems
56a5(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad par gyur pa mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus ni da lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i
56a6(mdo sde): dus ni da lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de bstan te mthong na glo ba dga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i
56a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma mdzad de/ des mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das
56b1(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar phyin nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bar byas nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'dud
56b2(mdo sde): cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du mi mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs ba/ khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems
56b3(mdo sde): dpar gyur cing ma'i rum na zla ba bcur 'dug 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa blangs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
56b4(mdo sde): pa| de de lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ da de ga la yod ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/
56b5(mdo sde): de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig dang / ji tsam du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
56b6(mdo sde): pas tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de blang gi /de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag
56b7(mdo sde): po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to/ /de
57a1(mdo sde): nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di man chad sum
57a2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra bsgrags te byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bkur na/ khyed kyi nang nas mthong bar su dga' ba myur du shog cig ces sgras go bar gyis shig /
57a3(mdo sde): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu
57a4(mdo sde): r tsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i steng du bzhag
57a5(mdo sde): nas lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te dzam+bu'i gling du phab bo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur
57a6(mdo sde): te| byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de'ang lha'i gos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /
57a7(mdo sde): lha'i longs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya
57b1(mdo sde): byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas rgyang ring po nas gdong thal mos bskyabs te mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang na tshangs pa
57b2(mdo sde): dag ni mthu che ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag kyang de dag gi drung na dma' ba
57b3(mdo sde): yin na| lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thos
57b4(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams myo myo bor 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i
57b5(mdo sde): dbang po/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /kho bos
57b6(mdo sde): kyang ji ltar bya/ kho bo nyid kyis kyang mthong bar ma nus so/ /grogs po dag /'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo / /de dag gis smras
57b7(mdo sde): pa/ lha'i dbang po/ de bas na/ ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ smras pa/ grogs po dag /lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags
58a1(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig / de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod de
58a2(mdo sde): mgo byol nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag
58a3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yongs
58a4(mdo sde): su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ steng khong pa brtsegs pas legs par brgyan
58a5(mdo sde): pa ste| de'i tshad ni 'phang du 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/
58a6(mdo sde): byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs ni 'di
58a7(mdo sde): lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do/ /lha rnams kyis de mthong na'ang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro/ /de de
58b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ dper na/ mgar ba mkhas pas shin tu bzhus te legs par sbyangs nas dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i gseng
58b2(mdo sde): bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dung mgrin ma gtogs pa lha
58b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par mi snang
58b4(mdo sde): ste| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung dang / char gyis btab pa'i lwa ba nag po bzhin no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po las byas pa ste/ de'i phye ma zho gcig la'ang
58b5(mdo sde): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rin du mi chog go/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po de lta bus kun nas bskor ba ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis
58b6(mdo sde): pa zhig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang na ma chags ma reg par 'dug go/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de kho na dang 'dra ba gsum pa zhig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa
58b7(mdo sde): de'i nang na ma reg ma chags par 'dug go / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste gdan bting ngo / /tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po de'i kha dog ni rnam pa
59a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu ste/ dper na/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po rigs dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no/ /spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na me tog lha'i las 'das pa gang
59a2(mdo sde): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsegs pa der skye'o/ /byang chub sems
59a3(mdo sde): dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams
59a4(mdo sde): kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der kun tu snang ngo / /gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa'
59a5(mdo sde): m a'i rum du 'jug pa de'i nub mo 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste sa chen po'i rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te pad+ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
59a6(mdo sde): bar du mngon par 'phags so/ /pad+ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu'i dam pa dang / tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stobs la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang
59a7(mdo sde): mthong ba med do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nying khu dang / snying po dang / bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad+ma chen po de la zil dngar gyi
59b1(mdo sde): t higs par chags te 'dug nas de tshangs pa chen pos bai DUR+Ya'i snod bzang pos blangs shing byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa
59b2(mdo sde): chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to/ /nying khu'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
59b3(mdo sde): pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu nus pa sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do/ /las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa
59b4(mdo sde): de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ce na/ byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i tshe sems can nad pa dag la sman byin pa
59b5(mdo sde): dang | sems can bsam pa la brten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / skyabs su 'ongs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang / rtag par me tog gi phud dang / 'bras
59b6(mdo sde): bu'i phud dang / ro'i phud de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / pha
59b7(mdo sde): dang ma la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po zil dngar gyi thigs pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo/ /khang pa
60a1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa der gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / phreng ba brgyus pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa 'phags pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
60a2(mdo sde): cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas der byung bar snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der gos stong phrag
60a3(mdo sde): brgya'i rgyan ces bya ba phrugs shig byung ste/ de'i byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa tha ma pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang
60a4(mdo sde): med do| |gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de na med pa gang yang med do//
60a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tu grub pa/ 'di ltar shin tu yongs
60a6(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yul ka ling+ka nas byung ba'i dar ltar reg na bde ba'o/ /de'ang 'ol spyir bstan par zad kyi/ de la dpe med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
60a7(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di ni bsam pas 'grub ste/ gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang / mngon par byung nas bla
60b1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ma gang gi rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i rum g.yas par khang
60b2(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub cing / phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan nas 'phos te khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil krung bcas nas 'dug
60b3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur nur po dang / mer mer po dang / ltar ltar po dang / reng reng por 'gyur ba med cing / yan lag dang / nying
60b4(mdo sde): lag dang / mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do/ /de de ltar
60b5(mdo sde): 'dug pa la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang
60b6(mdo sde): ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i
60b7(mdo sde): lha mo bzhi yod de/ u khu li zhes bya ba dang / mu khu li zhes bya ba dang / rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems
61a1(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo / /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig byang chub sems
61a2(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur
61a3(mdo sde): gyur te| dper na/ mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na ri'i spo la me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang ngo / /dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas
61a4(mdo sde): kyang snang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa'ang de lta bur gyur te/ 'od gsal zhing gzugs bzang la mdzes shing
61a5(mdo sde): blta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du skyil mo krung du 'dug na gser gyi sa le sbram rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai DUR+Ya sa brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes
61a6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog
61a7(mdo sde): byung ba ni snang ba chen po bskyed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'ang dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa
61b1(mdo sde): dang po de snang bar byed do/ /snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do/ /spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang ba
61b2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byed do/ /spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do/ /de snang bar byas nas de stan gang
61b3(mdo sde): la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do/ /de snang bar byas nas khyim thams cad snang bar byed do/ /khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste shar phyogs
61b4(mdo sde): snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub
61b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis snang bar byas par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la
61b6(mdo sde): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya tsam dag dang lhan
61b7(mdo sde): cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste mdzub mo bsgrengs nas stan ston to/ /'jig rten skyong
62a1(mdo sde): ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du skyes zin pa'i
62a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang 'dra bar lag pa bskyod cing 'deg la/ rnam par bskyod cing gzhog pa mthong nas de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste byang chub sems dpa' la
62a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang
62a4(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' par byed do/ /gang gi tshe de dag 'dong bar 'dod bar gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems sems kyis
62a5(mdo sde): rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te/ de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston te/ /de ltar lag pa brkyangs te 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum par byed de/ mal gnod
62a6(mdo sde): pa med do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam sems shing / de dag byang chub sems
62a7(mdo sde): dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nub mo mi nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang
62b1(mdo sde): zhing brkyangs nas kyang bskum pa dang / bskums nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag ba de 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin no/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa'am/ bud
62b2(mdo sde): med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo su'ang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i tshe thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba smra'o/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub
62b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe sngar dga' bar bya ba smra ba la mkhas par gyur te/ lha'am/ klu'am/
62b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nam/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa su'ang rung byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar
62b5(mdo sde): bya ba smra zhing de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o/ /de nas snga dro'i dus zad de nyi ma gung la babs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu
62b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa/ mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang / de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas
62b7(mdo sde): de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag
63a1(mdo sde): dga' bar byed cing mdzub mo brkyangs te stan ston to/ /dge slong dag/ de'i tshe'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nus
63a2(mdo sde): nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig
63a3(mdo sde): nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpas lag
63a4(mdo sde): pa gang du brkyangs pa de logs su byang chub sems dpa'i ma'ang lta bar gyur to/ /des na lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya
63a5(mdo sde): ba smra'o snyam mo/ /de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' zhig la smra ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo/ /khang
63a6(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur to/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas
63a7(mdo sde): pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do/ /dge slong dag /gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag 'dong
63b1(mdo sde): p ar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston
63b2(mdo sde): to| |brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do/ /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu
63b3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dod bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
63b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ nyi ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas phyi dro'i dus la babs pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
63b5(mdo sde): p a lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lha yul pa'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba
63b6(mdo sde): dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas
63b7(mdo sde): te 'ongs par shes nas byang chub sems dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag
64a1(mdo sde): la dga' bar bya ba smras te mdzub mo brkyangs nas stan ston to/ /dge slong dag /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las
64a2(mdo sde): bzlog par ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas
64a3(mdo sde): de ltar 'khod par ri gnas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /byang
64a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyangs pa de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to/ /de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar
64a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i gtam byed do snyam ste/ lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' zhig la smras te/ bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' ba'i
64a6(mdo sde): gtam byed do snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /gang gi tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub
64a7(mdo sde): sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to/ /de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas
64b1(mdo sde): phyir bskum pa byas te dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med de/ /de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag
64b2(mdo sde): cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
