64b3(mdo sde): dong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog go/ dge slong dag/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
64b4(mdo sde): 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
64b5(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa dang / chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur te/ de dag de ltar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/ 'od kyi bkod pa de
64b6(mdo sde): dag seng+ge'i khrir sprul nas de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod du bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di
64b7(mdo sde): nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te brtags kyang skal pa mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sus kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub
65a1(mdo sde): sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin no/ /dge slong dag /lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang byang chub
65a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe lus lci bar ma tshor te/ gzhan du na yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / bde bar tshor zhing lto mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yang myong bar
65a3(mdo sde): ma gyur to/ /'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba'am/ zhes sdang gis yongs su gdung ba'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdungs par ma gyur/
65a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'am/ gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la'ang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/ grang ba'am/ tsha ba'am/ bkres
65a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ skom pa'am/ mun pa'am/ rdul lam/ ngal ba tshor ba'am/ mthong bar ma gyur te/ de la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du mi 'ong ba snang bar ma
65a6(mdo sde): gyur to| |rmi lam ngan pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de la bud med kyi sgyu'am/ g.yo'am/ phrag dog gam/ bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma
65a7(mdo sde): gyur to| |de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub
65b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ma'ang skyes pa gang la'ang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/ skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i ma la 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye'o/ /ser
65b2(mdo sde): skya'i grong khyer chen po de dang / yul gzhan dag na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo su gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung pos non pa ji snyed
65b3(mdo sde): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ma mthong ma thag tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur to/ /mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du dong bar gyur
65b4(mdo sde): to| |sems can gang la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang /
65b5(mdo sde): mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ so'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ shu ba'am/ 'bras sam/ mdze'am/ sha bkra'am/
65b6(mdo sde): skem pa'am/ brjed byed dam/ rims sam/ lba ba'am/ phol mig gam/ me dpal lam/ rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems
65b7(mdo sde): dpa'i mas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyis nad dang bral par gyur cing / rang rang gi gnas su dong bar gyur to/ /tha na lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis rtswa nyag ma 'ga' zhig
66a1(mdo sde): sa las blangs te sems can nad pa dag la byin yang de dag de blangs ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag
66a2(mdo sde): gi lto g.yas par bltas pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor
66a3(mdo sde): snang ba bzhin te/ de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ byang chub sems
66a4(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing lha'i me tog gi char bab par gyur to/ /char
66a5(mdo sde): ni dus bzhin du 'bab/ rlung ni dus bzhin du ldang / dus dang / skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'pho bar gyur to/ /rgyal srid kyang bde zhing lo legs la 'khrug
66a6(mdo sde): pa med cing dgra med par gyur to/ /ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na shAkya'i rigs dang / sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung / dga' zhing rtse la
66a7(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyod do/ /sbyin pa dag kyang gtong / bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ zla ba bzhi 'das pa'i dus ston bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis rtse zhing
66b1(mdo sde): bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par blangs te/ rgyal po'i las btang nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs
66b2(mdo sde): su dag pa na gnas pa bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni
66b3(mdo sde): rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis
66b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i tshe gnas gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong
66b5(mdo sde): lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / de
66b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i lha dang / mi gzhan dag kyang bstan te mthong nas de dag tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes so/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po
66b7(mdo sde): tshangs pas de phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par bya ba'i phyir bteg ste khyer nas bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong dag la bka'
67a1(mdo sde): stsal pa| dge slong dag / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pas lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs
67a2(mdo sde): su smin par byas par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe rgyal sras sems can dam pa ma yi rum gnas pa/ /de tshe sa 'di tshal dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu
67a3(mdo sde): g.yos| |gser mdog 'od bkye ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs par gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'/ /gzhal med khang chen
67a4(mdo sde): dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par spras/ /der ni dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa zhugs par gyur nas 'dug /tsan+dan dri zhim mchog gis rab tu gang zhing rnam par
67a5(mdo sde): mdzes| |stong gsum rin chen yongs bkad de yi srang byed rin mi chog / stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang 'og nas brtol ba byas nas ni/ /yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi
67a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i nyid khu'i thigs pa byung / /de bzhin zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags/ /de las nyid khu'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras la
67a7(mdo sde): 'bul| |byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo tshangs pa 'dra ba ma gtogs par/ /sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can ris na med/ /bskal pa du ma'i bsod
67b1(mdo sde): nams gzi brjid nyid khu'i thigs gnas pa/ /de zos lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par gyur/ /'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong pa rnams/ /
67b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus gsum rgyun du 'ong / /phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas/ /bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang nas 'ongs pa'i gnas
67b3(mdo sde): su 'dong / /'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong / /'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun snang / /mchog tu bya ba'i theg
67b4(mdo sde): pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas/ /kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing 'dong / /bud med byis pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang / /'byung
67b5(mdo sde): pos nod dang sems 'khrugs gos med rdul gyis yog pa rnams/ /de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas sems ni rnyed gyur te/ /blo gros rtogs dang dran pa ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim
67b6(mdo sde): 'dong / /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang / /mig nad rna nad dag gis lus sems mi bder gyur pa dag/ rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag
67b7(mdo sde): gnod gyur pa/ /de dag sgyu 'phrul lag pa mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur/ /yang na rtswa yi nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te/ /sgyu 'phrul nad par byin na thams cad rims nad
68a1(mdo sde): med par gyur/ /bde ba thob cing da rod ma nyams so so'i khyim du 'dong / /de ni sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po rum na 'dug phyir ro/ /gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag
68a2(mdo sde): gi lus la brtags byas pa/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni/ /ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa/ /de bzhin byang chub
68a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang / /de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gnod par 'gyur ba med/ /'dod la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med/
68a4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas/ /de la bkres dang skom dang tsha dang grang ba'i gnod pa med/ /lha yi rol mo sil snyan dbyangs
68a5(mdo sde): sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung / /lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char yang 'bab/ /lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha mi thams cad kyang / /de dag phan tshun gnod
68a6(mdo sde): pa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med/ /sems can dga' bder rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed/ /dga' ba'i sgra sgrog de dag dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid dang ldan/ /rgyal
68a7(mdo sde): po'i srid bde 'khrug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab/ /rtswa dang sman dang me tog rnam kyang de yi dus su skye/ /rgyal po'i khab tu zhag bdun rin chen char ba bab gyur
68b1(mdo sde): bas| |sems can dbul po de las len cing spyin byed bde bar spyod/ /sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur pa de tshe gang yang med/ /ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal sems can
68b2(mdo sde): bzhin du dga' dang ldan/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de yang gso sbyong rab la nyer gnas shing / /de ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod/ /de ni dka' thub nag 'tshal song nas
68b3(mdo sde): lha mo sgyu 'phrul la/ /sems can mchog srel khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rmed/ /lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar zla ba bcu
68b4(mdo sde): 'das te byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i skyed mos tshal du snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ me
68b5(mdo sde): tog thams cad kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / rdzing dag na me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur
68b6(mdo sde): pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang las thon te kha 'bus nas rgyus par ma gyur pa dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad byung ba dang / gter chen po
68b7(mdo sde): nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas par snang ba dang / khyim gyi nang du'ang rin po che'i myu gu thon pa dang / spos chu'i dpal gyi wa 'bru mar dri zhim pos spags pa rnams kyang zag par gyur
69a1(mdo sde): pa dang / gangs kyi ri'i ngos las seng+ge'i phrug gu dag 'ongs te dga' bar rtse zhing ser skya'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas nas sgo na gnas par
69a2(mdo sde): gyur kyang sems can kun la'ang 'tshe ba med par gyur pa dang / glang po'i phrug gu thal gar lnga brgya lhags te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtse mos nyug cing
69a3(mdo sde): gnas par gyur pa dang / lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings pa dag kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis pang pa nas pang pa dag tu 'gre ldog par snang
69a4(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dang / klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus phye phyung zhing nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri'ang rma bya'i mdongs lag
69a5(mdo sde): na thogs shing nam mkha' la 'khod par snang ba dang / bum pa gang ba khri'ang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byed par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri'ang spos
69a6(mdo sde): chu'i ril ba b+h+ring ga ra klad la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri'ang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo
69a7(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po dag kyang dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga mgul nas da ltar te sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang / rlung thams cad kyang mi ldang bar gnas par gyur pa
69b1(mdo sde): dang / chu klung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi 'gul zhing mi 'bab par gyur pa dang / nyi zla dang / gzhal med khang dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyang mi rgyu bar gyur pa
69b2(mdo sde): dang / skar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang rin po che'i dra ba sa yog par gyur pa dang / me'ang mi 'bar bar gyur pa dang / khang pa
69b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dang / yang thog dang / rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang / rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang / ras bcos bu'i mdzod dang / rin po che sna
69b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo bye bar snang ba dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / spyang ki dang / wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang / sgra skar snyan pa'i sgra dag kyang
69b5(mdo sde): byung bar gyur pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha' yang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang / sa'i phyogs mthon dman du 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dang /
69b6(mdo sde): lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srang dang / tshong 'dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil ltar bzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par snang pa dang / sbrum
69b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang bde ba dang / legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang / shing sA la'i nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyang shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste phyag 'tshal zhing
70a1(mdo sde): gnas par snang ste/ snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi gzi brjid par
70a2(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par shes te nam gyi srod la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi bsam
70a3(mdo sde): pa gang lags gsol gyi lha ni gsan du gsol/ /yun ring ring po 'das nas skyed mos tshal gyi blo skyes te/ /gal te khyod mi bkyon cing zhe sdang phrag dog mi mnga' na/ /
70a4(mdo sde): bdag ni rtse na sa skyed mos tshal du myur du mchi bar bgyi/ /chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thub spyod pa khyod kyang skyo mkhyen grang / /bdag kyang sems can dag la bsrel nas
70a5(mdo sde): yun ni ring lags la/ /sA la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te/ /skyed mos tshal gyi dogs sar nga ni mchi ba'i rigs so lha/ /sos ka'i dus mchog
70a6(mdo sde): bud med rnams kyi rgyan du gyur lags te/ /nags rgyu khyu byug dang ni rma bya sgra rab snyan pa 'byin/ /gtsang zhing mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang / /nga ni
70a7(mdo sde): mchi na ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol/ /rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas/ /dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor
70b1(mdo sde): la smras pa ni/ /bzhon pa bzhon che mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum+bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis/ /ri sngo'i mdog
70b2(mdo sde): ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi/ /glang po stong phrag nyi shu snyes cig myur du bstad par gyis/ /glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo la brgyus/ /gser
70b3(mdo sde): dang nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud/ /rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ /dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rngo ga lcang
70b4(mdo sde): lo bzang 'khril ba'i/ /rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du stong gyis te/ /gser dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas dbyangs pa gyis/ /skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos
70b5(mdo sde): shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag / mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rno thogs pa/ /stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du bcos te bshams gyis la/ /sgyu 'phrul
70b6(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni srung bar gyis/ /lum+bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khroms brgyan par gyis/ /gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad
70b7(mdo sde): brgyan par gyis/ /lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal bar khroms/ /de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis/ /'khor rnams kyis ni de skad
71a1(mdo sde): tshig thos skad cig tu/ /bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum+bi ni yang brgyan byas te/ /rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol/
71a2(mdo sde): ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin kun bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig /mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur tam/ /khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med
71a3(mdo sde): rnams la 'di skad smras/ gang zhig nga la snying nye nga la dga' bar 'dod pa dag /nga yi bka' bzhin bgyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis/ /spos mchog ngad kyi dri
71a4(mdo sde): zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo bar gyis/ /brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par
71a5(mdo sde): gyis| |rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring kun gyis bstan par gyis/ /'khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu'i pi wang rdza rnga dum dum pheg/ sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang
71a6(mdo sde): bsham par gyis/ /sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing / /lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur ba khyed kyis gyis/ /shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo
71a7(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis/ /bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod/ /na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te/ /gang du'ang yid
71b1(mdo sde): du mi 'ong mi mthun sgra rnams mi grags gyis/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe/ /rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung / /rgyal po'i sgo
71b2(mdo sde): drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par gyur/ /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grag /de tshe bkra shig don du dril bu brgya stong bkrol bar byas/ /shing rta
71b3(mdo sde): de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la/ /lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bshams pa byas/ /rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas/ /
71b4(mdo sde): rma bya khrung khrung ngang pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgrengs/ /lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis
71b5(mdo sde): bkab| |lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lta/ /lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/ /gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng+ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa/ /
71b6(mdo sde): de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa dag tu rab tu g.yos/ /lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tog sna tshogs 'thor/ /de ring lum+bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltams gyur
71b7(mdo sde): te| |'jig rten gyi skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed/ /gsum cu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi byi dor byed/ /tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro
72a1(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa de la lta/ /de ni 'di
72a2(mdo sde): snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed/ /gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /
72a3(mdo sde): srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong / /gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i sems can de med de/ /yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang
72a4(mdo sde): bral bar 'gyur/ /'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri
72a5(mdo sde): bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor/ glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang
72a6(mdo sde): ldan pa| go cha legs par bgos pa/ sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/ shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar/ rgyal
72a7(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes pa'i shAkya rgan pa dang / gzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrungs/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i slas glu dang rol ma'i
72b1(mdo sde): dbyangs sgra ni byed/ 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg rdob sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu mo
72b2(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis
72b3(mdo sde): brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o/ /lum+bi ni'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis
72b4(mdo sde): btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtong bar gyur to/ /nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang / me tog dang /
72b5(mdo sde): 'bras bu bskyed par gyur to/ /nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa
72b6(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul du lum+bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las babs te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dge gis yongs su bskor cing shing drung nas ni shing drung
72b7(mdo sde): dag tu 'gro/ nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag /ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing de rim gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/ yal ga shin tu
73a1(mdo sde): rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang / dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dang phul du bya ba'i dri'i ngad
73a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs dpyangs pa/ nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/ rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma rnams
73a3(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga ring zhing shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ blag sha zhes bya ba sa'i phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzang
73a4(mdo sde): la yangs pa/ rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes pa/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i glu dbyangs blangs
73a5(mdo sde): p a| gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod phan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon
73a6(mdo sde): par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon par btud de phyag byas so/ /de nas lha
73a7(mdo sde): m o sgyu 'phrul ma nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs nas blag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil
73b1(mdo sde): du bltas nas bya smyang byed cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur
73b2(mdo sde): to| |byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe rnam par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so/ /de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhing shes
73b3(mdo sde): bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/ gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bu med par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe lha'i
73b4(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi ba'i lheb mos lus dang yan lag
73b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa
73b6(mdo sde): de'ang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /de
73b7(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas
74a1(mdo sde): ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de sa la babs par gyur ma thag tu pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di'ang brtol te byung ngo / /klu'i rgyal po
74a2(mdo sde): chen po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang / dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub
74a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lus bkrus so/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma
74a4(mdo sde): thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang / me tog sil mas lus 'khru zhing mngon par 'thor ro/ /bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang / rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur
74a5(mdo sde): te| |de pad+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ seng+ge'i lta stangs dang / skyes bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
74a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lha'i mig thogs pa med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang / grong
74a7(mdo sde): rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang ljongs su bcas/ yul du bcas/ mi dang lhar bcas pa rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
74b1(mdo sde): spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin nam/ shes rab bam/ dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang 'dra ba de lta bu gang la la
74b2(mdo sde): zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma
74b3(mdo sde): mthong nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum pa dang bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/
74b4(mdo sde): bsams brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par bya ste/ sus kyang bstan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad
74b5(mdo sde): kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dag kyang
74b6(mdo sde): skyes par gyur to/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor
74b7(mdo sde): nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o/ /'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng+ge ltar
75a1(mdo sde): tshim par gyur pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /bdud
75a2(mdo sde): dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me gsad pa'i phyir chos kyi char sprin chen po'i char phab ste/ de dag
75a3(mdo sde): bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs
75a4(mdo sde): su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras
75a5(mdo sde): mngon par go bar gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
75a6(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
75a7(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /dge slong dag /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po
75b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba'ang byung bar gyur to/ /mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /
75b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang dus mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang / rnam par
75b3(mdo sde): dag par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las kyang dal bu dal bus phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog
75b4(mdo sde): dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa babs par gyur to/ /rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba/ 'jam pa/ dri zhim po dag kyang ldang bar gyur to/ /phyogs thams cad
75b5(mdo sde): kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / du ba dang / khug rna med cing / rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po mi snang zhing zab pa grag
75b6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ reg na mchog tu bde ba/
75b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur
76a1(mdo sde): to| |byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
76a2(mdo sde): mug dang / dregs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams
76a3(mdo sde): cad spangs par gyur to/ /sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to/ /bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to/ /
76a4(mdo sde): chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to/ /smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to/ /
76a5(mdo sde): rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par gyur to/ /yan lag dang nyid lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob
76a6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /btson ra na 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar par gyur to/ /mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nad
76a7(mdo sde): du bya ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar
76b1(mdo sde): gyur to| |gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
76b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun
76b3(mdo sde): ' dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sa'i phyogs der de'i tshe zhig par mi
76b4(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad de/ dge slong dag /de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag
76b5(mdo sde): pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur te/ gar
76b6(mdo sde): gyi sgra chen po'ang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par
76b7(mdo sde): bab par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa
77a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ba'i che bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
77a2(mdo sde): g cig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
77a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i
77a4(mdo sde): chos dang ldan par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
77a5(mdo sde): ltar bdag ni lan bzhi'am/ lan lngar yang / lan bcur yang / lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang / lan brgya'i bar du yang / lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du'ang sangs rgyas
77a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/
77a7(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa/ mi mkhas pa/ lhag
77b1(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa/ khengs pa/ ma bsdams pa/ sems g.yengs pa/ nem nur gyis 'khor ba/ the tshom mang ba/ dad pa med pa/ dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dge sbyong gi tshul
77b2(mdo sde): dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas gcig
77b3(mdo sde): la gcig 'di skad du/ kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa btsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la'ang 'di lta bu'i
77b4(mdo sde): longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang / de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/
77b5(mdo sde): skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi shes so/ /dge slong
77b6(mdo sde): dag / sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang / mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu'ang bzang ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la
77b7(mdo sde): snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing /
78a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyi/ bdag cag ni mi tsam
78a2(mdo sde): du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa
78a3(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdag cag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems so/ /kun dga' bo/ /de dag ni/
78a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la'ang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul lta smos kyang ci
78a5(mdo sde): dgos te/ kun dga' bo/ de ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i zil gyis non pa/ mi gtsang bar bying ba/ rim gro'i zil gyis non pa/
78a6(mdo sde): ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos// //
78a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde
78b1(mdo sde): bzang po la'ang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung lags pa lta/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de dag ni mdo sde 'di
78b2(mdo sde): lta bu spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod par yang ma zad de/ sdig pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing dge sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar
78b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ tshe rabs 'phos nas ni ci lta bu zhig tu
78b4(mdo sde): mchi| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
78b5(mdo sde): 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur pa btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag
78b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di thos nas bdag ni brgyal
78b7(mdo sde): ba dang 'dra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod
79a1(mdo sde): pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
79a2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid mi
79a3(mdo sde): ches pa dang / spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad
79a4(mdo sde): du ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ la la zhig gis
79a5(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skye ba'i sems can de dag gis ni thob pa legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gis
79a6(mdo sde): 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o/ /de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o/ /de dag gi spyod pa ni legs par spyad pa'o/ /de dag gis ni snying po blangs so/ /de dag ni ngan
79a7(mdo sde): song gsum las grol ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo/ /de dag gis dad pa
79b1(mdo sde): thob pa ni don yod do/ /de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par zos so/ /de dag gis ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no/ /de dag ni/
79b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no/ /de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las brgal to/ /de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu byung ngo / /de dag gis ni mchog tu dga'
79b3(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo/ /de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so/ /de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te/ mchod par 'os pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten
79b4(mdo sde): na 'byung bar dkon pa'o/ /de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
79b5(mdo sde): pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/ kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni/
79b6(mdo sde): nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod
79b7(mdo sde): kyi| mthong na ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ la la ni mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi/ thos pas ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ la la ni mthong na'ang dga'
80a1(mdo sde): zhing yid du 'ong la thos na'ang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ gang yang rung ste la la zhig mthong ngam/ thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong
80a2(mdo sde): bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ste/ de dag ni de bzhin
80a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas gzigs so/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar bya ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o/ /de dag ni de
80a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tshe'ang
80a5(mdo sde): sems can su'ang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag las nges mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang
80a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /'di ni de bzhin gshegs
80a7(mdo sde): pas bcol ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so/ /nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsal to/ /kun
80b1(mdo sde): dga' bo/ grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du'ang 'gro ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/ sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar
80b2(mdo sde): gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la brten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
80b3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen cing / sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' po ste/ de dag ni bdag cag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs
80b4(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ mdza' bo gang yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de'ang de la sdug cing yid du
80b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'i/ dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig /ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
80b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi'ang mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing / bsam pa rdzogs
80b7(mdo sde): par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig la bu ngag nyan cing mthun par 'dzin pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de'ang
81a1(mdo sde): mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/ pha de shir zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin du
81a2(mdo sde): gang su'ang rung ste pa la dad na/ de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o/ /de dag ni pa la skyabs su dong ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang
81a3(mdo sde): po mnga' ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo yang dag par gsung ba ma
81a4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyi/ kun dga' bo/ dad pa la brtson par gyis shig /
81a5(mdo sde): 'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ngag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing
81a6(mdo sde): lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dri med
81a7(mdo sde): rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa/ /lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug cu de yi tshe/ /skad cig de la lum+bi nir lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la smra/
81b1(mdo sde): mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchi ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig /bdag cag khyod kyi phyag
81b2(mdo sde): rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags/ /khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i nyams skyes mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo
81b3(mdo sde): myur skyed 'gyur/ /ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang / /ji ltar
81b4(mdo sde): dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos las na/ /khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras bltams 'gyur/ /ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par
81b5(mdo sde): mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang / /nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang / /ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams
81b6(mdo sde): brgya stong yang / /dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltams par 'gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang / /
81b7(mdo sde): dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid/ /skyes bu seng+ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsib logs g.yas nas byung / /gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing
82a1(mdo sde): 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams/ /brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dang te thub pa de yang blangs/ /zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzang bkye bas
82a2(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te/ /lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi
82a3(mdo sde): g.yab mo phyung / /de tshes 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad+ma mdzes/ /sna tshogs mngon thon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste/ /gom
82a4(mdo sde): pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni/ /rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin
82a5(mdo sde): lha mchog nam mkha'i dkyil na'i khod gyur te/ /gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil/ /klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang
82a6(mdo sde): dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtong / /lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos
82a7(mdo sde): len| |stong gsum 'di'ang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /'jig rten rnam
82b1(mdo sde): par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag zhi/ /mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la/ /lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi/ /brtan pa gom
82b2(mdo sde): pa bdun du bzhud/ /sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa/ /der ni pad+ma bzang ba'i mchog /rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag /sa las mngon du thon par gyur/ /de ltar gom pa bdun
82b3(mdo sde): bzhud nas/ /rga dang 'chi bsel ba yi/ /sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do/ /'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te/ /de nas don ldan
82b4(mdo sde): gsung phyung ba/ /nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren/ /nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes/ /mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /lha dbang bcas dang 'jig
82b5(mdo sde): rten skyong dag rab tu dad sems skyes/ /spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil/ /klu yi dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni/ /dri zhim
82b6(mdo sde): spos chu dag gis rgyun gyis sku yang bsil ba byas/ /lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang bla ni gnas nas su/ /dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil/ /
82b7(mdo sde): gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni/ /bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/ /skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas
83a1(mdo sde): gtsang de la dgar smras pa/ /lha gcig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltams/ /de ni nges par 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang
83a2(mdo sde): phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tsho ba/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang gcig 'gyur phas kyi dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur/ /de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i
83a3(mdo sde): mdun du de song ste/ /lha gcig 'byor ba rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur/ /
83a4(mdo sde): kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub stobs dang ldan zhing tshan po che dang 'dra/ /skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha/ /'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs
83a5(mdo sde): kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/ /bsngags ldan gyis ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te/ /chibs mchog dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang
83a6(mdo sde): lor 'khril ba lags/ /mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du/ /rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyi legs par rgyal gyur lha/ /da
83a7(mdo sde): ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha gcig rgyal bar spyon/ /gser gyi dra bas
83b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag / nam mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis/ /sbrum ma la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang
83b2(mdo sde): be'u ni drug stong 'brangs/ /lhan cig lha mchog bltams shing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs/ /rje gcig rgyal por gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa
83b3(mdo sde): bltams pa yi/ /yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa/ /rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol/ /myur
83b4(mdo sde): du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par zhugs/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / skad cig de la sbyin pa'i gtong ba'ang de bas rgya cher
83b5(mdo sde): gyur to| |ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya'ang btsas par gyur to/ /grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang / bran mo brgyad brgya dang / 'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang / rte'u
83b6(mdo sde): mo khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rte'u pho khri dang / ba lang gi phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang / ba lang gi phrug gu pho lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag
83b7(mdo sde): thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras phu gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir byin par gyur te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems
84a1(mdo sde): dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shwad+tha'i sdong po skyes par gyur to/ /gling phra mo rnams su'ang tsan+dan gyi nags tshal skyes
84a2(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi khor yug tu'ang skyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag byung bar gyur to/ /gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du
84a3(mdo sde): 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to/ /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam
84a4(mdo sde): du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub
84a5(mdo sde): par gyur gyi/ 'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming
84a6(mdo sde): don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa'ang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon
84a7(mdo sde): bzhin du gyur to/ /der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur/ spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzid bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i spos
84b1(mdo sde): kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar dri zhim po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar
84b2(mdo sde): gyur to| |lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang / rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku
84b3(mdo sde): la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa
84b4(mdo sde): legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du
84b5(mdo sde): lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te byang chub sems dpa'
84b6(mdo sde): ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems
84b7(mdo sde): dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te bltams pa legs par bltams sam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes dri bar gyur to/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga
85a1(mdo sde): d ang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig
85a2(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum+bi ni'i nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas
85a3(mdo sde): rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs thams
85a4(mdo sde): cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to/ /sbyin pa dag kyang byin no/ /bsod nams dag kyang byed do/ /bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim
85a5(mdo sde): par byas so/ /su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la'ang de byin par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa'ang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul te gral gyi thog ma la
85a6(mdo sde): 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to/ /ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing / /ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na/ 'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi/ /bde ba
85a7(mdo sde): mdzad cig bltams par mngon/ /ji ltar rab rib med 'od kyis/ /lha dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang / /mi snang zil du brlag pa las/ /bsod nams 'od cig byung bar mngon/ /
85b1(mdo sde): mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing / /rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las/ /'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon/ /ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing / /
85b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur pas/ /tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su/ /gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon/ /sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing / /sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las/ /
85b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi/ /thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing / /pad+ma chen po thon pa las/ /nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /
85b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur/ /lha yi spos kyis spags gyur la/ /'jam pa'i rlung gi ngad ldang zhing / /sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las/ /'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon/ /
85b5(mdo sde): gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha brgya po/ /'dod chags bral ba 'di dag kyang / /thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa las/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon/ /mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing / /lha
85b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni mi mthong yang / /phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las/ /'di ni ded dpon chen por byon/ /me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing / /chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la/ /sa yang dal bus
85b7(mdo sde): g.yo ba las/ /'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par
86a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis lha mo sgyu
86a2(mdo sde): 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
86a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang btsas te zhag bdun lon nas ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung
86a4(mdo sde): nam snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus skyed mos
86a5(mdo sde): t shal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong 'gyur bas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs
86a6(mdo sde): so| |de zhugs pa dang / bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dong bar
86a7(mdo sde): gyur to| |bu mo lnga stong ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril ba b+h+ring gar thogs te lam chag chag gis 'debs
86b1(mdo sde): shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyi me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni bzang
86b2(mdo sde): por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te lam gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /bram ze lnga stong ni
86b3(mdo sde): dril bu thogs te bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /glang po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /rta nyi khri ni gser gyi
86b4(mdo sde): rgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
86b5(mdo sde): bas legs par brgyan te byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go cha sra ba bgos pa
86b6(mdo sde): bzhi khri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
86b7(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/ /shing rta gang la
87a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo rgyan thams
87a2(mdo sde): cad kyis chas pa rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyi khris shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig 'dug / mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig
87a3(mdo sde): 'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/ mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur to/ /dge
87a4(mdo sde): slong dag / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der
87a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i tshe rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir
87a6(mdo sde): gshegs su gsol/ kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kha lo sgyur pa dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/
87a7(mdo sde): kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kun nas spyan
87b1(mdo sde): mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i
87b2(mdo sde): sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu'ang
87b3(mdo sde): z hugs par byas te zla ba bzhi lon pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzang chen po der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs
87b4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de na shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/ phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub
87b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' btsa' ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang / de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /
87b6(mdo sde): bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro/ /de na shAkya ches bgres ches bgres pa de dag na re/ bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu/ thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs
87b7(mdo sde): dang dar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni gzhon nu'i
88a1(mdo sde): sru mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang lags par bskyed par nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad gros gcig
88a2(mdo sde): tu 'dus te/ skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dad par byas nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI sa gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror
88a3(mdo sde): ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bkod par gyur te/ de la brgyad ni pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni rtsen grogs kyi ma ma'o/ /brgyad ni dri
88a4(mdo sde): ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsags te dpyad pa/ ji ltar gzhon nu 'di 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur
88a5(mdo sde): ram| 'on te ma yin gyi/ rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba mngon par
88a6(mdo sde): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
88a7(mdo sde): cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha'i bu mo mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun 'dong ba mthong nas
88b1(mdo sde): des bsam pa/ ma la bdag gis rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas
88b2(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
88b3(mdo sde): lus legs par brgyan pa zhig btsas par mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par gyis shig /dzam+bu'i gling du rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i
88b4(mdo sde): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu
88b5(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so/ /de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba
88b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang /
88b7(mdo sde): glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bu stong
89a1(mdo sde): yod par 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni
89a2(mdo sde): sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang / chos dang mthun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing
89a3(mdo sde): mngon par phab ste/ dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
89a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ tshur shog de
89a5(mdo sde): bltar 'dong ngo / /de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang 'grogs te ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas lding ste ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
89a6(mdo sde): chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul brtul nas rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin
89a7(mdo sde): nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do/ /dge slong dag /de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang
89b1(mdo sde): po 'dus pa mthong ngo / /de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgo na drang srong zhig mchis so zhes gsol
89b2(mdo sde): cig / de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di
89b3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas/ gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni/ rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal
89b4(mdo sde): lo zhes mchi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig /de nas mi de
89b5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nang du bzhud cig /de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
89b6(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal bar spyon cig /rgyal bar spyon cig /sku tshe ring bar srungs shig /chos bzhin du rgyal po
89b7(mdo sde): mdzod cig / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la bdar te/ de
90a1(mdo sde): stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhe sa dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong / sngon mthong bar mi dran na 'dir ci la
90a2(mdo sde): byon ci zhig bzhed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyi sras shig pa bltams par gyur pa
90a3(mdo sde): de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyi/ langs kyi bar du cung zad cig zhes shig /drang srong gis smras pa/
90a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub
90a5(mdo sde): sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda byas so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis
90a6(mdo sde): kyis shin tu legs par blangs te drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro/ /de nas drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
90a7(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa las 'phags pa'i lus
90b1(mdo sde): can/ nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyi gang zag 'di byung ngo / /kye ma
90b2(mdo sde): ' jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis
90b3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i
90b4(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha'
90b5(mdo sde): bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang / gal
90b6(mdo sde): te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur
90b7(mdo sde): ba mthong nas des de lta bu mthong ba dang / mchi ma blags te dus nas shugs ring phyung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te dus nas shugs ring 'byin
91a1(mdo sde): par mthong nas dngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par rings pa drang srong chen po de la smras pa/ drang srong / de ltar bshums mo blags te bshums pa dang /
91a2(mdo sde): shugs ring 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/ gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba'am zhig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
91a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du du ba'ang ma lags/ 'di la mi dge ba'ang gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag nyid du bar bas so/ /de ci'i
91a4(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la/ gzhon nu don thams cad 'grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par
91a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus
91a6(mdo sde): kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur
91a7(mdo sde): te| tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/
91b1(mdo sde): yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams
91b2(mdo sde): grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i
91b3(mdo sde): chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol
91b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta
91b5(mdo sde): ba ngan pa sna tshogs kyi thibs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang pos mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang
91b6(mdo sde): btson rar 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang /
91b7(mdo sde): ling tog gis mig ldongs ba rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug pa rnams la ni zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen
92a1(mdo sde): po| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
92a2(mdo sde): mang por brgya la brgya lam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
92a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol
92a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang / bdag gi nad ma mchis pa 'di la'ang
92a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni de'i slad du du zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring 'byin pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag
92a6(mdo sde): gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba ltar na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'ang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po/
92a7(mdo sde): gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ /'di lta ste/ gzhon
92b1(mdo sde): nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ /gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen
92b2(mdo sde): po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor 'khril la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / dpral
92b3(mdo sde): ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa ni kha ba dang dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags
92b4(mdo sde): so| |rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags
92b5(mdo sde): bzang ba dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /
92b6(mdo sde): ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang / 'gram pa seng+ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / mdun mtho ba dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser
92b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba dang / bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag bus mor sleb pa dang / ro stod seng+ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing
93a1(mdo sde): n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / spu re re nas skyes pa dang / yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang / 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su
93a2(mdo sde): nub pa dang / bral legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dwags kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / zhabs kyi gong mtho
93a3(mdo sde): ba dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub
93a4(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/ mu khyud dang bcas/ lte ba dang bcas pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen
93a5(mdo sde): po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes
93a6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no/ /rgyal po chen po/ mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan
93a7(mdo sde): de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/ de dag dang
93b1(mdo sde): ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen
93b2(mdo sde): po| dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /
93b3(mdo sde): sen mo mdog snum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / tshigs mi
93b4(mdo sde): mngon pa dang / zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag
93b5(mdo sde): gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang / phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang / sgros
93b6(mdo sde): bim pa ltar dmar pa dang / sgra mi drag pa'i tshig dang / ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang /
93b7(mdo sde): snyan zhing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang / sku'i na bza' gtsang
94a1(mdo sde): ma phun sum tshogs pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / bsnyengs ba mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin tu
94a2(mdo sde): dpa' bar mdzes pa'i sku dang / rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya che la shin tu gang ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon
94a3(mdo sde): nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa dang / sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang / sku rim gyis legs par grub pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang /
94a4(mdo sde): lte ba ma yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing rab rib ma
94a5(mdo sde): mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang / seng+ge'i stabs lta
94a6(mdo sde): bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang / dku zlum pa dang /
94a7(mdo sde): dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / rked pa gzhu'i 'chang bzung ltar phra ba dang / mdog gi snyes pa sngo ba'am/ nag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa
94b1(mdo sde): lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan
94b2(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / spyan dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po
94b3(mdo sde): chen po| gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma nag pa dang / smin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis gzhol
94b4(mdo sde): ba dang / mkhur ba rgyas pa dang / mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang khro ba'i mdog med pa dang / shin tu rig pa'i dbang po dang ldan
94b5(mdo sde): pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang / dbu yongs su
94b6(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / dbu skra nag pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mi gshor ba dang / dbu skra mi 'dzing pa dang / dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang / dbu skra lcang
94b7(mdo sde): lor 'khril ba dang ldan pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / sdong
95a1(mdo sde): ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/ de dag dang
95a2(mdo sde): ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal
95a3(mdo sde): po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan
