95a4(mdo sde): las langs te byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing / /drang srong rnams kyis mchod
95a5(mdo sde): gyur te| |'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas/ /bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang / snag gi tsha bo
95a6(mdo sde): mis byin dang bcas te kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas gos bskon te bskor ba byas so/ /de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam
95a7(mdo sde): mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mis byin/ khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas
95b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig dang / de ni khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad
95b2(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrog pa/ /lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob/ /'di na srog
95b3(mdo sde): chags rnams kyi dga' skyed sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci/ /bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/ /lha 'am 'on te lha mi na yang na nam
95b4(mdo sde): mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad mthos ci/ /lha yi mig gi phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas/ /phyis
95b5(mdo sde): yangs ri mtsho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong / /'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing / /ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu thon gyur
95b6(mdo sde): la| |shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bus brgyan gyur las/ /srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal/ /sa 'di thams cad
95b7(mdo sde): mnyam shing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang / /lha rnams dga' zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen rmad
96a1(mdo sde): byung 'phyo ba las/ /dzam+bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi 'byung gnas nges par 'byung / /ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams
96a2(mdo sde): ni bder ldan la/ /lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan par rgyu ba dang / /ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba grags pa las/ /srid pa gsum
96a3(mdo sde): 'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon mi za/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam bltas na/ /ser skya'i grong na rgyal po zas gtsang grong
96a4(mdo sde): khyer dam pa yod pa der/ /mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong / /mthong nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang
96a5(mdo sde): skyes par gyur/ /de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su dong / /phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgor 'dug ste/ /zhabs 'bring
96a6(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas/ /sgo ba de la smras pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol/ /de mnyan myur du pho brang nang phyin rgyal po la
96a7(mdo sde): ni de bsnyad pa/ /lha gcig drang srong rgas 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis/ /drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi/ /
96b1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po nang du gtang ngam mi gtang bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod song nang du bos zhes bsgo/ /drang srod nag pos sgo ba'i tshig
96b2(mdo sde): thos dga' mgu bde dang ldan par gyur/ /skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar/ /drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du
96b3(mdo sde): mngon par dga'/ /rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe ring srung gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras/ /snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la 'dug/ rgyal pos gus
96b4(mdo sde): par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs/ /khyod kyi sras bltams gzugs mchog pha rol phyin
96b5(mdo sde): cing gzi brjid che dang ldan/ /mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan mnga' ba/ /rgyal po khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste/ /de
96b6(mdo sde): slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yong ma mchis/ /legs so legs par byon te mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong bdag dga' 'o/ /mchog sbyin gzhon
96b7(mdo sde): nu de nyal de ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyi/ /re zhig yud tsam gzhes dang 'di ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs bar
97a1(mdo sde): 'gyur| |gang tshe kha lo sgyur mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od mnga' de sad ba/ /de tshe rgyal pos 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang nyi las 'phags 'od pang blangs te/ /
97a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar drang srong lha mis mchod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan de gzugs shig /drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong / /de nas langs te
97a3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag nyid chen po bstan bcos mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsam zhing bltas/ /des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyi
97a4(mdo sde): mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /mgo lcogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong / /stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'am
97a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur/ /shin tu mi dga' lus dang sems kyi mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung / /rgyal po mchog kyang dngangs par gyur nas bram ze ci slad
97a6(mdo sde): bshums zhes smra/ /drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub ba gegs shig ma gzigs sam/ /drang srong ci slad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la med par
97a7(mdo sde): gsungs/ /khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ /bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid/ /'di ni sangs
97b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur/ /bdag gis dga' ba thob pas yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de slad du/ /'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum cu rtsa
97b2(mdo sde): gnyis dri med mnga' ba las/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso
97b3(mdo sde): por byon/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /drang srong lung bstan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas langs te thal
97b4(mdo sde): mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni lhas mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste/ /srid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i ded dpon mchog
97b5(mdo sde): gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong dga' bas tsha bo de la smras pa nga yi gdams ngag nyon/ /gang tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo bskor thos pa/ /de tshe myur du
97b6(mdo sde): thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /dang srong dam pa de yi rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/ /'di 'dra'i sras mnga' khyod kyi thob pa rgya chen legs par
97b7(mdo sde): thob ces smras/ /'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur/ /drang srong mchog de ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin// //
98a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po drug pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu
98a2(mdo sde): dbang phyug chen pos gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bskal
98a3(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
98a4(mdo sde): dang / thabs dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub can/ spyad pa legs par spyad pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
98a5(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par
98a6(mdo sde): bgos pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pas byung ba/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ rtul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi
98a7(mdo sde): dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ dga' ba'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs mthar
98b1(mdo sde): 'byin pa/ stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po/ /lha dang mis mchod pa/ mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/
98b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i bsam pa can/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/ legs par skye bas skyes pa/ 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa/ bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs
98b3(mdo sde): su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ tshur shog /bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim
98b4(mdo sde): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag
98b5(mdo sde): 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de dag kyang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya
98b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel
98b7(mdo sde): ba'ang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang
99a1(mdo sde): p hyug chen po lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'od kyis
99a2(mdo sde): rgyas par bkang ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / sgo bas rgyal po la gsol te/ rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te byang
99a3(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs
99a4(mdo sde): te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ dgyes pa'i dam par dgyes par mdzod cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen
99a5(mdo sde): po| byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang / gzhon nus lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang /
99a6(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal gyis zil gyis non pa las na/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
99a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu
99b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po byas te/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /de la 'di skad
99b2(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltams pa/ /lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la smras/ /de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal pa bye mang shin tu dka'/ /tshur shog
99b3(mdo sde): mi yi dbang po de la mchod du 'deng / /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /gtsug phud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang
99b4(mdo sde): ba ser skya'i gnas mchog tu/ /myur du lhags nas rgyal po'i sgo yi drung na sdod/ /de dag rnams kyis sgo ba la ni yid 'ong smras/ /rgyal po'i pho brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol/ /
99b5(mdo sde): chab sgo bas kyang chig de mnyan nas nang du song / /thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /lha gcig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe ring du srungs/ /bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag
99b6(mdo sde): 'od can chab sgor mchis/ /rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/ /zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od/ /rgyal po da dag gang du mchi yang grib mi
99b7(mdo sde): gda'| |sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur/ /dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yong mi ldang / /skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de dag lus
100a1(mdo sde): kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsol/ /tshig kyang yid du mchis te mi la dpe ma mchis/ /zab cing 'jam mnyen snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas las na/ /de dag
100a2(mdo sde): mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid/ /me tog mchog phreng phyug pa dar gyi lda ldi dag /kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus dang bcas par sdod/ /rgyal po lha rnams
100a3(mdo sde): de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha/ /blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i slad du mchis su nges/ /rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas/ /song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du
100a4(mdo sde): gshegs zhes gyis/ /de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na/ /rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni mi la gang yang med/ /sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal
100a5(mdo sde): pos gnang gi khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol/ /lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yid rangs te/ /lha yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs/ /lha mchog de
100a6(mdo sde): dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po stan las langs te thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir/ /thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs
100a7(mdo sde): kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol/ /nga rgyal dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur/ /bdag cag ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /khyod sras rnam dag sku
100b1(mdo sde): mnga' bsod nams chen po bltams/ /shin tu legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal/ /gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur/ /mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho
100b2(mdo sde): ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyi yan lag brgyan pa blta bar 'tshal/ /rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor
100b3(mdo sde): ba de rab dga'/ /gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba pang du blangs/ /lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen/ /thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di dag kun tu g.yos/ /
100b4(mdo sde): lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni/ /zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas/ /gtsug phud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par gyur/ /dri ma med pa'i
100b5(mdo sde): 'od kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang / /'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang / /mdzod spu nas ni rgya
100b6(mdo sde): chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las/ /bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal/ /mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su/ /yang dag yon tan
100b7(mdo sde): ji ltar don mthong de la bstod/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i/ /sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung / /yongs rtog 'dod chags yul gyi
101a1(mdo sde): gtsub mas bskyed pa yi/ /rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par/ /dpa' khyod chos kyi sprin gyis stong gsum bkad nas ni/ /'chi
101a2(mdo sde): med char gyis nyon mongs gdung ba zhi mdzad 'gyur/ /byams pa'i gsung mnga' thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong gsung du sgrog mdzad pa/ /
101a3(mdo sde): stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrog /srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas
101a4(mdo sde): pa| |mu stegs can gyi tshogs dan log par lta ba bcom/ /khyod kyi rgyu la brten dang stong pa'i chos thos nas/ /seng+ges wa tshogs bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs
101a5(mdo sde): chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal te/ /kun tu byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i/ /ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis/ /'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po
101a6(mdo sde): bsal bar gsol/ /gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung / /lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob/ /rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen
101a7(mdo sde): 'dis| |ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni gtod par 'gyur/ /ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab nas/ /bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas
101b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas legs zhes de dag tshig brjod cing / /lha tshogs de dag tshul du shis par mkha' las dong / /bltams pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar
101b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par
101b3(mdo sde): gyur te| de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo
101b4(mdo sde): nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang
101b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang /
101b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen
101b7(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyi/ de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig /
102a1(mdo sde): srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / tshong dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig /bkra mi shis pa sgur po dang / zhar ba dang / 'on pa
102a2(mdo sde): dang / lkugs pa dang / dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang / gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig /bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig /bsod
102a3(mdo sde): nams kyi rnga ni rdungs shig / bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig /grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par spud cig /rol mo sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa shin tu
102a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dag ni len zhing rdobs shig / khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig /tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi
102a5(mdo sde): dag ni gcig tu sdud shig / bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig /bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyen cig /bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig /lha khang rnams ni
102a6(mdo sde): shin tu brgyan par gyis shig / dge slong dag /de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas skye
102a7(mdo sde): rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyi/ rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shig /legs so zhes skye
102b1(mdo sde): rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs de ltar mnyan te gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas shin tu
102b2(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis sru mo la smras pa/ ma/ bdag gang du bkur/ smras pa/ bu/ lha khang du bkur ro/ /de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs
102b3(mdo sde): su bcad de smras pa/ bdag btsas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang / /nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu
102b4(mdo sde): yang / /spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal na/ /de ring ma yis gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/ /lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis/ /lha
102b5(mdo sde): rnams kun las bdag 'phags lha yi lha lags te/ /bdag 'dra'i lha yang ma mchis gong ma ga la mchis/ /'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyegs tsam du bdag mchi'o/ /bdag
102b6(mdo sde): gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthong na dgar 'gyur zhing / /rim gro bkur sti shin tu che bar bgyid 'gyur la/ /lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de ltar
102b7(mdo sde): grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan nas bkra shis thams cad bshams te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu pang du blangs nas bram ze dang / grong
103a1(mdo sde): rdal ba dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye dus
103a2(mdo sde): bskor te srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / tshong dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni bdugs/ me tog sil ma ni/
103a3(mdo sde): gtor/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang gi bun long ni cher gyur/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra
103a4(mdo sde): ni phyung ste song bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas
103a5(mdo sde): me tog gi char phab ste/ sil snyan sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs
103a6(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khang du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang /
103a7(mdo sde): de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/ gu lang dang / skem byed dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
103b1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas nas langs te byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi
103b2(mdo sde): brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa
103b3(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos so/ /lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dum dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha gang dag gi gzugs gang
103b4(mdo sde): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to/ /ri rgyal ri mchog ri rab nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal/
103b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho klu rje gnas ni nam yang ba rjes chu la phyag mi 'tshal/ /nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal/ /bsod nams shes rab rigs byung legs ldan lha
103b6(mdo sde): rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bzhes/ /yungs 'bru ba rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gyur pa ni/ /stong gsum 'di na lha mi gang yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa lags/ /ri rab rgya
103b7(mdo sde): mtsho nyi zla 'dra ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste/ /de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan pa'i tshe
104a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems
104a2(mdo sde): dpa' lha khang du khyer ba'i tshe btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni/ de yin/ rgyu ni de yin no/ /lha khang du khyer pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //dge slong dag /de nas bram ze
104a3(mdo sde): m dun na 'don 'char po zhes bya ba 'char 'gro'i pha bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te skar ma me bzhi 'das nas nag pa la bab pa'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du phyin
104a4(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ legs kyis byed du chug cig /de'i tshe rgyal po
104a5(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/ 'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang / rkang pa'i rgyan dag dang / mgo'i rgyan dag dang /
104a6(mdo sde): mgul gyi rgyan dag dang / sor gdub dag dang / rna rgyan dag dang / dpung rgyan dag dang / gser gyi ska rags dag dang / gser skud dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dag
104a7(mdo sde): dang / rin po che'i dra ba dag dang / lham rin po ches spras pa dag dang / do shal rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag dang / gdu bu rgyan can dag dang / mgul gdub dag
104b1(mdo sde): dang / cod pan dag kyang byed du bcug ste zin nas skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe shA kya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ gzhon nu brgyan du gsol
104b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed kyis gzhon nu la brgyan pa dang / mchod pa byas pas chog gi /ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad byed du bcug go /smras pa/ bdag cag gi rgyan 'di dag
104b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i sku la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig gdags su gsol/ de ltar gnang na bdag cag gis sug las bgyis pa'ang don mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe nam langs te nyi ma
104b4(mdo sde): shar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba der zhugs so/ /de'i tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs byang chub sems dpa' pang du
104b5(mdo sde): blangs so/ /bud med brgyad khris kyang byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /bu mo stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing
104b6(mdo sde): 'khod par gyur to/ /shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /bram ze lnga stong yang lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong du
104b7(mdo sde): lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyed cig byas pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags te/ de dag lus la btags ma
105a1(mdo sde): thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas lham mer ma gyur/ lhan ner ma gyur/ lhang nger ma gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper
105a2(mdo sde): na/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsha'i yug gzhag na lham mer mi rung / lhan ner mi rung / lhang nger mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
105a3(mdo sde): lus kyi 'od kyis phog na lham mer mi rung / lhan ner mi rung / lhang nger mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du rgyan gyi rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags pa de
105a4(mdo sde): dang de dag mog mog por gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa bzhin no/ /de'i tshe skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med
105a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa des lus chen po bstan nas mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ stong gsum sa 'di
105a6(mdo sde): grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa kun/ /gal te gser gyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang / /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser zegs gcig gis zil brlag ste/ /gser gzhan dag
105a7(mdo sde): ni dpal dang bral zhing gsal mi 'gyur/ /sa 'di mtha' dag dzam+bu'i klung gi gser khebs kyang / /'dren pa dpal rgyas spu khung 'od phyung zil gyis non/ /mi snang mi gsal
105b1(mdo sde): mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing / /bde gshegs skyob pa'i drung na snag tsha bzhin du 'gyur/ /yon tan brgyas gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan/ /de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min
105b2(mdo sde): shin tu dri med sku/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu ma dag dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od kyang dpa' stug mdun mi gsal/ /gang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bus mtshan spras
105b3(mdo sde): pa| |de la gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyan phal ci zhig dgos/ /rgyan rnams phrol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzad ma gtse zhig /blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi bzhed/ /
105b4(mdo sde): 'dun pa de ni rgyal khab sras dang lhan cig btsas/ /dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 'bungs de stsol/ /shAkya'i rigs ni rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas/ /shAkya dag ni yid
105b5(mdo sde): dga' mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur/ /lha mo des de skad ces smras nas lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /rgyan gyi le'u
105b6(mdo sde): ste| dgu pa'o/ / //dge slong dag /de ltar gzhon nu de ya zad skyes pa dang / bkra shis brgya stong byas nas khye'u stong phrag bcu dang / bu mo stong phrag bcus yongs su
105b7(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te yi ge'i grar 'jug par byas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang bas gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu dang / gser dngul dang dbyig gis gang
106a1(mdo sde): ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang dang / grong bar dang / tshong dus kyi phyogs gang yin pa dag tu gtor
106a2(mdo sde): to| |mngon par byin no/ /sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad kyi sgra'ang phyung zhing me tog gi char chen po'ang bab bo/ /stegs bu dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil
106a3(mdo sde): khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dag gi steng nas bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing me tog dag 'thor bar
106a4(mdo sde): gyur to| |lha'i bu mo stong phrag brgyad ni rgyan rnams kyis lhug lhug por brgyan te/ rin po che bzang byed thogs nas lam 'phyag cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dod
106a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha'i
106a6(mdo sde): dkyil nas me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi bre bar gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong bar
106a7(mdo sde): gyur te| bkod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs ma thag tu de nas byis
106b1(mdo sde): pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod de khas bub tu 'gyel to/ /de ltar 'gyel ba dang / dga' ldan gyi ris
106b2(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu yan lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bslang ngo / /bslebs nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang
106b3(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa/ /grangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang / /'jig rten bzo
106b4(mdo sde): yi sbyor ba tshad med mang ba dag / bskal pa bye mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslab/ /'on kyang skye bo'i rjes su mthun pa tsam mdzad de/ /byis pa mang po theg pa mchog la smin
106b5(mdo sde): mdzad dang / /sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi med dgod pa'i phyir/ /shin tu lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i bden bzhi lam
106b6(mdo sde): gyi tshul mkhyen cing / /rgyu la brten nas ji ltar 'byung ba de la'ang mkhas/ /ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad bsil 'gyur de tshul yang / /mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos tsam
106b7(mdo sde): lta cis mi mkhyen/ /'jig rten gsum na 'di yi slob dpon gang na med/ /lha dang mir bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste/ /bskal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'dis bslab pa'i/ /
107a1(mdo sde): yi ge de dag ming yang khyed kyis shes mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba/ /skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa
107a2(mdo sde): 'dis mkhyen te/ /gzugs med bltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab mkhas na/ /yi ge gzugs yod bltar snang dag lta smos ci dgos/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu
107a3(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas ma ma dang bran mo'i 'khor bkod de rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs
107a4(mdo sde): pa shAkya gzhan ni phyir dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa'i yi ge shing lha'i tshon gyis byug pa/ gser gyi yang mig gis btags
107a5(mdo sde): pa| mtha' ma nor bu rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye mkhan pos bdag la yi ge gang zhig bslab/
107a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i yi ge'am/ kha ro sti'i yi ge'am/ pad+ma'i snying po'i yi ge'am/ ang+ga'i yi ge'am/ mang+ga'i yi ge'am/ yul ma ga d+ha'i yi ge'am/ bkra shis pa'i yi ge'am/
107a7(mdo sde): sor mo pa'i yi ge'am/ sha ka ni'i yi ge'am/ ya ba na'i yi ge'am/ bag le ba'i yi ge'am/ pa ru sha'i yi ge'am/ 'gro lding ba'i yi ge'am/ ki ra ta'i yi ge'am/ lho
107b1(mdo sde): phyogs pa'i yi ge'am/ drag shul can gyi yi ge'am/ grangs kyi yi ge'am/ spyi'u tshugs pa'i yi ge'am/ rjes su mthun pa'i yi ge'am/ bru sha'i yi ge'am/ ka sha'i yi ge'am/
107b2(mdo sde): rgya'i yi ge'am/ phu na'i yi ge'am/ hu na'i yi ge'am/ yi ge 'bring dang rgyas par bri ba'i yi ge'am/ rgyal gyi yi ge'am/ lha'i yi ge'am/ klu'i yi ge'am/ gnod sbyin gyi yi
107b3(mdo sde): ge'am/ dri za'i yi ge'am/ mi 'am ci'i yi ge'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i yi ge'am/ lha ma yin gyi yi ge'am/ nam mkha' lding gi yi ge'am/ ri dwags kyi 'khor lo pa'i yi
107b4(mdo sde): ge'am| khwa skad shes pa'i yi ge'am/ sa bla'i lha'i yi ge'am/ bar snang gi lha'i yi ge'am/ nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi yi ge'am/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi ge'am/ shar gyi lus
107b5(mdo sde): 'phags po'i yi ge'am/ gdeg pa'i yi ge'am/ gzhag pa'i yi ge'am/ bsnan pa'i yi ge'am/ rgya mtsho'i yi ge'am/ rdo rje'i yi ge'am/ spring yig dang / lan gyi yi
107b6(mdo sde): ge'am| rnam 'thor gyi yi ge'am/ rings med kyi yi ge'am/ bstan bcos bskor ba'i yi ge'am/ rtsis bskor ba'i yi ge'am/ gdeg pa bskor ba'i yi ge'am/ gzhag
107b7(mdo sde): pa bskor ba'i yi ge'am/ rkang pas bskor ba'i yi ge'am/ tshig lan lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi yi ge'am/ tshig gi mtshams bcur brgyud pa'i bar
108a1(mdo sde): gyi yi ge'am/ bla thabs su bsnan pa'i yi ge'am/ sgra thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge'am/ rig pa dang mthun pa'i yi ge'am/ rnam par 'dres pa'i
108a2(mdo sde): yi ge'am/ drang srong gi dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge'am/ lha nges pa'i yi ge'am/ sa blta ba'i yi ge'am/ nam mkha' blta ba'i yi ge'am/ sman thams cad kyi rgyu mthun
108a3(mdo sde): pa'i yi ge'am/ snying po thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge'am/ 'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sdud pa'i yi ge'am/ kye slob dpon/ yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas
108a4(mdo sde): bdag la gang bslab/ de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen ngo mtshar du gyur nas bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung ste nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa med par
108a5(mdo sde): byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che/ /bstan bcos kun la bslab gyur kyang / /'jig rten 'jig rten rjes bsnyeg phyir/ /yi
108a6(mdo sde): ge'i grwar ni byon par gyur/ /yi ge gang gi ming dag kyang / /bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa/ /de la 'di lta byang gyur kyang / /yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to/ /'di yi zhal ni
108a7(mdo sde): mthong mod kyi/ /spyi gtsug 'phags pa bltar mi snang / /yi ge'i shes rab mthar phyin na/ /bdag gis 'di ko ji ltar bslab/ /lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi
108b1(mdo sde): mchog mkhas pa/ /khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med/ /'jig rten gang zag do zla med/ /bdag kyang 'di nyid mthu yis na/ /shes rab thabs kyi khyad par gyis/ /'jig rten kun
108b2(mdo sde): gyi dpung gnyen po/ /lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe byang chub
108b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob cing gang gi tshe a zhes brjod pa de'i tshe 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /A zhes brjod pa dang
108b4(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i sgra byung ngo / /i zhes brjod pa dang dbang po shin tu yangs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /I zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni yams kyi nad mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /u
108b5(mdo sde): zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni 'tshe ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /U zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /e zhes brjod pa dang nyes pa ni
108b6(mdo sde): btsal ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ai zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /o zhes brjod pa dang chu bo las rgal ba'i sgra byung
108b7(mdo sde): ngo / /au zhes brjod pa dang rdzub pa'i sgra byung ngo / /aM zhes brjod pa dang bdag gi ba mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /aHzhes brjod pa dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ka
109a1(mdo sde): zhes brjod pa dang las kyi rnam par smrin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /kha zhes brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya
109a2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ga zhes brjod pa dang chos zab ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /g+ha zhes brjod pa dang ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ling tog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i
109a3(mdo sde): sgra byung ngo / /nga zhes brjod pa dang yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /tsa zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgra byung ngo / /tsha zhes brjod pa dang
109a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /dza zhes brjod pa dang rga shi las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgra byung ngo / /dz+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi
109a5(mdo sde): dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /nya zhes brjod pa dang shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo / /Ta zhes brjod pa dang lam shin tu chad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /Tha zhes brjod pa dang dri ba
109a6(mdo sde): bzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /nga zhes brjod pa dang dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /D+ha zhes brjod pa dang yul mi gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo / /Na zhes brjod pa dang
109a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa ni phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ta zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /tha zhes brjod pa dang mthu stobs dang / shugs
109b1(mdo sde): dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo / /de zhes brjod pa dang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des pa'i sgra byung ngo / /d+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa rnams kyi
109b2(mdo sde): nor ni rnam pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /na zhes brjod pa dang ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /pa zhes brjod pa dang don dam pa'i sgra byung ngo / /pha zhes
109b3(mdo sde): brjod pa dang 'bras bu rnyed pa mngon du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ba zhes brjod pa dang bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgra byung ngo / /b+ha zhes brjod pa dang srid pa 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo
109b4(mdo sde): ma zhes brjod pa dang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa zhi bar bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ya zhes brjod pa dang chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ra zhes brjod pa dang dga' ba la
109b5(mdo sde): dga' ba med pa ni/ don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /la zhes brjod pa dang 'khri shing chad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /wa zhes brjod pa dang theg pa mchog gi sgra byung ngo / /sha
109b6(mdo sde): zhes brjod pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra byung ngo / /Sha zhes brjod pa dang skye mched drug gzhom zhing mngon par shes pa drug dang ye shes thob pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sa zhes brjod
109b7(mdo sde): pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /ha zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa bcom zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra byung ngo / /
110a1(mdo sde): k+Sha zhes brjod pa dang yi ge'i mthar phyin te/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /de ltar byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob pa'i tshe
110a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byung bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwa na 'dug pa'i tshe byis pa sum khri
110a3(mdo sde): nyis stong rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lobs par gyur kyang yi ge'i grwar 'jug pa'i
110a4(mdo sde): rgyu ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin no/ /yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //dge slong dag /gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon
110a5(mdo sde): nu de gzhon nu gzhan dag dang / zhang blon gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu zhing pa'i grong lta zhing dong ste/ grong bltas nas zhing blas kyi mtha'i skyed mos tshal zhig tu phyin to/ /de na byang
110a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par pha zad 'khyam zhing song song ba dang / dzam+bu'i shing ljon pa mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa'
110a7(mdo sde): de'i grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ 'dug nas byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/
110b1(mdo sde): rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral
110b2(mdo sde): zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
110b3(mdo sde): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams
110b4(mdo sde): kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs
110b5(mdo sde): te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag
110b6(mdo sde): pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de'i tshe phyir rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga yod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' las dong ba lnga zhig lho phyogs nas byang
110b7(mdo sde): phyogs logs su dong dong pa las de dag tshal stug po de'i steng du phyin pa dang / phyir phul ba ltar 'dong ma nus nas de dag mi dga' zhing ba spu g.yos te tshigs su bcad pa 'di
111a1(mdo sde): smras so| |bdag cag 'di na ri rab nor bu rdo rje brtsegs ri shin tu rngams stug pa yang thal phyung ste/ /glang po a mra'i shing rlon yal gas gzings pa
111a2(mdo sde): mang po bcom nas 'gro bzhin dong dong la/ /bdag cag 'di na lha yi khyim la'ang thogs med gnod sbyin dri za'i khyim steng nam mkhar gnas gnas na/ /tshal stug 'dir phyin
111a3(mdo sde): nas ni sgyid lug gyur pa su yi mthu zhig gis na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur/ /de nas tshal stug po de na lha mo zhig gnas pa des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa
111a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs byung shAkya'i rgyal sras nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'ong / /'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa zla zhal pad+ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta bur rab
111a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ /lha dang klu dbang gnod sbyin dri zas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan dgongs shing tshal stug 'di na bzhugs/ /srid pa bye ba brgya dag tu ni bsod nams spel ba de yi
111a6(mdo sde): mthu yis rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go / de nas de dag gis 'og logs su bltas pa dang / gzhon nu zhig dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong nas 'di dag 'di snyam
111a7(mdo sde): du su zhig 'di ltar gnas/ nor gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu'am zhig ma yin nam/ 'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud lta'am/ yang na lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ 'on
111b1(mdo sde): te dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'am/ yang na gu lang ngam/ grul bum gyi bdag po'am/ 'on te spro ba chen po dang ldan pa nag po'am/ 'on te lha'i bu zla ba'am/ 'on te 'od zer stong dang
111b2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i nyi ma'am/ 'on te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam/ su zhig snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so/ /gzhon nu 'di ni rnam thos bu yi gzugs
111b3(mdo sde): las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas na/ /'di ni sgra gcan yin nam 'on te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam nyi zla'i gzugs/ /'dod mchog dbang po'i gzugs sam gu lang
111b4(mdo sde): gzugs sam 'on te nag po'i gzugs yin nam/ /yang na 'di ni dpal ldan yan lag mtshan sgras sdig med sangs rgyas 'gyur ba zhig /de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de
111b5(mdo sde): dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rnam thos bu dang mig stong bdog la dpal ni gang yod gyur pa dang / /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang / /mi
111b6(mdo sde): mjed bdag po tshangs dang gza' rnams la yang dpal ni gang yod pa/ /dpal de shAkya'i sras po 'di drung phyin na gang gi char mi phod/ /de nas drang srong de dag gis lha mo de'i tshig
111b7(mdo sde): thos nas sa la babs pa dang / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing / me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba mthong nas de dag byang chub sems
112a1(mdo sde): dpa' la sems shing tshigs su bcad pas bstod de/ de la gcig gis smras pa/ 'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs pa/ /mtsho 'di rab tu byung gyur
112a2(mdo sde): te| |gang gis 'jig rten sim 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ mi shes rab rib 'jig rten du/ /sgron ma 'di ni rab tu byung / /gang gis
112a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba snang 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ mya ngan rgya mtsho 'dal ba la/ /gru yi dam pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur
112a4(mdo sde): pa'i| |chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ /nyon mongs 'ching bas bcings pa la/ /'grol bar mdzad pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis 'gro ba 'grol
112a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i/ /chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ rga dang nad kyis gzir ba la/ /sman pa dam pa 'di byung ste/ /gang gis rga shi thar bya ba'i/ /chos de
112a6(mdo sde): 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/ /de nas drang srong de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' las
112a7(mdo sde): dong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang byang chub sems dpa' mi mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' med pas mi dga' ste/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu de mi snang na gar song / de'i tshe
112b1(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che gzhon nu tshol du dong dong ba dang / de'i tshe blon po gcig cig gis byang chub sems dpa' dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed cing 'dug
112b2(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo / /des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma yol na/ dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/
112b3(mdo sde): tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rings shing myur ba myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te tshigs
112b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dang / smras so/ /rgyal po gzhon nu de la gzigs/ /dzam+bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad/ /brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du/ /gzi brjid dpal gyis rab tu
112b5(mdo sde): mdzes| |zhugs shing gang gi grib ma la/ /mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i/ /grib ma de ni des ma btang / /skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib/ /de nas rgyal po zas
112b6(mdo sde): gtsang ma dzam+bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ri yi
112b7(mdo sde): spo la me 'bar 'dra ba ste/ /zla ba skar ma'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing / /gzi brjid sgron 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na/ /nga yis lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur/ /de skad ces
113a1(mdo sde): smras nas des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /thub pa gang tshe bltams pa dang / /gang tshe 'od ldan bsam
113a2(mdo sde): gtan mdzad/ /'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su/ /mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i tshe byis pa khri'u thogs pa dag ca co'i sgra 'byin par gyur nas de dag la blon po dag
113a3(mdo sde): gis sgra ma che sgra ma che zhes byas pa dang / de dag ci zhig nongs zhes zer ro/ /blon po dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan bzang po mchog
113a4(mdo sde): d am pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang pa mnga' ba 'di ri ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang shing gi grib ma de ma yol zhing sgrib
113a5(mdo sde): par gnas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpyid 'das dbyar gyi dus bab dbyar zla rab la/ /me tog rgyas shing me tog yal gas khebs gyur te/ /khrung khrung rma bya ne tso ri skegs
113a6(mdo sde): skad 'byin pa/ /shAkya'i bu dag phal cher mngon du 'dod bar gyur/ /'dun pa can gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu nags tshal dag ni gzigs pa mdzad slad du/ /byis pa rnams kyis
113a7(mdo sde): yongs su bskor te gshegs pa'i rigs/ /bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi/ /bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs rnams sbron du mchi/ /nyi ma'i gung la
113b1(mdo sde): sems can rnam par dag pa de/ /byis pa lnga brgya dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu/ /yab la ma gsol yum la ma gsol ma tshor bar/ /de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du
113b2(mdo sde): song / /rgyal po dam pa'i zhing ba dag gi grong de na/ /dzam+bu'i sdong chen yal ga mang po rgyas yod pa/ /gzhon nus mthong na nyam thag sdug bsngal phag gyur te/ /'dus byas ci rung
113b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed/ /dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa dzam+bu'i grib mar song / /rtswa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni/ /skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus
113b4(mdo sde): srang bsam gtan bzhi/ /dge ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed/ /drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dong dong na/ /dzam+bu'i shing gi steng du phyin nas 'dong ma
113b5(mdo sde): nus| |de dag thogs nas nga rgyal dregs pa spang bya zhing / /de dag thams cad mthun par lhan cig lta bar byed/ /bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de bzhin khor yug dag/ thal phyung
113b6(mdo sde): thags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na/ /bdag cag de ring dzam+bu'i shing ljon 'di las ni/ /'da' bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod/ /babs te sa steng 'dug nas
113b7(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i shing drung na/ /shAkya'i bu pho byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can/ /'dzam klung gser gyi 'od 'phro 'dra ba 'od zer ldan/ /skyil mo krung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe
114a1(mdo sde): mthong / /de dag rmad gyur spyi bor sor bcu thal sbyar te/ /thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal to/ /'gro ba shin tu bde mdzad legs par
114a2(mdo sde): bltams pa legs/ /myur du rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsir sems can thul/ /sdong po mchog ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud/ /gdugs yol gyur kyang grib mas bde bar
114a3(mdo sde): gshegs mi gtong / /lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa thal sbyar nas/ /nges par byas pa de yi rkang par phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zas gtsang rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs
114a4(mdo sde): tshol zhing / /nga'i bu gzhon nu de ni gang du song zhes rmed/ /sru mos smras pa bdag gis btsal kyang ma rnyed na/ /gzhon nu de ni gar bzhud rgyal pos rma bar gsol/ /zas gtsang
114a5(mdo sde): rgyal pos nyug rum dag la rings par rmas/ /nga yi gzhon nu 'di nas byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes/ /sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang rmas/ /lha gcig khyod
114a6(mdo sde): gson mchog de zhing pa'i grong du bzhud/ /de ni rings par shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /byung nas dpal zhugs gyur ba'i zhing ba'i grong du bltas/ /ji ltar nyi ma bye ba khrag
114a7(mdo sde): khrig shar ba ltar/ /de ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong / /cod pan ral gri lham dag pha zad phog phud de/ /mgo bor sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag
114b1(mdo sde): kyang 'tshal/ /drang srong bdag nyid chen po legs par yang dag smra/ /gzhon nu byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du nges/ /rab tu dad lha brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang / /de bzhin
114b2(mdo sde): shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang / /bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong / /bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /des ni stong gsum ma
114b3(mdo sde): lus sa rnams rab bskyod nas/ /dran dang shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs gyur te/ /mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs pa'i tshig brjod pa/ /yab cig zhing blas thong la gzhan
114b4(mdo sde): las tshol ma mdzad/ /gal te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis gser char dbab/ /de ste na bza' 'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul/ /'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang
114b5(mdo sde): bdag gis 'bru char dbab/ /mi dbang khyod kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor/ /yab dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas/ /skad cig de la de slar grong khyer mchog tu
114b6(mdo sde): zhugs| |'gro dang mthun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas kyi/ /sems can rnam dag mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan/ /zhing pa'i grong gi le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes pa dang / dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
115a1(mdo sde): z as gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs kha cig gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
115a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang / blo nges pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos
115a3(mdo sde): 'di skad du bstan te/ gzhon nu 'di gal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /ci
115a4(mdo sde): ste mngon par ma byung na ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur
115a5(mdo sde): ro| |de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim
115a6(mdo sde): bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong
115a7(mdo sde): tshang ba 'byung ngo / /de gnod par bya ba dang / mtshan cha med par chos dang mthun pas sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te gcig pu gnas par 'gyur
115b1(mdo sde): ro zhes mchin/ de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te dges ba la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung
115b2(mdo sde): bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur ba dang bdag cag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gdung yang mi 'chad/ khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang mi snyan par mi brjod cing rim gror bgyi
115b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ gal te de ltar bya na/ de'i phyir gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod khyed kyis ltos shig /de'i tshe shAkya lnga
115b4(mdo sde): brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no/ /bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no/ /zhes zer ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
115b5(mdo sde): de ni shin tu phul che ba yin gyi/ gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 'dod ces dri bar bya'o zhes de dag kun kyang 'dus te gzhon nu la dngos po de brjod do/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ da
115b6(mdo sde): ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsam ste/ 'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis mtha' yas rig /'thab mo 'khon ces mya
115b7(mdo sde): ngan sdug bsngal rtsa/ /'jigs byed dug gi lo ma 'dra ba ste/ /me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang 'dra/ /'dod pa'i yon tan bdag 'dod ma yin te/ /bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes
116a1(mdo sde): ma yin| |bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bas zhi sems su/ /bdag ni mi smra nags tshal gnas par bya/ /yang des brtags nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas
116a2(mdo sde): te sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dam dang lcag lcig khrod nas pad+ma rnam par 'phel//
116a3(mdo sde): mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob/ /gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa/ /de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul/ /sngon gyi byang
116a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba/ /de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras dang slas kyang bstan/ /'on kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams/ /bdag kyang de
116a5(mdo sde): dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya/ /gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa/ /bud med phal pa gang yang bdag gi tshul mthun min/ /gang zhig bdag gi sems
116a6(mdo sde): ni mngon par dga' byed cing / /bag yod gzugs dang na tshod rus rigs dag pa 'os/ /des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yi ger bris/ /'di 'dra'i bu mo mchis na bdag
116a7(mdo sde): la bka' stsol cig / skye po phal ba ma bsdams bdag la mkho ma lags/ /yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan mchis na bdag stsol cig /dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang
116b1(mdo sde): gzugs kyi dregs dang bral/ /phu nu ma la byams ltar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing / /gtong la dga' ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can/ /de 'dra'i bu mo mchis na yab kyis
116b2(mdo sde): bdag stsol cig / gang la nga rgyal khengs dang zhe sdang ma mchis shing / /g.yo dang phrag dog sgyu spangs drang ba'i dang tshul can/ /rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan la chags dang bral/ /
116b3(mdo sde): bdag gi khyos ni chog 'tshal rtag sdom bag mchis la/ /rgyags pa ma mchis mi g.yeng zung thub tshul 'chang zhing / /nga rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral bas bran mo bzhin/ /sgra
116b4(mdo sde): dri ro la ma chags chang la ma chags te/ /'dod bral brnab sems ma mchis rang gi nor gyis 'tshal/ /bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba ma lags pa/ /ngo tsha'i gos 'tshal
116b5(mdo sde): rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas/ /lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson/ /lus dang dag dang yid kyi dngos po rab dag pa/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mnga' nga rgyal
116b6(mdo sde): glen bral zhing / /rtog dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de/ /gyos sgyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan/ /bran dang bran mo kun la'ang bdag bzhin byams
116b7(mdo sde): srel ba| |smad 'tshong bzhin du bstan bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas/ /slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du ma la nas ldang bgyid pa/ /byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis
117a1(mdo sde): pa| |de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig / dge slong dag /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas mdun na 'don
117a2(mdo sde): la smras pa/ bram ze chen po/ khyod ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/ bu mo dag ltos la gang la'ang rung ste yon tan de lta bu dag yod na/
117a3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung / bram ze'i bu mo'ang rung / rje'i rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung / dmangs rigs kyi bu mo'ang rung gi /bu mo de dag 'dir 'on cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu
117a4(mdo sde): 'di ni rigs don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ gzhon nu 'di ni yon tan don du gnyer ba yin no/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /rgyal rigs bram ze'i bu mo dang //
117a5(mdo sde): rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin te/ /su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i/ /bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig /nga yi bu 'di rigs dag dang / /rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin/ /yon tan bden pa
117a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnams/ /de la 'di yi yid dga' 'o/ /dge slong dag /de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des tshigs su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de khyer te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
117a7(mdo sde): chen por song nas khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du song song ba las/ yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/ de nas rim gyis
117b1(mdo sde): shAkya lag na be con can gyi khyim du phyin nas der bltas na bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug la yid du 'ong ba/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ ha cang yang mi ring
117b2(mdo sde): ba| ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi nag pa/ bzod ma dar la bab pa/ bud med rin po che ltar snang ba
117b3(mdo sde): zhig mthong ba dang / bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze chen po/ khyod la dgos ba ci zhig mchis/ bram ze mdun na
117b4(mdo sde): 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur cing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can/ /de yis bud med
117b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris/ /su la yon tan 'di yod de yi chung mar 'os/ /zhes smras te/ des de la yi ge de byin no/ /de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de bklags
117b6(mdo sde): nas bzhin 'dzum ba bstan te bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze yon tan 'di dag bdag la kun tshang gi /des ba'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim
117b7(mdo sde): thab bo| |gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi bshol ma mdzad gsungs/ /brgya la skye bo phal dang bzhugs par 'gyur yang gda'/ /de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
118a1(mdo sde): drung du song ste don de brjod pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun pa'i bu mo mthong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ su la de lta bu zhig yod/
118a2(mdo sde): smras pa| lha/ shAkya lag na be con can la bu mo de lta bu zhig mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che zhing bzang ba la
118a3(mdo sde): mos pa yin la/ bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyi/ bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig byas te gzhon
118a4(mdo sde): nu 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin pa byed du gzhug go / bu mo de dag gi nang nas gang la gzhon nu mig mngon par chags par gyur pa de gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/ /
118a5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra
118a6(mdo sde): bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag kyang bu mo dag la sbyin pa byed kyi/ bu mo thams cad kyang 'dun
118a7(mdo sde): khang du shog cig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dun khang du song ste seng+ge'i khri la 'dug go /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang
118b1(mdo sde): mas bya ra ba dag bkod nas gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mig chags pa de nga la gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag /de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de na bu mo
118b2(mdo sde): gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang ga la ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blang ba'i
118b3(mdo sde): phyir der dong ngo / /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpas bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag la yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems
118b4(mdo sde): dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba myur bar phyir dong ngo / /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba/
118b5(mdo sde): bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'dun khang ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mig mi 'dzum par byang chub sems dpa'
118b6(mdo sde): la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag byin zin par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs
118b7(mdo sde): nas 'dzum dmul te byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag gis khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/ bdag la de ltar dngan sdang mdzad/ smras pa/
119a1(mdo sde): ngas ni khyod la dngan sdang byas pa'ang med na/ khyod ni shin tu 'phyis te 'ongs so zhes smras nas des sor gdub srang brgya stong du ma ri ba phud de
119a2(mdo sde): de la byin no/ /bu mo des smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod la bdag gis 'di lta zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/ smras pa/ 'o na rgyan gzhan dang gzhan dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod
119a3(mdo sde): khyer cig / des smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so zhes smras nas bu mo de song ngo / /de nas
119a4(mdo sde): bya ra bar bkod pa'i mi de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song nas lo rgyus de dag smos te smras pa/ lha/ shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bgyi ba de
119a5(mdo sde): la gzhon nu spyan chags par gyur la cung zad cig tu bka' mchid kyang bgyis so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi gan du
119a6(mdo sde): bram ze mdun na 'don pho nyar btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig ces spring ngo / /lag na be con can gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gzhon nu de
119a7(mdo sde): ni pho brang na skyid de bar 'khrungs pa lags la/ bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/ sgyu rtsal shes pa la bu mo gtong gi /sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la
119b1(mdo sde): mi gtong ba lags na/ gzhon nu de ni sgyu rtsal shes pa'ang ma lags la/ ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phongs dang / stobs dang gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyi tshul shes pa'ang ma lags
119b2(mdo sde): na| bdag gis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gtong / tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ nga la des 'di dang lan gnyis su
119b3(mdo sde): bsdos te/ gang gi tshe ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa de'i tshe yang / ci nged lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/ de'ang 'di
119b4(mdo sde): skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang gtam de thos nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
119b5(mdo sde): ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu/ de dri bas ci zhig bya/ gzhon nus smras pa/ lha/ de ni bka' mi stsal du mi rung ngo zhes lan
119b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dris pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag brjod do/ /byang chub
119b7(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/ lha/ grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'gran par nus pa 'ga' mchis sam/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bgad nas byang chub sems dpa' la
120a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/ smras pa/ lha de ni/ bdag gis legs par rdo thogs so/ /de bas na/ sgyu rtsal 'tshal
120a2(mdo sde): ba rnams kun kyang gsog tu gsol/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gis sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril
120a3(mdo sde): gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rang gi sgyu rtsal ston gyi/ der sgyu rtsal shes pa thams cad shog cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / shAkya
120a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam tshogs par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste/ 'dir ral gri'i thabs dang / 'phongs dang /
120a5(mdo sde): stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces dam bcas nas de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo / /de'i
120a6(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po bong shin tu che ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa gzhon nu lha sbyin gyis mthong nas phrag dog dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal dang /
120a7(mdo sde): stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna nas bzung ste lag pa g.yas pas thal mo lan gcig bsnun pas bsad par gyur to/ /de'i
120b1(mdo sde): 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' po byung ba dang / des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do/ /smras pa/
120b2(mdo sde): lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la
120b3(mdo sde): zhon te byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sus bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do/ /smras pa/ lha sbyin
120b4(mdo sde): gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos bor ro/ /smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas
120b5(mdo sde): pa'ang legs na/ sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mi zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas shing
120b6(mdo sde): rta la 'dug bzhin du rkang pa ya gcig sa la brkyang ste rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po de blangs te ra ba bdun rim dang / 'obs bdun rim 'das nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags
120b7(mdo sde): gcig tsam du 'phangs so/ /glang po de phyogs gang du lhung ba'i phyogs de gshong chen po zhig tu gyur nas da ltar glang po'i gshong zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya
121a1(mdo sde): stong mang po e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin bar gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu
121a2(mdo sde): dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /glang po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa/ /zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs/ /ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun
121a3(mdo sde): yongs bzlas nas/ /grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon mi zar/ /nga rgyal stobs kyis mtho ba'i lus can rnams/ /'khor ba'i
121a4(mdo sde): grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du/ /shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas thon nas sa'i phyogs gang
121a5(mdo sde): du shAkya gzhon nu dag sgyu rtsal ston pa der dong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs dag dang / skye bo phal po che dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
121a6(mdo sde): dang / shAkya gzhon nu gzhan dag gi sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de sa'i phyogs der dong ngo / /de nas thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga shes
121a7(mdo sde): pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpar yi ge 'gran to/ /de'i tshe shAkya de dag gis slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas yi
121b1(mdo sde): ge'i 'bru'am/ yi ge'i sna grangs kyi mthar phyin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag phye zhig /de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'
121b2(mdo sde): yi ge la mkhas pa mngon du mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mi yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam/ /lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig
121b3(mdo sde): rten nam/ /'jig rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang / /de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyin/ /mi yi zla ba 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'i/ /yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi/ /
121b4(mdo sde): ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yong mi shes/ /'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur/ /shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags pa lta'ang
121b5(mdo sde): 'phags par chug ste/ gzhon nu 'di grangs kyis shes pa la khyad par ci yod 'gran par bya'o/ /de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces bya ba rtsis pa chen po byed pa/ bgrang pa dang rtsis kyi pha rol
121b6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dpang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub
121b7(mdo sde): sems dpas ni rtsis mgo phog / shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis ni brtsis pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sleb par ma nus so/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum
122a1(mdo sde): dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig
122a2(mdo sde): tu brtsis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ma sleb bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyed kyis ni rtsis mgo phog cig /kho bos ni brtsi'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya gzhon
122a3(mdo sde): nu gcig gis rtsis mgo phog na/ byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyis chod pa la ma sleb bo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang /
122a4(mdo sde): nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu rtsis mgo phog kyang byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyis chod pa la ma
122a5(mdo sde): sleb bo| |byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di la brtsad de'ang ci rung gi /khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rtsis mgo phog cig dang / kho bos brtsi'o/ /de nas shAkya gzhon
122a6(mdo sde): nu lnga brgyas tshig gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi med par rtsis mgo phog na/ byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/ de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni
122a7(mdo sde): phug thug par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' med par gyur to/ /de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
122b1(mdo sde): so| |legs pa'i blo mnga' 'di dris na/ /mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste/ /shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam/ /kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug /de yi shes rab 'di 'dra ste/ /ye shes blo gros dran
122b2(mdo sde): ldan yang / /rtsis kyi mkhyen pa rgya mtsho de/ /da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad/ /de nas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te shin tu rmad du byung bar sems shing / de'i tshe thams cad
122b3(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye don grub gzhon nu khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo/ /zhes thams cad stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' la
122b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod la sras de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing mgyogs la/ yang zhing shugs dang ldan pa
122b5(mdo sde): can mnga' ba ni brnyes pa legs par brnyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu/ rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub grangs kyi shes pa
122b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa dang / rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/ smras pa/ lha/ rdo thogs so/ /smras pa/ 'o na rtsis shig /de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di
122b7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa zhes bgyi ba'i rtsis kyi lugs mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ shes so/ /smras pa/ 'o na bye ba las brgyar gong du
123a1(mdo sde): bsgres pa'i rtsis kyi lugs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bye ba phrag brgya na ther 'bum zhes bya'o/ /ther 'bum
123a2(mdo sde): phrag brgya na khrag khrig ces bya'o/ /khrag khrig phrag brgya na gtams pa zhes bya'o/ /gtams pa phrag brgya na dkrigs pa zhes bya'o/ /dkrigs pa phrag brgya na mi 'khrugs
123a3(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /mi 'khrugs phrag brgya na khyad phyin ces bya'o/ /khyad phyin phrag brgyan phang steng zhes bya'o/ /phang steng phrag brgya na mang 'dzin ces bya'o/ /mang 'dzin phrag brgya na
123a4(mdo sde): glang po'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /glang po'i stobs phrag brgya na ngogs thob ces bya'o/ /ngogs thob phrag brgya na rnam par bzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par bzhag pa
123a5(mdo sde): gdags pa phrag brgya na rgyu rig ces bya'o/ /rgyu rig phrag brgya na lag sbyin zhes bya'o/ /lag sbyin phrag brgya na rgyu dbang zhes bya'o/ /rgyu dbang phrag brgya na rdzogs thob ces
123a6(mdo sde): bya'o| |rdzogs thob phrag brgya na bgrang rtogs zhes bya'o/ /bgrang rtogs phrag brgya na sgrib pa zhes bya'o/ /sgrib pa phrag brgya na stobs zhes bya'o/ /stobs phrag brgya na kun
123a7(mdo sde): stobs zhes bya'o/ /kun stobs phrag brgya na rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o/ /rnam par brda shes ldan phrag brgya na brda shes kun zhes bya'o/ /brda shes kun phrag
123b1(mdo sde): brgya na rnam 'byung zhes bya'o/ /rnam 'byung phrag brgya na de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rtsis kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir
123b2(mdo sde): byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang
123b3(mdo sde): chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na ded 'dren gdags pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i
123b4(mdo sde): yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/ /de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs
123b5(mdo sde): yod do| |de'i yang gong na thams cad rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i
123b6(mdo sde): yang gong na snying po mchog ces bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo / /de'i yang
123b7(mdo sde): gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i
124a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na grangs
124a2(mdo sde): de shes pa ni nga dang / gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba srid pa tha ma par gyur pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par gang yang med do//
124a3(mdo sde): srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu/ rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdul phra rab kyi
124a4(mdo sde): rdul bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go / rdul phra mo bdun la ni chung du gcig go /rdul chung ngu bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go /nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong rdul
124a5(mdo sde): gcig go / ri bong rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go /lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go /glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go /sro ma bdun la ni yungs
124a6(mdo sde): 'bru gcig go / yungs 'bru bdun la ni nas gcig go /nas bdun la ni sor gcig go /sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang ngo / /mtho do la ni khru gang ngo / /khru bzhi la ni
124a7(mdo sde): gzhu gang ngo / /gzhu stong la ni yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyang grags gcig go /rgyang grags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go /de la khyed kyi nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta
124b1(mdo sde): bu du yod sus shes/ srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu/ bdag nyid kyang de la mgo rmongs na/ gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de bas na/ gzhon nus dpag
124b2(mdo sde): tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab mi 'khrugs khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khrag
124b3(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag sum cu dang / bye ba drug cu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang / khri nyis stong yod de/ dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab de snyed
124b4(mdo sde): cig yod do/ /de ltar 'jug pa des dzam+bu'i gling 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod la ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do/ /shar gyi lus 'phags la
124b5(mdo sde): ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la ni dpag tshad khri yod de/ de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa
124b6(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / khor yug dang khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag
124b7(mdo sde): brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'phrul
125a1(mdo sde): dga' bye ba phrag brgya dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs ris bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don bye ba phrag brgya
125a2(mdo sde): dang / tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs chen bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya
125a3(mdo sde): dang / dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya
125a4(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can 'du shes med pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba
125a5(mdo sde): phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/ yangs
