125a6(mdo sde): shing rgya che ba'o/ /de la dpag tshad du yod pa dang / dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad ther
125a7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad khrag khrig phrag du yod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i rtsis kyi bar du thug pa la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod
125b1(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i rtsis de ni grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/ de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o/ /de bas kyang shin tu grangs med pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab ni stong gsum gyi stong
125b2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod do/ /byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang tshim zhing mgu
125b3(mdo sde): la yid rangs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig bzhag ste gos dang rgyan lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo/ /de nas
125b4(mdo sde): rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bye ba brgya na ther 'bum ther 'bum de bzhin du/ /khrag khrig dang ni gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du/ /dkrigs
125b5(mdo sde): pa mi 'khrugs bdag gi shes thug de gong min/ /mtshungs pa med kyi mkhyen brtsis la de bas lhag/ yang kye shAkya dag /stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtswa dang nags tshal dang / /sman
125b6(mdo sde): dang chu yi thigs pa ji snyed yod pa dang / /hu zhes bya ba gcig la 'di yis rtsi nus na/ /lnga brgya tsam dag gi lta ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ /de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la
125b7(mdo sde): zhes zer zhing ca co dang / gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/ /dus gsum sems can ma
126a1(mdo sde): lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i/ /sems dang sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag /mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag /thams cad sems
126a2(mdo sde): kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen/ /dge slong dag /de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du
126a3(mdo sde): 'phags par gyur to/ /de'i rjes la mchod pa dang / rkyal dang / bang la sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par gyur nas nam mkha'i
126a4(mdo sde): dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang / /bskal pa bye bar bzod dul byams stobs
126a5(mdo sde): kyis| |lus dang sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas/ /de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyam par gyis/ /sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs pa khyed kyis mthong / /'on
126a6(mdo sde): kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rgyal ba dpag tu med pa dag la mchod
126a7(mdo sde): pa mdzad du bzhud/ /'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de/ /byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis yong mi shes/ /ji tsam zhugs shes de la ci zhig bskyed/ /'di ni mtshungs pa med
126b1(mdo sde): kyi rim gro skyed/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod
126b2(mdo sde): pa'ang sad par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/ shAkya
126b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis shig 'tshogs nas byang chub sems dpa' la rgol ba ltar chas te 'khod do/ /de'i nang nas dga' bo dang / kun dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub
126b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la stobs brgal ba'i phyir drung du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis reg ma thag tu de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang gzi brjid
126b5(mdo sde): ma bzod de sa la 'gyel to/ /de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lha sbyin nga rgyal can mthu snyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal gyis snyems la/ byang chub sems
126b6(mdo sde): dpa' la bsngo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ma
126b7(mdo sde): stabs shing mi rings par stangs bzang por gzhon nu lhas byin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste gsad pa'i blos ma yin gyi/ nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis
127a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' las bskor bskor te sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu gnod
127a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur bas chog gi / thams cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig /de nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur
127a3(mdo sde): to| |de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam
127a4(mdo sde): gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i

127a6(mdo sde): pa| |de dag gyad chen stobs po che 'dra la/ /gcig car skyes bu'i mchog la rub gyur kyang / /reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i khor yug
127a7(mdo sde): dang / /phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa/ /lag pas mnyes shing rmeg med phyir rlog na/ /mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che/ /'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang pa'i
127b1(mdo sde): gyad| |dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa/ /nag po'i rtsa lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms/ /bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya/ /de ltar byang chub
127b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyis shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di dag ni sad kyang zin/
127b3(mdo sde): mthong yang zin gyi/ /da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig /de'i tshe kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu
127b4(mdo sde): lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du
127b5(mdo sde): btsugs so/ /de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags
127b6(mdo sde): bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dngar nas de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig
127b7(mdo sde): btsugs so/ /de nas kun dga' pos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chod kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /lha sbyin gyis
128a1(mdo sde): rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags
128a2(mdo sde): drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /lag na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i
128a3(mdo sde): 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/ thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de
128a4(mdo sde): dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/ la la ni chag nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis brdung bzod pa'am/ lus kyi stobs
128a5(mdo sde): dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ yod do/ /gzhon nus smras pa/ lha/ de lta bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyi mes seng+ge'i 'gram
128a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i gnam ru da ltar lha khang na spos dang phreng bas mchod de/ de ni sus kyang bdung bar yang mi nus na/ dgang par lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod
128a7(mdo sde): do| |byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha/ de blang du gsol/ sad par bgyi'o/ /de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog
128b1(mdo sde): gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de bdung bar yang ma nus na/ dgang par lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so/ /de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams
128b2(mdo sde): cad phyung ste gzhu de bdung bar brgal na ma bdungs so/ /de nas gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te stan las ma langs par
128b3(mdo sde): skyil mo krung phyed bcas te lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis bdungs so/ /gzhu de de ltar bdungs pa'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen
128b4(mdo sde): po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur to/ /grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyang skrag skrag por gyur te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di lta ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro/ /de la la la
128b5(mdo sde): na re| gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi gnam ru bdungs nas de'i sgra byung ba 'di yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang / ga
128b6(mdo sde): zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de
128b7(mdo sde): smras pa| gdan las ma bzhengs brtsal ba ma mchis su/ /thub pas gnam ru 'di 'dra ba dungs pa las/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te/ /bdud kyi sde bcom myur
129a1(mdo sde): du thub par 'byon/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkang nas 'phags pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun
129a2(mdo sde): dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con can gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs
129a3(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad las thal nas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dngar ba dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul
129a4(mdo sde): 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' de sa la zug nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas
129a5(mdo sde): da ltar yang mda'i khron pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/ /shAkya'i tshogs
129a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/ kye ngo mtshar to/ /'dis ni bslab kyang ma bslab par rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zer
129a7(mdo sde): ro| |nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar ngo mtshar yang
129b1(mdo sde): ci che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa yi snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ /zhi gnas gnam ru thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis/ /nyon mongs dgra
129b2(mdo sde): rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su/ /byang chub dam pa zhi ba rdul med mya ngan med pa 'thob/ /de skad ces smras nas lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog
129b3(mdo sde): dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo / /de bzhin du mchong pa dang / yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / bang dang /

130b3(mdo sde): tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la yongs su spyod pa ston to/ /bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas shAkya'i

130b5(mdo sde): bag gsar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya smod cing mi snyan par zer ro/ /de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho mas gtam de
130b6(mdo sde): thos nas nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la/ /'phags pa dag ni ma g.yogs mdzes/ /nor bu rin chen
130b7(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes/ /'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste/ /'od na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin/ /'greng ba'am de bzhin 'dug pa dang / /thams

131a3(mdo sde): pa| |'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin/ /byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ /ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/ /gang dag snying la sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jam pa/ /de dag dug gi bum

132a1(mdo sde): 'tsho ma la bkab nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang / /mna' ma rang gi yon ji ltar rab smra

135b1(mdo sde): pa chen po mchog na gnas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dang rgyan ma bor ba/ dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas
135b2(mdo sde): lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing bzang la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po phra ba
135b3(mdo sde): du ma bting ba/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ yan lag dam pa'i spras pas mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa/ lha'i bu mo
135b4(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ lta ba dang mthun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes par byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ dung dang / rnga
135b5(mdo sde): dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / pi wang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim+pa la dang / na ku la dang / sgra snyan dang /
135b6(mdo sde): gling bu snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pas bslang ba la bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang sgra mnyen zhing
135b7(mdo sde): 'jam pa snyan la yid du 'ong ba dang / gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo / /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
136a1(mdo sde): ' das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan sgra byung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
136a2(mdo sde): 'di dag byung ngo / /bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas/ /sil snyan yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gi
136a3(mdo sde): mthu yis na/ /tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung / /rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas/ /go 'phang mya ngan med mchog
136a4(mdo sde): rdul med sangs rgyas te/ /skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las dgrol lo zhes/ /dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur/ /de phyir dge myur grong khyer
136a5(mdo sde): mchog 'di nas/ /byung la sngon gyi drang srong zhabs bcags pa/ /sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis/ /khyod
136a6(mdo sde): kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor/ /rkang lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po de ring khyod dus 'di/ /chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'gro la
136a7(mdo sde): phye| |khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri med dge/ /sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gis brgyan/ /drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med/ /'gro ba nyon mongs rnam
136b1(mdo sde): pa mang las khrol/ /khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad/ /khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod/ /bzod pas bzod cing dul bas des pa'i bdag /rkang gnyis dbang po
136b2(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung blo gyis/ /khyod brtson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med/ /bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur/ /g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te/ /ngan song gsum
136b3(mdo sde): po mtha' dag skam par gyis/ /gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad/ /dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs gyis la/ /khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bo'i char phab ste/ /
136b4(mdo sde): mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis/ /'chi med mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te/ /skom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes/ /khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te/ /
136b5(mdo sde): grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung / /khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas/ /khyod kyi ye shes mtha' yas dri med che/ /rmongs pa yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la/ /shes
136b6(mdo sde): rab 'od dge dam pa mdzes pa gyis/ /khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad/ /snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms dang / /khyod kyis spyod pa dam pa gang spyad pa/ /spyod pa de
136b7(mdo sde): nyid 'gro la rnam par phye/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gis gzi brjid kyis/ /yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcad 'di/ /sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag /mal na
137a1(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul/ /gang gi tshe na dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams/ /shin tu mdzes shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrog
137a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshe| |phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lha mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang / /sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang mi che rjes su sgrog /'gro la phan byed yon tan mang po
137a3(mdo sde): ldan khyod 'gro rnams su/ /rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na rgyal ba'i yon tan gnyug mar byas/ /sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag dran gyis te/ /shing mchog
137a4(mdo sde): drung du myur song 'chi med go 'phang thob par gyis/ /lha mi dag ni shin tu skom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral/ /khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu sbyin//
137a5(mdo sde): stobs bcu'i ro bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa/ /bdud rtsi de ni mi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed
137a6(mdo sde): la dga' ba bo/ /khyod kyis sngon gyi srid par nor dang nor bu gser rnams btang / /chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa dang / /rang gi mgo dang
137a7(mdo sde): mig dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'ang btang / /mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi zhig khyod la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshig
137b1(mdo sde): smras te| |grong khyer rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho bor byin zhes byas/ /de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med/ /gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dge bar
137b2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i tshe/ /skye bo bla ma bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la 'khu mi byed/ /bram ze dam pa dag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod/ /de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lha yi gnas
137b3(mdo sde): su skyes| |sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad pa na/ /khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med par 'chi ba'i
137b4(mdo sde): dus byas te/ /de yi tshe na khyod kyi rkang lag dag las 'o ma zag /khyod sngon drang srong sngo sangs zhes byar gang tshe gyur pa na/ /ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla
137b5(mdo sde): ma la yang dga'/ /mi yi bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la bsnun pa na/ /khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs med cing snying brtser gyur/ /khyod sngon ri dwags bdag
137b6(mdo sde): po yon tan can du gyur pa'i tshe/ /ri gzar 'bab chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyur pa na/ /phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de phyung ste thang la bzhag/ khyod kyi dgra bo khrid
137b7(mdo sde): de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs/ /mi mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i bur ni gang tshe gyur pa na/ /khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par lhung ba'i tshe/ /khyod kyis rgya
138a1(mdo sde): mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang / /stobs brtan khyu mchog khyod kyi nor bu de tshe phyir yang rnyed/ /skyes bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drang
138a2(mdo sde): srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe/ /bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur shog ces khyod gan 'ongs/ /smras pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra las byung zhes byas/ /khyod kyis
138a3(mdo sde): rang lus btang gi bram ze de ni ma btang ngo / /gna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te/ /'dod pas smras pa shing 'di lo ma du yod grongs zhes
138a4(mdo sde): bya| |shing de lo ma ji snyed yod pa rab bgrangs rab mkhas pas/ /khyod kyis de bzhin nor pa med cing mthun par tshig tu brjod/ /khyod sngon ne tso yon tan ldan gyur shing
138a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa'i tshe/ /zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drin la bsam ste de ma spangs/ /lha yi bdag pos khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'/ /snga mkho bzhin du shing
138a6(mdo sde): mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas/ /khyod kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de/ /yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pa yon tan
138a7(mdo sde): mang / /khyod kyi dus la da bab grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang thong / /'gro ba dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod la myur du khod/ /gang gi tshe na bud med rin chen bzang
138b1(mdo sde): po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te/ /sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa/ /de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs
138b2(mdo sde): pa| |sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag gi sgra las rab tu byung / /rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod
138b3(mdo sde): kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab/ /mi yi seng+ge khyod kyis sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyis shig /rkang gnyis dbang po khyod da mngon par 'byung ba'i dus
138b4(mdo sde): ni 'di yin no/ /khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin/ /nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzang rin chen spras pa dang / /rkang lag dag dang
138b5(mdo sde): mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor ba dag / khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med/ /khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mtshe ba bzang dang rgyal
138b6(mdo sde): po zhi bar gyur/ /snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur/ /rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang mig bzang dang ni de la sogs pa byas/ /rgyal po khrag
138b7(mdo sde): khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal ba mang por tshul khrims spyod pa spyad/ /nor bu rin chen dri ma med pa
139a1(mdo sde): lta bur tshul khrims rnam dag gyur/ /khyod kyis 'bri yi rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing spyad/ /tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis
139a2(mdo sde): 'dir ni 'gro la rgya cher don yang byas/ /'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mdas bsnun tshe/ /gtum po dgra la snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni
139a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis bskyabs/ /bzang zhing mdzes pa'i mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yong ma btang / /khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po
139a4(mdo sde): byas| |bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i mi phan sdug bsngal stong mang dang / /tshig rtsub dag dang bsad pa dang ni bcing ba mang po bzod par byas/ /khyod
139a5(mdo sde): kyis gna' sngon mi gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gro byas/ /de dag phyi nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzod/ /mgon po khyod ni ri mchog
139a6(mdo sde): gnas na gang tshe dred mor gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha ba bab cing chu phrugs pas ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi bzung ste/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam pa mang dang bde ba kun gyis rim
139a7(mdo sde): gro byas| |de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod/ /byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la/ /
139b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med/ /dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni med par byas/ /mi yi
139b2(mdo sde): seng+ge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo/ /khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i tshe/ /snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha' las ni
139b3(mdo sde): srin po'i gling du myur du song / /de tshe phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul ba mang po
139b4(mdo sde): byas| |myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems brtul te/ /bsam gtan par gyur rdul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom/ /
139b5(mdo sde): khyod 'dir bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas/ /da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnams 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab/ /
139b6(mdo sde): gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur/ /rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur/ /khyod kyis skye
139b7(mdo sde): bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod/ /de yi tshe na mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam
140a1(mdo sde): mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas/ /gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang / /tshul dang 'dul dang blo gros rnam
140a2(mdo sde): mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur/ /rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo/ /khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par
140a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dag / rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas/ /srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te/ /mun
140a4(mdo sde): pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas/ /tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis/ /sil snyan sgra bsgrags
140a5(mdo sde): de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' po bskul bar gyur/ /blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni da bab kyi/ /sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di
140a6(mdo sde): dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig / bud med gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis/ /brgyan pa dag kyang sems dang phangs pa skyes nas
140a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba rnams/ /sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing slong bar byed pa na/ /rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di
140b1(mdo sde): 'dra byung / /gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar ni/ /gtang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad/ /bsam
140b2(mdo sde): gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la da bab kyi/ /'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi bshol ma byed cig /sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang
140b3(mdo sde): gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang / /skye bo de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas/ /khyod kyi chung ma bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste/ /
140b4(mdo sde): byang chub don du gtang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis btang / /khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur/ /mu khyud 'dzin
140b5(mdo sde): dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can/ /mchod sbyin stong ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor brtan dang / /shin tu don bsam gyur te sems can dman la
140b6(mdo sde): gtang bar dka' ba btang / /zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur/ /gtong ba che dang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa gzo bar gyur/ /
140b7(mdo sde): rgyal po drang srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang / /rgyal po legs par smra ba tshol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur/ /zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro
141a1(mdo sde): dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur/ /rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi'i rgyal po rin chen gtsug phung zhi ba bstod/ /mi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan
141a2(mdo sde): du gyur te gtang bar dka' ba btang / /khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa phob/ /khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig
141a3(mdo sde): mthong / /sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na/ /khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod/ /dpa' bo
141a4(mdo sde): grong khyer dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la da bab bo/ /thog mar khyod kyis don yod mthong la sA la'i me tog gis ni mchod/ /rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems
141a5(mdo sde): kyis skad cig bar du bltas/ /rnga dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis a ru ra yi 'bru gcig phul/ /tsan+dan mthong nas khyod kyis rtswa yi me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung / /rtul po
141a6(mdo sde): grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor/ /chos kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs zhes bya ba rab tu byin/ /kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal
141a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod/ /'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser phreng gtor/ /'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal
141b1(mdo sde): la bal sran gtor/ /ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jam/ /rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan la sman yang phul/ /thams cad zil gnon
141b2(mdo sde): mu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad+ma phul/ /pad+ma'i snying po la ni bla bre seng+ge la ni char gding phul/ /sA la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul/ /grags sbyin
141b3(mdo sde): kunada'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul/ /ye shes lhun la lus btud klus byin la ni na bza' dbul ba byas/ /rab 'thong gshegs dang tsan+dan mchog dang
141b4(mdo sde): 'od ldan la ni tshwa spar re/ /bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul/ /shAkya thub la spar gang gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas/ /nyi ma'i zhal
141b5(mdo sde): la me tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod pa na/ /klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul/ /sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng+ge'i tog
141b6(mdo sde): la khri gdan phul/ /yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srung la ni glu dbyangs kun/ /spos mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul/ /mi 'khrugs
141b7(mdo sde): rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mchod la phreng ba phul/ /rgya spos gtsug lag rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la spos kun phul/ /sgron ma che la bdag phul
142a1(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas/ /chos kyi tog la me tog sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ut+pa la/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang
142a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag byed pa na/ /khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par
142a3(mdo sde): gyis| |sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba yal bar ma dor mngon par phyung / /mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste/ /rjes su mthun pa'i
142a4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob/ /de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu/ /sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam
142a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab byas/ /bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das/ /khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song / /dngos po
142a6(mdo sde): thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med/ /'dod pa rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa min gyi grong khyer mchog nas byung / /bskal ba zad par 'gyur tshe gzi
142a7(mdo sde): brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi zad 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur/ /dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag
142b1(mdo sde): pa med/ /shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par phyung / /rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing / /gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang / /sil snyan
142b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa/ /de tshe sil snyan sgra las 'di dag byung / /srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar/ /'chi me rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med pa/ /srid las 'byung la
142b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs/ /bum par chud pas bung ba 'khor ba bzhin/ /srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/ /'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs/ /'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam
142b4(mdo sde): mkha'i glog 'dra ste/ /ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro/ /srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams/ /mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po/ /'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi
142b5(mdo sde): mkhas 'khor/ /dper na rdza mkhan phang lo bskor ba bzhin/ /rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang / /dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa/ /dus ngan rnyi la 'gro ba 'di
142b6(mdo sde): dag thogs/ /dper na rngon pa'i rnyi la spre'u thogs bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang / /'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas/ /ral gri'i so
142b7(mdo sde): 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs/ /ngan skyug snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas/ /rtag tu brjed par
143a1(mdo sde): byed pa mun pa 'dra/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa/ /srid pa'i sred pa'i 'khri shing 'phel bar byed/ /ji ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs
143a2(mdo sde): bcas pa/ /de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig /'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas 'dra/ /ral gri'i so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs/ /ji ltar
143a3(mdo sde): sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyug snod/ /de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig /bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra/ /ro la khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin/ /
143a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra/ /gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag ca 'dra ba dang / /mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang / /rmi lam mnyam pa 'phags
143a5(mdo sde): pas skye bos rig / 'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma bral/ /sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing rdzun pa can/ /chu bur dbu ba lta bu yang dag min/ /yongs su brtags las byung bar
143a6(mdo sde): mkhas pas rtogs/ /na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe/ /phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/ /rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas/ /rnam
143a7(mdo sde): par spong ste ri dwags klung skam bzhin/ /nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe/ /phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/ /nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur
143b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshe| |rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin/ /ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing / /de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed/ /nor nyams rga bas nyen cing
143b2(mdo sde): sbrang ba na/ /de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin/ /rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin/ /phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed/ /rga na sdug bsngal
143b3(mdo sde): nyen cing nor zad na/ /de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin/ /rga bas rga byas na tshod yol gyur na/ /sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin/ /rga bas khog na
143b4(mdo sde): 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra/ /rga las byung ba thub pa myur du smros/ /bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skem/ /ma lu'i 'khri shing sA la'i nags stug bzhin/ /rga
143b5(mdo sde): bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste/ /dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin/ /rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed/ /rga bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing
143b6(mdo sde): mthu stobs 'phrog / rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed/ /rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog /nad brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis/ /'gro ba
143b7(mdo sde): gtses te mi yis ri dwags bzhin/ /rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la/ /sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig /dper na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che/ /rtswa
144a1(mdo sde): shing gel pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing / /dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed/ /nor 'bru nor
144a2(mdo sde): chen tha mar zad par byed/ /nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed/ /gnod pa byed cing sdug la sdang par byed/ /yongs su gdung byed mkha' las nyi ma bzhin/ /'chi dang 'pho dang
144a3(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dus byed pa/ /phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral/ /phyir mi 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yin/ /shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyan dang mtshungs/ /'chi ba
144a4(mdo sde): dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed/ /'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin/ /mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur 'gro /rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang
144a5(mdo sde): med| |'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te/ /'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin/ /klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng+ge 'dra/ /rtsa rtsi 'byung bo'i tshogs
144a6(mdo sde): la me dang mtshungs/ /skyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las/ /'gro ba dgrol zhes khyod kyis smon lam btab/ /sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de dran byos/ /khyod ni mngon
144a7(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i dus la bab/ /gang tshe bud med tshogs ni rab dga' zhing / /sil snyan dag gis thub chen slong byed pa/ /de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus/ /
144b1(mdo sde): tshigs bcad sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung / /'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste/ /mkha' la glog rgyun ring du mi gnas bzhin/ /khyod kyi dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur
144b2(mdo sde): gyi| |brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la bab/ /'du byed mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te/ /rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag /gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang
144b3(mdo sde): mtshungs/ /bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring mi thogs/ /'du byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can te/ /dbyar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin/ /chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra
144b4(mdo sde): pa ste| |rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba/ /'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste/ /myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin/ /rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi
144b5(mdo sde): gnas la/ /dbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med/ /'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste/ /brtags na chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra/ /sgyu ma lta bur sems ni rmongs par byed/ /
144b6(mdo sde): lag bcangs stong pas byis ba brid dang mtshungs/ /'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang / /rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste/ /gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten
144b7(mdo sde): nas byung / /byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra 'di ma rtogs/ /dper na gres ma mun dza rten byas la/ /btsal ba'i stobs kyis thag par 'gyur ba dang / /zo chun rgyud mo 'khor lor
145a1(mdo sde): bcas pa yang / /de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med/ /de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa/ /gzhan dang gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas ni/ /de dag so
145a2(mdo sde): so re rer 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ /sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te/ /sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min/ /de las gzhan min de yang ma
145a3(mdo sde): yin te| |de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do/ /ma rig pa yi 'du byed rkyen yin te/ /'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du med/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang / /rang bzhin
145a4(mdo sde): stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin/ /rgya las rgya yi 'bur ni snang mod kyi/ /rgya de 'phos par gyur pa'ang yod ma yin/ /de la de med gzhan las ma yin te/ /de ltar 'dus byas rtag med
145a5(mdo sde): chad pa med/ /mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dir 'byung yang / /mig ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin la/ /gzugs kyang mig la
145a6(mdo sde): 'pho ba yod ma yin/ /'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yang / /de dag bdag dang sdug par brtags pa ste/ /nor pa yang dag ma yin btags yin yang / /de las mig
145a7(mdo sde): gi rnam par shes pa 'byung / /rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te/ /mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong / /gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs pa min/ /rnal
145b1(mdo sde): 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu ltar mthong / /dper na gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang / /lag pas rtsol ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa/ /de la brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /byung
145b2(mdo sde): nas ring por mi thogs 'gag par 'gyur/ /de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te/ /'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags
145b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ /de yi 'ong ba'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so/ /phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi/ /rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las/ /de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes
145b4(mdo sde): brjod kyang / /de ni dam pa'i don du dmigs su med/ /mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni/ /lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang / /lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan
145b5(mdo sde): las min/ /re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med/ /tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni/ /yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi/ /yid dang ngag ni mi snang gzugs med de/ /
145b6(mdo sde): nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs su med/ /mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi/ skye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na/ /de tshe ngag kun brag ca lta bu dang / /
145b7(mdo sde): skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong / /dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la/ /lag pas rtsol ba byas pa gsum tshogs na/ /sgra snyan pi wang gling bu la sogs pa/ /
146a1(mdo sde): de dag las ni sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te/ /'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
146a2(mdo sde): kun tu brtags byas na/ /sgra yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so/ /de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las/ /'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste/ /yang dag mthong ba'i
146a3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /'du byed stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong / /phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni/ /nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste/ /thams cad bdag
146a4(mdo sde): gis dben zhing gnas med la/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni/ /mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs/ /ji
146a5(mdo sde): ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par gyis/ /gnod pa yang dag ma yin btags pa yi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba
146a6(mdo sde): gdungs/ /snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu/ /'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob/ /byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni/ /'phags pa'i nor gyis srog chags
146a7(mdo sde): bsdu 'o zhes/ /mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir/ /bskal pa bye ba mang po sbyin pa byin/ /sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te/ /'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul
146b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal la/ /sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar/ /'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu ba gyis/ /ngan song sa yi lam ni gcad pa dang / mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo mo
146b2(mdo sde): mchog de ni/ /sems can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te/ /khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs/ /tshul khrims ldan pas bsams pa 'grub 'gyur gyi/ /sngon gyi spyod
146b3(mdo sde): de rjes su dran gyis la/ /ngan song gsum po'i sa yi sgo bcad de/ /mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni dbye bar gyis/ /srog chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhil dang / /srid pa'i mtsho
146b4(mdo sde): las sems can bsgral byas te/ /zhi bde rims nad med la dgod do zhes/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bzod pa shin tu bsgoms/ /sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te/ /dgra dang
146b5(mdo sde): gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa yi/ /'tshe ba spyod la yal bar ma dor bar/ /'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la khod/ /chos kyi gru ni legs par sbyar byas la/ /srid pa'i
146b6(mdo sde): mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te/ /zhi bde rims nad med la dgod do zhes/ /gang gi don du khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsten/ /sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la/ /'gro
146b7(mdo sde): ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa/ /sems can mgon med pa dag brtson stobs dang / /brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di dag thon/ /dbang po 'khrul dang phal ba'i dbang po
147a1(mdo sde): dang / /spre'u 'dra'i sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces/ /'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir/ /nyon mongs gzhil ba'i bsam gtan bsgoms
147a2(mdo sde): gyur pa| |sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te/ /nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa yi/ /'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las/ /bsam gtan mchog la skye rgu
147a3(mdo sde): 'di dag khod/ /gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /'gro la chos brgya mang po mthong byed pa/ /yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sbyin no zhes/ /khyod kyis sngon chad shes
147a4(mdo sde): rab shin tu bsgoms/ /sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la/ /gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /'gro la shes rab dam pa 'od bzang ba/ /chos mig dri med nyon
147a5(mdo sde): mongs med pa byin/ /bud med rnams kyi sil snyan glu dbyangs las/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di byung ste/ /de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnams spangs nas/ /byang chub dam pa
147a6(mdo sde): mchog tu sems btang ngo / /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe'ang chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /chos yid
147a7(mdo sde): la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas
147b1(mdo sde): par gyur cing / bsam pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa/ chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa/ ji ltar thos pa'i
147b2(mdo sde): chos yang dag par ston pa/ bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos sbyin pa la ser sna med pa/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe ma khyud
147b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa/ chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/ chos la gnas su 'dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa/ chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzin
147b4(mdo sde): pa| chos la rton pa/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ste/ thabs la mkhas par rtogs par khong du chud pa yin
147b5(mdo sde): no| |dge slong dag / de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni bstan/
147b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par ni byas/ yun
147b7(mdo sde): ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun tu bstan/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med
148a1(mdo sde): pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan/ lha'i dang mi'i las
148a2(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod
148a3(mdo sde): pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba ni bstan/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba ni bstan/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs
148a4(mdo sde): su gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad
148a5(mdo sde): kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas te/ ji ltar mgron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus
148a6(mdo sde): la lta zhing / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no/ /sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do/ /smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon
148a7(mdo sde): par sgrub po/ /sems can rnams la'ang snying rje chen po gtong ngo / /sems can rab tu thar par bya bar yang sems so/ /'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par
148b1(mdo sde): yang so sor rtog go/ 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog go/ bdud dang nyes pa'i zhags pa yang dag par gcod do/ /'khor ba'i rgyud las
148b2(mdo sde): kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang sems yang dag par gtong ngo // //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu
148b3(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas la bsam pa thag pa nas don du mi gnyer ba
148b4(mdo sde): yin| nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor
148b5(mdo sde): ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin/ bdud kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong ba
148b6(mdo sde): yin| khams gsum pa las byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ mngon par
148b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ dben pa la gzhol ba yin/ dben pa la 'bab pa yin/ dben pa la bab pa yin/ dgon pa dang bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ rab
149a1(mdo sde): tu dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin/ bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi don
149a2(mdo sde): du 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/
149a3(mdo sde): byams pa la gnas pa can yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin
149a4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad
149a5(mdo sde): la mi lta bar yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa bged pa la dga' ba yin/ lhug par gtong ba yin/ lag pa brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sbyin
149a6(mdo sde): byas pa yin/ bsod nams shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dang ser sna dang bral ba yin/ sems kun tu ma
149a7(mdo sde): bzung ba yin/ bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yin/ byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang / 'dod pa che ba dang /
149b1(mdo sde): chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang / ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir
149b2(mdo sde): mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying
149b3(mdo sde): brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ ya lad bgos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa yin/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs
149b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtong ba'i lag cha can yin/ sems
149b5(mdo sde): can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin/ dus dang phyed par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su
149b6(mdo sde): bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang
149b7(mdo sde): ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gcod pa yin/ tshul khrims dang / yon tan dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi
150a1(mdo sde): mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med
150a2(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / spyo ba dang / smad pa dang / bshung
150a3(mdo sde): ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma brnyogs pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa
150a4(mdo sde): yin| bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par mi sems pa yin/ gnod pa mi byed pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems
150a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bad pa brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la phyir mi ldog
150a6(mdo sde): pa yin| dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid la byed
150a7(mdo sde): pa yin| chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
150b1(mdo sde): mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang
150b2(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis
150b3(mdo sde): shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba yin/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
150b4(mdo sde): gsum gyis rnam par rtse ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag ca dang / mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /byang chub
150b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' de ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin/ de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/ de ltar sems can gyi
150b6(mdo sde): don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sil snyan dang glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de
150b7(mdo sde): dag gis rgya cher bskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo bzhi
151a1(mdo sde): mngon du byed do/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyong ba sgrub
151a2(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam pa chud mi za ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
151a3(mdo sde): sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i lhag pa'i
151a4(mdo sde): bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la
151a5(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par sgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas
151a6(mdo sde): c hos kyi sgo bzhi po de dag mngon du byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
151a7(mdo sde): m ngon par 'dus byas pas byang chub sems dpa' mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
151b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do/ /mos pa rgya chen dang ni bsam pa dang / /lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skye zhes/ /
151b2(mdo sde): de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung / /dang zhing dad dang mos dang gus pa dang / /nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang / /dri dang dge ba ci zhes tshol ba dang / /rjes su dran
151b3(mdo sde): pa bsgoms pa'i sgra byung ngo / /sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang tshul khrims sgra/ /bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra/ /bsam gtan mngon par sgrub dang ting 'dzin sgra/ /
151b4(mdo sde): shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung / /byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra/ /dga' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas//
151b5(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin bya'i sgra yang byung / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab dbye sgra/ /yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rab dbye dang / /byang
151b6(mdo sde): chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung / /yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang / /zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong dang / /mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag
151b7(mdo sde): med sgra| |mi sdug sgra yang sil snyan rnams las byung / /'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra/ /zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye sgra/ /'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin
152a1(mdo sde): gnas med sgra/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang sil snyan byung / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste//
152a2(mdo sde): sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis/ /sems can mchog rab rjes bslab byang chub smon/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na
152a3(mdo sde): 'dug pas bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
152a4(mdo sde): su smin par byas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba bla
152a5(mdo sde): n a med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar
152a6(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i khang bzang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan/
152a7(mdo sde): /skyes bu seng+ges tshe yang bstan/ /btsun mo'i 'khor yang bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes mthun mdzad/ /'jig rten chos ni
152b1(mdo sde): rjes thob pas/ /lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i/ /de yi dus la deng bab bo/ /ma grol bas ni dgrol mi nus/ /long bas lam yang ston mi
152b2(mdo sde): nus| |grol bas dgrol bar byed par nus/ /mig ldan long ba lam ston nus/ /sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol/ /khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags/ /de dag khyod kyi rjes slob
152b3(mdo sde): cing / /mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod/ /dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang / /gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te/ /khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas/ /lha mir bcas pa'i
152b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mos/ /khyod ni 'dod la mi dgyes te/ /bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad kyang / /lha mi brgya phrag mang po dag /gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad/ /dar la bab
152b5(mdo sde): 'di shin tu 'da'/ /ri gzar 'bab chu mgyogs 'gro bzhin/ /dar la bab pa yal gyur nas/ /mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags/ /de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe/ /dar
152b6(mdo sde): bab dam par mngon byung ste/ /thugs dam nyams 'og chud mdzod la/ /lha mi'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mi ngoms te/ /dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs
152b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das/ /shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms/ /khyod 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang dang / /yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug /'dab ma brgya
153a1(mdo sde): pa'i zhal 'dra ba/ /mngon par 'byung bar dgongs su gsol/ /nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing / /'byung med bcing bas dam bcings rnams/ /
153a2(mdo sde): dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa/ /thar lam zhi la dgod du gsol/ /khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas/ /sems can yun ring na rnams la/ /chos kyi sman ni sbyor
153a3(mdo sde): mdzad de/ /mya ngan 'das bde myur du 'khod/ /mig med mun pa gti mug glags/ /lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi/ /lha rnams dang ni mi yi mig /shes rab sgron mas myur
153a4(mdo sde): du sbyongs/ /byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing / /bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces/ /lha dang lha min klu dag dang / /gnod sbyin dri za mang po sdod/ /klu yi rgyal pos rang gi gnas//
153a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong / /mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyid/ /de yi brtul zhugs bsam pa skongs/ /byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la/ /lhung bzed bzhi
153a6(mdo sde): ni dbul lo zhes/ /'jig rten skyong bzhi sder bcas pa/ /de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis/ /tshangs pa rab tu zhi spyod pa/ /byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang / /bla med 'khor
153a7(mdo sde): lo rab bskor bar/ /mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis/ /byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha/ /byang chub snying por gnas rnams kyang / /byang chub rnam par 'tshang
153b1(mdo sde): rgya ba| |blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis/ /byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i nang / /bye ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis/ /de dag thog mar khyod gyur mdzod/ /de dag 'og tu lus sa
153b2(mdo sde): re| |dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa/ /mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs/ /yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba/ /rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bsgrag tu gsol/ /bskul ba'i
153b3(mdo sde): le'u ste| bcu gsum pa'o/ / //dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to/ /rgyal
153b4(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te mngon par 'byung zhing mngon par byung
153b5(mdo sde): nas kyang rab tu byung ste gos ngur smrig gyon pa rmis so/ /de nas de sad pa dang / rings pa rings par nyug rum la dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ des
153b6(mdo sde): smras pa| lha/ bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du/ gzhon nu ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ snga ltas su snang ba ni/ 'di dag yin
153b7(mdo sde): snyam nas khong pa'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to/ /de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur
154a1(mdo sde): te| bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas
154a2(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir dpyid dang / dbyar dang / ston gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzang gsum byed du bcug go/ de la dpyid sa gang yin pa
154a3(mdo sde): de ni grang dro ran pa'o/ /dbyar sa gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsil ba'o/ /dgun sa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyis dro ba'o/ /khang bzang re re'i gru skas rnams kyang
154a4(mdo sde): mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa'o/ /de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes
154a5(mdo sde): sgra dpag tshad phyed du grag pa byung ngo / /ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang gzhon nu ni chab sgo bkra shis pa nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/
154a6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'phar re re'ang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do/ /de dag gi sgra'ang dpag tshad phyed du grag
154a7(mdo sde): go / de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa'ang sbyor ro/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag par gyur to/ /dge
154b1(mdo sde): slong dag / de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'i/ shing rta myur du sbyor cig /de nas kha lo sgyur ba rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
154b2(mdo sde): gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gzhon
154b3(mdo sde): nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma phyung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na/ 'on tang gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis
154b4(mdo sde): bskor te dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas mngon par mi 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang / rim gro byed pas da ste
154b5(mdo sde): zhag bdun na gzhon nu sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gi / der khyed kyis gzhon nu'i mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba
154b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni sol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong
154b7(mdo sde): khyer thams cad brgyan to/ /skyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla bre ni bres/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis ni/
155a1(mdo sde): legs par brgyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de'ang chag chag btab ste phyags nas spos chu'i chag chag btab ste me tog
155a2(mdo sde): sil ma ni chal par bkram/ phog phor nas ni bdugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng / dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla bre ni bres/
155a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun po ni dbyangs/ dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so/ /g.yog 'khor kyang gzhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan
155a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo / /de nas byang chub
155a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus las rtsa rgyus thon pa/ so rgal ba/ lus gnyer
155a6(mdo sde): mas gang ba/ skra byi ba/ sgur ba/ gdung rten ltar dgu ba/ zhom pa/ 'khar ba la brten pa/ mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung ba/ lus
155a7(mdo sde): dgu bas 'khar ba la brten nas yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig lam gar bstan par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha
155b1(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kha lo sgyur ba mi rid nyam chung zhing / /sha khrag bskams la rgyus lpags nyi chos dkris/ /mgo dkar so rgal lus ni rab skem la/ /'khar
155b2(mdo sde): ba brten cing mi bde 'khyor 'gros su/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di rga bas zil gyis non/ /dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson stobs nyams/ /gnyen gyi
155b3(mdo sde): skye bos brnyas shing mgon med gyur/ /don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di yi chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam ni/ /
155b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid de smros shig /tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smros shig dang / /thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam/ /kha lo sgyur
155b5(mdo sde): bas smras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags/ /skye bo kun gyi dar la bab pa rga bas 'joms/ /khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang /
155b6(mdo sde): rga las thar 'gro ba yi thabs ni gzhan ma mchis/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i skye bo mi mkhas pa'i/ /blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos
155b7(mdo sde): pas rga ma mthong / /nga ni slar 'gro nga yi shing rta myur du sgyur/ /nga yang rga la gnas pas rtse dgas ci zhig bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar
156a1(mdo sde): bsgyur te phyir grong khyer du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs
156a2(mdo sde): kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ga na mi nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzing can/ lus nyam chung ba/ rang gi gcin skyag tu bying ba/ mgon med pa/
156a3(mdo sde): skyabs med pa/ shin tu sha thang par dbugs dbyung zhing rngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di
156a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /kha lo sgyur ba mi rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la/ /dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'/ /yan lag kun bskams lto bas
156a5(mdo sde): dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur/ /rang gi gcin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste/ nad kyi
156a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa nye bar ma mchis pas 'gum pa thug/ nad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams/ /mgon dang skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen ma mchis
156a7(mdo sde): lags| |byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nad med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa/ /skyes bu mkhas pas gnas
156b1(mdo sde): 'di mthong nas ji lta bur/ /rtse la dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang
156b2(mdo sde): grong khyer du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs
156b3(mdo sde): pa dang / des lam ga na mi shi bar gyur pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa/ ras kyi bla bre phub pa/ nye du'i tshegs kyis bskor te kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste ngu la smre sngags 'don cing
156b4(mdo sde): skra bshig la mgo la sa 'thor zhing brang rdung la cho nge 'don cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur
156b5(mdo sde): ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kha lo sgyur ba mi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni/ /mi dag skra bshig mgo la sa yis 'thor byed cing / /sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni brjod la brang rdung
156b6(mdo sde): bas| |kun nas bskor ba byas te khyer ba su zhig yin/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di dzam+bu'i gling du gum pa ste/ /slan chad pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong
156b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod khyam dang mdza' gnyen tshogs rnams spangs nas ni/ /'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen mi mthong / /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
157a1(mdo sde): rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cir mi rung / /sna tshogs nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cing mi rung / /ring du mi gson gson pa mkhas
157a2(mdo sde): la cir mi rung / /rga la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung / /gal te rga med nad med 'chi ba med gyur kyang / /'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na/ /
157a3(mdo sde): rga na 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos/ /legs par slar zlog rab tu thar par byas ba bsam/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de
157a4(mdo sde): slar bzlog ste phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal
157a5(mdo sde): gyi sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis lam ga der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge slong
157a6(mdo sde): zhi ba/ dul ba/ yang dag par bsdams pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ mig phab pa/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ 'gro ba
157a7(mdo sde): dang ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon su lta ba mdzes pa/ bskum pa dang smyang ba mdzes pa/ chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung
157b1(mdo sde): bzed dang chos gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam ga na 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
157b2(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing / /mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing / /dur smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu zhi ba spyod/ /lhung bzed thogs nas mi
157b3(mdo sde): rgod ma khengs su zhig yin/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod/ /bdag nyid
157b4(mdo sde): zhi ba tshol zhing rab tu byung bar gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang bral bar bsod snyoms spyod cing rgyu/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ /'di ni dge bar legs smras nga yang 'dod
157b5(mdo sde): pa ste| |rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags/ /de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la'ang phan/ /'tsho ba bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur
157b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |dge slong dag/ de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la skul
157b7(mdo sde): ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ra ba rgya chen po byed du bcug ste/ 'obs kyang rkor
158a1(mdo sde): bcug / sgo gtan dam po'ang 'dzugs su bcug /srung ma'ang bkod/ dpa' bo rnams kyang sbran/ bzhon pa'ang sta gon byas/ go cha'ang gyon
158a2(mdo sde): du bcug go/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam gyi sum mdo rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste/ byang chub sems
158a3(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par 'byung nga re zhes de dag de srung du bcug go/ btsun mo'i 'khor la'ang res 'ga' tsam yang glu dbyangs kyi rgyun chad da re/ dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad
158a4(mdo sde): kyang sbyor cig / ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi sgyu'ang ston cig ces bsgo'o/ /de la 'di skad
158a5(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ 'thab mor mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgo gar bkod/ /go bgos mi rta glang po shing rta mi bskyon glang po'i phreng ba'ang bkod/ /'obs
158a6(mdo sde): dang shing thags dag dang rta babs phyir thon po yang byed du bcug / sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra 'byung bar yang gtan pa dam po bcug /shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams
158a7(mdo sde): cad yid mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan srung bar byed/ /dpung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po shin tu grag par byed/ /des pa 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer
158b1(mdo sde): 'khrugs shing yid dngangs skrag / shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang snyam byed/ /skye bo bud med dag la bsgo ba rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyun ma bcad/ /
158b2(mdo sde): brtse bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur bgyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis/ /bud med sgyu thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po ston/ /des pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar
158b3(mdo sde): srung bar byos la bgegs kyang rab tu byos/ /kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste/ /ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang rma bya ri skegs dag dang ne tso
158b4(mdo sde): rnams| |khang bzang skar khung rta babs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni/ /dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mgo smad sems shing sgra mi 'byin/ /rdzing dang
158b5(mdo sde): rdzing chen dag gis pad+ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par gyur/ /shing ljon bskams shing yal ga me tog lhags la me tog slar mi 'chags/ /pi wang gling bu rgyud gsum
158b6(mdo sde): rgyud kyis brgyan pa de tshe glo bur chad/ /rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung / /grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu
158b7(mdo sde): gnyid kyis non/ /gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang glu len pa la dga' ba med/ /rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yod dman gyur te sems khong chud cing 'dug /e ma
159a1(mdo sde): ma rungs shAka rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang snyam byed/ /sa 'tsho ma dang rgyal bu mal gcig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe/ /nam phyed tsam
159a2(mdo sde): na sa 'tsho ma yi rmi lam du ni 'di dag rmis/ /sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur/ /shing ljon rnams kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas
159a3(mdo sde): thon te sa la 'gyel/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung / /lag pa g.yon pas skra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan lhung ba mthong / /lag
159a4(mdo sde): pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong / /bdag gi mu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og dpag chad par mthong / /nyal khri de yi rkang pa
159a5(mdo sde): bzhi chag sa yi steng na nyal ba mthong / /rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong / /rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par 'thor cing chu
159a6(mdo sde): yis khyer bar gyur pa dang / /khyim thab rgyan yang gos dang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong / /grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non
159a7(mdo sde): pa dang / /rin po che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur pa rmis/ /mu tig do shal 'phyang ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang / /
159b1(mdo sde): de yi tshe ni ri yi rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yos pa rmis/ /shAkya'i bu mo'i rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rmis gyur nas/ /de sad mig nas mchi ma zag cing rang
159b2(mdo sde): gi khyo la 'di skad smras/ /lha gcig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmis pa cir 'gyur pa ni bka' stsol cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrul cing mig kyang 'khrul la yid ni mya ngan non//
159b3(mdo sde): de yis de thos ka la ping+ka rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas/ /sa 'tsho ma la smras pa khyod ni rab tu dgar 'gyur sdig pa med/ /sems can gang dag bsod nams sngon
159b4(mdo sde): spyad de dag rmi lam 'di 'dra rmi/ /sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmi lam 'di 'dra rmi ba ga la yod/ /khyod kyis sa ni rab tu g.yos pa dang / /ri rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis
159b5(mdo sde): pa| |lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung po'i tshogs/ /kun gyis khyod mchod gtso mor byed par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas thon rmis shing / /lag pa g.yon pas
159b6(mdo sde): skra 'bal rmis pa ni/ /sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcad/ /'dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin/ /khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing / /skar ma rnams kyang
159b7(mdo sde): lhung bar rmis pa ni/ /sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmis
160a1(mdo sde): shing / /lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmis pa ni/ /sa 'tsho myur du bud med lus spangs te/ /ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur/ /khyod
160a2(mdo sde): kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang / /gdugs yu ring chen spras pa chag rmis pa/ /sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rgal cing / /nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur
160a3(mdo sde): ba mthong / /khyod kyis rgyan rnams chu sa khyer rmis pa dang / /nga yi gos dang cod pan khri steng rmis/ /sa 'tsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni/ /'jig rten kun
160a4(mdo sde): gyis nga la bstod pa mthong / /khyod kyis mar me brgya phrag bye ba dag /grong khyer byung nas mun nag gyur rmis pa/ /sa 'tsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun/ /'jig
160a5(mdo sde): rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur/ /khyod kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang / /gser gyi tshong tshong spras pa chad rmis pa/ /sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra bcad de/ /
160a6(mdo sde): 'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin/ /sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par ni/ /rtag tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na/ /khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya
160a7(mdo sde): ngan med/ /myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob/ /ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin/ /tshul khrims bsrungs dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms/ /de bas
160b1(mdo sde): nga la dad pa gang rnyed pa/ /de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed/ /'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ /ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs/ /
160b2(mdo sde): de bas nga la dad pa gang byed pa/ /de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad/ /dga' ba 'thob kyi mi dga' ma skyed cig /tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig /
160b3(mdo sde): dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'thob ste/ /khyod kyi rmi ltas bzang gis 'tsho nyol/ /sngon chad dge ba'i las ni yang dag bsags gyur pa/ /mi mchog rnams ni mngon
160b4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe/ /mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi brjid bsags pa dang / /dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi bar 'gyur/ /de ni rkang pa dag
160b5(mdo sde): dang lag pa chen po yis/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gis chu dkrugs dang / /sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang / /ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su
160b6(mdo sde): gyur pa rmi/ /rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na/ /mun pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang / /sa las gdugs shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab
160b7(mdo sde): dang / /'od kyis reg pas log lhung sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi/ /dkar nag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang / /kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang
161a1(mdo sde): mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan skyug ri la yang / /'dzegs nas 'gro yang de na gos ba med ba rmi/ /rmi lam na ni chu bo chu yis rab gang nas/ /srog
161a2(mdo sde): chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las/ /der ni grur byas bsgral te gzhan dag bsgral nas ni/ /de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog thang bkod rmi/ /rmi
161a3(mdo sde): lam la ni nad pa mang po nad btab pa/ /nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la/ /de ni sman par gyur nas rtsi sman mang byin pas/ /nad btab sems
161a4(mdo sde): can khrag khrig mang po thar byed rmi/ /ri rab ngos la seng+ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni/ /slob ma thal mo sbyar cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la/ /bdag ni g.yul las rgyal zhing
161a5(mdo sde): lha rnams nam mkha' las/ /kun tu dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par ni rmi lam rmi/ /bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang / /byang chub sems dpa'
161a6(mdo sde): rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi/ /de thos nas ni 'di ni ring por mi thogs par/ /mi yi lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'/ /rmi lam gyi le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //dge slong dag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma la'ang ma byas shing / phas gnang ba med par mngon par
161b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'di ni bdag la mi rigs te/ byas pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam nas de mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na rang gi gnas kyi khang bzang nas byung ste rgyal po
161b2(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma'i khang bzang du phyin nas 'dug go / byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu khang bzang thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sad
161b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'od de mthong ste mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar nyug rum la smras pa/ kye nyug rum/ ci nyi ma shar tam/ gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/ nyug rum
161b4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha/ da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma bas so/ /lha/ gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa thal mi phyin/ /lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab
