161b5(mdo sde): tu bgyid/ /nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang rma bya dang / /ne tso khu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin/ /'od 'di lha mi'i yid du mchi zhing bde ba ste/ /rab tu sim bgyid
161b6(mdo sde): dge bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags/ /shing dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yong ma mchis/ /yon tan ldan pa gcig cig deng ni 'di 'byon nges/ /rgyal po de ni mi
161b7(mdo sde): dga' phyogs bcur bltas pa dang / /sems can dag pa pad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas/ /de ni mal nas ldang bar 'dod na ma nus te/ /rnam dag blo can dam pa pha
162a1(mdo sde): la gus pa bskyed/ /de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/ /lha gcig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs/ /bgegs kyang
162a2(mdo sde): ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig / rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par mdzod/ /rgyal po de ni mchi mas mig gang 'di skad smras/ /khyod ni
162a3(mdo sde): phyir ldog pa yi dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /bdag la dam pa ci slong smros shig thams cad sbyin/ /bdag dang pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'dir phan thogs/ /de tshe byang
162a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/ /lha gcig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol/ /gal te stsal bar spyod na mnga' ni khyod la mchis/ /'on tang
162a5(mdo sde): rtag tu khyim na gzims shing 'byung mi 'gyur/ /lha gcig bdag ni rga bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mdog bzang dar la bab par gnas pa dang / /nad
162a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa thob cing nad kyis mi gdab dang / /tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal/ /rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thag ste/ /gzhon
162a7(mdo sde): nu gnas min slong bas bdag la mthu med do/ /bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang na ma du yang / /rga na 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud las ma thar to/ /rga na
162b1(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud par mi 'gyur ba/ /lha gcig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi stsol na/ /gzhan yang mchog cig gsol gyi rgyal po gsan du gsol/ /'di nas
162b2(mdo sde): shi 'phos nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur mdzod/ /mi yi dam pas tshig ni de skad thos pa dang / /sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su chod/ /phan byed 'gro ba thar
162b3(mdo sde): byed rjes su yi rang ngo / /khyod kyi bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste rang gi khyim du phyin nas mal na
162b4(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / de song ba'am 'ongs par sus kyang ma tshor ro/ /dge slong dag /de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsags te de'i
162b5(mdo sde): lo rgyus rnams smos nas gzhon nu ni mngon par 'byung na/ da ji ltar bya zhes smras so/ /shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i
162b6(mdo sde): tshogs 'di ni mang la/ de ni gcig pur gyur bas mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so/ /de nas shAkya de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya
162b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/ 'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslab pa/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar
163a1(mdo sde): sgor bkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya gzhon nu re re la'ang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya brgya dang / shing rta re re la'ang 'khor dpung
163a2(mdo sde): bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang / nub dang / byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/
163a3(mdo sde): 'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslab pa/ tshan pa che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shAkya gzhon nu re re la'ang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta
163a4(mdo sde): re re la'ang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum
163a5(mdo sde): mdo dang / lam po che mang po thams cad na sdod cing 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te rta dang / glang
163a6(mdo sde): po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgo na mel tshe byed do/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mis kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor
163a7(mdo sde): du thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs/ /mu tig rgyan phreng rnams kyang sbyangs la khyim 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos/ /glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mdo
163b1(mdo sde): g.yel pa med par mel tshe dam du gyis/ /gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du srung bgyis/ /go bgos lag na lag cha ral gri dang / mdung thung mda'
163b2(mdo sde): dang mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs/ /sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /kun kyang rab tu sgrim pa chen po gyis/ /sgo kun chod la gtan pa dam du chud/ /sgo 'phar sra ba rked
163b3(mdo sde): par gtan chug la/ /dus la ma bab par ni sgom dbye/ /sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re/ /nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs/ /me tog zla gam seng+ge shing lo res/ /
163b4(mdo sde): ska rags sor gdub sna rgyan chings shing thogs/ /rkang gdub dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs/ /lha mi phan pa glang po dregs bzhin 'gro /gal te glo bur mngon par byung
163b5(mdo sde): nga re| |ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par/ /de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig /bud med gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa mal na 'dug pa bskor/ /ci
163b6(mdo sde): nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur par/ /phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis/ /rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bros/ /gling bu
163b7(mdo sde): dag kyang rab tu bud cing longs/ /de mod rdul dang bral ba srung bar gyis/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig ni spron byos te/ /do mod ma nyal shin tu srung ba gyis/ /rgyal srid dang ni
164a1(mdo sde): yul 'khor spangs nas su/ /khyim nas mngon du 'byung bar gyur ta re/ /'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na ko /rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi
164a2(mdo sde): dga'| |rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang / /rgyal po'i rigs dang rgyud ni chad par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga rtsen la sogs
164a3(mdo sde): pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag /do mod byang chub sems
164a4(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par 'byung gi / khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro ba gyis shig /rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang lcang lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas gnod sbyin gyi
164a5(mdo sde): 'khor chen po la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gi /khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas theg la 'byung bar gyis shig /
164a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/ sku ni sred med bu yi stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyed sra la lci/ /sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba
164a7(mdo sde): mi mnga' ste/ /ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po rmang nas phyung ste nam mkhar gzung nus kyi/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan lhun po ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang
164b1(mdo sde): du bkur mi nus/ /rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lci/ /gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor/ /bsam pa thag pas brtson par
164b2(mdo sde): byos la gus pa yis/ /bya yis sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis/ /kho bo mdun nas 'gro yid khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa theg /byang chub sems dpa' mngon
164b3(mdo sde): par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po gsog / dge slong dag /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /do mod byang chub
164b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gi / de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig /de na lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag
164b5(mdo sde): gis ni ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par bgyi'o/ /lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya ba
164b6(mdo sde): des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis ni rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams
164b7(mdo sde): kyi sgra mi grag par bgyi'o/ /lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil du shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs
165a1(mdo sde): bus 'khor bar bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog sna tshogs chal par
165a2(mdo sde): bkram pa/ pog por nas bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der bkod pa bgyi'o/ /klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi
165a3(mdo sde): bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis pha bgyis te der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil
165a4(mdo sde): snyan dang / glu dbyangs len du stsal cing glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i dbang
165a5(mdo sde): po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bos ni sgo dbye'o/ /lam mtshon par bya'o/ /lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis ni btsun
165a6(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o/ /lha'i bu yang dag skul pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs par
165a7(mdo sde): gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de na klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
165b1(mdo sde): nye dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te tsan+dan
165b2(mdo sde): sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char dbab bo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa nges pa bsam ste brtsams
165b3(mdo sde): so| |byang chub sems dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzang na mal bde ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs
165b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sems la sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi mngon du byed do/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon nga rang byung gi
165b5(mdo sde): bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na go cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas kye ma'o/ /bdag gis 'jig
165b6(mdo sde): rten gnas pa bcings te 'khor ba'i btson ra chen por bcug pa la 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te bcings pa bkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag go/ sred pa'i zhags pa dang / sgrog dam
165b7(mdo sde): pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo/ /zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to/ /kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig
166a1(mdo sde): pa'i mun pa mun nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa/ mi shes pa'i ling thog dang rab rib kyis mig bsgribs pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ ma rig pa
166a2(mdo sde): dang gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma'ang nye bar bsgrubs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman ri lu dang / sman
166a3(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog dang / rnyog pa thams
166a4(mdo sde): cad bsal nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur to/ /kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi
166a5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can/ 'du shes dang / sems dang /
166a6(mdo sde): lta ba phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ bzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstan te/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bsnyil bar bya'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi
166a7(mdo sde): smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to| |kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten rnam par ma zhi ba/ thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/ dru gu 'dzings pa lta
166b1(mdo sde): bur gyur pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor la 'khor ba las
166b2(mdo sde): m i ldog pa mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi pa
166b3(mdo sde): 'di mngon du gyur te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to/ /skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis btsun
166b4(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te mi sdug par gnas pa dang / smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas nam mkha' la 'khod de byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
166b5(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis/ /pad+ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la smras/ /dur khrod dbus 'dir bzhugs par gyur lags na/ /khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur/ /
166b6(mdo sde): lha yi dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas/ /yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog /bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong / /dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden
166b7(mdo sde): snyam byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang / kha cig ni gos lhung bar gyur/ kha cig ni skra zhig /kha cig
167a1(mdo sde): ni rgyan brul/ kha cig ni cod pan lhung / kha cig ni phrag pa mi sdug par gyur/ kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par
167a2(mdo sde): gnas| kha cig ni mig gyur/ kha cig ni kha chu zag /kha cig ni sdur/ kha cig ni lud pa lu/ kha cig ni god/ kha cig ni brdol/ kha cig ni so 'khrig /kha cig
167a3(mdo sde): ni bzhin mdog 'gyur/ kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te lag pa ring por gyur/ kha cig ni rkang pa phral/ kha cig ni mgo phyung / kha cig ni mgo g.yogs/
167a4(mdo sde): kha cig ni bzhin gyi dbyibs gyur/ kha cig ni lus ma rung bar gyur/ kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus bskums shing sdur/ kha cig ni rdza rnga la
167a5(mdo sde): 'khyud nas lus gan rkyal du 'gyel/ kha cig ni pi wang dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs/ kha cig ni rol mo'i
167a6(mdo sde): cha byed kim+pa la dang / na ku la dang / 'khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg la 'dzin/ kha cig ni mig 'dzum zhing 'byed la 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha gdangs par gyur
167a7(mdo sde): te| de ltar sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
167b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste/ /snying rjes shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad smras/ /e ma skye rgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur/ /srin mo'i tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar
167b2(mdo sde): rnyed| |'dod pa'i yon tan yon min yon tan 'dzin/ /gti mug mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan/ /dper na bya ni bya rgyar tshud pa bzhin/ /nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par
167b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ma yin/ / //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis yang btsun
167b4(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor lo rtog cing snying rje chen po'i smre bas sems can gyi phyir smre ste/ 'di ni byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/ gsad pa'i gnas su gsang par bya ba gsod pa dang
167b5(mdo sde): mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyug gis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni
167b6(mdo sde): 'bying ba ste/ glang po che chur bying pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di ni byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra'i nang gi btson btsas pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni
167b7(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba ste/ phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ khyi keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis
168a1(mdo sde): pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/ spre'u rnyong la thogs
168a2(mdo sde): pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bzung ba ste/ nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtubs pa ste/ sha tshong gi
168a3(mdo sde): gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de
168a4(mdo sde): dag ni 'dam du 'bying zhing thogs pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni phongs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam
168a5(mdo sde): bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs
168a6(mdo sde): su zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i steng gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni ngu ba 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang
168a7(mdo sde): mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog rtsol ba ste/ dmus
168b1(mdo sde): long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi ltong gis btags pa dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni rnyis pa ste/
168b2(mdo sde): dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so/ /'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ mar gyi ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba
168b3(mdo sde): ste| klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so/ |'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams la
168b4(mdo sde): 'dzems pa ste/ mgron po la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jig pa ste/ shing sA la la rlung dmar chen po dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag
168b5(mdo sde): ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/ skye bo la sbrul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so/ /byis pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus
168b6(mdo sde): pas chod pa bzhin no/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/ shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams la rtsen pa ste/ byis pa chung
168b7(mdo sde): ngu rang gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag ni byis pa rnams la
169a1(mdo sde): slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag brid pa bzhin no/ /'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/ rgyan po
169a2(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so/ /'di dag gis byis pa rnams la 'chos pa ste/ srin mo rnams kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa
169a3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar
169a4(mdo sde): sgrub/ smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la'ang de dang 'dra bar rnam par sgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong / lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa
169a5(mdo sde): las skyod/ sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba
169a6(mdo sde): dang / mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo / /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /lus kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i
169a7(mdo sde): chu las byung ba 'jig tshogs ming du btags/ /mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi thigs pas gang / /zhag dang rnag dang lgang
169b1(mdo sde): pa dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang / /rtag tu ngan skyug zag cing kun kyang dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa/ /pags dang so dang skra dang spu yis bsgyur cing
169b2(mdo sde): pags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan/ /rgyu ma mchin pa mtsher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam chung ba/ /rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing
169b3(mdo sde): sha yis mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyen/ /skye ba po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur
169b4(mdo sde): pa| |mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur
169b5(mdo sde): to| |nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par lta zhing
169b6(mdo sde): 'dzum yang ston/ /sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir zhing lta na phyi bshol byed dam ci/ /yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /yang na
169b7(mdo sde): chags pa med pa 'di yul rnams la chags par mi 'gyur grang / /lha rnams kyis bskul ba yi yi dam brjed par ma gyur grang / /lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa/ de skad
170a1(mdo sde): smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na'ang mngon par 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa de khyed la
170a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/ da srid pa tha ma pa la gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par
170a3(mdo sde): byas pa| yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtul ba/ tshul du shis shing rings thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzang na shar phyogs su lta zhing
170a4(mdo sde): 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de/ khang bzang gi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te sangs rgyas thams cad bsam nas sangs rgyas thams
170a5(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal te nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang des mthong ba/ nam mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lha brgya stong gis bskor cing / me
170a6(mdo sde): tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog gi rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi
170a7(mdo sde): chun po thogs te lus btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'ang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri
170b1(mdo sde): za dang / klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing go cha sra ba bgos/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du
170b2(mdo sde): shis par nor bu'i cod pan dang / gtsug phud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang glo g.yas
170b3(mdo sde): g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo / /skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/ nga yi bkra
170b4(mdo sde): shis 'di ni don kun grub/ /do mod gdon mi za bar don grub kyi/ /'dun pa phyi bshol ma byed la gor du/ /rta rgyal rgyan gyis brgyan pa nga la byin/ /de nas 'dun pas
170b5(mdo sde): tshig de thos nas yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng+ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / /me tog ku
170b6(mdo sde): mu da dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu gsar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal/ /sbyangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs
170b7(mdo sde): me yi 'od 'phro nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ /glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog ri dwags rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs
171a1(mdo sde): can stabs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag pa
171a2(mdo sde): rkang pa mig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing / /chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung mgyogs
171a3(mdo sde): shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang
171a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab/ /'dun
171a5(mdo sde): pas smras pa/ jo jo khyod bltams ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir bram ze ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar lha khyod kyi

178b2(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te/ /skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab/ /do mod khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub/ /bdag kyang khyod dang
178b3(mdo sde): thabs cig mchi bar bgyi/ /'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu yang dag skul pos bskul byas pa/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur
178b4(mdo sde): du bzhengs/ /sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol/ /da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab/ /lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang / /yid 'ong
178b5(mdo sde): me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/ /de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dud/ /lha yis bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar/ /grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud
178b6(mdo sde): med khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa/ /de dag thams cad yid ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams/ /rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs
178b7(mdo sde): rnams| |de dag rnams kyang yid ngal myur du nyal te de dag gzugs mi mthong / /shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang / /glang chen rta
179a1(mdo sde): dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal/ /rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur/ /bud med
179a2(mdo sde): tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yong ma tshor/ /de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /nam phyed 'das te nam
179a3(mdo sde): gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras/ /'dun pa rta pho bsngags ldan bzang po legs brgyan legs par nga la byin/ /gal te nga la byams par sems na bgegs
179a4(mdo sde): ma byed par myur du byin/ /'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras/ /sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci
179a5(mdo sde): zhig bgyi/ /dus mkhyen cing ni tshod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ /khyod kyi sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su'ang chab sgo 'byed mi
179a6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur/ /'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor/ /kyi
179a7(mdo sde): hud bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar rgyug snyam/ /gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' zhig thos/ /yan lag
179b1(mdo sde): bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed/ /rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di ma tshor/ /bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha
179b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas/ /kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsam pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig /lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis
179b3(mdo sde): 'dun pa de la smras/ /'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyo ma bya/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rnga dung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas/ /
179b4(mdo sde): 'on kyang lhas bsnyal ba yi grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yod ma gyur/ /'dun pa bar snang dri ma med la lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos/ /khyod kyis byang chub sems
179b5(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lhags ltos/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin dpung bskor sgo na mdzes par 'dug pa dang / /lha dang lha min mi'am ci tshogs
179b6(mdo sde): gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos/ /'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta pho de la smras/ /sems can kha los gyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta
179b7(mdo sde): skad sgrog cing shog / de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas/ /yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par
180a1(mdo sde): dbul ba byas/ /mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags/ /khyod kyis sngon chad gang dgongs smon lam
180a2(mdo sde): de grub gyur cig gshegs su gsol/ /gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig /'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris
180a3(mdo sde): pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig / de ni gang tshe mal nas langs tshe sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos/ /rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon/ /
180a4(mdo sde): skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad+ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog bteg /brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston/ /de yis gsal ba dri ma
180a5(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal/ /de tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med/ /me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung
180a6(mdo sde): lha dang lha min bstod/ /thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dong / /skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid
180a7(mdo sde): ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs/ /mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad+ma 'dra ba'i bzhin la smras/ /khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di
180b1(mdo sde): grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur/ /do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /slan chad bya tshogs
180b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /grags pa mtha' yas khyod na sid bgyid pa'i/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang / /bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos ma 'gyur/ /nyon
180b3(mdo sde): mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na/ /gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /lha dang grub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur/ /lha yi dri yang slan chad
180b4(mdo sde): snom mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar/ /khyod kyis do mod pho brang de bzhin spangs/ /khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis/ /gar
180b5(mdo sde): la lta ba bzhin du bdag la gda'/ /grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs 'phrog ste/ /'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags/ /gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs
180b6(mdo sde): can du| |lung bstan drang srong tshig ni deng rdzun gyur/ /bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na/ /sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
180b7(mdo sde): 'dir gdung yang 'chad/ /shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams/ /dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par/ /bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi/ /
181a1(mdo sde): 'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol/ /blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni/ /snyan
181a2(mdo sde): pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te/ /skye 'chi mthar 'byin ma thob bar du ni/ /nga yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya/ /rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa/ /
181a3(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par/ /nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te/ /'greng 'dug nyal dang 'chag pa mi bya 'o/ /gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa/ /byang
181a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de byung zhing / /de ni mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe/ /lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin/ /'di ni bsod nams zhing chen
181a5(mdo sde): yin| |'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing / /'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/ /sems can rnams la thugs rje bas/ /'di yis bskal ba bye mang du/ /sbyin
181a6(mdo sde): dang dul dang sdom pa yis| |'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/ /'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag /brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams/ /'dod pa
181a7(mdo sde): dag dang longs spyod rnams/ /don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung / /sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung / /yan lag
181b1(mdo sde): nyid lag bcad gyur kyang / /khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'/ /'di ni rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/ /bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'/ /'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/ /
181b2(mdo sde): mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad/ /'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/ /thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni/ /sems can bye ba
181b3(mdo sde): 'grol bar 'gyur/ /'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las/ /grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te/ /rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di
181b4(mdo sde): ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan/ /thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon/ /dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa/ /tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen/ /'di ni shin tu lha yi lha/ /lha
181b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os/ /thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral/ /yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs/ /mig med rnams kyi
181b6(mdo sde): sgron ma ste/ /gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags/ /ring nas na ba'i sman pa lags/ /rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal/ /dbang po lta bur spyan stong mnga'/ /tshangs pa
181b7(mdo sde): lta bur rang byung gyur/ /lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa/ /brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang / /dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral/ /nyon mongs 'joms pas
182a1(mdo sde): dpa' bo ste/ /ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags/ /seng+ge lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs/ /glang po lta bur rab dul thugs/ /khyu mchog lta bur
182a2(mdo sde): tshogs kyi gtso/ /bzod de 'khrug pa rab tu spangs/ /zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal/ /nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad/ /sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa/ /skar ma lta bur
182a3(mdo sde): mun pa bral/ /pad+ma lta bur chags mi mnga'/ /me tog lta bur khrims dri dga'/ /ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo/ /dog sa lta bur gsos su gyur/ /rin chen
182a4(mdo sde): 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs/ /'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal/ /'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal/ /'dis ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom/ /'di ni ded dpon
182a5(mdo sde): chen po ste/ /lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la/ /yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog /ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur/ /rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa po/
182a6(mdo sde): mun pa rab rib rnam par grol/ /sa dang lha yul grags pa yi/ /rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags/ /skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba/ /dpag tu med
182a7(mdo sde): la bstod pas bstod/ /khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des/ /smra ba'i seng+ge 'dra bar shog /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung
182b1(mdo sde): nas shAkya'i yul dang / ke'u ta'i yul dang / gyad yul las 'das te me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa'
182b2(mdo sde): phyin pa dang nam nangs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
182b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o/ /slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang /
182b4(mdo sde): rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar gtang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dun pa/ khyod
182b5(mdo sde): song la rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar log cig /sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du'ang mchod rten
182b6(mdo sde): de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yod la rab tu byung
182b7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas des ral gris gtsug phud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/
183a1(mdo sde): deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus ston byed do/ /der mchod rten yang byas te/ deng sang du'ang mchod rten de la
183a2(mdo sde): gtsug phud blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung yang gos ka shi pa gyon pa ji ltar
183a3(mdo sde): rung gi/ gal te ngas tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni legs so snyam du bsam pa dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
183a4(mdo sde): rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig dgos par gyur to snyam mo/ /de na lha'i bu gcig cig lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas
183a5(mdo sde): te rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal
183a6(mdo sde): te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur smrig rnams kho bo la byin na/ kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes
183a7(mdo sde): la| 'o ni rnams kyang kho bo la mdzes so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bslang ngo / /de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig
183b1(mdo sde): rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te gos ka shi pa rnams kyang blangs so/ /de nas lha'i bu des mos pa bskyed de lag pa gnyi gas gos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la
183b2(mdo sde): bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / /de'ang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas des mchod rten brtsigs
183b3(mdo sde): te| deng sang du'ang mchod rten de la ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas gtsug phud bcad nas gos ngur smrig rnams bgos
183b4(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yid rangs te mchog tu rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag /gzhon nu
183b5(mdo sde): don grub rab tu byung ngo / /de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/
183b6(mdo sde): sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
183b7(mdo sde): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkol te 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas bde
184a1(mdo sde): ba| 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /
184a2(mdo sde): zhes nas a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang ga zhi'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to/ /sgra de'ang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par
184a3(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas dpyid dang / dgun dang / dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzang rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim
184a4(mdo sde): rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas bya kur ra mo bzhin dud mo thon par gyur to/ /de na bud med kha cig ni shin tu mya ngan gyis
184a5(mdo sde): nyam thag nas kyi hud bu zhes 'dzer cing du'o/ /kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing du'o/ /kha cig ni kyi hud khyim thab ces 'dzer to/ /kha cig ni jo bo zhes
184a6(mdo sde): 'dzer to/ /kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o/ /kha cig ni lus rdeb cing du'o/ /kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo/ /kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig
184a7(mdo sde): lta zhing du'o/ /kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing du'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing du'o/ /kha cig ni brang rdung zhing du'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa dpung par
184b1(mdo sde): rdeb cing du'o/ /kha cig ni mgor rdung zhing du'o/ /kha cig ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing du'o/ /kha cig ni skra 'jig cing du'o/ /kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing du'o/ /kha cig
184b2(mdo sde): ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho de 'don to/ /kha cig ni ri dwags mo dug mdas phog pa bzhin du glo bur du rgyug cing du'o/ /kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs
184b3(mdo sde): shing du'o/ /kha cig ni chu shing rlung dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyor zhing du'o/ /kha cig ni sa la 'gyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to/ /kha cig ni nya chu nas
184b4(mdo sde): bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gro ldog cing du'o/ /kha cig ni shing rtsa nas phyung ba bzhin du glo bur du sa la 'gyel nas du'o/ /sgra de'ang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams
184b5(mdo sde): la smras sa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag /shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda'
184b6(mdo sde): zhes gda'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig /de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye rgu'i bdag mo
184b7(mdo sde): chen mo gau ta mi'i smre sngags 'don te sa la 'gro ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol/ /de
185a1(mdo sde): nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyed deng la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog cig/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan
185a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi cha ba sgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi
185a3(mdo sde): bar zhig na me tog gi char 'bab par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di nas byung ngo snyam nas de dag cung zad cig pha
185a4(mdo sde): zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni gzhon
185a5(mdo sde): nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo/ /de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin
185a6(mdo sde): du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang / rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo / /de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gi/
185a7(mdo sde): de lam dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa/ gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir mi 'dis gzhon
185b1(mdo sde): nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang / 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ni ma yin te/ 'dis kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo/ /gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi pa 'di
185b2(mdo sde): rnams 'di la byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / /de dag
185b3(mdo sde): gis yang 'dun pa la dris pa/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu dong na nus sam/ des smras pa/ mi nus so/ /gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang
185b4(mdo sde): brtul ba brtan pa ste/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por mi
185b5(mdo sde): 'jug go zhes de de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang
185b6(mdo sde): brtul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog go/ de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang / rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin to/ /de nas ring ba zhig lon pa
185b7(mdo sde): dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gags pas bteg pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu
186a1(mdo sde): byed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma theg go / gang gi tshe de dag gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen
186a2(mdo sde): mo gau ta mI 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gis snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing
186a3(mdo sde): du 'dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs rgyan de dag rdzing du bor te/ deng sang du'ang rgyan gyi rdzing zhes ming du chags so/ /de la 'di
186a4(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa'i bo byung / /de tshe ser skya'i grong khyer pa dag mtha' dag sad/ /kun gyi snying la gzhon nu mal na
186a5(mdo sde): nyal snyam sems/ /mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra/ /sa 'tsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad/ /mal du bltas na byang chub
186a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma mthong nas/ /kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces/ /rgyal po'i khyim du dud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur/ /rgyal pos sgra de
186a7(mdo sde): thos nas sa la 'gyel gyur te/ /e ma nga yi bu gcig pa zhes dud mo phyung / /de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas/ /shAkya mang po dag gis de ni
186b1(mdo sde): dbugs kyang phyung / /sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la lhung bar gyur/ /skra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur/ /sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por
186b2(mdo sde): mi thogs zhes/ /'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kyi ma legs par gsungs/ /gzugs ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag spras/ /gsal zhing rnam dag
186b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug / dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha mi mchod pa'i 'os/ /bdag ni mal du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud/ /yon tan mnga' ba'i
186b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar/ /skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyi/ /sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi/ /khrus bgyi
186b5(mdo sde): spangs te brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad par bgyi/ /skyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis/ /rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra/ /mi mchog
186b6(mdo sde): dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i/ /grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags 'brog dang mtshungs/ /kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can/ /
186b7(mdo sde): kyi hud lhug lhug pa yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor/ /kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang / /yon tan ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mi blta 'o/ /sru mo
187a1(mdo sde): de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing / /shAkya'i bu mo ma ngu zhig ces dbugs kyang 'byin/ /nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi mthar byed ces/ /
187a2(mdo sde): mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin/ /drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de/ /nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas/ /'dun pa de la
187a3(mdo sde): rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtad/ /'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song zhig/ yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni/ /gzhon nu song gi slar
187a4(mdo sde): zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi/ /chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smros/ /'dun pa de
187a5(mdo sde): bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa/ /'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces/ /mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur
187a6(mdo sde): gyi| |bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis/ /byang chub sems dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga'
187a7(mdo sde): bar gyur nas ni/ /khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu bsgoms gyur te/ /nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur/ /'dun pa rta mchog dang ni
187b1(mdo sde): rgyan rnams khyer nas su/ /mi mchog dam pa de yi skyed mos tshal du phyin/ /skyed mos tshal gyi srung ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas/ /kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams
187b2(mdo sde): la smras| |gzhon nu 'di yi rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang / /skyed mos tshal du phyin gyi thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni/ /
187b3(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin/ /sa 'tshos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas/ /tsheg de la ni yid ma ches te dgar ma gyur/ /gzhon
187b4(mdo sde): nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang / /byon cing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin/ /rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas/ /dud mo btab
187b5(mdo sde): ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur/ /kyi hud nga'i bu gling bu rol mo sgra dbyangs mkhas/ /rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song / /'dun pa khyod kyis nga la
187b6(mdo sde): 'dir ni legs par smros/ /byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis de la
187b7(mdo sde): mchod pa ji ltar byas/ /'dun pas smras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson/ /dgung phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'
188a1(mdo sde): 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du/ /'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung / /bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med tshogs
188a2(mdo sde): kyang bslang / /de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos/ /bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul/ /phan pa mdzad pa gang du dgyes par
188a3(mdo sde): gshegs zhes bgyis/ /brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg /dpa' bo bcibs nas
188a4(mdo sde): stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos/ /nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las gshegs gyur te/ /'od ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal/ /me tog
188a5(mdo sde): bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung / /lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/ /nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs/ /
188a6(mdo sde): 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su/ /de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang / /sa 'tshos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas/ /rab tu
188a7(mdo sde): brgyal bar gyur te sa yi steng du 'gyel/ /bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni/ /chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo khru bar byed/ /mya ngan rnyed
188b1(mdo sde): pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong / /phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam byed/ /shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas/ /rta yi rgyal po rta mchog
188b2(mdo sde): de yi mgul nas 'jus/ /sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas/ /mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra/ /kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag
188b3(mdo sde): gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs can gyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan/ /kyi hud bdag gi
188b4(mdo sde): yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan
188b5(mdo sde): pa| |kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs
188b6(mdo sde): snyan ldan pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po/ /kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas
188b7(mdo sde): yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin lum+bi ni der bltam pa legs bltams pa/ /kyi
189a1(mdo sde): hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa'i ye shes dong po che/ /kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim+pa'i sgros can pad+ma'i spyan
189a2(mdo sde): mnga' gser mdog 'dra/ /kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan ba zho ba mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi shangs legs smin legs smin mtshams
189a3(mdo sde): bar na dri med mdzod spu gnas pa po/ /kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i rked pa e na'i byin pa rked pa zlum/ /kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla
189a4(mdo sde): ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can/ /de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi
189a5(mdo sde): glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po dus bzang ba/ /kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa/ /kyi hud
189a6(mdo sde): bsngags ldan legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid/ /kyi hud 'dun ma snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sgron cing slong ma phod/ /
189a7(mdo sde): do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo sgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te/ /phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs zhes skabs der tshig gcig tsam zhig
189b1(mdo sde): ci yi phyir ma smras/ /phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas/ /gang gis phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de
189b2(mdo sde): yi grogs su gyur ba dpal yon ldan/ /'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig /'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyis pha dang
189b3(mdo sde): ma dag mchod pa'i 'os zhes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na/ /de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos/ /kyi hud sdug pa rnams
189b4(mdo sde): dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin/ /byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur/ /de yis sngon
189b5(mdo sde): yang rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog
189b6(mdo sde): thob gyur/ /rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho
189b7(mdo sde): ma yi tshig ni thos gyur nas/ /de ni nga ro thon cing tshig tu smras pa sa 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson/ /nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams
190a1(mdo sde): cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa/ /de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhas
190a2(mdo sde): gsung / /de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas/ /de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyi sa 'tsho bzhengs
190a3(mdo sde): zhes sgra skad chen po phyung / /lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur/ /bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yi rgyal
190a4(mdo sde): po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul/ /bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra phyung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags/ /'on kyang lha yis
190a5(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong khyer pa las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur/ /gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang
190a6(mdo sde): lag rab tu brdabs/ /de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur/ /de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan
190a7(mdo sde): gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas/ /mkha' las lha rnams bye ba thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin srin po tshogs
190b1(mdo sde): rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis/ /pad+ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag bteg /bsod
190b2(mdo sde): nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang ku mu da dang bar sha lta bu de la bcibs/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab//
190b3(mdo sde): bde sogs khyim thabs brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis/ /de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod nas
190b4(mdo sde): gshegs/ /bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes/ /lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa
190b5(mdo sde): de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs/ /lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing / /de dag
190b6(mdo sde): bsngags ldan la yang stobs mthud byed cing snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ /bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo ba mi
190b7(mdo sde): dga' ma skyed cig / 'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par 'gyur/ /lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la
191a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur/ /yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung zad med/ /
191a2(mdo sde): bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug
191a3(mdo sde): pa snying po mchog bdugs 'di la ltos/ /bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der/ /lha yi bu mos
191a4(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha yi 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis/ /legs pa sa 'tsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzad cing mchog
191a5(mdo sde): tu dgyes par mdzod/ /mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yi mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur/ /sa 'tsho mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i
191a6(mdo sde): las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags/ /de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyi dgyes par mdzod la bshums mo ma
191a7(mdo sde): mdzad cig / rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mis mchod pa yi bkod pa gang lags pa/ /bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag gis dgung bdun par du brjod
191b1(mdo sde): kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus/ /khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/ /bdag gis bsam na khyod kyang
191b2(mdo sde): mi yi dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg
191b3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i bu mo
191b4(mdo sde): sa 'tsho ma dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems
191b5(mdo sde): dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de la gos ngur smrig rnams blangs te 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / sems can la snying
191b6(mdo sde): brtse ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba
191b7(mdo sde): dang / des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad+ma'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang
192a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so/ /de nas bram ze'i drang srong nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang / des
192a2(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos so/ /de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te/
192a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to/ /de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
192a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul
192a5(mdo sde): zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i
192a6(mdo sde): gzugs la ltos shig / de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyis te 'di ni ya mtshan che'o/ /dge slong dag /de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi
192a7(mdo sde): bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur/ khyod las bdag gis tshangs
192b1(mdo sde): par spyad pa spyod do/ /des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bus gang la spyad na tshogs chung dus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu la spyod
192b2(mdo sde): cig / dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ nga la mos pa'ang yod nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa'ang yod/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang
192b3(mdo sde): yod kyi| chos de nyid thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang / dben par gnas par bya'o snyam nas dge slong
192b4(mdo sde): dag / de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang / dpen par gnas nas tshegs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de
192b5(mdo sde): nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ring 'phur/ khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam/
192b6(mdo sde): des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma/ de de bzhin no/ /ngas smras pa/ kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do/ /des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma/ de bas na/ chos gang
192b7(mdo sde): kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la gang khyod kyis shes pa de'ang kho bos shes te/ de bas na/ bdag cag gnyi gas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to/ /dge
193a1(mdo sde): slong dag / de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma rnams la'ang don mthun par byed du bcug
193a2(mdo sde): go / dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges
193a3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing spyad snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can
193a4(mdo sde): du gnas nas yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo ga la ba der song nas
193a5(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po skya bo de'i ngos la nga gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so/ /de nas nga
193a6(mdo sde): nang par sha ma thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / mdun
193a7(mdo sde): du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon du lta ba dang / bskum pa dang brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / snam sbyar dang / thang ba dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes
193b1(mdo sde): pa dang / dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang / 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing
193b2(mdo sde): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis nga mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
193b3(mdo sde): nam/ 'on te rnam thos kyi bu'am/ 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig yin nam snyam mo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan/ /byang
193b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste/ /sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar/ /ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas/ /byang chub sems dpas nam nangs
193b5(mdo sde): shes nas ni/ /mchog tu blta na mdzes par sham thabs bgos/ /lhung bzed thogs te dma' ba'i yid kyis su/ /de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs/ /gser
193b6(mdo sde): gyis le sbram bzhin rab dul la/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa/ /skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med kyis mthong na/ /su yang lta bas ngoms par
193b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan/ /gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i/ /sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes/ /
194a1(mdo sde): skye bo sel cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /bud med stong dag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing / /de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang / /srang
194a2(mdo sde): dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas/ /de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lta/ /skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe/ /nyod nga tshong ba dag kyang
194a3(mdo sde): mi byed cing / /chang dang can kyang chang ni mi 'thung la/ /khyim dang srang na 'dug par mi dga' 'o/ /rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/ /de dga' rgyal
194a4(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po la/ /grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod/ /lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes zhes zer/ /kha cig brgya byin lha yi rgyal
194a5(mdo sde): zhes zer/ /gzhan dag 'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer/ /de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang / /gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha yi bu zhes zer/ /kha cig
194a6(mdo sde): nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du/ /sgra gcan stobs ldan thags bzang ris zhes zer/ /kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du/ /ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer/ /
194a7(mdo sde): rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur nas/ /yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba/ /byang chub sems
194b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo / /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mi de la/ /bsod snyoms byin la gar song ltos zhes bsgo/ /ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas//
194b2(mdo sde): kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras/ /gzugs can snying pos nam nangs shes nas ni/ /mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te/ /ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song //
194b3(mdo sde): ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong / /bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song / /ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing / /rtswa bting steng na skyil mo krung
194b4(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong / /rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas/ /
194b5(mdo sde): khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras/ /byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa/ /sa yi bdag po yun
194b6(mdo sde): ring tshe srungs shig / kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su/ /re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung / /gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan/ /lus kyi kha dog mdzes
194b7(mdo sde): shing shugs ldan na/ /nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te/ /bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal pos byang chub sems
195a1(mdo sde): dpa' la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod sku mthong bas mchog tu dga'/ /bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig /bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul
195a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa spyod/ /nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig /slan chad sa gnas rtswa steng ma bzhugs shig /khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon/ /bdag gi
195a3(mdo sde): rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/ /byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing gya gyu med/ /dga' 'gyur phan zhing snying brtse'i tshig smras pa/ /rgyal po khyod ni
195a4(mdo sde): rtag tu bkra shis gyur/ /kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do/ /'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan/ /sems can dmyal dang yi dwags dud 'gror ltung / /
195a5(mdo sde): mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pa 'phags ma yin/ /kho bos ngar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor/ /'dod pa shing gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung / /ji ltar sprin dang char
195a6(mdo sde): pa bzhin du 'gro/ mi brtan 'gyur la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/ dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu/ /de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdung / /rnyed
195a7(mdo sde): du zin kyang chog par 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe dbang med ma rung rab gyur pa/ /de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen bskyed/ /rgyal po lha yi 'dod pa gang yin
195b1(mdo sde): dang / /mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i/ /'dod pa thams cad mi gcig gis thob kyang / /de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo/ /rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa/ /'phags
195b2(mdo sde): pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes gang / /shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs chog /'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas
195b3(mdo sde): shing / /sngon chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med/ /ji ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin/ /'dod pa bsten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel/ /rgyal po lus la yang ltos
195b4(mdo sde): de mi brtan/ /snying po med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin/ /bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag /rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med/ /kho bos 'dod
195b5(mdo sde): pa mang dang de bzhin du/ /blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor te/ /mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob 'dod nas/ /kho bo srid la mi dga' nges par 'byung / /ma ga d+ha yi rgyal
195b6(mdo sde): bos der smras pa/ /dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon/ /gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs/ /rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze'am rgyal po lags//
195b7(mdo sde): dge slong khur gyi 'du shes med na gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong / /mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos
196a1(mdo sde): gyur tam/ /kho bo'i pha yi ming ni zas gtsang yin/ /yon tan 'dod pas kho bo deng rab byung / /ma ga d+ha yi rgyal pos 'di skad gsol/ /khyod mthong
196a2(mdo sde): legs par mthong ste legs pa lags/ /gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma/ /'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa/ /thugs nas bdag la bzod
196a3(mdo sde): pa mdzad du gsol/ /gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub brnyes gyur tshe/ /chos rjes bdag la chos kyi bgo bsha' mdzod/ /rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni/ /
196a4(mdo sde): bdag gis mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do/ /de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te/ /rgyal pos shin tu gus par bskor byas nas/ /mi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs
196a5(mdo sde): bskor te/ /slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+ha yi grong zhugs te/ /ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug/ lha dang mi
196a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni don byas nas/ /mi dbang nai rany+dza na'i chu 'gram song / /gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //dge slong dag /yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan
196b1(mdo sde): cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston to/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' rangs byed kyi bu
196b2(mdo sde): lhag spyod tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo / /
196b3(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang
196b4(mdo sde): pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na/ gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni/ 'di bdag la khyad par du 'phags
196b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan
196b6(mdo sde): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma gyur gyi/ gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs
196b7(mdo sde): pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya'am/ bdag
197a1(mdo sde): rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/ bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus
197a2(mdo sde): byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya'am snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod
197a3(mdo sde): ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig /sus chos bstan pa kun shes/
197a4(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de/ 'on
197a5(mdo sde): kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
197a6(mdo sde): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa
197a7(mdo sde): thob par 'tshal lo/ /smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste skyil mo krung
197b1(mdo sde): bcas nas 'dug go / 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad
197b2(mdo sde): par dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya
197b3(mdo sde): stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te rangs
197b4(mdo sde): byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
197b5(mdo sde): kyi lam las gong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ des smras pa/ med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod
197b6(mdo sde): pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la'ang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
197b7(mdo sde): shes rab yod do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ khyod gang du nges par byung ba'i chos de kho
198a1(mdo sde): bos kyang khong du chud do/ /des smras pa/ de bas na/ 'dong khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag rjes su bslab bo zhes byang chub sems dpa' don
198a2(mdo sde): mthun pa dang / slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po/ lam 'di ni yid 'byung par 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'dod chags
198a3(mdo sde): dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gog par 'gyur ba ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par
198a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin/ dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma
198a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o/ /de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las
198a6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal cing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma
198a7(mdo sde): nus kyi| dge sbyong gau ta mas tshegs chung dus khong du chud cing mngon du byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing / de las gong du tshol ba las the tshom med par de ni 'jig
198b1(mdo sde): rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro/ /gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la'ang bgod par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu
198b2(mdo sde): lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas
198b3(mdo sde): nas lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing song song ngo / /yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang / ri ga ya'i bar na tshogs gzhan dag cig dus ston byed
198b4(mdo sde): de| tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so/ /dge slong dag/ de nas byang chub
198b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+ha'i ri ga ya ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin par gyur to/ /ri ga ya'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir
198b6(mdo sde): gnas te/ de der gnas pa'i tshe sngon ma thos pa dang / sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to/ /gsum gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag
198b7(mdo sde): las lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa dag las sems dben par mi gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la
199a1(mdo sde): 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la skom pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin la/ de
199a2(mdo sde): dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las
199a3(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan
199a4(mdo sde): dang / shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste gtsubs na/ des me 'byin par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du dge sbyong dang / bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las
199a5(mdo sde): lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa rnams la sems dben par mi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la sred pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa
199a6(mdo sde): dang / 'dod pa la skom pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la brgyal ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/ de
199a7(mdo sde): dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing / lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma
199b1(mdo sde): las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o/ /
199b2(mdo sde): yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya
199b3(mdo sde): ba nas me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la thang la bzhag ste shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gis gtsubs
199b4(mdo sde): na| des me 'byin par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/
199b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang
199b6(mdo sde): gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad de bzhin
199b7(mdo sde): du sbyar te de dag gi de ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa myong mod
200a1(mdo sde): kyi| 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so/ /'di lta ste/
200a2(mdo sde): dper na/ skyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang / 'od tshol bar gyur la/ des shing skam po'i gtsub stan dang / gtsub shing thogs shing thang la bzhag ste gtsubs
200a3(mdo sde): na| des me dbyung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so/ /de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'on
200a4(mdo sde): kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i
200a5(mdo sde): dpe gsum pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa
200a6(mdo sde): rnams las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de'ang nye bar zhi ba yin la bdag
200a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis gnod par byas shing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'on kyang bdag mi'i
200b1(mdo sde): chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga'
200b2(mdo sde): ba'i bar du ga ya'i rir ga ya'i rtse mo la gnas te/ rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyis grong lteng rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de na klung ne rany+dza na chu gsal ba/
200b3(mdo sde): 'bab stegs bde ba/ shing dang shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa/ nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' yid shin tu
200b4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o/ /sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam shing nyams dga' ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa ste/ rigs kyi bu spong ba
200b5(mdo sde): don du gnyer ba la ni 'dis cho ga go / bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyi/ bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub
200b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni dzam+bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / mu stegs can gyi sdes
200b7(mdo sde): gang pa dang / lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang / lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
201a1(mdo sde): dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste/ sngags spyod pa dang / lag pa la ldag pa dang / mi slong ba dang / mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba du ma za ba dang / sha dang

207a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag go / e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so/ /e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o/ /sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes
