207b7(mdo sde): par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod na/ sgur por gyur te 'gyel to/ /sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang / ba spu rul pa thams cad
208a1(mdo sde): lus las lhags so/ /gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de'ang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur
208a2(mdo sde): to| |nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang 'di ltar e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag go / e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so//
208a3(mdo sde): e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o/ /sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de'ang med par gyur to snyam du shes so/ /de'i tshe rgyal
208a4(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma'ang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du pho nya gtong ngo / /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du
208a5(mdo sde): bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang / ye shes
208a6(mdo sde): chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir til 'bru gcig dang / rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru
208a7(mdo sde): gcig gis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa bstan te yid dman pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug
208b1(mdo sde): pa bzhin du gnas te spyod lam nyams pa med do/ /nyi mas bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo / /grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo / /rlung dang nyi ma dang char pa'i skyabs
208b2(mdo sde): ma btsal to/ /sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sdig sbrul ma bskrad do/ /bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs ma bor ro/ /bskum pa dang / smyang ba ma byas so/ /
208b3(mdo sde): glos phab pa'am/ khas bub bam/ gan rkyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so/ /sprin chen po dang / yul ngan chen po dang / char pa dang / ser pa dang / ston dang / dpyid
208b4(mdo sde): dang / dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go /tha na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyabs so/ /dbang po'ang ma bkag
208b5(mdo sde): go / dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs so/ /gang dag der 'ong ba grong gi gzhon nu'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ rtswa thun nam/ shing thun
208b6(mdo sde): nam| lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rdul khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/ de la sa skud do/ /der byang chub sems dpa' lo drug po
208b7(mdo sde): de dag gis lus ngan pa dang / god pa dang / rid par gyur te/ de'i rna ba gnyis su rtswa'am shing bal bcug nas sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/ /sna'i bu ga gnyis su
209a1(mdo sde): bcug nas rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/ /rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to/ /khar bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin
209a2(mdo sde): to| |snar bcug nas rna ba dang khar 'byin to/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
209a3(mdo sde): po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do/ /smon lam
209a4(mdo sde): yang 'debs so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs
209a5(mdo sde): su smin par byas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim byung ba/ /yon tan dag dang ldan pa de/ /sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir/ /thabs
209a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes/ /snyig ma lnga yi dus kyi tshe/ /chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten po/ /las dang bya bor 'jig rten du/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'dir skyes par gyur//
209a7(mdo sde): mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gang / /ltad mo dang ni ltas su lta/ /lus la gnod pa bya ba byed/ /byis pa de dag dag par sems/ /g.yang sa me dang mya ngam 'jug/
209b1(mdo sde): sgren mo sa dang lci bas skud/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir/ /gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan/ /lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang / /mi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag /
209b2(mdo sde): bum pa khar gzhong las mi len/ /sgo dang ka bas chod mi len/ /gang na khyi yod pa nas min/ /'dug ce'am tshur shog ces las min/ /khyim nas kha zas gcig
209b3(mdo sde): len pas/ /bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems/ /mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho/ /nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong / /ldam ldum sre da pad+ma'i rtsa/ /gzegs dang ba lang
209b4(mdo sde): lci ba za| |rtsa ba 'bras bu lo ma dang / /ku sha tshal bu la ba pags/ /srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu/ /glen pa 'di bden gzhan rdzun snyam/ /lag pa sgreng bar byed
209b5(mdo sde): pa dang / /skra bsgreng ral ba bsgreng ba dag /lam las rab tu rnam par nyams/ /las min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod/ /rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal/ /tsher
209b6(mdo sde): mar nyal zhing cog pur 'dug / kha cig rkang pa gcig pus 'greng / /gdong bstod nyid dang zla ba lta/ /chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang / /rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang / /shing
209b7(mdo sde): dang ri yi rtse mo dang / /rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /glen pa de dag gnod mang gis/ /lus ni yongs su skem par byed/ /log par lta dang ldan pa dag /myur du ngan
210a1(mdo sde): song rnams su ltung / /nga ni bka' thub brtul zhugs dang / /dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang mis/ /spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i/ /dka' spyad
210a2(mdo sde): drag po rtsom snyam sems/ /bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis/ /blta bar nus pa ma yin pa'i/ /rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan
210a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed/ /mu stegs brtul zhugs pa yis/ /dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod/ /de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po
210a4(mdo sde): brtsams/ /sa steng ci yang ma bting bar/ /skyil lo klung ni bcas te 'dug /rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig /za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston/ /dbugs dbyung
210a5(mdo sde): rngub pa rnam par spangs/ /stobs dang ldan pa gso ba med/ /lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog /nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed/ /rtog dang rnam par
210a6(mdo sde): rtog med pa/ /g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med/ /nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa yi/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de ni nyi las grib mar ram//
210a7(mdo sde): grib las nyi mar song ma byas/ /lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang / /sdig sbrul sbrang bu
210b1(mdo sde): skyo ba mi byed/ /rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed
210b2(mdo sde): pa min| |gzhan du snying rje sems kyis ni/ /'jig rten don mang ched du sgom/ /grong gi byis pa ba lang rji/ /shing thun dag dang rtswa thun dag /de la rdul khrod 'dre snyam
210b3(mdo sde): sems/ |de las yis skud byed cing / /mi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed/ /de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang / /g.yo ba med cing 'khrug med par/ /mkha' khyab bsam
210b4(mdo sde): gtan bsam gtan byed/ /mtho ba med cing dma' pa med/ /lus ma bsrungs par chos mi reg /bshad ba mi byed gci mi byed/ /sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta/ /
210b5(mdo sde): sha dang khrag rnams bskams gyur te/ /pags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus/ /sgal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang / /lan bu blas pa ji bzhin no/ /gang dag lhag par byas lha
210b6(mdo sde): dang / /lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu/ /yon tan ldan pa mngon sum pas/ /nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed/ /ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di/ /mkha' khyab bsam
210b7(mdo sde): gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces/ /smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed/ /snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi/ /don mang phyir byed ma gtogs
211a1(mdo sde): par| |bdag phyir ma yin bde blos min/ /bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min/ /phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom/ /mu stegs blo nyams zil gyis
211a2(mdo sde): mnan| |mgo reg byang chub ga la yod/ /byang chub bskal mang rnyed dka' zhes/ /'od srung la ni tshig smras pa'i/ /las dang bya ba rab tu bstan/ /skye bo dag ni dga'
211a3(mdo sde): bya'i phyir/ /mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis chod/ /theg pa gsum la rab tu btul/ /de yi ched du blo gros bzang / /mkha'
211a4(mdo sde): khyab bsam gtan bsam ma gtan byed/ /dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //dge slong dag /bdud sdig can yang byang chub
211a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags ltas skabs btsal kyang nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ /de glags
211a6(mdo sde): ma rnyed nas yid chad de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo / /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang / /nags tshal gel ba sgra med dang / /lteng
211a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na/ /chu klung nai rany+dza na der/ /spong ba'i phyir ni brtson pa byas/ /rtag tu mthu rtsal brtan pa po/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /brtson pas
211b1(mdo sde): rab tu brtul de la/ /bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ smra bar byed cing 'ongs par gyur/ /kye srog gces kyi 'tsho bar gyis/ /gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur/ /
211b2(mdo sde): gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa/ /de dag byas na mya ngan med/ /khyod ni mdog nyams dman par gyur/ /khyod ni shi la thug cing 'dug/ 'chi ba'i cha ni stong snyed tsam/ /cha
211b3(mdo sde): gcig tsam zhig gson par zad/ /sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin/ /me yi sbyin sreg sbyin sreg byos/ /'on kyang bsod nams chen por 'gyur/ /spong ba yis ni ci zhig
211b4(mdo sde): bya| |spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal te/ /sems dul pa ni bya dka' zhes/ /de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshig /byang chub sems dpa' de la smras/ /de skad smra ba'i bdud
211b5(mdo sde): de la| |byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras/ /sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po/ /khod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs/ /nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang / /don du gnyer
211b6(mdo sde): ba med do bdud/ /gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer/ /de la de skad smra ba'i rigs/ /'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas/ /mi 'chi snyam du nga mi sems/ /tshangs
211b7(mdo sde): par spyod la gzhol gyur pas/ /phyir ldog par ni mi bya 'o/ /chu klung dag gi chu rgyun kyang / /rlung gis rnam par skem byed na/ /spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta/ /'di
212a1(mdo sde): yis ci phyir skam mi 'gyur/ /khrag ni bskams par gyur pa dang / /de yi 'og tu sha skam 'gyur/ /sha ni zad par gyur pa dang / /phyir zhing sems
212a2(mdo sde): ni dang bar 'gyur/ /phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang / /ting nge 'dzin kyang ngas par 'gyur/ /nga ni de ltar gnas pas na/ /tshor ba dam pa thob gyur kyang / /
212a3(mdo sde): lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ /sran thub dag par gyur la ltos/ /nga la 'dun pa yod gyur cing / /brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod/ /nga yi brtson 'grus bskyod
212a4(mdo sde): nus pa| |'jig rten de ni ngas ma mthong / /srog chad shi ba ches bla ste/ /'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min/ /g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste/ /pham nas gson pa de lta min//
212a5(mdo sde): sngar ma dpung las mi rgyal te/ /dpa' bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med/ /bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya/ /'dod pa khyod kyi dang
212a6(mdo sde): po'i dpung / /mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin/ /khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang skom/ /sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin/ /rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste/ /'jigs
212a7(mdo sde): pa drug par brjod pa yin/ /khyod kyi the tshom bdun pa ste/ /khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin/ /'thob dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang / /log par grags pa gang
212b1(mdo sde): thob dang / /bdag la bstod par byed pa dang / /gzhan la smod par byed pa dang / /de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu/ /lhung ba'i bdud kyi dpung yin no/ /dge sbyong bram ze kha cig
212b2(mdo sde): ni| |'di na glags lta 'khod par snang / /khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyis/ /'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba/ /so btang ma byas snod chus bzhin/ /shes rab kyis ni
212b3(mdo sde): de dag gzhig/ dran pa legs par nyer bzhag ste/ /shes rab legs par bsgoms byas nas/ /shes bzhin du ni spyod par bya/ /blo ngan khyod kyis ci byar yod/ /de skad
212b4(mdo sde): ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid ma rangs nas yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// //'phags pa rgya
212b5(mdo sde): cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang
212b6(mdo sde): dag kha cig 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang / lus la gdung ba byed de/ sdug bsngal drag po/ tsha ba/ mi bzad
212b7(mdo sde): pa| yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas de dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ spyod pa 'di dang /
213a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du ma byas te/ 'di ni byang chub
213a2(mdo sde): lam ma yin/ lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi
213a3(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod do snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ngas pha'i skyed mos tshal du shing dzam+bu'i grib ma
213a4(mdo sde): la 'dug ste 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
213a5(mdo sde): ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug
213a6(mdo sde): bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/ nga'i rnam par shes pa rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /ngas 'di snyam
213a7(mdo sde): du bsam ste/ 'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya mi nus so/ /gal te nga 'di ltar lus ngan zhing nyam chung bzhin
213b1(mdo sde): du mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni/ ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying brtse bas byas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di'ang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyi/
213b2(mdo sde): ngas kha zas rags pa bzos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ de nas gdod byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag/ de na lha'i phu gang dag nga la mos pa
213b3(mdo sde): de dag gis nga'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas nga ga la ba der 'ongs te nga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/
213b4(mdo sde): bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas la/ /
213b5(mdo sde): bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par shes te/ nga la mos pa'i lha'i
213b6(mdo sde): bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/ nga shin tu rdzun smras par gyur to snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rdzun smra ba spang ba'i
213b7(mdo sde): phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' bar sems btud do/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul
214a1(mdo sde): zhugs dang / dka' thub nyams su blangs nas stan de las langs te kha zas rigs pa 'di lta ste/ bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud kyi
214a2(mdo sde): dang / ha ra nu kha'i khu bcud dang / zan dang / 'bras chan dang / 'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /dge slong dag/ de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam
214a3(mdo sde): du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta mas lam 'di dang / sgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong pa'i khyad par gang yang mngon du byed
214a4(mdo sde): ma nus na/ kha zas rags pa 'di zos te bsod snyoms la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te/ mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsam nas byang chub
214a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/ grong khyer wA ra NA sir song nas drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags su gnas so/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du dka'
214a6(mdo sde): ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong pa'i bu mo gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so/ /lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug
214a7(mdo sde): 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig dang / til 'bru gcig dbul ba'ang phul lo/ /grong pa'i bu mo bcu ni bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / stobs sbed ma
214b1(mdo sde): dang / shin tu sdug dang / sde las rnam par rgyal dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i phreng ba can dang / mdzes ma dang / rdza byed ma dang / skra lcang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang / legs
214b2(mdo sde): skyes dam zhes bya ba ste/ gzhon nu ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas
214b3(mdo sde): rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas mdog dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes pa/
214b4(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to/ /dge slong dag /de na byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub
214b5(mdo sde): nyams 'og tu chung bar bya ba dang / /ngas rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya la zan byin zhing 'di skad du bdag
214b6(mdo sde): gi zas zos pas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/ /dge
214b7(mdo sde): slong dag / lo drug 'das nas ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ gal te bdag gis 'doms yog 'ga' zhig bsten na re stes snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /de'i
215a1(mdo sde): t she grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa
215a2(mdo sde): de ngas mthong nas ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te dgus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / de nas sa bla'i lhas bar snang gi
215a3(mdo sde): lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid por te phyag dar khrod pa la sems
215a4(mdo sde): btud pa ngo mtshar te/ grogs po dag /'di ni rmad du byung ba'o/ /bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
215a5(mdo sde): la sgra bsgrags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o/ /'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan
215a6(mdo sde): pa la'o| |dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o/ /'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris
215a7(mdo sde): pa'i bar du'o/ /skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang / yud tsam de la grogs po dag /'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
215b1(mdo sde): rgyal srid bor te phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang / brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags
215b2(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo/ /de nas de nyid
215b3(mdo sde): du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/ deng sang du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di
215b4(mdo sde): snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis chu ni rnyed na/ gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdo le ba cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb
215b5(mdo sde): bzhag nas de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam
215b6(mdo sde): pa| 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang kho bos bkru'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid
215b7(mdo sde): kyis bkrus so/ /de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang / bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gad pa mthon po zhig sprul to/ /rdzing de'i
216a1(mdo sde): gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / lha mo la phan gdags
216a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir shang de'i lha mo la smras pa/ lha mo/ shing gi yal ga smod cig /des kyang shing gi yal ga smad nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'jus te byung ngo / /byung nas kyang
216a3(mdo sde): shing sgrub byed pa'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te/ deng sang du'ang de la phyag dar khrod pa drubs pa zhes ming du grags so/ /de
216a4(mdo sde): nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon btsos pa/ rung ba/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub
216a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' la phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang / de na
216a6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang
216a7(mdo sde): gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas de kha zas rags pa bzang po bza' bar sems kyi/ sngon khyod kyis bdag gi zas zos nas
216b1(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi
216b2(mdo sde): bya ba de gyis shig / dge slong dag /de nas grong mi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nyid
216b3(mdo sde): khur byas pa/ bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba/ snying po can blangs te/ blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras gsang ba gsar ba dag dang / phru pa gsar bar blugs nas thab gsar
216b4(mdo sde): par btsugs te kha zas de sgrub bo/ /de sgrub pa na snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yu drung 'khyil pa dang / pad+ma dang /
216b5(mdo sde): sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo / /de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas
216b6(mdo sde): byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tshom med do snyam pa dang / rgya mtsho pa shes shing cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par gyur nas des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob
216b7(mdo sde): pa nyid du lung bstan to/ /de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de tshos pa dang / thang la bzhag ste me tog gis gtor/ spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting ste bran
217a1(mdo sde): mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma/ song la bram ze bos shig /ngas ni 'o thug sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o/ /jo mo/ /legs so zhes de'i ltar
217a2(mdo sde): mnyan nas shar phyogs logs su song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo / /de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong
217a3(mdo sde): ngo / /de bzhin du nub dang / byang phyogs logs su song na'ang de dang der des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo / /de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
217a4(mdo sde): gzhan mu stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur bas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo / /de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang dang gang du
217a5(mdo sde): mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa dga' ba las/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi gda'o/ /legs skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze
217a6(mdo sde): yin te| de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gong ma song la de nyid bos shig /jo mo/ /legs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis
217a7(mdo sde): la gtugs te legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i
217b1(mdo sde): khyim du sang ste stan bting ba la 'dug go / dge slong dag /de nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste byang
217b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu byin pa 'di bdag gis deng zos te the tshom
217b3(mdo sde): med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong pa'i
217b4(mdo sde): bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe/ gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des smras pa/ khyod snoms shig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo la
217b5(mdo sde): ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so/ /legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dgyes su mdzod cig /bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la'ang zas mi stsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems
217b6(mdo sde): dpas zas de thogs te lteng rgyas nas byung nas dro la bab pa dang / klu'i klung chu bo nai rany+dza na'i ngogs su song ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas byang
217b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar phye ba'i phyir klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du zhugs so/ /dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' 'khrus byed pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di
218a1(mdo sde): lta ste| byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha
218a2(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro/ /de'i tshe klung chen po nai rany+dza na lha'i spos rnams dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /byang chub sems
218a3(mdo sde): dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi
218a4(mdo sde): gnas su khyer ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skra dang ag tshom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas mchod
218a5(mdo sde): rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' klung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la blta'o/ /de nas klung nai rany+dza na'i klu'i bu mo gang
218a6(mdo sde): yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng+ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/ grong pa'i bu mo legs
218a7(mdo sde): skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas ci tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so/ /'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur
218b1(mdo sde): bor ro| |bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas mig stong pa grong
218b2(mdo sde): khyer 'jig pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de dbrog tu brgal na ma nus nas rang
218b3(mdo sde): gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer ro/ /khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i
218b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dus ston byas te/ deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston byed do/ /seng+ge'i khri de'ang klu'i bu mo de nyid
218b5(mdo sde): kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/ /dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
218b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
218b7(mdo sde): po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang pa'ang byung bar gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam
219a1(mdo sde): sems| |gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ring bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa/ /shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad
219a2(mdo sde): mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni/ /de dag na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur/ /bsod nams ngan don tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag
219a3(mdo sde): ngan pas ye shes tshol/ /de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas/ /kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed pa byas
219a4(mdo sde): nas ni| |shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsam/ /grong pa'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de/ /
219a5(mdo sde): 'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed/ /de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de tshe 'o thug sbrang rtsi can blangs te/ /klung gi
219a6(mdo sde): 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis nai rany+dza na'i dogs na 'dug / bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de/ /lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang
219a7(mdo sde): srong dag gis bskor te nai rany+dza nar 'ongs/ /pha rol brgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar bsam nas ni/ /thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying
219b1(mdo sde): brtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru/ /bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag /klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don du
219b2(mdo sde): chu la gang bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri med des pa bkrus te ngogs na 'dug par shes gyur nas/ /lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu
219b3(mdo sde): de mchod phyir khyer/ /dur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin/ /rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung dogs
219b4(mdo sde): na 'dug / klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng+ge'i khri yang bshams/ /de la 'jig rten dag gi mig byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas/ /blo gros
219b5(mdo sde): ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin/ /rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas/ /blo gros ldan
219b6(mdo sde): pas ci tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni tshur bor te/ /de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer/ /gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas
219b7(mdo sde): rags pa dam pa zos pa de yi skad cig la/ /de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga mkho bzhin du gnas/ /legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag
220a1(mdo sde): la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas/ /seng+ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros kyis byang chub shing drung chas/ /nai rany+dza na'i
220a2(mdo sde): le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung nai rany+dza nar khrus byas te zas zos nas lus kyi mthu stobs
220a3(mdo sde): bskyed de/ bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la ba der skyes bu chen
220a4(mdo sde): po'i stabs gang yin pa'i stabs des song ste/ mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i
220a5(mdo sde): stabs dang / mi dngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo med pa'i stabs dang / 'che ba med pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / sdod pa med
220a6(mdo sde): pa'i stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khyor ba med pa'i stabs dang / 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang / ha cang mi
220a7(mdo sde): sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang / rtab rtab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dag ba'i stabs
220b1(mdo sde): dang / zhes sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng+ge'i stabs dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i
220b2(mdo sde): stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel
220b3(mdo sde): cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar
220b4(mdo sde): nas 'od zer phyung nas sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad+ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dag pa legs par spyad pa'i
220b5(mdo sde): 'gros kyi stabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng+ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad
220b6(mdo sde): gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang / thar pa'i lam ston pa'i stabs dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan
220b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs phas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling thog dang nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor
221a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong pa rnams zil gyis
221a2(mdo sde): gnon pa'i stabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig bu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis non pa'i stabs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
221a3(mdo sde): thob par byed pa'i stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang / zhib rdul med
221a4(mdo sde): pa| bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so/ /
221a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar klung nai rany+dza na dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to/ /char sprin rnams kyis
221a6(mdo sde): spos chus chag chag btab bo/ /me tog kyang chal mar bkram mo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
221a7(mdo sde): shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to/ /gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po logs su mgo bstan te nyal
221b1(mdo sde): l o| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud par
221b2(mdo sde): g yur to| |klung nai rany+dza na nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon bar bkod par
221b3(mdo sde): gyur to| |lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i gdugs
221b4(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / de don gyis legs par brgyan pa sprul to/ /mda' rgyang gang tsam/ mda' rgyang gang tsam zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas
221b5(mdo sde): mtho ba mngon par sprul te/ shing ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus las phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go /shing ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spos chus yongs su gang
221b6(mdo sde): ba| gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pas gang ba/ rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che
221b7(mdo sde): bai DUR+Yas them skas brgyan pa/ chu sreg dang / bya gar dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so/ /lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad
222a1(mdo sde): khri ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so/ /lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro/ /shing ta la thams cad kyi
222a2(mdo sde): mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go / rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo tsan+dan dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes
222a3(mdo sde): su 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i pog phor thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to/ /rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par
222a4(mdo sde): gyur to| |dge slong dag / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu skyod/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrog /me
222a5(mdo sde): tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/ rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung / rta dang / glang po che dang / glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya
222a6(mdo sde): ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis
222a7(mdo sde): brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo / /gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
222b1(mdo sde): m ngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de
222b2(mdo sde): la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma
222b3(mdo sde): bor ba| go cha sra ba mnabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad char phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang
222b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i
222b5(mdo sde): rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
222b6(mdo sde): cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon
222b7(mdo sde): chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs
223a1(mdo sde): pa| sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig
223a2(mdo sde): rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pas pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral
223a3(mdo sde): ba| mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/
223a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
223a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs
223a6(mdo sde): su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad
223a7(mdo sde): pa dang | sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs
223b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyi/ de la grogs po dag /khyed byang
223b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod ba dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig /de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
223b3(mdo sde): smras so| |gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs
223b4(mdo sde): pa'i lam snang ba/ /bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur/ /thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs
223b5(mdo sde): par bya| |de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te/ /lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
223b6(mdo sde): lo drug bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud/ /kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis/ /de ni stong
223b7(mdo sde): gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste/ /brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med/ /gang btsas tshe na zhing rnams
224a1(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur pa/ /de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud/ /gang gi spyi
224a2(mdo sde): gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing / /gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la/ /gang gi
224a3(mdo sde): gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing / /gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong / /gang dag blo gros
224a4(mdo sde): brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang / /nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang / /gzhan
224a5(mdo sde): las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi ba 'chi med thob 'dod dang / /gal te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis/ /gang
224a6(mdo sde): gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang / /khang bzang skar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang / /
224a7(mdo sde): me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa skyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang / /rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs//
224b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/
224b2(mdo sde): gyo mo dang rdo med pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul mang ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam pa g.yas su 'khyil
224b3(mdo sde): cing g.yung drung 'khyil pa/ ka tsa linada'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to/ /de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen
224b4(mdo sde): po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin
224b5(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to/ /byang
224b6(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs
224b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brgyan par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur
225a1(mdo sde): snang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar dag dang / ri nag po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi
225a2(mdo sde): zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo / /byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i
225a3(mdo sde): bu ut+ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mut+ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang
225a4(mdo sde): byed dang / dri ma med dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi tog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan
225a5(mdo sde): dang | pad+ma'i 'od de/ lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go /de
225a6(mdo sde): dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim
225a7(mdo sde): bdun gyis ni bskor/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/
225b1(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang / gser gyi tshong tshong dag dang / dzam+bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi pad+ma dag gis ni khebs par byas/
225b2(mdo sde): snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/ rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang
225b3(mdo sde): ba| mngon du mchod pa/ lha yul ba dang / mi yul ba gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang /
225b4(mdo sde): thang las skye ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag
225b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying
225b6(mdo sde): po der snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul bar gyur te/ de dag lha dang /
225b7(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur to/ /bkod pa de dag mthong nas
226a1(mdo sde): shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod
226a2(mdo sde): pa ched du brjod do/ /byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi 'di lta ste/ 'od ma dang / snyan ldan dang / yid bzang dang / mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po
226a3(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me
226a4(mdo sde): tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sbom phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu 'gel ba/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun pa
226a5(mdo sde): srid tsam du mtho ba/ de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i
226a6(mdo sde): shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing
226a7(mdo sde): phyi rim bskor ba/ shing yongs 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do/ /gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon
226b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba/ snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo
226b2(mdo sde): rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od
226b3(mdo sde): des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to/ /mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to/ /ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag dbang po
226b4(mdo sde): ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to/ /mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to/ /
226b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to/ /sems can dbul po rnams
226b6(mdo sde): ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to/ /nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams ni lto 'grangs par gyur to/ /skom
226b7(mdo sde): pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
227a1(mdo sde): sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / chags pa dang / tha ba dang / gnod sems dang / phrag dog gi gnod pa
227a2(mdo sde): med par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang
227a3(mdo sde): ldan zhing gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes bskyed par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar/ /dmyal ba mi bzad snang ba yi/ /sems
227a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams/ /phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa/ /thub chen 'od kyis reg
227a5(mdo sde): pas na| |de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes/ /yi dwags 'jig rten yi dwags rnams/ /bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /
227a6(mdo sde): de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur/ /mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing / /ngan 'gro rnams kyang bskams par gyur/ /sems can thams cad bder gyur te/ /lha yi bde
227a7(mdo sde): bas rab tu tshim/ /mig dang rna ba med pa dang / /gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams/ /de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing / /yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur/ /
227b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang / /gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun/ /zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan/ /smyos pa dag ni dran ldan
227b2(mdo sde): zhing / /dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan/ /nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing / /bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur/ /ser sna med cing dgra med de/ /gnod sems dang ni rtsod
227b3(mdo sde): pa dag / phan tshun byed pa med gyur te/ /de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas/ /pha dang ma dag bu gcig la/ /ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems can phan tshun
227b4(mdo sde): du| |de tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis/ /phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang / /gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis
227b5(mdo sde): mi khyab gsal/ /ri bo nag po rnams dang ni/ /khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur/ /rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun/ /gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang / /lag mthil lta bur
227b6(mdo sde): gyur pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ /zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas/ /thams cad rin chen nyid du snang / /byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa/ /lha
227b7(mdo sde): ni de ltar bcu drug yod/ /dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang / /byang chub snying po brgyan par gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na/ /bkod pa chen po gang yod pa/ /byang
228a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /de dag thams cad der yang snang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rang rang
228a2(mdo sde): gzhal med khang rnams la/ /dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur/ /'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas/ /lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur/ /bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir//
228a3(mdo sde): phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs 'dzer/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /brtson pa bya ba med par yang / /de yi yid la 'dod pa dang / /bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//
228a4(mdo sde): ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang / /sngon spyod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa/ /las de'i rnam par smin pa yis/ /'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung / /byang chub shing gi lha mo
228a5(mdo sde): bzhis/ /lha yi shing ni yongs 'du ba/ /de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /byang chub snying po brgyan pa byas/ /byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang / /lha yis mngon par
228a6(mdo sde): 'dus byas pa/ /yon tan de dag tshig gis ni/ /thams cad brjod par yong mi nus/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba rnam par dag
228a7(mdo sde): pa| dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba bskyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ sems can la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog
228b1(mdo sde): t u dga' pa thams cad bskyed pa des klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad
228b2(mdo sde): pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las/ /ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba mthong
228b3(mdo sde): ba dang / /ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar/ /mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig 'byung du the tshom med/ /
228b4(mdo sde): sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang / /khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gis rgya cher 'od kyang yong mi snang / /me dang nor bu dag dang
228b5(mdo sde): dri med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang / /brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na/ /de ring khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra
228b6(mdo sde): ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la/ /sems kyang dga' ba bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur to/ /lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la
228b7(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa las/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin tu gsal/ /klu yi me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig
229a1(mdo sde): do shal dang / /rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la/ /klu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna
229a2(mdo sde): tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga bzang / /brdung zhing 'gro bla kun gyis mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'deng / /de ni langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig
229a3(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / /de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig /lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod
229a4(mdo sde): sbyin rnams kyis bskor/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'dong ba mthong / /klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog
229a5(mdo sde): la mchod byas te/ /gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug /klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la
229a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byed/ /me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed/ /klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams
229a7(mdo sde): kyis bstod/ /'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs/ /bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de
229b1(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ /de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur/ /gang gi don du sngon chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la/ /gang
229b2(mdo sde): gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms/ /gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi smon
229b3(mdo sde): lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud/ /ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba
229b4(mdo sde): stong dag khyod la bskor ba rab bgyid cing / /ji ltar tsa sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' las mchi
229b5(mdo sde): zhing tshul du shis ldan par/ /dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ /ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar
229b6(mdo sde): mchis te/ /ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye rgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang / /ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun tshad bser ma'ang dal bus ldang ba las/ /srid pa gsum
229b7(mdo sde): du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur/ /ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang / /tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams
230a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang / /gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las/ /srid pa gsum du skye rga
230a2(mdo sde): thar pa mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal por de ring byon/ /ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la/ /bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig
230a3(mdo sde): dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs/ /ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs brtol byung ste/ /de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom
230a4(mdo sde): pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud/ /de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod
230a5(mdo sde): pa'am g.yos ma nus/ /mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par
230a6(mdo sde): mdzes/ /rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar ltung gda'/ /ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skam par 'gyur yang
230a7(mdo sde): gda'/ /skyes bu mkhas pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'/ /khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi
230b1(mdo sde): gda'/ /gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang / /byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel brgya chen rnyed par gyur/ /bur bcas bdag
230b2(mdo sde): dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur cing / /glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi/ /dge slong dag /de ltar klu'i rgyal
230b3(mdo sde): po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs
230b4(mdo sde): pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang / pog phor rna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs
230b5(mdo sde): l en pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 'di
230b6(mdo sde): dag gis kyang bstod do/ /'khrul pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsha/ /ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba/ /ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam
230b7(mdo sde): pa mi mnga' ba/ /chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba 'dul mdzad pa/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad
231a1(mdo sde): sman pa mchog / gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo / /ji ltar lha
231a2(mdo sde): tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te/ /me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang / /'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las/ /de ring rgyal bar 'gyur
231a3(mdo sde): gyi rab tu dgyes par mdzod/ /shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs/ /bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol/ /sngon gyi rgyal dbang
231a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar/ /byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ /khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal ba bye mang du/ /'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du
231a5(mdo sde): dka' ba spyad pa mdzad/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la da bab kyi/ /shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod/ /dge slong dag /de nas byang
231a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
231a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo/ /de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsam ste/ rtswa bting nas bzhugs so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya
231b1(mdo sde): stong bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so de de bzhin no/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de de

231b6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / mi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / snum pa dang /

233b1(mdo sde): gang blangs/ /seng+ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos/ /lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis/ /deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg

234a2(mdo sde): drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no/ /kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

236a7(mdo sde): rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag / byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul/ /de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa

236b2(mdo sde): t shal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang

243b3(mdo sde): 'dzum gang cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste lag pa gnyis mgo la rdeb par rmis pa dang

243b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab/ kyi hud yab ces cho nga 'don par rmis pa dang /
243b6(mdo sde): bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya bo bseng bseng po dang / nyam chung ba dang / mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa
243b7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang / de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de
244a1(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang om tshugs bcas te ngu zhing tsho nges btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ yul

244a3(mdo sde): sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / 'thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shubs nas ma phyin cing bdag mi
244a4(mdo sde): shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag por bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mes byin gyi bu'ang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra
244a5(mdo sde): sgrog par rmis pa dang / sgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas
244a6(mdo sde): pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang
244a7(mdo sde): chad cing rnam par chad nas 'khrul bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing pa gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang /
244b1(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad kyang kha sbub tu 'gyel bar rmis pa ste/ dge slong dag /de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so/ /de sad pa dang /

245a1(mdo sde): ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur/ /de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni/ /bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chad/

257a5(mdo sde): la mig zur gyis lta ba dang / kha cig ni gos legs par bgos kyang bgo ma legs pa lta bur bcos pa dang / kha cig ni rked pa dang / gser gyi phag ska bskyod pa dang / kha
257a6(mdo sde): cig ni 'khrul ba ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste phan tshun 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni glu len pa dang / kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ba ltar yang
257a7(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskyod pa ltar brla sgul ba dang / kha cig ni brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni seng ras bgos te gser gyi phag ska dril bu
257b1(mdo sde): can bcings nas dgod cing 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ba ltar slar yang len pa dang / kha cig ni gsang ba dang / gsal ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston
257b2(mdo sde): pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis bskus par ston pa dang / kha cig ni mkhur ba bskus shing rna cha'ang ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo'ang g.yogs shing bzhin yang g.yogs la
257b3(mdo sde): skad cig tsam gyis ston pa dang / kha cig ni ston rgod rgod pa dang / dga' dga' ba dang / rtse rtse ba phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tshab ltar 'dug pa dang / kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs
257b4(mdo sde): dang / bu ma btsas pa'i gzugs dang / na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang / kha cig ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la sgugs pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems
257b5(mdo sde): dpa' la me tog sil mas 'thor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la rtog cing gdong du'ang lta ste/ 'di ci chags pa'i dbang pos lta'am/
257b6(mdo sde): 'on te mig rgyang ring du lta'am/ g.yo'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la sgra gcan las thar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang / nyi
257b7(mdo sde): ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang / gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang / gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang / lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / khor yug
258a1(mdo sde): ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang / dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang / glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo / /de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis byang
258a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir glu dang gar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab/ /zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyi
258a3(mdo sde): dgyes par rol/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste/ /mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag 'gyur/ /bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te/ /lha
258a4(mdo sde): mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag cag byung / /byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar bsgyur la/ /myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod/ /khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lhags gyur pa//
258a5(mdo sde): lha yi bu mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs/ /gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang / /chags par 'gyur na chags pas dga' ba su
258a6(mdo sde): zhig chags mi 'gyur/ /skra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri dang ldan/ /cod pan rna cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la/ /dpral ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur
258a7(mdo sde): mig yangs legs/ /kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste/ /shing tog bim+pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan/ /dung dang kund kha ba dkar so ldan/ /sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs /
258b1(mdo sde): nu ma shin tu mkhrang zhing rgyas la 'bur/ /lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes/ /rked pa 'khor sa lta bur yangs shing mdzes/ /na chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs/ /glang
258b2(mdo sde): po'i sna 'dra ba yi brla ldan zhing / /lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can/ /rked pa gser gyi phag ska rab mdzes brgyan/ /khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs/ /ngang pa'i stabs ldan
258b3(mdo sde): dal gyis mchi bgyid pa/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba/ /rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la/ /lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas/ /glu dang rol mo'i
258b4(mdo sde): dbyangs sgra gar rab bslab/ /dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes/ /'dod la rab dga' gal te ma bzhed na/ /'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus/ /mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi
258b5(mdo sde): shes 'ga'/ /gter mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar/ /khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lhags pa/ /na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra/ /dge slong dag/ de nas byang chub sems
258b6(mdo sde): dpa' mig mi 'dzum par 'dzum dmul te bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing / dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang / lus ma bcos pa dang / brjid pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs
258b7(mdo sde): pa dang / ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa dang / blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spangs pa'i phyir rang
259a1(mdo sde): gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang / bya ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / snyan pa dang / yid
259a2(mdo sde): du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po gsog cing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste/ /mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul
259a3(mdo sde): dka' thub nyams par byed/ /bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras/ /nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur/ /'dod pa bsten
259a4(mdo sde): na sred pa phyir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te/ /dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin/ /de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min/ /nga ni bdag
259a5(mdo sde): gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra/ /sgyu ma'i tshon ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ /rmi lam dag
259a6(mdo sde): na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang / /byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed/ /mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste pags pas g.yogs/ /khrag
259a7(mdo sde): rlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs/ /lto ni gcin dang phyis bsags te shin tu mi gtsang ba/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las
259b1(mdo sde): yang dag byung / /byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis/ /lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min/ /sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun
259b2(mdo sde): ring 'khor byed na/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzad mang po myong / /rked pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag /brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul
259b3(mdo sde): 'khor lta bur gnas/ /nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te/ /phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin/ /'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol bar
259b4(mdo sde): phyin gyur pa/ /me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sprul chen khros 'dra ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na/ /de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing
259b5(mdo sde): brgyal bar gyur/ /mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang / /gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing / /dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam
259b6(mdo sde): las gol gyur cing / /bsam gtan lam gol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas/ /nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te/ /rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas
259b7(mdo sde): par byed ma yin/ /mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la/ /nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra/ /gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la/ /
260a1(mdo sde): bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni/ /nga la tha ba med cing chags med gti mug mi 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni nam mkha'
260a2(mdo sde): mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro/ /lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la/ /khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba/ /de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te/ /rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med

260a4(mdo sde): rnams brgyan te bud med kyi g.yo nye bar bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' la rngod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu//
260a5(mdo sde): bdud kyis btang ba shin tu tshul du shis par rings par lhags gyur te/ /shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras
260a6(mdo sde): po shing drung 'dug la rngod par byed/ /dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste/ /skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom/ /khu
260a7(mdo sde): byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyis gang / /'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da ba ba bo/ /bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul
260b1(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa/ /ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs/ /'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dwags dbang po sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po/ /'gro la phan
260b2(mdo sde): pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa/ /'dod pa rtsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa/ /byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos
260b3(mdo sde): rtag spangs pa/ /gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i dus la bab gyur gyi/ /do mod bdud las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur/ /sgyu rnams
260b4(mdo sde): bsten nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba gsan du gsol/ /khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa sa bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab
260b5(mdo sde): tu bgyid 'gyur na/ /thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la dga' ba bsten du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis
260b6(mdo sde): mchod la/ /chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed/ /chos kyi dga' bas
260b7(mdo sde): dga' yi yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin/ /de dag gis smras pa/ re zhig dar la bab pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur pa dang / /khyod ni re zhig snyun gyis ma btab mi shis bgres par
261a1(mdo sde): ma gyur dang / /ji srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur ba/ /de srid par du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa'i dga' ba spyad du gsol/ /byang chub
261a2(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/ ji srid de mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang / /ji srid lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang / /ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra
261a3(mdo sde): yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa/ /de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya/ /de dag gis smras pa/ lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos
261a4(mdo sde): bskor ba dang / /'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na/ /lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la/ /rol cing spyod la

261a6(mdo sde): khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song / /'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la
261a7(mdo sde): su zhig dga'/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la/ /shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs//
261b1(mdo sde): sa las rtsa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo can mchis pa/ /nags mchog mi ci tshogs kyis bsten par na chung rnams dang dgyes par mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
261b2(mdo sde): lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas/ /bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags/ /gang zhig dus na sa las skyes pa rnams
261b3(mdo sde): kyang nyi mas skam par 'gyur/ /nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad/ /bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa/ zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad+ma gsar pa
261b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can/ /snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra/ /'di 'dra lha yi gnas na dkon na mi yi gnas na ga la mchis/ /gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag
261b5(mdo sde): tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lus ni ngan skyug mi gtsang srin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po/ /myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa bde ba
261b6(mdo sde): ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong / /rgyu bar bcas dang mi rgyu ba yi 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa/ /go 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya/ /de dag 'dod pa'i

262a1(mdo sde): smras| |jo jo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi/ /srid pa kun gyis nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras/ /'dod pa ral gri
262a2(mdo sde): mdung thud rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra/ /sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas na/ /bud med yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams
262a3(mdo sde): spangs| |bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig byed pa de dag gis/ /gang gi tshe na glang po'i phrug gu'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe/ /ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis
262a4(mdo sde): la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ /dga' zhing mgu pa bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas/ /pad+ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal/ /mar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i
262a5(mdo sde): 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba/ /srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig /bdag nyid brgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du
262a6(mdo sde): gsol| |de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam+pa ka 'dra rnam mang bstod/ /mchog tu gyur ba'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni/ /song ste pha yi rkang la mgo bos phyag
262a7(mdo sde): 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras/ /yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs/ /bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis lta/ /de ni chags
262b1(mdo sde): pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags/ /lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho bskams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'/ /srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi
262b2(mdo sde): dbang mi 'gyur/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/ yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la
262b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ kye mi shes shing glen te/ khyed kyi gzugs dang da rod ma mthong ngam/ ji ltar gyur na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la
262b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te/ /gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags/ /spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma
262b5(mdo sde): mchis| |lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zab/ /bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs/ /'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis//
262b6(mdo sde): gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba/ /lha yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis/ /de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab/ /chags bcas gang lags de yi
262b7(mdo sde): snying zhu 'gyur rigs na/ /de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma g.yos/ /ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo g.yo ma mchis/ /bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltams yon
263a1(mdo sde): tan gzi brjid rdzogs/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad/ /lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge /de dag de yi rkang
263a2(mdo sde): par mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi/ /rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges/ /yab cig bdag cag
