263a7(mdo sde): yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi bgyi/ /dge slong dag/ de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas
263b1(mdo sde): ma dang / mdangs stobs dang / bden smra dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel
263b2(mdo sde): bar byed/ mngon du bstod par byed de/ sems can dam pa khyod ni dgung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o/ /blo rnam par dam pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhang nge ba'o/ /
263b3(mdo sde): sems can dam pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad+ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dabs na rgyu ba'i seng+ge ltar sgrog pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod
263b4(mdo sde): ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar
263b5(mdo sde): rin po ches bltams shing gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o/ /sems can rnam par dag
263b6(mdo sde): pa khyod ni dogs ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa
263b7(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung dmar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas ma mchis pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod
264a1(mdo sde): ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar
264a2(mdo sde): dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa brtan pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i
264a3(mdo sde): lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o/ /sems can dam pa khyod ni ring por mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o/ /
264a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyi dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do/ /dge slong dag /de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
264a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems khong du chud cing
264a6(mdo sde): dmas pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du byid ba ltar nyam chung ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o/ /sdig can
264a7(mdo sde): khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis
264b1(mdo sde): btab pa ltar sgyel ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni 'gron pa lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni mi dbul bo bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o/ /sdig
264b2(mdo sde): can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni seng+ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa
264b3(mdo sde): ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus
264b4(mdo sde): mi shes pa'o/ /sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab pa ltar deng tshar chod par
264b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o/ /sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu
264b6(mdo sde): drug gis bdud sdig can nyam dmas pa byas so/ /dge slong dag /de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed de/ bcu drug
264b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpas do mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni gyad stobs chung ngur
265a1(mdo sde): gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar do mod
265a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar gang la rlung dmar btab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod
265a3(mdo sde): ni wa la seng+ge bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas dngangs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni/ shing sA la chen po rtsa ba nas bcad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas
265a4(mdo sde): bsgyel bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la
265a5(mdo sde): nyin tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang chub sems
265a6(mdo sde): dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bud pa'i khyu ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni chos kyi
265a7(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems
265b1(mdo sde): dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni rgya
265b2(mdo sde): mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyed ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar da mod byang chub sems dpas
265b3(mdo sde): rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur
265b4(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni
265b5(mdo sde): phyir log ma gyur te/ /slongs shig rgyob cig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig /'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur/ /
265b6(mdo sde): langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces smras/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ri yi rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur
265b7(mdo sde): srid| |skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la ltung yang srid/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi/ /nga
266a1(mdo sde): 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang / /lha dang lha min
266a2(mdo sde): tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams/ /kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur/ /kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa longs la tshig bzhin gyis/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
266a3(mdo sde): gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min/ /yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin/ /gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug /dbang med khyod na
266a4(mdo sde): lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed/ /khyod kyis gang btsal de dang 'phrad par sla ma yin/ /rab 'gro
266a5(mdo sde): shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang / /go 'phang mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci smos/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khro ba'i zil non blo dang lha yul
266a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / /bdag la rtag dang mi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang / /yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi/ /drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad/ /de dag
266a7(mdo sde): yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra/ /khyab dang phyogs gcig ces dang kha cig rtag ces smra/ /lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can/ /byed pa po dang byed po min
266b1(mdo sde): zhes gzhan dag 'dzer/ /stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pas sde dpung bcas/ /khyod pham byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas/ /'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das/ /
266b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya/ /bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'od zungs shig /gcig pu dgon
266b3(mdo sde): par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas bzung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis/ /nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed du chug /
266b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byas/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs
266b5(mdo sde): cha cha ris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang srid/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid/ /nyi ma
266b6(mdo sde): zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed pa nus srid kyi/ /khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus mi 'gyur/ /
266b7(mdo sde): bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer/ /dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs/ /bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/ /kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma
267a1(mdo sde): ma rung gyur ces zer/ /'dzam klung gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser/ /shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os/ /khyod deng g.yul ngo chen po
267a2(mdo sde): rab tu brlag 'gyur te/ /dbang pos lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la smras//
267a3(mdo sde): mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa/ /de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod/ /gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul bgrang dang / /gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu
267a4(mdo sde): 'byin dang / /skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba/ /des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus/ /bdud khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shubs nas phyung
267a5(mdo sde): ba'i ral gri rnon po lag na thogs/ /dge sbyong myur longs nga yis bsam pa bzhin du song / /'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad da re/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te stong gsum sa
267a6(mdo sde): rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la/ /kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gyur kyang / /de dag nga yi ba spu bskyod par mi nus nga la gnod byed smos
267a7(mdo sde): ci dgos/ /sun 'byin ma rings shig dang de'u ri btags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/ /rnga mo ba lang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs mig dang / /myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad
267b1(mdo sde): 'dra ba dang / /me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing / /rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen/ /sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing / /rdo rje'i lce dang
267b2(mdo sde): lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs/ /ral gri mdung thung rno dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs/ /sa ni rtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms/ /kha cig lag ba brgya dag gis ni mda' brgya
267b3(mdo sde): 'phen| |kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor/ /chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len/ /kha cig nam mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen/ /kha cig khros nas
267b4(mdo sde): lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam/ /me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen/ /sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrug par byed/ /'og gi chu yi phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug /kha
267b5(mdo sde): cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab tu mchong / /kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchong / /rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la/ /glog ltar rab tu 'bar bar mig nas
267b6(mdo sde): mngon du 'byin/ /bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas/ /sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin rtog /'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro med bdag kyang med/ /chu zla'i tshul
267b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor/ /mig dang skyes ba bud med med cing bdag gi med/ /rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus/ /chos 'di byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral/ /brten
268a1(mdo sde): nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong / /bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na/ /'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis/ /lag
268a2(mdo sde): ba'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces/ /rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te/ /de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa/ /sen mo zangs mdog rab
268a3(mdo sde): mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can/ /'dzam klung gser 'bar dang 'dra bsod nams dges bsten pas/ /tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs/ /mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni

268a5(mdo sde): me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te/ /tshangs pa skye rgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang / /gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub
268a6(mdo sde): yan lag 'phags pa dpang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dbang / /brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang / /tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon
268a7(mdo sde): shes nga yi dpang / /rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dbang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims
268b1(mdo sde): ye shes dang / /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni/ /de dag nga yi ba spu'i brgya yi char mi phod/ /de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs/ /khar ba'i snod ltar sa
268b2(mdo sde): 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur/ /bdud kyis sgra thos nas ni sa la sgyel gyur te/ /nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob cig zungs shig sgra yang thos/ /lus las rdul byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur//
268b3(mdo sde): rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur/ /brang rdung cho de 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med/ /bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur/ /glang po rta dang bzhon

268b5(mdo sde): bar gyur/ /pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag /gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed/ /de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tsho ba'i
268b6(mdo sde): skabs kyang med/ /bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snying po de/ /thams cad rnam par 'thor cing tha rgur gyes gyur te/ /zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur/ /mthong nas smras
268b7(mdo sde): pa ga la te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer/ /shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas/ /chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor/ /myur du longs la phyi bshol ma byed skyen du song / /bla ma'i
269a1(mdo sde): tsheg ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gi bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/ /sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na/ /

269a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba brjod/ /rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul/ /me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan+dan phye char 'bebs/ /sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed
269a6(mdo sde): cing tshig brjod pa/ /dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /rten mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs/ /rgya chen pham mdzad
269a7(mdo sde): dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes/ /stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang / /sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur/ /bdud gdul ched du
269b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba/ /bye ba sum cu drug dang brag khrig nyi shu bzhi/ /de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog

269b3(mdo sde): pa| dgra btul ba/ g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i
269b4(mdo sde): chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas
269b5(mdo sde): so| |de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
269b6(mdo sde): ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde
269b7(mdo sde): ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs
270a1(mdo sde): par byas te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug
270a2(mdo sde): bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi ba rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs
270a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas
270a4(mdo sde): nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa
270a5(mdo sde): mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ngo / /las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
270a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa
270a7(mdo sde): rnams la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
270b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go / sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags
270b2(mdo sde): pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang
270b3(mdo sde): du skye bar 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po
270b4(mdo sde): dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo / /dge slong dag /de ltar
270b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do/ /mun pa sel to/ /snang ba bskyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems
270b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas
270b7(mdo sde): nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/ /de bdag dang sems can gzhan
271a1(mdo sde): dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang /
271a2(mdo sde): sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya
271a3(mdo sde): dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba
271a4(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas 'jig pa'i bskal ba dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /
271a5(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no/ /bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /rigs ni 'di
271a6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o/ /kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o/ /tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub po/ /yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas so/ /bde ba dang sdug
271a7(mdo sde): bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo / /bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas shi 'phos
271b1(mdo sde): nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /de nas byang chub sems
271b2(mdo sde): dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/
271b3(mdo sde): las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha smad skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba
271b4(mdo sde): dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di
271b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/ 'on kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung
271b6(mdo sde): po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/ e ma'o rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di thams cad zad par bya bar
271b7(mdo sde): shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang 'chi ba byung / rga ba dang 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di
272a1(mdo sde): snyam du bsam ste/ skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/
272a2(mdo sde): gang yod pas skye ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas
272a3(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas nges 'di snyam du bsam ste/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung
272a4(mdo sde): ste| srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas len pa byung / len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des
272a5(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsam ste/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/ len pa'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas sred pa
272a6(mdo sde): byung / sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems
272a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas nges 'di snyam du bsam ste/ reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa
272b1(mdo sde): yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ skye mched
272b2(mdo sde): drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye
272b3(mdo sde): mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas nges 'di snyam du sems te/ ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni ming dang gzugs yin no snyam
272b4(mdo sde): mo| |de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni/ gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/
272b5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
272b6(mdo sde): yod pas rnam par shes pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ 'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen
272b7(mdo sde): ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam
273a1(mdo sde): ste| ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma
273a2(mdo sde): rig pa'i rkyen gyi 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
273a3(mdo sde): skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye
273a4(mdo sde): ba| skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug
273a5(mdo sde): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /dge slong dag /sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed
273a6(mdo sde): cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so/ /snang ba byung ngo / /
273a7(mdo sde): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ skye ba med
273b1(mdo sde): na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags
273b2(mdo sde): pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam ste/ srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di

273b4(mdo sde): pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /

273b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/

274a1(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /zhes
274a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o/ /'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o/ /'dir
274a3(mdo sde): zag pa ma lus par 'gag go / 'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni ma rig pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni
274a4(mdo sde): ma rig pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'dir ma rig pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur te/ nub
274a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni 'du byed 'gog

274a7(mdo sde): 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs so/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs
274b1(mdo sde): kyi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni skye
274b2(mdo sde): mched drug go / 'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta
274b3(mdo sde): ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni reg pa'o/ /'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag
274b4(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /'di ni tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni tshor ba'i 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di
274b5(mdo sde): ni sred pa'o/ /'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'i

275a1(mdo sde): mo| |'di ni rga ba'o/ /'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni rga ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ /'di ni 'chi ba'o/ /
275a2(mdo sde): 'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /'di dag ni mya
275a3(mdo sde): ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba

275a5(mdo sde): bsngal 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas nam gyi
275a6(mdo sde): cha smad skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na skyes bu dang / skyes bu dam pa dang / skyes bu mchog dang / skyes bu chen po dang / skyes bu khyu mchog dang /
275a7(mdo sde): skyes bu glang po dang / skyes bu seng+ge dang / skyes bu skyes mchog dang / skyes bu dpa' bo dang / skyes bu rtul phod dang / skyes bu cang shes dang / skyes bu pad+ma dang / skyes bu
275b1(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po dang / skyes bu ljid khyer ba dang / skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / blta
275b2(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
275b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag /bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs
275b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi| me tog gtor cig ces byas so/ /de na lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag /sngon gyi yang
275b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda mdzad cing brda mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brda ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig /dge slong dag /de
275b6(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur par mkhyen nas shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad
275b7(mdo sde): do| |rdul ni nye bar zhi'o/ /zag pa ni bskams te/ yang mi zag go/ lam ni chad de/ yang mi 'jug go /'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched
276a1(mdo sde): du brjod do/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog gis gtor te/ de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to/ /
276a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/ sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ lta ba ni bzlog/ nyon mongs
276a3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par dkrugs/ zug rngu ni phyung / mdud pa ni bkrol/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng / bag la nyal rnams ni bton/
276a4(mdo sde): chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag
276a5(mdo sde): pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni bsngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung / sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par
276a6(mdo sde): gzigs/ sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar ba ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung / sdug
276a7(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar par mdzad pa por ni gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs
276b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/ rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni/ brnyes/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang
276b2(mdo sde): dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med par ni gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba
276b3(mdo sde): dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na bzhugs so// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
276b4(mdo sde): mdo bam po bco lnga pa/ dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
276b5(mdo sde): cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang / thang gcig de dang / yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos
276b6(mdo sde): snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu
276b7(mdo sde): g.yos| kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu
277a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams
277a2(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang bskur ro/ /chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong
277a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung
277a4(mdo sde): ste| de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang
277a5(mdo sde): kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur te/ sems can mkhas pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo / /thugs rje chen po'i
277a6(mdo sde): sprin yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/
277a7(mdo sde): dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya
277b1(mdo sde): ste| skyes bu seng+ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te/ /ston pas bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni/ /gang tshe stobs bcu sa rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe/ /phyogs
277b2(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur/ /chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa/ /zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyel tam|/
277b3(mdo sde): bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de/ /shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom/ /khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis
277b4(mdo sde): gdugs rnams bskur/ /des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul/ /khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes/ /srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa
277b5(mdo sde): myur du phob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyangs te/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra yi gsung du brjod pa na/ /bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs
277b6(mdo sde): rgyas| |dper na mar dang mar gyi nying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin/ /dge slong dag /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
277b7(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
278a1(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin
278a2(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / seng+ge ltar mi bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang / rig
278a3(mdo sde): pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig
278a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang
278a5(mdo sde): dag par 'das pas dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang spra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i shin
278a6(mdo sde): tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te tshigs su
278a7(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du/ /bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas/ /ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga'
278b1(mdo sde): 'bros mi mdzad/ /'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/ /byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs/ /des na 'di ni do mod mdzes/ /byang chub dam pa tshol
278b2(mdo sde): pa na| |'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/ /brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /bzod pa'i stobs
278b3(mdo sde): kyi go mnabs te/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs/ /des ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan/ /'di yis bskal pa bya mang du/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni/ /gzhan
278b4(mdo sde): dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de/ /des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal/ /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis/ /thub pa'i dbang po yang dag
278b5(mdo sde): mchod| |des na do mod 'di la mchod/ /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags/ /sems can bye bar phan yang btags/ /des na byang chub
278b6(mdo sde): myur du brnyes/ /'di ni phung pos bdud las rgyal/ /'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal/ /'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal/ /des 'di mya ngan mi 'da' 'o/ /'di ni shin tu lha yi lha//
278b7(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/ /bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing / /'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/ /'di ni sbyin gnas dam
279a1(mdo sde): pa ste| |'di la sbyin pa btang na de/ /byang chub dam pa thob bar du/ /bar ma dor ni chud mi za/ /'di yi mdzod spu mdzes pa yis/ /zhing mang bye ba gsal
279a2(mdo sde): bar bgyid/ /nyi zla dag kyang zil du brlag /sems can rnams la snang bar gyur/ /'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te/ /gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs/ /
279a3(mdo sde): mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/ /'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste/ /zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs/ /sems dang ldan
279a4(mdo sde): dang sems med pa/ /mang po dag la rang byung gzigs/ /'di snyan shin tu rnam dag ste/ /lha yi dag dang mi yi dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos smra dang / /mtha' yas pa yi sgra
279a5(mdo sde): rnams gsan/ /'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste/ /ka la ping+ka 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan/ /bdud kyi sde rnams
279a6(mdo sde): gzigs gyur kyang / /de yi thugs ni 'khrugs mi mnga'/ /lha yi tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang / /shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'/ /'di yis mtshon dang mda'
279a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags/ /bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/ /sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo/ /gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni/ /de yi sku la gnod
279b1(mdo sde): ma byung / /de yi skabs su byams mi mnga'/ /zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so/ /gang dag khyod las chos thos nas/ /sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi/ /lha dang mi rnams de dag ni/ /
279b2(mdo sde): rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags/ /rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba/ /khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar/ /kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog /
279b3(mdo sde): skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pha ma mdzad de/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /
279b4(mdo sde): 'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /bsod nams rnam smin bde sde sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub//
279b5(mdo sde): bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po thob/ /de bas bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi
279b6(mdo sde): chos mnyan pas kyang chog bar su zhig 'dzin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin/ /byang chub
279b7(mdo sde): sems dpas lag pa brkyangs te tshig brjod pa/ /mchod pa byas kyi rang rang dag gi zhing du dengs/ /kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sna tshogs bkod
280a1(mdo sde): pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dong / /dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol/ /
280a2(mdo sde): dpung bcas bdud las rgyal te bdud rtsi reg shog ces/ /sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon/ /dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang
280a3(mdo sde): chub kyi shing drung na seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de/ de dag ni
280a4(mdo sde): bskal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa ni lag mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par 'gyur/ /'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang
280a5(mdo sde): ldan pa byung / /lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud/ /seng+ge sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong / /stong gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang / /
280a6(mdo sde): ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud/ /stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge byang chub snying por rol/ /sku las 'od zer
280a7(mdo sde): brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste/ /rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi/ /de nas skad cig yud tsam mi khom bskams par gyur/ /sems can gang la'ang tha
280b1(mdo sde): ba rgyags sdang gnod pa med/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/ /nyi zla nor bu med dang glog dang lha yi 'od/ /'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me
280b2(mdo sde): min| |'gro ba gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong / /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/ /phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos/ /de
280b3(mdo sde): yi bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dkrugs/ /bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'bri ba/ /'di yang mi yi seng+ge gdan la rol pa lags/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang
280b4(mdo sde): chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
280b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/ /'jig rten gsal bar
280b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa byung / /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la/ /nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa/ /khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal/ /bsod nams
280b7(mdo sde): dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs so/ /dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i tshim mdzad 'gyur/ /sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal/ /gau ta ma ni thang la bzhugs//
281a1(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis/ /khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po khyod 'phags te/ /'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis
281a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten chos kyis khyod mi gos/ /chab na mchis pa'i pad+ma bzhin/ /'jig rten ring nas gnyid log 'di/ /mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la/ /khyod ni shes rab sgron ma
281a3(mdo sde): yis/ /rab tu sad par mdzad pa sbyong / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni/ /nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la/ /nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag
281a4(mdo sde): byung / /'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas/ /mi khom rnams ni stong par 'gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag kyang / /bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /skyes bu khyu mchog des
281a5(mdo sde): pa khyod| |lta bar gang dag 'dong bgyid pa/ /de dag bskal pa stong rnams su/ /nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/ /gang dag chos nyan 'gyur ba rnams/ /de dag mkhas shing
281a6(mdo sde): nad med dang / /zag dang phung po zad pa dang / /'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur/ /nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni/ /kun kyang len pa ma mchis par/ /myur du rab tu grol
281a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu thob/ /de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/ /sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os/ /de dag yon phul mi chung ste/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu
281b1(mdo sde): lags| |dge slong dag / de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
281b2(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
281b3(mdo sde): dang | phreng ba dang / phyug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
281b4(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan/ /thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog /byang chub rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes/ /dbyangs
281b5(mdo sde): kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod skyabs khyod gling khyod ni dpung gnyen te/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad/ /khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin/ /
281b6(mdo sde): gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog /mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod/ /byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs/ /mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phob la/ /lha
281b7(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi gdung bzhi bar mdzod/ /khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad+ma 'dra/ /khyod ni mi g.yo mi bskyod lhun po 'dra/ /khyod ni thugs dam mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin/ /yon tan mchog kun
282a1(mdo sde): mnga' ste zla ba 'dra/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de
282a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang
282a3(mdo sde): c hub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i
282a4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan/ /mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog mnga' ba/ /dran dang ldan
282a5(mdo sde): zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'/ /mnyel ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral/ /'jig rten gsum du grags shing
282a6(mdo sde): rig pa gsum brnyes pa/ /rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyi mig sbyin pa/ /spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus ngan rnyog pa bsal ba rab tu zhi
282a7(mdo sde): thugs ldan/ /thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba/ /khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa
282b1(mdo sde): btang snyoms dgyes/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon/ /bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes
282b2(mdo sde): pa po| |grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzad pa/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud po 'dir lhags pa/ /shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams pas
282b3(mdo sde): pham mdzad nas/ /khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes/ /g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la
282b4(mdo sde): sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
282b5(mdo sde): zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la pa der song ste phyin pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bla bre
282b6(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
282b7(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste/ /bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig gcig la pham
283a1(mdo sde): par mdzad/ /khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de/ /thub pa don kun 'grub pa 'jig rten gsum
283a2(mdo sde): gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bdud kyi bu mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing
283a3(mdo sde): g.yo ma nus/ /mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mdzad de/ /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags/ /
283a4(mdo sde): byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad tshe na shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang / /phangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin skyed mos tshal dang grong khyer dang / /yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang
283a5(mdo sde): rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang / /dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes/ /nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te
283a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas/ /sems can bya ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams/ /dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral
283a7(mdo sde): bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa/ /khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /smra ba'i khyu mchog
283b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams de/ /bdag cag thams cad dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs/ /sangs rgyas
283b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog /
283b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu
283b4(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dzam+bu gling gi gser gyi pad+ma dag gis
283b5(mdo sde): mngon par gtor te spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa/ /mun rdul bral zhing
283b6(mdo sde): 'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur/ /lha yul mi yul pa yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /dka' ba
283b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel/ /shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod/ /sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa dri ma shin tu mnga' bas/ /lha
284a1(mdo sde): dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal/ /pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa/ /lha dang mi yi srid par
284a2(mdo sde): dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba/ /shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phyi/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgyu ba mdzod/ /srid
284a3(mdo sde): pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te/ /lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul bar mdzod/ /zla ba bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu
284a4(mdo sde): ba| |srid pa gsum 'dir rmad byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog / lha dang mi yi srid pa dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'/ /'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i
284a5(mdo sde): dga' la dgyes pa po/ /'khor la sgrog pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags/ /dge
284a6(mdo sde): slong dag / de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin
284a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de bzhin
284b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la dar gyi lnga ldis g.yogs nas spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag
284b2(mdo sde): 'phags/ /gti mug dang ni lta dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dang dpal gyis rgyas/ /log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi med 'god mdzad pa/ /'jig rten 'dir byung
284b3(mdo sde): mchod rten lha yul pa dang mi yul bas mchod pa/ /khyod ni gso ba'i sman ba mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin pa po/ /lta dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal/ /
284b4(mdo sde): lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste/ /de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu
284b5(mdo sde): dang | |brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal stug spyan sngar lam me ma lags te/ /shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/ /khyod kyi ye shes
284b6(mdo sde): rmad byung mngon sum gyur bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bden dang bden min gsung / /dul ba thugs zhing dbang po thul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs
284b7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ /ston pa lha dang mi yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa/ /shAkya thub pa mi yi khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes mnga' ba ye shes
285a1(mdo sde): bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa/ /dri ma gsum bsal rig pa gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa po/ /thub pa blo gros ji ltar
285a2(mdo sde): gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa/ /stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas
285a3(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu yongs su
285a4(mdo sde): d ga' ldan dga' ldan kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i
285a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas bzhugs tshe der ni khyod kyis rgya
285a6(mdo sde): chen chos kyang bshad/ /khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad/ /khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed
285a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron ma khyod pa mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs//
285b1(mdo sde): gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs rab tu zhi/ /gang gi ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad/ /khyod kyi smon lam de ni
285b2(mdo sde): rab tu rdzogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor/ /chos 'tshal ba dag chos mnyan bgyi zhes te/ /srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis/ /'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor
285b3(mdo sde): du gsol/ /srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral du gsol/ /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par
285b4(mdo sde): bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom
285b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de
285b6(mdo sde): spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis/ /khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga
285b7(mdo sde): la lhag/ /mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub snying po lha yis gang bgyis pa/ /bkod pa mdzes pa de dag
286a1(mdo sde): mthong lags te/ /ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa/ /de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags/ /khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te/ /
286a2(mdo sde): gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad/ /shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas las rgyal/ /khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur//
286a3(mdo sde): shes rab sgron mes 'jig rten gsum po gsal/ /khyod ni rab rib sel bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa/ /khyod la bstod pa bskal bar brjod kyang
286a4(mdo sde): ni| |khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /de ltar rab 'thab bral
286a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig
286a6(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
286a7(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa ma 'khrul kha na mtho mi mnga' rtag
286b1(mdo sde): tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra/ /phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /thub pa khyod kyi sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang
286b2(mdo sde): dag mchod pa mdzad/ /de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/ /tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal
286b3(mdo sde): mtshan tog / rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag mig sbyin pa/ /thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba/ /shAkya khyu mchog
286b4(mdo sde): 'gro bdag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te/ /shes rab stobs dang thabs
286b5(mdo sde): dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang / /stobs rnams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te/ /stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub
286b6(mdo sde): snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur/ /dpung tshogs mtha' yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de/ /nyams par mi 'gyur grang zhes lha
286b7(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rab tu dngangs shing skrag par gyur/ /khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/ /khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos
287a1(mdo sde): te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/ /ji ltar snga ma rnams kyis seng+ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa/ /de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas
287a2(mdo sde): mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du gyur ma lags/ /yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes/ /des na khyod ni 'jig rten
287a3(mdo sde): dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing / /dge slong dag /de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la
287a4(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
287a5(mdo sde): bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas me tog a ti muk+ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / paR+shi ka dang / d+ha nu ka ri'i phreng ba dang /
287a6(mdo sde): chun po thogs te lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
287a7(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid du mchi/ /zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba/ /'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa/ /thub mchog
287b1(mdo sde): dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba/ /sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun/ /khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas na/ /mi yi sgra
287b2(mdo sde): skad thams cad zil gyis non/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi/ /mi min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed/ /rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas/ /de kun 'phags
287b3(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba thob/ /khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad/ /mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nam yang rgyags ma gyur/ /khyod ni 'gying ba mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /rgya mtsho'i
287b4(mdo sde): dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin/ /de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /pad+ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po/ /de ltar
287b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun la mchod sbyin mdzad/ /de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la
287b6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/
287b7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i
288a1(mdo sde): ba dan rnams dang / rin po che dang / dar gyi lnga ldi dang / rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang / mu tig gi chun khor dang / me tog gi lnga ldi sna tshogs rnams lus
288a2(mdo sde): phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang / zla gam rnams kyis legs par brgyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
288a3(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa mkhas la bdag cag mchis nas ni/ /'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing / /sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na/ /de ltar
288a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong / /mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa/ /mi yi 'dren pa de dag nam mkha' khyab/ /'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus
288a5(mdo sde): lags pas/ /gzhal med khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis/ /bar snang nas ni me tog char bab pa/ /stong chen byur bur rab tu gang gyur pa/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur
288a6(mdo sde): bab kyang / /'bab chu rgya mtshor bab pa bzhin du gyur/ /gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng / /me tog tsam+pa ka yi lnga ldi dang / /rgyan phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang 'thor/ /lha
288a7(mdo sde): yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ /bar snang thams cad lha yis gang gyur te/ /'di la skra tsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid
288b1(mdo sde): kyang ni| |khyod la rgyags pa'am ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas
288b2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sa
288b3(mdo sde): gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas spos chus chag chag btab ste/ me tog gis chal bar bkang nas ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi bla bre bres te de bzhin gshegs
288b4(mdo sde): pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /stong gsum rdo rje lta bur mi shigs gnas par gyur/ /nga 'dir pags pa sha dang rus pa rkang bskams kyang /
288b5(mdo sde): byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas mi ldang zhes/ /rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por bzhugs/ /gal te mi yi seng+ge khyod kyis stong gsum kun/ /byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag
288b6(mdo sde): rkang mthil gyis/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhags tshe ma lus zhig par 'gyur/ /sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag
288b7(mdo sde): pa ni| / sa yi lha yis rnyed pa rgya chen legs par rnyed/ /'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snang bar mdzad/ /stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos ci 'tshal/ /'og gi chu yi
289a1(mdo sde): phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang / sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed ba/ /stong gsum sa rnams thams cad bdag cag gzung bar bgyi/ /khyod la kun
289a2(mdo sde): 'bul ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad du gsol/ /gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam 'chag gam mnal ba dang / /gau ta ma bde bar gshegs pa'i sras bo nyan thos gang / /chos gtam
289a3(mdo sde): smra dad gang yang de dag nyan pa dang / /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /de ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
289a4(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /mngon par bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa
289a5(mdo sde): gsum pa'o/ / //dge slong dag /de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la lha rnams kyis bstod cing skyil mo krung ma
289a6(mdo sde): bshig / spyan mi 'dzum par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang dga' ba'i zas kyi bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to/ /
289a7(mdo sde): de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i
289b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyang spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub kyi shing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i bkrus so/ /lha dang
289b2(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog
289b3(mdo sde): pa'i spos chu des rang rang gi lus la bskus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed do/ /lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin kyang
289b4(mdo sde): spos chu de dang ma bral bar gyur te/ spos gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa yid la byas pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba des
289b5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des de bzhin
289b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
289b7(mdo sde): pa dgung bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ dge slong dag /de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de la 'di
290a1(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ni dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs
290a2(mdo sde): pa zhag bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag /de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
290a3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ /zhabs ni 'khor los khyab pa po/ /pad 'dab rdul med stong gzi ldan/ /lha yi cod pan zhabs gtugs pa/ /dpal stug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde
290a4(mdo sde): gshegs zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de tshe lha bu de sems dga'/ /lha min rab tu zhi byed pa/ /yid gnyis sel ba'i tshig 'di smras/ /shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa/ /
290a5(mdo sde): chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin pa/ /zhus pa rnams kyang mthar 'byin pa/ /lha min dogs pa bsal du gsol/ /dpag med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas stobs
290a6(mdo sde): bcu ci slad du/ /rgyal ba dog sa'i snying por ni/ /dgung bdun skyil mo krung ma bshig /'dab brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ci zhig gzigs na dgung bdun du/ /mi yi seng+ge rnam
290a7(mdo sde): dag spyan/ /spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mdzad/ /gang gis shing rgyal drung du ni/ /skyil krung ma bshig dgung bdun bzhugs/ /smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi 'am/ /smra ba'i seng+ge
290b1(mdo sde): kun gyi lags/ /tshems ni mnyam zhing rnam dag pa/ /stobs bcu'i zhal ni dri rab gda'/ /ma nor legs par bka' stsal to/ /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod/ /zla 'dra'i zhal
290b2(mdo sde): gyis bka' stsal pa/ /ngas bshad lha yi bu nyon cig /ngas ni dris pa de yi lan/ /cung zad tsam zhig bshad par bya/ /dper na rgyal po phyogs gang du/ /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dbang
290b3(mdo sde): bskur ba/ /zhag bdun par du sa phyogs de/ /mi 'dod rgyal po'i chos nyid do/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / /gang tshe smon rdzogs dbang bskur ba/ /sa yi snying por zhag bdun du
290b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba skyil mo krung mi 'jig / dper na dpa' bo dgra tshogs rnams/ /ma lus pham byas lta ba ltar/ /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas kyang / /nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad/ /
290b5(mdo sde): gti mug byung ba'i 'dod dang khro/ /de dag 'gro ba'i dgra 'dra ste/ /chom po chos ni bzang 'dra ba/ /de dag ma lus ngas 'dir bshig /nga 'dir nga rgyal rnam dgu dang / /gnas med
290b6(mdo sde): rlom sems rab tu bcom/ /zag pa thams cad rab tu spangs/ /nga yi ye shes dam pa skyes/ /ngas 'dir sred pa'i sred rgyu dang / /ma rig bya min byed pa de/ /bag nyal bcas rtsa dra
290b7(mdo sde): ba rnams/ /ye shes gsal ba'i me yis bsregs/ /ngas 'dir nga dang nga yi dang / /nyes zhags ring 'gro rtsa bu ga pa/ /sgrib pa'i mdud pa dam po de/ /ye shes mtshon gyis bcad par gyur/
291a1(mdo sde): ngas 'dir ring nas nga'i ldan pa/ /slu ba tha ma rnam 'jig pa/ /len par bcas pa'i phung po de/ /ye shes kyis ni yongs su shes/ /gnyis su rmongs
291a2(mdo sde): pa log 'dzin pa/ /tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams/ /ngas 'dir ma lus bsal bya ste/ /phyin chad nam yang skyer mi 'gyur/ /ngas 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba yi/ /me yis sgrib
291a3(mdo sde): pa'i nags tshal bsregs/ /byin ci log ni rnam bzhi yang / /nga yis ma lus nges par bsregs/ /'du shes skud pas brgyus pa yi/ /rnam rtog phreng ba gnod byed pa/ /ngas
291a4(mdo sde): 'dir byang chub yan lag gis/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog /bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang / /gti mug sum cu dri ma can/ /sdig pa dag ni bzhi bcu ngas/ /sa yi snying
291a5(mdo sde): po 'dir bsal to/ /sa yi snying por 'dug nas ngas/ /sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang / /khams ni rnam pa bco brgyad dang / /khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bsal/ /nyon mongs chu bo
291a6(mdo sde): nyi shu dang / /'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad/ /brtson 'grus mthu dang brtul ba yis/ /nga 'dir de dag shin tu 'das/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsgyings sgrog pa/ /lnga brgya ngas
291a7(mdo sde): 'dir yang dag rtogs/ /brgya phrag stong du tshang ba yi/ /chos rnams nga yis yang dag rtogs/ /ngas 'dir bag nyal ma lus pa/ /dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'/ /kun
291b1(mdo sde): nas ldang ba'i lo ma rnams/ /ye shes me yis nges par bsregs/ /dogs dang yid gnyis kun 'byung ba/ /lta ba'i chu yis gang gyur pa/ /mi dge dogs can sred pa'i klung / /shugs
291b2(mdo sde): drag ye shes nyi mas bskams/ /tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag spangs/ /sgyu dang ser sna phrag dog sdang / /nyon mongs dgon pa deng 'dir bcad/ /'dul ba'i me yis rab tu bsregs
291b3(mdo sde): 'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de/ /ngan 'gro nyam ngar 'dren byed pa/ /'phags la skur ba 'debs pa'i tshig/ ye shes mchog gi sman gyis skyugs/ /ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang /
291b4(mdo sde): ting 'dzin thob nas du ba dang / /cho de 'don dang mya ngan dang / /smre ba ma lus mtha' mar phyin/ /ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge 'dzin/ /thob nas chu bo sbyor ba dang / /mdud pa mya ngan
291b5(mdo sde): zug rngu dang / /rgyags dang bag med kun las rgyal/ /ngas 'dir nyon mongs gzings pa yis/ /srid pa'i ljon shing rtog rtsa brtan/ /dran pa'i sta res ma lus par/ /bcad nas ye
291b6(mdo sde): shes me yis bsregs/ /nga 'dir nga snyam nga rgyal te/ /khams gsum dbang byed stobs che ba/ /g.yon can ye shes ral gris bcom/ /lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin/ /dra ba ma
291b7(mdo sde): lus sum cu drug/ 'jug pa sa yi snying po 'dir/ /shes rab ral gri stobs ldan pas/ /bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba bag nyal bcas/ /sdug bsngal mya
292a1(mdo sde): ngan 'byung de dag / ngas 'dir shes rab dam pa yi/ /thong lcags kyis ni ma lus bton/ /rang bzhin gyis dag sems can gyi/ /shes rab mig 'dir nga
292a2(mdo sde): yis sbyangs/ /ye shes mig sman chen po yis/ /gti mug ling tog rgya chen bsal/ /'byung khams bzhi po rgyags pa yi/ /chu srin gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho
292a3(mdo sde): dran pa dang / /zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams/ /ngas 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs/ /rnam rtog du 'thul chags chen me/ /rab tu 'bar ba rnam thar chu/ /bsil ba'i khu bas
292a4(mdo sde): bsad par gyur/ /ngas 'dir bag la nyal ba'i sprin/ /ro myang glog 'dra rnam rtog 'brug /brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyis/ /'das te kun tu gtor bar gyur/ /ngas
292a5(mdo sde): 'dir dran pa dri med pa'i/ /ting 'dzin thob nas sems spyod dgra /srid pa'i 'khon rgyud ma lus par/ /shes rab ral gri'i stobs kyis bcad/ /ngas 'dir rgyal mtshan mchog
292a6(mdo sde): 'chang ba/ /shing rta glang po rtas mtho ba/ /gzugs bsgyur bdud dpung brtson pa'i sde/ /byams pa thob nas rnam par bcom/ /mi sdug ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir
292a7(mdo sde): dbang po drug gi rta| / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas brtan pa/ /rtag tu rgyags yan ma lus btags/ /smon med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir rjes su chags pa dang / /khong
292b1(mdo sde): khro ba dang 'thab pa dang / /rtsod spang ma lus mtha' mar phyin/ /stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /ngas 'dir phyi dang nang dag gi /rlom sems kun dang rtog pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa
292b2(mdo sde): yongs su zad/ /mtshan med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ /lha mi srid pa'i rtser thug pa'i/ /bde ba thams cad ma lus par/ /nga yis 'dir ni yongs su btang / /ngas 'dir rnam thar
292b3(mdo sde): gsum thob nas/ /ngas 'dir shes rab stobs kyis ni/ /srid pa dag gi 'ching ba kun/ /ma lus kun las grol bar gyur/ /ngas 'dir rgyu mthong gyur nas ni/ /rtag dang mi rtag 'du shes
292b4(mdo sde): dang | / bdag dang bdag med bde sdug bsngal/ /rgya yi 'du shes gsum las rgyal/ /ngas 'dir las kyi rnam pa dag /skye mched drug rtsa kun 'byung las/ /byung ba thams cad shing
292b5(mdo sde): dbang drung / /mi rtag pa yis bsnun te bcad/ /ngas 'dir ye shes nyi ma yis/ /gti mug mun pa'i rnyog pa dang / /lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba/ /yun ring mun pa bsal snang
292b6(mdo sde): byas| |ngas 'dir brtson 'grus stobs kyi grus/ /'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can/ /ngan 'dzin lta ngan sred rlabs chu/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las rgal/ /gang rtogs chags
292b7(mdo sde): dang gti mug dang / /sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te/ /phye leb nags mer lhung 'dra ba/ /ngas 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs/ /nga 'dir ring nas song ba yi/ /bskal pa dpag
293a1(mdo sde): med bye khrag khrig / 'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa/ /gdung ba med nas ngal yang sos/ /'jig rten phan phyir rga shi dang / /mya ngan sdug bsngal
293a2(mdo sde): mthar phyin pa/ /phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa/ /bdud rtsi de ni ngas 'dir rtogs/ /sred las byung ba'i skye mched kyis/ /sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba/ /phyis mi
293a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'jigs med kyi/ /grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to/ /ngas 'dir nang gi dgra chen po/ /khyab pa de dag rjes su rtogs/ /rtogs nas rab tu bsregs te ngas/ /de dag yang
293a4(mdo sde): byung gnas med byas/ /bdud rtsi'i don du bskal pa ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig rang gi sha /mig dang rin chen mang btang ba/ /de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag
293a5(mdo sde): med pas/ /gang sangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs/ /gang gi snyan pa nyams dga' ba/ /sgra ni 'jig rten rnams su grags/ /rten nas byung ba'i 'gro ba stong / /sems kyi skad cig
293a6(mdo sde): gcig la 'jig / smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 'dra/ /de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/ /gang gis lag pa'i mthil du ni/ /shing tog bzhag bzhin 'jig rten khams/ /thams
293a7(mdo sde): cad mthong ba'i mig mchog de/ /nga yis 'dir ni dag par byas/ /sngon gyi gnas ni ngas 'dir dran/ /rig pa gsum yang thob par gyur/ /bskal ba khrag khrig dpag med pa/ /
293b1(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log las sad bzhin dran/ /lha mi nor zhing 'du shes log /phyin ci log gyur gang 'bar ba/ /de yang de bzhin ma nor bar/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nyid khu 'thungs/ /gang
293b2(mdo sde): gi don du stobs bcu po/ /sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/ /byams pa'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don du stobs
293b3(mdo sde): bcu po| |sems can kun la snying rje bsgoms/ /snying rje'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don du stobs bcu po/ /sems
293b4(mdo sde): can kun la dga' ba bsgoms/ /dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ /ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i nying khu 'thungs/ /gang gi don stobs bcu po/ /bskal pa khrag khrig btang snyoms

293b6(mdo sde): sngon gsol ba/ /bdud rtsi'i nyid khu ngas 'dir 'thungs/ /rga shi mtha' mar ma phyin par/ /skyil mo krung ni mi gzhig ces/ /sder bcas pa yi bdud mdun 'dir/ /nga yis tshig ni
293b7(mdo sde): gang smras pa/ /ye shes rdo rje brtan 'bar byas/ /nga yis ma rig pa yang bcom/ /stobs bcu nyid ni thob par gyur/ /de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig /nga yis dgra bcom nyid
294a1(mdo sde): thob ste| |nga yi zag pa ma lus zad/ /bdud kyi sde yang bcom par gyur/ /de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig /sgrib pa lnga yi sgo glegs rnams/ /nga yis
294a2(mdo sde): 'dir ni thams cad bcag / sred pa'i 'khri shing rnams kyang bcad/ /nga 'dir skyil mo krung gzhig go /de nas mi yi zla ba de/ /dal gyis gdan las bzhengs nas su/ /dbang
294a3(mdo sde): bskur chen po bzhes nas ni/ /seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs par gyur/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod/ /steng nas spos chu sna tshogs kyis/ /stobs bcu yon tan

294a7(mdo sde): so| |ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la gdan de nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhag bdun pa
294b1(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyang ring du 'chag pas 'chag go / zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tshe ni de bzhin

294b4(mdo sde): ring ba'i 'chag pas 'chag go/ / /'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor/ /bam po bcu drug pa/ /de nas bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
294b5(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ yongs
294b6(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/ dge slong dag/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas

295a2(mdo sde): dad par byas nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag ma byung gi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sdig can/ ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang /
