360a3(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub bo/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo
360a4(mdo sde): zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi shes so/ /chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so/ /me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang
360a5(mdo sde): dag par mi shes so/ /sring mo/ de ltar na/ khams kyi ming yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang
360a6(mdo sde): chub bo zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mig mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par grub pa
360a7(mdo sde): de la sring mo/ mig ni stong pa ste/ mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /rna ba ni stong pa ste/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /sna ni stong pa ste/ sna stong
360b1(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /lce ni stong pa ste/ lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /lus ni stong pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /yid ni stong
360b2(mdo sde): pa ste| yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
360b3(mdo sde): gzugs su 'dogs par mi byed do/ /gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs
360b4(mdo sde): par mi byed do/ /chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/ sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ mig ni gzugs mi len
360b5(mdo sde): te| byang chub kyang gzugs mi len to/ /rna ba ni sgra mi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra mi len to/ /sna ni dri mi len te/ byang chub kyang dri mi len to/ /lce ni ro mi len te/ byang chub kyang ro mi len
360b6(mdo sde): te| |lus ni reg bya mi len te/ byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to/ /yid ni chos mi len te/ byang chub kyang chos mi len to/ /sring mo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gzugs dang bral ba ni byang
360b7(mdo sde): chub bo| |yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du'ang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sring mo/ de ltar na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang mtshams
361a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang
361a2(mdo sde): yin pa de ni sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
361a3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
361a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ro'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
361a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /yid kyi rnam par
361a6(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/ sring
361a7(mdo sde): mo| de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ de ltar na/ byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis
361b1(mdo sde): su dbyer med do/ /byang chub dang / gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de
361b2(mdo sde): gnyis su dbyer med do/ /byang chub dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /byang chub dang / chos kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su
361b3(mdo sde): dbyer med do/ /byang chub dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes
361b4(mdo sde): smras so| |sring mo/ gzhan yang mig rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/ /mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa
361b5(mdo sde): pa ste| rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo/ /sring mo//
361b6(mdo sde): mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags/ mi sdang / ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
361b7(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags pa/ mi sdang ba/ ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/ /sring mo/ mig ni bdag po med pa/ bdag
362a1(mdo sde): gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna
362a2(mdo sde): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa
362a3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /sring mo/ mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ byang chub kyang skyes pa'i
362a4(mdo sde): chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang
362a5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang
362a6(mdo sde): ma yin| bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ mig ni skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ byang chub kyang skyes pa'ang ma yin/
362a7(mdo sde): bud med kyang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ yid kyi bar du'ang skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no/ /sring mo/ byang chub kyang skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no/ /sring mo/
362b1(mdo sde): de ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su
362b2(mdo sde): chud de| de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma
362b3(mdo sde): yin| sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu ma yin/ byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po
362b4(mdo sde): ma yin| mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ snom pa bo ma yin/ za ba po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa po ma yin no/ /sring mo/ byang chub kyang bdag ma yin
362b5(mdo sde): sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra
362b6(mdo sde): ma yin| dri ma yin/ ro ma yin/ reg ma yin/ rnam par reg pa ma yin te/ sring mo/ de lta bas na/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /sring mo/ gang yang khyod
362b7(mdo sde): kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing tha dad du dbyer med do/ /sring
363a1(mdo sde): mo| gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
363a2(mdo sde): nyid gcig par de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud de/ sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo
363a3(mdo sde): zhes smras so/ /sring mo/ gzhan yang sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid dang / rnam
363a4(mdo sde): par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni skra la gnas pa ma yin/ spu la gnas pa ma yin/ sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ pags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/
363a5(mdo sde): khrag la gnas pa ma yin/ rus pa la gnas pa ma yin/ chu ba la gnas pa ma yin/ rkang la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/ gnyis ka med
363a6(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma
363a7(mdo sde): yin te| gnas pa ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyun chad pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rnam par rig
363b1(mdo sde): pa med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ 'dre ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ba/ 'od gsal ba ste/ sems dang / yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam
363b2(mdo sde): par byang ba med pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing 'od gsal la lus med pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med do/ /sring mo/ de ltar na/ phung
363b3(mdo sde): po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams so/ /sring mo/ khyed kyi lus 'di la phung po
363b4(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched gang dag mngon par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
363b5(mdo sde): rnams las gzhan pa ma yin te/ de dag nyid byang chub yin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad
363b6(mdo sde): du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag
363b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /gang dag smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams
364a1(mdo sde): las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi
364a2(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde
364a3(mdo sde): ba skyes te yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas tshangs
364a4(mdo sde): par spyad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces smras
364a5(mdo sde): so| |'jam dpal/ bdag kyang khyod kyis rjes su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / chos kyi gdung mi
364a6(mdo sde): gcad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i slad du khyod kyis bstan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub der sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du chos rtogs par
364a7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang bgyi'o/ /nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du nongs pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o/ /
364b1(mdo sde): gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon
364b2(mdo sde): par zhen pas 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid ma gtogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang gang dag
364b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing /
364b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni ji ltar mchis pa ma lags pa la kun btags pa las
364b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar de ltar kun btags pa yongs su rtogs na 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar
364b6(mdo sde): na| nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jig cing 'ju ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o//
364b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste/ rlung dang 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ nam mkha'i ri mo dang
365a1(mdo sde): 'dra'o| |nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du mi gnas pas chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug
365a2(mdo sde): pa las 'byung ba ste/ gnod sbyin dang 'byung po 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las byung ba ste/ sprin mar dang 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa
365a3(mdo sde): rnams ni kun btags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni bar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams
365a4(mdo sde): ni bdag gir 'dzin pas dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni log par bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung
365a5(mdo sde): bas mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor mi rtog pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni
365a6(mdo sde): sems dang rjes su mthun pas bskyed pa ste/ nges par mi sems pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/ yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o/ /
365a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ril por 'dzin pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams gsog pa'o/ /nyon mongs
365b1(mdo sde): pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on
365b2(mdo sde): kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi phur bu'i gzhi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/ nyon
365b3(mdo sde): mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis byang chub ni nyon
365b4(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang
365b5(mdo sde): chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'dzubs mi gnas pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa
365b6(mdo sde): rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na 'jam dpal/ sems 'di ni chags pa'am/ sdang ba'am/ rmongs pa zhes sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus
365b7(mdo sde): te| 'jam dpal/ ji ltar sems bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi
366a1(mdo sde): nus pa'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar de 'dod chags
366a2(mdo sde): la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/ cha mnyam pa la
366a3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi
366a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji lta ba de bzhin du zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar
366a5(mdo sde): bdag gi gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du
366a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni rtswa dang / shing thams cad kyis
366a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me'ang nyon mongs pa'i rtswa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o/ /'jam dpal
366b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad
366b2(mdo sde): dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung dmar ni shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad la mi chags so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes
366b3(mdo sde): rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la mi chags so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa
366b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams
366b5(mdo sde): cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni/ rdul dang / na bun dang / sprin thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ de
366b6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'
366b7(mdo sde): ni| sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /
367a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod
367a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par
367a3(mdo sde): mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/
367a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'o ma dang / chab bsres pa las 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi/ chab ni ma lags so/ /'jam
367a5(mdo sde): dpal| de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'dres pa dag las shes rab nyid ni len
367a6(mdo sde): gyi| nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na nye dur 'brel ba'i bud med rnams la shing gi yal ga 'dud par mi bgyid
367a7(mdo sde): do| |'jam dpal/ de bzhin du dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes 'dud par mi
367b1(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar bdag ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa ci'ang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang
367b2(mdo sde): bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang
367b3(mdo sde): dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/
367b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' zhes
367b5(mdo sde): mi bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang zhes bgyi ba chab kyi nang du stsal na/ gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/ chab
367b6(mdo sde): kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang nyon
367b7(mdo sde): mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gsol/ nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/ /de nas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser
368a1(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
368a2(mdo sde): dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems
368a3(mdo sde): dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag snang na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o/ /sring mo/ de bzhin
368a4(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o/ /sring mo/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya
368a5(mdo sde): ba ni su gang du kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang mi mthong / rnam par byang ba'ang mi mthong ste/ mthong ba dang / mi mthong ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon
368a6(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa'o/ /sring mo/ gang dang gang du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni/ nyon mongs
368a7(mdo sde): pa'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam/ sems pa 'jug pa med pa'i phyir te/ gang gis dge ba'am mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag
368b1(mdo sde): thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o/ /gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o/ /gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do/ /'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo/ de dag ni nyon
368b2(mdo sde): mongs pa yin no/ /sring mo/ nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/ mig dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro
368b3(mdo sde): dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /shes rab
368b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /sring mo/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni rgyu ba
368b5(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /kun tu 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
368b6(mdo sde): bla dwags te/ sring mo/ grangs dang grangs med pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do/ /sring mo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la'ang nyon mongs pa med la/ gzhan
368b7(mdo sde): dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar pa la'ang shin tu brtson pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar
369a1(mdo sde): par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag
369a2(mdo sde): phul gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mtshan ma med pa la
369a3(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing smon pa la spyod pa'i sems
369a4(mdo sde): can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba
369a5(mdo sde): med cing 'chi 'pho ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rga ba dang shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su
369a6(mdo sde): 'jug cing skye ba dang / 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos su nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las
369a7(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
369b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje ba ste/ sring mo/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo/ /sring mo/ 'di
369b2(mdo sde): lta ste| dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i/ rin po che chen po dag thogs te ldog par ni dka'o/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor brtag pa ni sla'i/ thabs la
369b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o/ /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / nyan thos kyi
369b4(mdo sde): skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la'ang so sor brtag pa ni sla'i/ /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba ldog par ni dka'o/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ g.yul ngo
369b5(mdo sde): chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i/ /ma rmas ma nyams par rgal ba ni dka'o/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du'ang 'jug pa ni sla'i/ /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas
369b6(mdo sde): ldog par ni dka'o/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ thabs zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo/ thabs zhes bya ba ni gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/
369b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so/ /sring mo/ thabs zhes bya ba ni gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo
370a1(mdo sde): dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo dang /
370a2(mdo sde): bsam bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba med pa'i
370a3(mdo sde): sgo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang / dben pa'i sgo dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya
370a4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad so sor srung ba'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang / rang byang chub kyi
370a5(mdo sde): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang sgo thams cad la'ang chags pa med pa de ni thabs la mkhas pa
370a6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang gi sgo dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang / gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo
370a7(mdo sde): dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o//
370b1(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis shes pa
370b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /bam po gnyis pa ste/ tha ma/ yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i ngos kyi sman ljongs shig na
370b3(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dag sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu ring du 'chag pas 'chag cing bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
370b4(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang / thabs la mkhas pa ji skad bstan pa de ni de bzhin te/ legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin pa
370b5(mdo sde): dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing / legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
370b6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
370b7(mdo sde): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
371a1(mdo sde): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
371a2(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom
371a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad
371a4(mdo sde): pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis su la stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom
371a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de da ltar gang na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
371a6(mdo sde): chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gi / lha'i bu dag /gang dag chos nyan par
371a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag kyang der dengs shig / de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma
371b1(mdo sde): yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / lus rags par
371b2(mdo sde): sprul nas me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char des rgyal po'i khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu me tog chal bar bkram par gyur to/ /de na lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing /
371b3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams kyang mthong ste/ phan tshun smra bar ni mi byed do/ /de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag me tog de dag gis kyang
371b4(mdo sde): bskul/ lha'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ga la ba der dong ngo / /rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te dpung gi tshogs
371b5(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
371b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de 'dod chags kyis nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba
371b7(mdo sde): dang bral te/ dbang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing dbang po mi g.yeng la ngo tsha shes pa dang / dpal gyis legs par brgyan par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de la phyin chad su'ang 'dod pa'i
372a1(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de 'dus par rig nas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser
372a2(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang phyir zhing chags pa med na/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang du
372a3(mdo sde): bzhag / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/
372a4(mdo sde): de dag kyang ma skyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so/ /nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de'ang bdag gis rtogs lags so/ /'jam
372a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ rtog pa ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni
372a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so/ /tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so/ /nyon mongs pa rnams ni glo bur te/ stong pa nyid
372a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'jam
372b1(mdo sde): dpal| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dug drag po'i sbrul gdug pas bltas ba tsam gyis skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las der mi zhig gis dug thams cad 'jil ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu
372b2(mdo sde): zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel zhes bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas de la khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtse
372b3(mdo sde): bas rtse zhing / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag sprul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/ phang par len cing glo la se ral phreng du btags te rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za
372b4(mdo sde): bar mi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du mi bgyid do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pas tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log la nye bar
372b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa na 'dod chags kyi rang gi lus la chags shing rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtog par mi bgyid
372b6(mdo sde): lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du ma 'tshal/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ srog gi dbang po zil pa'i thigs
372b7(mdo sde): pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal zhing / chos thams cad bdag
373a1(mdo sde): ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis bsgribs shing / gzhan la'ang mun par bgyid/ bdag kyang bcings shing
373a2(mdo sde): gzhan la'ang 'ching bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shing mos nas kyang rnam
373a3(mdo sde): par grol te/ de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang / slan chad chags pa'i mig gis su la'ang lta bar mi bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi
373a4(mdo sde): gnas so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su'ang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
373a5(mdo sde): pa la smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma 'jam dpal/ lha'i 'khor dang / mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyi/ gang gis lha dang mi
373a6(mdo sde): ' di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas sems can rnams la snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
373a7(mdo sde): chos kyi bka' mchid bgyi bar khyod spo bas par mdzod cig / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring
373b1(mdo sde): mo| |nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'ang yongs
373b2(mdo sde): su ma brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin no/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'ang yongs su brtags
373b3(mdo sde): na| 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni rgyu yod na/ 'bar ro/ /sring mo/ /de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu yod na/
373b4(mdo sde): khams gsum du 'bar ro/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni rgyu med na/ mi 'bar ro/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med na/ khams
373b5(mdo sde): gsum du mi 'bar ro/ /sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang / 'bri ba med do/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la'ang skye pa
373b6(mdo sde): dang / 'bri ba med do/ /sring mo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ me shi ba la ni me zhes mi gdags so/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du nyon mongs pa zhi ba la'ang nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdags so/ /sring mo/ 'di
373b7(mdo sde): lta ste| dper na/ nam mkha' gang la me 'bar yang nam mkha' ni me des tshig par mi nus so/ /sring mo/ de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa byung yang
374a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des kun nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so/ /sring mo/ 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar
374a2(mdo sde): blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mtsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu
374a3(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/
374a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs par gyur pa de bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ skye mched rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos
374a5(mdo sde): smras pa| 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu
374a6(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gi nam mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/
374a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ dper na/ bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyi gnyis phrad pa ma mchis pa bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ nga ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
374b1(mdo sde): dpal/ dper na/ long ba gzugs la blta ba bzhin du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ sgyu ma sprul
374b2(mdo sde): pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
374b3(mdo sde): dpal| bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ yang 'dod par mi bgyid do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
374b4(mdo sde): dpal| bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du yongs su btang bas spyad lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
374b5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ /
374b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags
374b7(mdo sde): so| |'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis
375a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis brtsams lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sam/ bu mos smras
375a2(mdo sde): pa| 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
375a3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo /
375a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang
375a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpas snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
375a6(mdo sde): rnams las btsal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag
375a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpas dga' ba ga las btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras
375b1(mdo sde): pa| lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems las so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
375b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni sems can thams cad la mi slu ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye bar mchi bar
375b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ 'gal ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu
375b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa dag go / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag gang dang 'gal/ bu mos smras pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ phas kyi rgol
375b5(mdo sde): ba gang dag yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong / bu
375b6(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can thams cad kyis mtho btsams pa las mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtho btsams pa ma mchis na/ bzod pa ci'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du
375b7(mdo sde): ste| 'jam dpal/ gang la sems can thams cad kyis mtho btsams pa na 'khrug pa ma mchis shing gnod pa mi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgoms pa lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras
376a1(mdo sde): pa| bu mo/ khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par
376a2(mdo sde): bgyid pa 'di ni/ khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo| khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis sems la
376a3(mdo sde): zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing yul thams cad la gnod pa mi bgyid pa ste/ de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
376a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras
376a5(mdo sde): pa| bu mo/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i
376a6(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams ston kyang phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems
376a7(mdo sde): dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston kyang rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad
376b1(mdo sde): du rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston kyang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang phrag
376b2(mdo sde): dog dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed/ bu mos smras pa/
376b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang thabs yongs su sgom pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo /byang chub sems dpas
376b4(mdo sde): ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su sgom pas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
376b5(mdo sde): cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang du bdag dang gzhan gyi
376b6(mdo sde): 'du shes 'jug pa de ni nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ gang la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'am nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis
376b7(mdo sde): smras pa| bu mo/ chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang / chos ston pa la sgyu ma'i
377a1(mdo sde): mi lta bur mos pa dang / bstan pa'i chos de la'ang brag ca'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing / mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba la'ang gnyis su mi bgyid pa de tsam
377a2(mdo sde): gyis na| chos nyan par 'tshal pa lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ chos la rton pa la nan tan bgyid pas chos
377a3(mdo sde): mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od
377a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis ston gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
377a5(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa ma sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi
377a6(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / bu mo de'ang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /
377a7(mdo sde): des bzod pa thob nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te 'jam dpal/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol/ tshul bzhin ma lags par
377b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa/ 'phags pa ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/ /'jam
377b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo/ 'di lta ste/ mgo'i skra 'breg pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bu mo/ gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon
377b3(mdo sde): mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bu mo/ gang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma
377b4(mdo sde): yin gyi| bu mo/ gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la
377b5(mdo sde): yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bu mo/ gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/
377b6(mdo sde): bu mo| |gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben pa shes pa la 'god par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /kha dog dang /
377b7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi rtags dang / spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems
378a1(mdo sde): bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/
378a2(mdo sde): sems can gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni byang
378a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam par gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba
378a4(mdo sde): yin no| |bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems
378a5(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bdag gi sems rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su srung pa ni byang
378a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bdag thar par bya ba la brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad thar par bya ba la
378a7(mdo sde): brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bu mo/ 'khor bas skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las
378b1(mdo sde): sgrol bar bya ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bu mo/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/
378b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni sems can gzhan
378b3(mdo sde): dag la snying rje che ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la skyon du mi lta ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu
378b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang gzhan la gdung pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
378b5(mdo sde): tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan la bsten pa zhes bya
378b6(mdo sde): ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi ltung ba mi gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni nyes pa thams cad
378b7(mdo sde): las 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ni gzhan la rag las pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpas gzhan la rag ma las par bya'o/
379a1(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo
379a2(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba tshul khrims la rag las pa yin te/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa yin
379a3(mdo sde): te| brjed ngas pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba ni shes rab la rag las pa yin te/ shes rab 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do/ /
379a4(mdo sde): bu mo| rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba la rag las pa yin te/ sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni/ rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do/ /bu mo/ rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye
379a5(mdo sde): shes mthong ba la rag las pa yin te/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci'ang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
379a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la reg las pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas na/ gzhan
379a7(mdo sde): la rag las pa med pa ste/ rang gi kun shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'dis gang ci shes pa de bdag gis kyang shes la/ 'di gang ci smra ba de bdag kyang smra'o zhes gzhan dag gi ngor
379b1(mdo sde): mi lta bas na/ gzhan la rag las pa med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ gzhon nur gyur pas rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ legs par bshad pa'i
379b2(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan thams cad lus las phud de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/
379b3(mdo sde): khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba legs par bshad de/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal
379b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ khyod rta'i shing rta 'di la zhon la/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la snying
379b5(mdo sde): brtse ba'i phyir yongs su smin par gyis shig dang / de nyid kyis khyod rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
379b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gnas su ji ltar rung snyam mo/ /de nas bu mo des skye bo phal po che de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems
379b7(mdo sde): kyis shes nas skye bo phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /'dod chags dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can
380a1(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/ /grogs po dag /zhe sdang dang bral
380a2(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/ /
380a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag /gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i
380a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/ /grogs po dag /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang
380a5(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba med la/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ma ni bu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med
380a6(mdo sde): do| |grogs po dag / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med do/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bcings pa
380a7(mdo sde): las bkrol ba'i mi ni 'dod chags kyi kun tu spyad pa la mi spyod do/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa dag 'ching ba dang / 'obs lta bur
380b1(mdo sde): 'du shes pas chags pa med do/ /de nas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal chos kyi 'bab stegs su ni zhugs/ gting ni rnyed/ thang la ni phyin/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ni
380b2(mdo sde): b ral te srid pa'i skyon gyi nyon mongs pa 'jigs par lta ba ni legs par mthong nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas
380b3(mdo sde): nas shing rta la zhon khar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang bzhin rnam dag chags pas ma chags shing / /rtag tu byams sems snang bas sdang ba med/ /shes rab snang shar gti
380b4(mdo sde): mug rmongs bral ba/ /nyon mongs med par shing rta bzhon par bya/ /gang gis sngon chad bdag ni rgyal gyur cig /nor chags tshong dpon bu dang lhan cig tu/ /shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos
380b5(mdo sde): tshal song ba/ /'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang du song / /ji ltar sprin tshogs stug pos sa khebs na/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer lham me lhan ner min/ /'on kyang 'od zer de dag gar mi 'gro /sprin
380b6(mdo sde): gyis bsgribs pas snang ba med du zad/ /de bzhin nyon mongs bsgribs pas byis pa kun/ /shes rab snang la blo skye med pa yang / /shes rab yul gang na yang gnas pa med/ /nyon mongs
380b7(mdo sde): yongs su shes pas shes rab snang / /nyon mongs gang nas 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing / /yul gyi phyogs dang char yang ma yin te/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa las nyon mongs 'byung / /tshul
381a1(mdo sde): bzhin gyis ni de dag 'byung mi 'gyur/ /bor ba med cing blangs pa'ang yod ma yin/ /bskyed pa med cing bkag pa'ang yod ma yin/ /gzhan la ma byin 'phrog
381a2(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin te/ /chos mnyam nyid kyis bdag kyang rnam par dag /'bru mar sgron ma mun par byung ba na/ /mun pa phyogs su 'dong ba med pa ltar/ /shes rab kyis ni mun pa med
381a3(mdo sde): gyur na| |nyon mongs zad gyur med cing 'byung ba'ang med/ /ji ltar sman pas nad pa gso ba na/ /de yi khams ni 'jigs par mi byed kyang / /de yi glo bur nad ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /
381a4(mdo sde): nad rnams gzhar yang 'byung ba med pa ltar/ /de bzhin sman pa'i dam pa 'jam dbyangs kyis/ /rigs pa'i tshul mkhyen sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi/ /sems can nyon mongs nye
381a5(mdo sde): bar zhi mdzad kyang / /chos rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa med/ /phung po 'di dang khams rnams 'di dag dang / /skye mched 'di rnams gtan du 'gyur ba med/ /gang dag
381a6(mdo sde): sngon chad nyes ldan dug bcas pa/ /de dag de ni dug med 'gyur ba med/ /de nas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis tshogs su bcad pa de dag smras nas yang
381a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tu
381b1(mdo sde): shing rta la zhon te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa nyid kyis skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la chos dang ldan pa'i
381b2(mdo sde): gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
381b3(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /gang dag chos nyan par dga' ba rnams
381b4(mdo sde): de'ang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dengs shig / de skad ces smras nas sa phyogs de nas langs te/ rang rang gi gnas ga la ba de logs su song ngo / /de nas smad
381b5(mdo sde): tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang / der me tog chal bar bkram ste bdug pas bdugs /
381b6(mdo sde): bla bre bres nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan te bza' btung 'byor pa dag kyang bshams nas dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang rjes su mthun pa'i
381b7(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob par glu dbyangs len par byed cing skyed mos tshal na gnas par gyur to/ /de dag gis zos shing 'thungs nas rab tu myos par gyur ba dang / smad tshong ma'i bu
382a1(mdo sde): mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyi phang bar sngas bcas te nyal lo/ /de nas bu mo des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis rang
382a2(mdo sde): gi lus rnyis par bstan nas des 'chi ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/ de'i lus thams cad mi sdug par gyur nas ro myags pa 'dra bar snang zhing / de'i rna ba'i bu ga gnyis dang / mig
382a3(mdo sde): gi dbang po dang / sna'i nang nas mi gtsang pa dri mi zhim pa dag 'byung zhing byung nas kyang lus thams cad la khyab par gyur to/ /de'i kha'i nang nas kyang dri mnam po dag byung ste/ dri
382a4(mdo sde): mnam po de dag gis skyed mos tshal de thams cad kyang khyab par gyur to/ /spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang khrag dang rang mnam po dag 'dzag go /lto ba dang lte ba'i dbus rdol
382a5(mdo sde): ba nas kyang mtsher ba dang rgyu ma thams cad byung ngo / /rkub dang 'doms nas kyang bshang gci dag 'byung zhing 'dzag go /de'i spyi bo nas kyang klad pa 'dzag go/ rkang lag gi sor
382a6(mdo sde): mo rnams la'ang sbrang ma sngon po dag rgyu bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyis bu mo de'i lus la de lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas
382a7(mdo sde): kyang 'jigs skrag ste yi chad cing skyabs med rten med dpung gnyen med par gyur nas skyabs tshol zhing 'jigs pa chen pos skrag par gyur nas 'dar zhing cho nges 'debs par gyur to/ /
382b1(mdo sde): de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te/ so so'i skye bo nyid yin pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyon de dag mthong ba'o/ /bdag re zhig na bu mo 'di'i le lan gyis rgyal po ma skyes
382b2(mdo sde): dgras gsad par 'ong ngo snyam nas des bu mo de phang pa nas dor ba dang 'bros par brtsams na'ang ma nus so/ /de'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa
382b3(mdo sde): chen po de mthong nas bros par gyur to/ /de nas de gcig pu grogs med par de na shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bdag 'jigs skrag chen po 'di las yongs su thar par byed pa
382b4(mdo sde): lha'am| klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ dge slong ngam/
382b5(mdo sde): bram ze su yod snyam sems shing 'dug go /tshong dpon gyi bu de dang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo de la chos bshad pa dag kyang
382b6(mdo sde): ma thos mi shes so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skyed mos tshal de'i shing ljon pa thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /'jig
382b7(mdo sde): rten thams cad yang dag min/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin/ /khye'us ji ltar mthong gyur pa/ /chos rnams rang bzhin de yin no/ /sha dang khrag gis bskus pa ni/ /byis pa rnams
383a1(mdo sde): kyi 'khrul ba ste/ /yang dag min der rnam brtags nas/ /mi mkhas byis pa chags par byed/ /ji ltar mi mkhas mi zhig ni/ /dri nga gla rtsi'i bum pa la/ /
383a2(mdo sde): phyi rol ri mo bris pa zhig /mgo la khyer te song pa las/ /'gro ba de yi de yang ni/ /de las lhung ste chag gyur nas/ /dri nga gla rtsi'i mthong gyur te/ /chags pa med cing 'bros pa ltar/ /de
383a3(mdo sde): bzhin byis pa mi mkhas pa/ /bud med rnams la yid zhen cing / /kha dog gzugs dang dbyibs rnams la/ /brtags nas de la chags par byed/ /lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de
383a4(mdo sde): la khye'u khyod rab rtogs shig / dur khrod rul pa'i dri la ni/ /mkhas pa su zhig chags par 'gyur/ /yang dag min la 'jigs med kyi/ /khyod ni 'jigs par ma byed par/ /gang la
383a5(mdo sde): khyod sngon brgya la gyur pa'i/ /chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ltos/ /chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad cing / /'jigs gyur 'jigs pa sel mdzad pa/ /shAkya seng+ge zhes bya ba'i/ /ston pa yang
383a6(mdo sde): dag byung ba yod/ /'dod pa mi rtag mi brtan pa/ /glog 'od snang ba ji bzhin te/ /snang yang yang dag ma yin pas/ /mkhas pa de la chags pa med/ /ji ltar chu ni 'khrugs pa las/ /
383a7(mdo sde): dbu brdos pa byung ba yang / /rgyu yi sbyor las skyes pa ste/ /de la byed pa po yang med/ /de bzhin ming dang gzugs rnams kyang / /las kyi sbyor las skyes pa ste/ /rgyu las byung ba yin pas
383b1(mdo sde): na| |byed pa po ni gang yang med/ /kha dog bzang po gar song zhing / /gang gis khyod 'dir skrag pa yi/ /mi gtsang ba yang ga las 'ongs/ /khye'u khyod de la mngon sum gyis/ /chos rnams yul na
383b2(mdo sde): mi gnas shing / /de dag phyogs nas 'ongs pa med/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med kyang / /de dag rang bzhin ston par byed/ /'di la byed pa po med cing / /tshor ba po yang 'di la med/ /byed
383b3(mdo sde): med tshor ba po med pa'i/ /chos rnams sgyu 'dra dngos po med/ /rang gi lus la rtogs shig dang / /de yang 'di dang 'dra bas na/ /khye'u khyod gzhan gyi lus kyis ni/ /'dir yang skrag par
383b4(mdo sde): ma byed cig / ji ltar rmi lam rmis pa na/ /rtsed mo byed cing dga' bltar/ /de bzhin dga' ba'i rtsed mo kun/ /rmi lam rtsed mo byas dang 'dra/ /shAkya seng+ge'i spyan sngar ni/ /khye'u khyod 'gro bar gyis
383b5(mdo sde): shig dang / /des ni khye'u khyod 'jigs dang skrag /rtsa dang bcas te 'byin par 'gyur/ /pha ma khyod kyi skyabs ma yin/ /mdza' bshes rtsa lag rnams kyang min/ /de dag gis ni khyod por
383b6(mdo sde): nas| |ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro / 'jigs gyur 'jigs pa sel mdzad cing / /skyabs med skyob pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /chos dang tshogs mchog dge 'dun la/ /der ni skyabs su
383b7(mdo sde): 'gro bar gyis/ /lha dang dri za mi rnams las/ /gang dag de la skyabs song ba/ /'jigs pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /bde ba rnyed par dka' ba med/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u des
384a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas dga' mgu zhing yid rangs te 'jigs skrag pa dang bral nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ shi ba'i
384a2(mdo sde): ro myags pa de bor nas nags khrod de nas byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu de gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir sku las 'od rab tu phyung ste/ 'od des yul ma ga d+ha
384a3(mdo sde): thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /khye'u des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang 'dra ba/ gzi
384a4(mdo sde): brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar ba/ mdzes pa/ dga' bar bya ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba mchog /mtshungs pa med pa/ dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa/ gser gyi
384a5(mdo sde): mchod sdong ltar mngon du 'bar ba/ glang po che ltar dbang po thul cing bsrungs ba/ mtsho ltar dwangs shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
384a6(mdo sde): brgyan ba/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs par bya ba ring po nas mthong ngo / /de'i lam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i lan kan bres pa/
384a7(mdo sde): me tog bkram pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang khye'u de'i mdun du 'greng nas khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khye'u/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
384b1(mdo sde): mthong nas sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang khyod nyid la dgongs kyi/ khye'u/ khyod lam 'dir zhugs la de bzhin gshegs
384b2(mdo sde): pa'i spyan sngar song zhig / de nas khye'u de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la khye'u/ khyod kyis me
384b3(mdo sde): tog 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor cig ces me tog man+dA ra ba thu ba gang byin no/ /de nas khye'u des me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to /gtor
384b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
384b5(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
384b6(mdo sde): bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis yul gyi bzang mo rgyal pos thugs su chud pa gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bgyi ba zhig dga' bar rtse ba'i slad du skyed mos tshal
384b7(mdo sde): du khrid pa las/ bcom ldan 'das/ de mdog yal zhing lus myags te nye du'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang spangs nas bdag kyang 'jigs pa chen po skyes na/ bcom ldan 'das/
385a1(mdo sde): 'di'i le lan gyis bdag rgyal pos bkum du mi mchi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u /ma dogs shig /sangs rgyas la skyabs su
385a2(mdo sde): song ba rnams la 'jigs pa phyis mi 'byung bas ngas khyod mi 'jigs pas mgron du gnyer gyi 'jigs pa ma skyed cig / khye'u/ de lta mod kyi gzhi gang las 'jigs pa dang / skrag

385a7(mdo sde): shes pa ni gzhi'o/ /bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o/ /phung po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes ni gzhi'o/ /khams la so sor mi rtog pa ni gzhi'o/ /

385b6(mdo sde): med pa las sgrar go bar byed pas brag ca lta bu'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo yin pas grib ma'i gzugs lta bu'o/ /rang bzhin gyis ya ma brla yin pas chang ba stong pa lta bu'o//

386a7(mdo sde): chags kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol lo/ /khye'u/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin dang / nyon mongs pa thams
386b1(mdo sde): cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol lo/ /khye'u/ ji ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dngos po med pa de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa

387a1(mdo sde): sems rtogs pa ma gtogs par khong du chud par bya ba gzhan med do/ /rang gi sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems can thams cad kyi sems

387b7(mdo sde): ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra/ /tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin/ /'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /'du byed rnams ni chu shing bzhin/ /rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /yongs su rtogs pas kun tu bskyed//
388a1(mdo sde): byis pas yang dag min brtags pa/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /'di lus mi g.yo bem po ste/ /rtswa dang rtsig pa lta bu lags/ /rnam shes bstan
388a2(mdo sde): du ma mchis te/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /'di la sems can bdag ma mchis/ /srog dang gang zag ma mchis te/ /lus 'di bsags pa tsam lags par/ /de ltar
388a3(mdo sde): bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /'di la 'dod chags sdang ma mchis/ /gti mug 'byung ba'ang ma mchis te/ /nyon mongs ma mchis bdag ma mchis/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su
388a4(mdo sde): 'tshal| |tshul bzhin ma lags bslad pa 'di/ /byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa ste/ /mkhas pa de la mi chags par/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /dper na 'dir ni nags
388a5(mdo sde): khrod na| |shi ba'i ro ni man ma pa bzhin/ /gzugs 'di rang bzhin de 'dra bar/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /'di ni sngon mthar ma skyes te/ /phyi mthar 'chi 'phor 'gyur ma
388a6(mdo sde): mchis| |da ltar byung ba ma mchis par/ /de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/ /'di yis bdag ni rgyal ba las/ /mi gtsang ba yis bkrol bas na/ /'jam dbyangs rnam pa ji ltas kyang /
388a7(mdo sde): 'di la lan glan rngo ma thogs/ /mi 'gum 'chi 'pho ma mchis kyang / /sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du/ /bdag ni 'chi bar ston bgyid pas/ /su zhig byang chub tshol mi bgyid/ /ji
388b1(mdo sde): ltar bdag gis chags sdang dang / /nyon mongs thams cad tshul bzhin min/ /sems can kun gyi mtshan de 'dra/ /'di ni chos rnams chos nyid lags/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
388b2(mdo sde): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna
388b3(mdo sde): tshogs| kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
388b4(mdo sde): gyi bar du song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med bdag snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
388b5(mdo sde): d ga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das
388b6(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu
388b7(mdo sde): dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol
389a1(mdo sde): to| |rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyen la ya mtshan mi mnga' bas/ /ston pa rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'di ltar khyod ni 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur pa
389a2(mdo sde): yi| |khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bdag cag shin tu 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal 'dzum mdzad par gyur pa mthong nas ni/ /lhar bcas 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom skyes par gyur/ /the tshom gyur
389a3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi som nyi bsal du gsol/ /mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/ /gang gis de ring chos rnams la ni yid bzhag gam/ /chos nyid du ni rgyal ba la las mthong
389a4(mdo sde): gyur tam/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis deng bgyis sam/ /bdag cag de dag nyan par 'tshal lo mi yi gtso/ /gang gang de ring bdud rnams bzhon dang bcas bcom
389a5(mdo sde): mam| |gang gis ston pa'i thugs ni de ring dgyes bgyis sam/ /gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs sam/ /de dag nyan par 'tshal gyi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /
389a6(mdo sde): 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni mnyan slad du/ /'gro ba thams cad thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te sdod/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi gtso bo thugs rje bskyed mdzod la/ /the tshom gyur pa rnams
389a7(mdo sde): kyi yid gnyis bsal du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/
389b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser
389b2(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal 'di ni sngon 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/ 'dis de las thos nas chos rnams
389b3(mdo sde): la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /
389b4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin
389b5(mdo sde): du bcug ste/ 'dis kyang nga las chos thos nas chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni bskal
389b6(mdo sde): pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen can zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin
389b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar
390a1(mdo sde): spyod pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che dag ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung par
390a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
390a3(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od ces bya ba 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par byed do/ /gang gi tshe de
390a4(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od de la byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od
390a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
390a6(mdo sde): rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa'ang nga'i ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od
390a7(mdo sde): dpal dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lung bstan ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'jig rten du
390b1(mdo sde): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de
390b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan

390b6(mdo sde): dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
390b7(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la
391a1(mdo sde): phab pa| rgya gar skad du/ a R+Ya many+dzu shrI bi ku rbA Na pa ri brta nA ma ma hA mAn su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u
391a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
391a3(mdo sde): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang
391a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag dang yang thabs cig go /de na bcom ldan
391a5(mdo sde): 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de'i tshe lha'i bu 'od mang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /'jam dpal
391a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub

391b1(mdo sde): ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu ji tsam du las rnams 'byung ba de tsam du bdud kyi las so/ /ji tsam du smon pa dang /
391b2(mdo sde): ji tsam du log par 'dzin pa dang / ji tsam du mchog tu 'dzin pa de tsam du bdud kyi smras so/ /ji tsam du 'dod pa dang / ji tsam du 'du shes pa dang / ji tsam du rlom sems pa dang / ji tsam
391b3(mdo sde): du yongs su rtog pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /sbyin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang bdud kyi
391b4(mdo sde): las so| |tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /sbyin pa rlom sems su byed pa dang /

391b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms su lhung ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la rlom sems su byed pa'ang bdud
391b7(mdo sde): kyi las so/ /bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ bdag ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni spros pa med pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni/ de
392a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub cing gnas pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed cing rnam par rtog pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /lha'i bu/ rtog pa dang / rnams par rtog pa

392a3(mdo sde): las ga las 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ bdud kyi las ni brtson pa las 'byung po/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ brtson pa la bdud kyis glags tshol gyi/ mi brtson pa

392a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ji tsam du gnyis la sbyor ba de tsam du brtson pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gnas pa ni gnyis la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/ /lha'i
392a6(mdo sde): bu brjod pa zhes pa ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /sbyor ba med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa
392a7(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /spros pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /lha'i bu/ gang na mig la mi sbyor ba dang / gzugs la mi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems
392b1(mdo sde): dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gang na rna ba la mi sbyor ba dang / sgra la mi sbyor ba dang / sna la mi sbyor ba dang / dri la mi sbyor ba dang / lce la mi sbyor ba dang / ro la mi sbyor ba dang / lus la mi sbyor ba

392b5(mdo sde): med par yang sbyor la/ sems can ser sna can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / tshul khrims la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba sdud par sbyor ba dang /
