392b7(mdo sde): par yang sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ sems can sems rnam par g.yeng ba sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/
393a1(mdo sde): sems can shes rab 'chal pa can sdud par yang sbyor ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med
393a2(mdo sde): par yang sbyor la/ lta bar song ba thams cad dang yang bral zhing lta bar song ba las rnam par grol ba'ang ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid la sbyor ba ste/ stong pa nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong pa'i stong
393a3(mdo sde): pa nyid des lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa dang / stong pa nyid gang gis lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa'i stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong par 'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal

393a5(mdo sde): dang bral zhing rnam par rtog pa las grol ba'ang ma yin pa ni mtshan ma med pa la sbyor ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa gang gis mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de'ang mtshan
393a6(mdo sde): ma med pa dang mnyam zhing / rnam par rtog pa de dang mtshan ma med pa'ang mtshan ma med par rnam par rtog pas mnyam par shes te/ 'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang
393a7(mdo sde): yin pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang smon pa med pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor te/ de
393b1(mdo sde): smon lam 'debs kyang sems kyi bag la nyal bar mi byed cing / smon lam 'debs kyang smon lam gyis rgyu ba'ang med la/ skye'ang skye zhing mtha' gnyis kar lta ba dang bral ba 'di lta ste/ ngar
393b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang bral bar gyur cing / skye'ang skye la 'chi 'pho dang skye pa dang yang bral ba yin te/ 'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang

393b6(mdo sde): med pa dang / dor ba med par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang chos kyi dbyangs
393b7(mdo sde): dbyer med par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad la bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi
394a1(mdo sde): shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i zhing du'ang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyan la
394a2(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye bar yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad la bla ma dang / gus pa dang /

394a4(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas 'du byed thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtog par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par

394a7(mdo sde): 'phrul par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ma skyes pa dang mi gsog par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas phung po dang / khams
394b1(mdo sde): dang / skye mched yongs su 'dor bar yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas srid pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtog par byed par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas 'khor ba na
394b2(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas shes rab kyi mig la'ang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas lha'i mig la mngon par sgrub pa la'ang sbyor
394b3(mdo sde): ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas chos brjod du med par khong du chud par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes
394b4(mdo sde): pas don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la'ang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas
394b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa la'ang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas so so ci rigs par chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas
394b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong khong du chud par byed par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang dag par ston par yang sbyor ba 'di ni lha'i bu
394b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa yang dag phul lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad stong ni bla na
395a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal
395a2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di legs par bshad pa lags so/ /legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu 'ong mang pos
395a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi phyir legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin pas ci khyod dga' bar 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal
395a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sprul pa'i sprul pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin na/ sprul pa de la ci dga' bar 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sprul pa la rjes su chags
395a5(mdo sde): pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med na/ de la dga' bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
395a6(mdo sde): de'i mtshan nyid la/ 'jam dpal yang de'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la legs so/ /zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci zhig yod/ lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca ni sgra snyan pa dang / mi snyan pa
395a7(mdo sde): rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni brag ca'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de'i rang bzhin/
395b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal yang de'i rang bzhin yin na/ de la legs so zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas su la legs so zhes bya ba
395b2(mdo sde): gnang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas par ston pa dang / bstan pa thams cad la su'i blo thogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / su sems can thams cad la
395b3(mdo sde): sems can du 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang / su chos thams cad la chos su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang / su bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba la'ang gnas pa dang / su
395b4(mdo sde): bdud kyi las khong du chud nas bdud kyi las kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su shes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las la mngon par zhen na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyang bdud kyi las su shes pa
395b5(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas de bzhin
395b6(mdo sde): gshegs pas khyod la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang mnyam pa nyid de la mi mnyam pa gang yang yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/
395b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam pa gang yang med do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang mtshams med pa mnyam mo/ /mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam
396a1(mdo sde): pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/ /mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang lta bar gyur pa rnams mnyam mo/ /lta bar gyur pa rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/ /mnyam pa nyid gang dang
396a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa de dang phyin ci log rnams mnyam mo/ /phyin ci log rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/ /mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang dmigs pa mnyam mo/ /dmigs pa gang dang mnyam pa
396a3(mdo sde): de dang kho bo mnyam mo/ /mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'khor ba'i mtha' mnyam mo/ /'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'
396a4(mdo sde): gang dang mnyam pa de dang bdag gi mtha' mnyam mo/ /bdag gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i mtha'
396a5(mdo sde): mnyam mo/ /ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtha' mnyam mo/ /rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dod chags dang / zhe
396a6(mdo sde): sdang dang / gti mug gi mtha' mnyam mo/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/ /stong pa nyid dang /
396a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dus byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo/ /'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo/ /'dus ma byas kyi
396b1(mdo sde): mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mnyam ste/ lha'i bu/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad mnyam mo/ /de la su 'chad pa dang / gang bshad pa dang / gang la
396b2(mdo sde): bshad pa dang / su la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i chos de dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam ste/ nam mkha' yang 'dus ma byas yin pas nam mkha' ni mnyam
396b3(mdo sde): pa'ang med/ mi mnyam pa'ang med de/ su rjes su mi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid 'di dag gi rjes su song ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /lha'i bus

396b6(mdo sde): legs pa'o/ /sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni legs pa'o/ /gnod sems kyi bsam pa
396b7(mdo sde): ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /nyes pa byung ba mi 'chab cing 'chags te rnam par 'byed la kun nas bskor ba med par gnas pa ni legs pa'o/ /nyes pa byung ba 'chab pa ni legs pa ma
397a1(mdo sde): yin pa'o/ /bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa ni legs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon tshol ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /byas pa gzo ba dang /
397a2(mdo sde): byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang / byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa ni legs pa'o/ /byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa mi shes pa dang / byas pa chud
397a3(mdo sde): gzon pa dang / byas pa lan du phan mi 'dogs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /thos pa yang dag par sgrub pa ni legs pa'o/ /thos pa log par sgrub pa ni legs pa ma

397b1(mdo sde): legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /'tsho ba dag pa ni legs pa'o/ /snyom las can ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /skyabs su sod pa rnams mi gtong ba ni legs pa'o/ /skyabs su song ba
397b2(mdo sde): rnams la 'khu ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa'i tshig bden pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni legs pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad
397b3(mdo sde): la bslu ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /thos pa la ser sna
397b4(mdo sde): med cing chos la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud med de zang zing med par chos ston pa ni legs pa'o/ /chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed de zang zing dang
397b5(mdo sde): 'brel ba'i sems kyis chos ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i bsdu ba ni legs pa'o/ /sems can la mi lta zhing
397b6(mdo sde): thabs dang mi ldan par bsdu ba'i dngos po ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshol ba ni legs pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni legs
397b7(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'o/ /shes pas byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa'o/ /nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /mdza' ba brtan pa ni legs pa'o/ /ngan pa dang
398a1(mdo sde): bshes pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtan pa ni legs pa'o/ /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du zhugs pa ni legs pa

398a3(mdo sde): tu 'byung ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /stong pa nyid smra ba'i mngon par 'byung ba ni legs pa'o/ /'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam smra ba'i seng+ge'i khri ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//

398a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thob pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad ni legs pa'o/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gyi byang chub ni legs pa
398a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'o/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa'i brda sprod pa ni legs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod par sems pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub
398a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed pas 'tsho ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems
398b1(mdo sde): dpa' chos smra ba yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i rnyed pa ni legs pa'o/ /lha'i bu/ de ltar na ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal ba de tsam du thams cad
398b2(mdo sde): legs pa ma yin pa'o/ /ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun pa de tsam du thams cad legs pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod ci legs so zhes bya ba'i

400b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na/ nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par ga
401a1(mdo sde): la 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang yi ge rnams kyi ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs te/ ye shes
401a2(mdo sde): de ni yi ge med pa'o/ /lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me gtsubs pa las me mi 'byung gi /gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
401a3(mdo sde): pas gal te thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de kun shes par mi
401a4(mdo sde): 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gtsubs shing gi gtam gyis ye shes de bstan te/ ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gtsub
401a5(mdo sde): shing gi gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang ci'ang rung ste/ sdom pa dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam dang /
401a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gtam zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gtsub shing gi gtam ma yin pa'i gtam
401a7(mdo sde): gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gtam gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / 'dren pa dang / sel ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang /
401b1(mdo sde): gtam gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin pa dang / gtam gang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar
401b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang / gtam gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ spang par
401b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / gtam gang thob par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
401b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa 'di ni lha'i bu dag / snying po yod pa'i gtam mo/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gtam 'di lta bu rjod pa'i tshe mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig can
401b5(mdo sde): 'dir mi 'ong ba ni ngo mtshar to/ /tshig de smras nas ring por ma lon par de'i mod la bdud sdig can steng gi bar snang la sprin chen po 'khrugs par mngon par sprul nas sgra chen
401b6(mdo sde): po'i nga ro phyung ba dang / des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dngangs skrag nas sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu su zhig gi snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
401b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /
402a1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe bdud sdig can bcing ba dam pos bcings te sa'i steng du
402a2(mdo sde): lhung ba de lta bu'i bsam pa bsams pa dang / bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so/ /bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so zhes sgra byin to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras
402a3(mdo sde): pa| sdig can/ bcing ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod kyis khong du ma chud do/ /de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga'o snyam
402a4(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang / phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang / sred pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba ste/ sdig can/ 'di ni 'ching ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba dam po gzhan
402a5(mdo sde): yin te| des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khong du ma chud do/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ thong zhig dang bdag gi gnas su 'gro'o/ /yang bdud kyi las mi bya'o/ /'jam
402a6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgos na/ khyod ci'i phyir gtang / bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
402a7(mdo sde): rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud
402b1(mdo sde): byed du gzhug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul pa'o/ /gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa 'di ni
402b2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar ma yin te/ gang bdud sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa 'di rab tu ngo mtshar to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
402b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng+ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bdud
402b4(mdo sde): sdig can gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag / ci dang ci 'dod pa kho bo la dris shig dang / kho bos dris pa lung bstan pas khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras so/ /de nas
402b5(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od
402b6(mdo sde): srung chen po/ bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o/ /zhi gnas de la chags pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
402b7(mdo sde): la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang / lta bar song ba rnams bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /
403a1(mdo sde): mtshan ma rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / smon lam la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan
403a2(mdo sde): las 'das pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / 'khor ba la bsal bar 'du shes pa 'di dag ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o/ /de
403a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ lta bar song ba bsal nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ lta bar song ba nyid stong pa nyid do/ /mtshan ma bsal nas
403a4(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon lam bsal nas smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ smon lam gyi
403a5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'o/ /'khor ba bsal nas mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ 'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /btsun pa 'od srung
403a6(mdo sde): chen po| mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'du shes pa dang / rlom sems dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye
403a7(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig pa dang / zad pa las ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med
403b1(mdo sde): par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong de
403b2(mdo sde): dag gis smras pa/ gang thob pa'ang med la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med pas so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ btul ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ji ltar gnas pa nyid
403b3(mdo sde): kyi phyir cung zad kyang khrid pa'ang med/ ma khrid pa'ang med de/ ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes pa dang / bskyed pa'ang med/ bkag pa'ang med de/ mnyan pa nyid du shes pa de ltar
403b4(mdo sde): bdag cag btul to/ /dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /gnas
403b5(mdo sde): brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ ji ltar na dge slong sbyin gnas yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ nam
403b6(mdo sde): dge slong len pa'ang med/ nod pa'ang med la dad cing dang ba thams cad las kyang yongs su spyod pa na'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang dge slong gang la byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo
403b7(mdo sde): dang / gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo dang / nye bar len pa'i sems dang / nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang yongs su mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i
404a1(mdo sde): gnas yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/ bdud
404a2(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gang la brten nas shin tu zad pa'i phyir zad pa'ang zad par mi byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'ang
404a3(mdo sde): mi skyed| myong ba med pa'ang myong bar mi byed de/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la/ shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i
404a4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing mnyam par yang mthong la/ cung zad kyang mthong ba'ang med/ mi mthong ba'ang med pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge
404a5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa'o/ /maud+gal gyi bus smras pa/ sdig can/ ji ltar na dge slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun
404a6(mdo sde): pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du shes la/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa'ang
404a7(mdo sde): med cing sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba'i sems la 'ching bar yang mi byed/ grol bar yang mi byed/ sems gzugs med pas chos thams cad gzugs med
404b1(mdo sde): par shes/ sems gnas pa med pas chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong / sems 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad 'dzin pa med par shes kyang sems kyis sems
404b2(mdo sde): shes pa'ang med la/ sems kyis ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang shes shing / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid
404b3(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin gyis gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/ btsun pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ dge slong de lta bu ni sems thams
404b4(mdo sde): cad la dbang thob pa yin no/ /gang pos smras pa/ sdig can/ ji ltar na dge slong yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/ nam dge slong
404b5(mdo sde): gis gzhan las chos thams cad shes kyang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa'ang med/ chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par ston/ yi ge dang /
404b6(mdo sde): skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam thams cad kyang brag ca lta bur shes/ chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar mthong / gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed
404b7(mdo sde): kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtog pa las byung bar shes/ chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/ dor ba'i phyir ram/ shin tu
405a1(mdo sde): bzla ba'i phyir ram/ thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos mi ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la'ang dbang thob cing legs so zhes bya ba la'ang
405a2(mdo sde): re ba med la/ zang zing med par chos ston cing rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag bar shes te/
405a3(mdo sde): sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes nas phung po'i bdud la dben par mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la
405a4(mdo sde): ma skyes pa dang mi skye bar gnas pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud la g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/ dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par chos
405a5(mdo sde): ston pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ ji ltar na dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor/ dge slong gis nam chos
405a6(mdo sde): thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/ nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i mthar shes la/ nyes pa byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa'ang sel cing dam por
405a7(mdo sde): mi byed de/ de dag gang gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon na/ cho ga dang tshul khrims la log par zhugs pa phran tshegs lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta
405b1(mdo sde): bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa'ang nye bar sgrub/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la'ang mkhas/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la'ang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang / 'byung
405b2(mdo sde): bar 'du shes/ nyon mongs pa nang du'ang mi ston/ phyi rol du'ang ma yin/ gnyis ka med par yang ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid nyon mongs pa med par shes shing
405b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'ang mi sel/ nyon mongs pa med pa'ang mi sgrub/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin 'dra bar shes te/ ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas phyogs dang yul
405b4(mdo sde): du 'gro ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/ yongs su rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis bzhin nye bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams
405b5(mdo sde): na| mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang
405b6(mdo sde): 'dra ste| tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags tshol ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba
405b7(mdo sde): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas sus nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/ sems can nyon
406a1(mdo sde): mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang
406a2(mdo sde): dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi
406a3(mdo sde): don gtan la bab par bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bdud sdig can la 'di skad
406a4(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyi/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig /sdig can/
406a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang / de skad ces smras pa dang / sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ nyi shu po 'di
406a6(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas
406a7(mdo sde): skrag pa rnams la bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/ /stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba'ang bdud
406b1(mdo sde): kyi las so/ /'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan las rnam par ldog
406b2(mdo sde): pa tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sbyin gnas tshol zhing tshul khrims
406b3(mdo sde): 'chal pa rnams la khro ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /zab mo'i gtam 'chab
406b4(mdo sde): cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /rab tu brtson pa'i
406b5(mdo sde): bsngags pa brjod kyang sems can mi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa'ang bdud kyi
406b6(mdo sde): las so| |lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /nyon mongs pa ma lus par
406b7(mdo sde): zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing snying rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa'ang bdud
407a1(mdo sde): kyi las so/ /thabs dang mi ldan par dge ba spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mi tshol gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang phan
407a2(mdo sde): pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dogs te chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so/ /'jig
407a3(mdo sde): rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal pa
407a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa rnams la mi bsten/ mi bsnyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mi mnyam par dga'
407a5(mdo sde): ba'ang bdud kyi las so/ /gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba'am/ rgyal po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin
407a6(mdo sde): po che dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi bsten/ mi bsnyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni lha'i bu byang chub sems
407a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi
407b1(mdo sde): las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing thos nas kyang rnam
407b2(mdo sde): par spong ba de dag byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba na yongs
407b3(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
407b4(mdo sde): khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang / tshe rabs tshe
407b5(mdo sde): rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa
407b6(mdo sde): dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can sdud cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po
407b7(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i
408a1(mdo sde): bu mtshams bzang gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni sdig
408a2(mdo sde): can| khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
408a3(mdo sde): mi gang 'byung po babs pa de ni mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o/ /lha'i bu/ de bzhin du kho bo'ang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs
408a4(mdo sde): nas ston gyi/ 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi blta'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng+ge'i khri la
408a5(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dga' bar ma gyur tam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bos ni
408a6(mdo sde): bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar
408a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
408b1(mdo sde): po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dag 'khrug cing
408b2(mdo sde): khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub
408b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / khong khro ba med
408b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas g.yo med pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse
408b5(mdo sde): zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang / chos nyid la rton
408b6(mdo sde): pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel
408b7(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa'ang med la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i
409a1(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa
409a2(mdo sde): rnam pa bcu gnyis so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur ram/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ kho bo dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o//
409a3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bdud sdig can thong zhig dang / rang gi gnas su 'gro'o//
409a4(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/
409a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du
409a6(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la
409a7(mdo sde): sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa
409b1(mdo sde): la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes so/ /sdig can/ khyod dgrol na/ gang nas dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang
409b2(mdo sde): las kyang mi dgrol lo/ /smras pa/ sdig can/ de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba'ang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa me gtogs par gang las kyang
409b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de/ de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de bsdus pa dang / sdig can
409b4(mdo sde): de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so/ /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
409b5(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
409b6(mdo sde): yul du blta'o/ /de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/
409b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sems can
410a1(mdo sde): rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gal te sems can rnams
410a2(mdo sde): na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu/ gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par
410a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang byung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba byung na /
410a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang de
410a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos bskyed pa de gang / chos bkag pa gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes
410a6(mdo sde): nas chos gang yang bskyed pa'ang med/ bkag pa'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ sangs
410a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
410b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la'ang kun tu mi spyod pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na
410b2(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
410b3(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /lha'i
410b4(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing sems
410b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod
410b6(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro
410b7(mdo sde): ba dang / tha ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/
411a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i chos de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
411a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus gces pa'ang mi 'dor ba na'o/ /
411a3(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms
411a4(mdo sde): par zhugs par shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
411a5(mdo sde): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang
411a6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi rnam par dpyod pa na ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
411a7(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
411b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus
411b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la dga' ba'ang mi skyed la/ mi dga' ba'ang ma
411b3(mdo sde): yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar
411b4(mdo sde): gyur pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad sgyu
411b5(mdo sde): ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems
411b6(mdo sde): dpas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
411b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / gzhi med par shes pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
412a1(mdo sde): pa| nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos na mi dngangs/ mi skrag /skrag par mi 'gyur zhing go cha chen po mi

412a3(mdo sde): bsrings pa'ang ma yin la sred pa'i bag la nyal gyis nye bar bsnyen pa'ang ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba
412a4(mdo sde): yin| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
412a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing tshig ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa
412a6(mdo sde): na'o| |lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mthun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang mthun pa'i phyir sems can
412a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad dang mthun par gnas pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes
412b1(mdo sde): shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol tu rgyu ba la'ang
412b2(mdo sde): rgyu ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la'ang spyod la/ chags pa thams
412b3(mdo sde): cad la zhen pa'ang med pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bsten pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod
412b4(mdo sde): pa na'o| |lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzan pa na'o/ /
412b5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji
412b6(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
412b7(mdo sde): rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes
413a1(mdo sde): pas chos gang yang mi len pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig
413a2(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la'ang gnas la/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
413a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la sems can thams cad kyi
413a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par yang snang ba na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rang dgar rang dbang can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
413a5(mdo sde): nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyis dbang byed kyi/ nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji
413a6(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing gzhan la'ang ma thos pa'i chos thos par
413a7(mdo sde): byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung
413b1(mdo sde): ba rab tu shes kyang chos thams cad 'phro bar yang mi byed/ mi 'phro bar yang mi byed pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa
413b2(mdo sde): yin| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/ rang gi sems
413b3(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa la'ang mi lta zhing / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
413b4(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la sems can thams
413b5(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang po rnams la'ang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing / sgra skad brag ca dang mtshungs par yang shes nas mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
413b6(mdo sde): gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bshad
413b7(mdo sde): pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor pa phun sum tshogs
414a1(mdo sde): pa| dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa de dag gis kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ de dag ci
414a2(mdo sde): la mos par 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/
414a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis bgrod pa
414a4(mdo sde): gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste/ gnyis su med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing / ma
414a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba'ang tshol la/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred
414a6(mdo sde): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags
414a7(mdo sde): kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang / zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe
414b1(mdo sde): sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / gti mug gi mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / gti
414b2(mdo sde): mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu shes pa na ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs
414b3(mdo sde): su shes par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed/ lam sgom par yang mi byed la/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pas 'phags pa'i bden
414b4(mdo sde): pa bzhi rjes su rtogs te/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med/
414b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/ 'gag par mi byed/ gnas
414b6(mdo sde): par mi byed do/ /gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa
414b7(mdo sde): sgom pa ste/ lha'i bu/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas
415a1(mdo sde): brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na bdud rnams kyi skabs med do/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
415a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gi bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la gcags
415a3(mdo sde): bzhin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar
415a4(mdo sde): bdag gis shes pa ltar na/ gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa med
415a5(mdo sde): do| |lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim de dag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong
415a6(mdo sde): ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par
415a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji
415b1(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi
415b2(mdo sde): dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med
415b3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa
415b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lha'i bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
415b5(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig / bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
415b6(mdo sde): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'od mang po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
415b7(mdo sde): yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
416a1(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan
416a2(mdo sde): la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga tA d+hiSh+ThA Na satwA ba lo ke na bud+d+ha k+She tre ni rde sha na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
416a3(mdo sde): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
416a4(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas lha'i nor
416a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng+ge'i khri bkod pa na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
416a6(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa/
416a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis
416b1(mdo sde): thogs pa/ thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal
416b2(mdo sde): dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'od dang / tsan+dan dang / bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
416b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad kyang
416b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgya stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa
416b5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa
416b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu
416b7(mdo sde): dang / gang pa bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i khri la
417a1(mdo sde): bzhugs par rig nas rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos
417a2(mdo sde): dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas so/ /kha cig gis lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
417a3(mdo sde): 'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong gsum
417a4(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing / gzugs thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni/
417a5(mdo sde): mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas sgra dag thos par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to/ /gos med pa
417a6(mdo sde): rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur
417a7(mdo sde): to| |dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod med pa de dag nor dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang
417b1(mdo sde): ldan par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

417b3(mdo sde): skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems
417b4(mdo sde): can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems can gang dag
417b5(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas sems can thams cad la
417b6(mdo sde): byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten
417b7(mdo sde): rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa
418a1(mdo sde): chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral

423a3(mdo sde): gsol te/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
423a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma te/ lo ka bi lo ke lo a ti krAn+te/ satwa a ba lo ke ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha te/ sarba a sha pa
423a5(mdo sde): ri pU ra Ne/ d+yu ti na d+ha re/ na ra de ba pU dzi te ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na da de/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ sarba lo ka ma su khA b+ha ba tu/ pUrba k+Sharma k+Sha pa ya tu/ rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ sarba ye b+h+ya ta thA ga ta
423a6(mdo sde): a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swAhA/ kye rigs kyi bu dag /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /ngas
423a7(mdo sde): kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
423b1(mdo sde): zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/ grogs po dag /gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad
423b2(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog
423b3(mdo sde): dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher
423b4(mdo sde): byas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la
423b5(mdo sde): re re nas dbul bar bya'o/ /des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob
423b6(mdo sde): par yang 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang / stobs dang /
423b7(mdo sde): mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
424a1(mdo sde): par gyur nas de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems
424a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
424a3(mdo sde): dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung
424a4(mdo sde): lags so/ /bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad bdag gis mngon 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grags
424a5(mdo sde): par gyur tam/ glo bur chud par gyur pa de'i lus nyam nga ba'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba'am/ sems gdung ba'am/ dus ma
424a6(mdo sde): lags par 'grum pa'am/ chab kyis 'jigs pa'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa'am/ mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung
424a7(mdo sde): po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dgra rnams sam/ mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho 'tsham pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba'am/ gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni
424b1(mdo sde): gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig /bdag gis chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /
424b2(mdo sde): ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam
424b3(mdo sde): bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba be d+hi satwa nAM/ a ri ha hA na/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ badzra kA yaM/ badzra ba la/ badzra te dza/ hUM hUM/ badzra pA Ni/ ta thA
424b4(mdo sde): ga ta A dz+nyA pa lA ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyAM/ sarba bya d+hi na sarba pA paM nA sha ya/ de hi me/ yi the ba si taM pha ra ma/ yan ya me ba a b+hi prA yan tsa mi tan+ta me ba sa mraM d+h+ya tu/ he he/ tu ru tu ru/ A gats+tsha/
424b5(mdo sde): A gats+tsa/ ma bi lam+ba da ri sha ya/ badzra kA ya/ da ri sha ya/ badzra krA yaM/ bud+d+ha a d+hi sh+ThA ne na swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po
424b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang rab tu dngangs so/ /lha thams cad dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags
424b7(mdo sde): kyi gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
425a1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
425a2(mdo sde): gam| rig sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/ tshe dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen par bgyis la dgung zla yar gyi ngo
425a3(mdo sde): tshes brgyad la tsan+dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gang du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying gar sku gdung stsal pa/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rig
425a4(mdo sde): sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la/ gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad
425a5(mdo sde): n as tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par
425a6(mdo sde): bgyi| phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyems dang / 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la rad pa dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas dus
425a7(mdo sde): gsum du bdug spos dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
425b1(mdo sde): bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o/ /des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dog sa
425b2(mdo sde): g.yo ba dang / 'od zer kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang yang
425b3(mdo sde): dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring pa dang / sdig pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur zhing yon tan stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /'gum pa'i tshe
425b4(mdo sde): na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /bdag mthong bar yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes
425b5(mdo sde): bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so/ /legs so/ /phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang / yid gnyis med pa dang /
425b6(mdo sde): the tshom med par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs
425b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
426a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
426a2(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / mi rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
426a3(mdo sde): skyes pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing
426a4(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par
426a5(mdo sde): 'gyur pa'o/ /'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed pa/ shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems
426a6(mdo sde): can de dag la chos ston par byed cing / sdig pa thams cad las zlog bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su
426a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang / sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
426b1(mdo sde): dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i
426b2(mdo sde): phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i
426b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par
426b4(mdo sde): 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshol lags na/ de dag gi
426b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dka' ba spyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
426b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
426b7(mdo sde): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu mo dang /
427a1(mdo sde): chung ma dang / bran dang / bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba
427a2(mdo sde): snga ma 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa'i bsod
427a3(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa
427a4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nges kun chub par byas shing bshad
427a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'bri pa dang / yi ger 'brir
427a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par ston
427a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / nyan par byed na/ de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang
427b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri
427b2(mdo sde): ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni/ de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba
427b3(mdo sde): dang / bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
427b4(mdo sde): mtshon cha dang / spyo ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi
427b5(mdo sde): gzhi de dang / mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung
427b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra 'kho nar mthong zhing / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/ dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag de
427b7(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos nas kyang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/ lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstan pa ma thob
428a1(mdo sde): pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / gzung ba dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger

428a5(mdo sde): ba de dang / chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
