428b1(mdo sde): so| |khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig / gnod pa byed pa dang / brnyas pa dang / gshe ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / mtshon 'byin pa dang / rgya 'gal bar byed na'ang lus dang / srog
428b2(mdo sde): la mi ta bar byas la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ yi ger 'bri bar bya/ yi ger 'brir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams
428b3(mdo sde): cad kyis rim gror bya'o/ /yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o/ /
428b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bskal pa
428b5(mdo sde): grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar/ /rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig /yon tan
428b6(mdo sde): nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa/ /de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/ /gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin
428b7(mdo sde): gos dang rgyan/ /spos dang phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te/ /nyan cing klog la yi ger 'bri byed pa/ /de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te/ /bde bar
429a1(mdo sde): gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs/ /rtag tu bag yod dgon par rten byed cing / /sems gzhan med par bsam gtan dag sgom dang / /sdug pa'i
429a2(mdo sde): bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing / /lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas/ /gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/ /mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin
429a3(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ /de yi ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs/ /'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste/ /gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa/ /de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing / /
429a4(mdo sde): de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing / /ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan/ /de la nam yang sdig pa yod min
429a5(mdo sde): cing / /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong / /de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sems gdung lus lan ba'ang de bzhin du/ /klad pa na bas thams cad
429a6(mdo sde): zad 'gyur zhing / /de ni nam yang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur/ /des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon tan kun/ /ji ltar bsam zhing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag
429a7(mdo sde): tu dge slong pho mo dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni/ /mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/ /chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te/ /mdo sde 'di ni
429b1(mdo sde): rtag tu gzung bya zhing / /'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/ /spos dang phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis ni/ /bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'brir yang gzhug /phyi ma'i dus la rga
429b2(mdo sde): nas gdungs gyur la/ /'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen spyo zhing / /sems dmyal yi dwags rnams su yongs 'khyams dang / /za ma ma ning smad par bya ba dang / /dmus long nyid
429b3(mdo sde): dang ro dang khyi yi dri/ /rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye bar byed/ /phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la/ /khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can/ /sangs rgyas chos la gus par
429b4(mdo sde): ma byas pas/ /de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la/ /der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston
429b5(mdo sde): byed pa| |de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya/ /gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang / /smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa/ /de ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin/ /'dzin la phu dud
429b6(mdo sde): byas na nga la'ang byas/ /de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang / /gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'bri zhing klog byed pa/ /de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing / /tshig 'jam snyan pa rgyun du brjod
429b7(mdo sde): p ar bya| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan
430a1(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/
430a2(mdo sde): bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so/ /de nyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklags te
430a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'brir stsal na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs
430a4(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ des ji ltar bsam pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
430a5(mdo sde): kyang byang bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar
430a6(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba
430a7(mdo sde): byin te| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyi shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
430b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /
430b2(mdo sde): na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kA nAM/ na ma AR+Ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/
430b3(mdo sde): shAn+te/ pra shAn+te/ sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya/ kA ru ci ka/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta ma ma na si ku ru/ bya ba lo kA ya/ mA ma/ sma ra sma ra/ yan+ta yA bUrba/ sad t+ya a d+hiSh+Tha naM kri taM/ te
430b4(mdo sde): na san t+ye na pa tsa ne na/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha k+She ta ma pa ri sho d+ha yA/ ma me kash+tsi de ba he thaM ka ro tu/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ ma hA te dze/ ya na ma ma
430b5(mdo sde): kA ya du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ wA ga du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ ma no du sh+tsa ri ta ma bA/ dA rI d+r+ya ma bA/ tad sarba dak+ShA pA ya/ a lo kA ya/ bi lo kA ya/ ta thA ga ta da ri sha nan tsa/ a ha ma d+hi ka dak+Sha mi
430b6(mdo sde): bo d+hi sa t+ya da ri sha na ma/ d+ha d+hu ma/ dad sa swa me da ri sha na ma/ sarba me ku sha lA a b+hi bar+d+han+tu/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nan/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma
430b7(mdo sde): ma satwa/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa de swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing ga zha'i sgra chen po dang / lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to/ /
431a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod sems can thams
431a2(mdo sde): cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/ las thams cad phyang bar phyed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i
431a3(mdo sde): gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzugs 'di legs par smras so/ /bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs
431a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang /
431a5(mdo sde): kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang / sangs
431a6(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la
431a7(mdo sde): tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyogs su spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / bum pa gang ba
431b1(mdo sde): dag gis phyogs de dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod pa byas nas lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
431b2(mdo sde): me tog phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod nas yi ger bri bar bya'o/ /'bri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun
431b3(mdo sde): mong du byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang / gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems
431b4(mdo sde): dang / snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o/ /tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de
431b5(mdo sde): bzhin bya'o/ /cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing
431b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe de nyid la'ang lus bde pa 'thob par 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
431b7(mdo sde): dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro/ /des yi ger 'brir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin
432a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su
432a2(mdo sde): bstan te bzhag la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du
432a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing / gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba/ bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas
432a4(mdo sde): pa grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te dus
432a5(mdo sde): gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa
432a6(mdo sde): brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la gtor bar bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o/ /phyogs bcur phyag
432a7(mdo sde): byas la nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang / steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna
432b1(mdo sde): tshogs dang ldan pa dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o/ /des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
432b2(mdo sde): zhing sems 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/ /cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar
432b3(mdo sde): bsnyen pa byas la de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la bdug spos dang / tsan+dan dang / pog dkar po dang / ga bur dag kyang gzhag
432b4(mdo sde): mar me kha bzhi/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dar dang / ba dan sna tshogs dag dang / gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par
432b5(mdo sde): brgyan la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chen dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang / gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go /sna ma'i me
432b6(mdo sde): tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir gtor ro/ /de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas
432b7(mdo sde): la| re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/
433a1(mdo sde): 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas las thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing
433a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang /
433a3(mdo sde): mdzod dang / bang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/ dgra thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
433a4(mdo sde): blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs par 'gyur/
433a5(mdo sde): nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang
433a6(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / cho ga shes pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang / 'phags
433a7(mdo sde): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang / byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu
433b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs chen po'am/ gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
433b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi
433b3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs/ klog par yang rdo mi thogs/ mchod par yang rngo
433b4(mdo sde): mi thogs/ yi ge bri bar yang rngo mi thogs/ yi ger 'brir stsal bar yang rngo mi thogs/ dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/ /gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal
433b5(mdo sde): te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g.yengs pas nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par
433b6(mdo sde): 'gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang / gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir stsal bar gyur na'ang
433b7(mdo sde): de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid
434a1(mdo sde): cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na/ re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par
434a2(mdo sde): 'gyur lags te/ de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang / yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang / the tshom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
434a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
434a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
434a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod par byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
434a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sha m+b+hi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na
434a7(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
434b1(mdo sde): cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/ /de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / re
434b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ na maH
434b3(mdo sde): sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ s+yAd ya the dan/ ha ha/ hi hi/ hu hu/ sa ra sa ra/ la hUM la hUM/ shA g+h+rIM/ ma hA bid+yA/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skri te/ ha sa ha sa kiM tiSh+Tha si/ kiM kiM tiSh+Tha si/ kan ka
434b4(mdo sde): bi tsi tra/ a ba ra Na bi b+hU Shi tAng+ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba aR+than me sA d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ aR+than sA d+ha ya/ aR+than de hi me/ sarba satrA nAM sid+d+hiM/ hA hA/ pad+me
434b5(mdo sde): pad+me| ma hA pad+me/ bi sha de bi sha de/ ma hA bi sha de/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ b+ha bo b+ha bA ya/ ta ma haM g+ho re/ tan me bid+ya ma pra yo dza na ya/ sid+d+hiM ku ru/ sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na
434b6(mdo sde): swAhA| bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang / nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / nor gyi dbang phyug chen
434b7(mdo sde): po dang / rgyal srid dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang / bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des chos brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma
435a1(mdo sde): bkum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa
435a2(mdo sde): snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo
435a3(mdo sde): rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad dang / me tog phreng ba dang / zla gam dang / se mo dos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gnod
435a4(mdo sde): sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sug pa na pad+ma thogs shing
435a5(mdo sde): yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/ 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/ rad
435a6(mdo sde): pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang
435a7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / lag na rdo rje la me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir
435b1(mdo sde): yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / chan sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / mar me sna
435b2(mdo sde): tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing / re re nas gnod sbyin mo
435b3(mdo sde): chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o/ /de nas zla ba nya'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang chog 'di nyid dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor ba dag dang / bdug spos
435b4(mdo sde): dang / ga pur dang / pog dkar po dang / tsan+dan dang / shing mu sa dag kyang dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag der rang gi
435b5(mdo sde): gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / nam mkha' la mchis pa dang / lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal srid
435b6(mdo sde): dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / tshe ring ba dang /

436a1(mdo sde): spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o/ /mchod rten dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang ba mi
436a2(mdo sde): phyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid ba zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/
436a3(mdo sde): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gal te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang / yid gnyis su
436a4(mdo sde): gyur pa gang lags pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags
436a5(mdo sde): pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma le legs so zhes bya
436a6(mdo sde): ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi
436a7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dag smras zhing dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni/ yang khyod legs so/ /khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
436b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna
436b2(mdo sde): tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
436b3(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar
436b4(mdo sde): bgyi zhing / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyi/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su
436b5(mdo sde): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nI/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+ThA d+ha ne/ d+hA na dza ye/ bri bri/ bri d+hA ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri ti ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/
436b6(mdo sde): pa sha bsta/ A yu d+ha d+ha ra ni/ yu yu A yuSh+pa la na/ ta thA ga ta nAM/ sma ra bo d+ha tsit+taM/ ma bi lam+ba/ de hi me ba ra na/ shaM khi ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la
436b7(mdo sde): gnas par bgyis na/ de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / gzi brjid 'phel ba dang / longs spyod 'phel pa dang / dbang phyug 'phel ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra rnams dbang
437a1(mdo sde): du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa phyogs gtsang ma'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor ba'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin
437a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la bdug spos dang / pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /
437a3(mdo sde): des par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags
437a4(mdo sde): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs so/ /legs
437a5(mdo sde): so| |yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/ /sring mo/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs
437a6(mdo sde): b yed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
437a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'bri ba de dag dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa bgyid
437b1(mdo sde): pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal srid dang / tshe ring bar bgyid
437b2(mdo sde): pa| dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyon
437b3(mdo sde): nam| dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs
437b4(mdo sde): ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang /
437b5(mdo sde): dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'khrug slong dag lus rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ de'i
437b6(mdo sde): yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyi/ de'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ tad+ya thA/
437b7(mdo sde): oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+ThA d+ha ne/ d+hA na dza ye/ bri bri/ bri d+hA ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+ri ta ka ri/ nA nA bi bi d+ha/ ba sha bsta d+ha d+ha ri ni/ yu yu a yuSh+ThA la le/ ta thA ga ta nAM/ sma ra bo d+hi
438a1(mdo sde): tsit+taM/ ma bi lam+ba/ de hi me pa ra na/ shaM khi ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin
438a2(mdo sde): gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
438a3(mdo sde): spos dang / mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/ ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis
438a4(mdo sde): shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /gang la la bdag rang gi gzugs mthong
438a5(mdo sde): b ar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su
438a6(mdo sde): bzung bas tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o//

438b1(mdo sde): mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'chal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang / bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs
438b2(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gcang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdud dang bcas
438b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas su me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing / phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang / zho dang / 'bras chan gyi gtor ma
438b4(mdo sde): dag gtor la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchong pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa
438b5(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya
438b6(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing / re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzungs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/ dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang
438b7(mdo sde): stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / gter lta 'tshal ba dang / nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / dus ma lags par
439a1(mdo sde): 'gum pa bzlog pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams
439a2(mdo sde): pa skye ba dang / gzhan yang ci 'tshal pa'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
439a3(mdo sde): d ag la the tshom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang bdag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis

439a6(mdo sde): du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni/ yang khyod legs so/ /sring mo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig /de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab
439a7(mdo sde): tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo/ legs

440a1(mdo sde): nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos dang / rgyan dang / dbyig dang / gser dang /
440a2(mdo sde): nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba
440a3(mdo sde): dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba

440a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang /
440a6(mdo sde): yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
440a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams
440b1(mdo sde): cad las yongs su thar bar kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi ched kyi dpe mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs

440b4(mdo sde): ba'am| yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
440b5(mdo sde): rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos
440b6(mdo sde): dang | me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed/ rje par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
440b7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags dang / skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten
441a1(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam

441a7(mdo sde): te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag cag don med pa la don
441b1(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing / lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /

441b7(mdo sde): yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang dang / shar dang / nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na'ang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang / dad par mi byed pa dang / yid

442b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ /gang gis khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/ /mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni/ /sbyin pas de yid dper yang mi phod do/ /gang gis sangs rgyas la
442b6(mdo sde): ni dad byas te/ /tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur/ /gang zhig me tog gcig
442b7(mdo sde): tsam 'thor byed cing / /gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/ /ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/ /bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la
443a1(mdo sde): mchod pa'i phyir/ /kaR+sha pa Ni'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing / /byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/ /byang
443a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la/ /ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du/ /bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na/ /de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod
443a3(mdo sde): 'gyur| |de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang / /sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te/ /mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/ /bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad
443a4(mdo sde): par bya| |rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing / /sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la/ /sems dmyal yi dwags rnams su skye ba na/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod
