443a6(mdo sde): tshun rtog ga re/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrog pa/ /mi zad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing / /phyin
443a7(mdo sde): chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med/ /bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med/ /yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med/ /nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/ /
443b1(mdo sde): kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad/ /ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas/ /de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi zad myong 'gyur bas/ /sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na/ /
443b2(mdo sde): byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed/ /de phyir rtag tu dge slong pha ma dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos khor zug dang / /mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing / /'dzin pa la yang
443b3(mdo sde): rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
443b4(mdo sde): lags te/ ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
443b5(mdo sde): bo| gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'phang bar mi byed/ klog par mi byed/ rgyas par mi byed kyang / des ni khyod kyis nga la
443b6(mdo sde): nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang par mi byed/ klog par mi byed/
443b7(mdo sde): mchod par mi byed/ yang dag par ston par mi byed/ yid la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos
444a1(mdo sde): nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ /dI ni phyi ma'i dus
444a2(mdo sde): phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /
444a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri lan pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
444a4(mdo sde): bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur to/ /lnga brgyas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags dgu khri ni/ nyon mongs
444a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
444a6(mdo sde): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na rigs
444a7(mdo sde): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang / yi ger 'bri bar bgyid pa de dag
444b1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/ /slad ma'i dus slad
444b2(mdo sde): ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang / 'jo sgeg dang / gar dang / bro dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yang ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
444b3(mdo sde): gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas yongs su zin cing / mchod par mi bgyid/ ri
444b4(mdo sde): mor mi bgyid/ dad par mi bgyid/ glo ba chos par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal
444b5(mdo sde): ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing / sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
444b6(mdo sde): dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / de'ang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
444b7(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/ /de lta lags pas na/ lus dang /
445a1(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams
445a2(mdo sde): cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags
445a3(mdo sde): so| |de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang /
445a4(mdo sde): me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag dang / a la la zhes ca co dang / gzha'i sgra dag dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gi mchod
445a5(mdo sde): pa byas nas/ lags so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du
445a6(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
445a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' po/ de'i phyir khyod
445b1(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
445b2(mdo sde): 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa
445b3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa
445b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad
445b5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / 'phrog ma la
445b6(mdo sde): sogs pa de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang / thams
445b7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
446a1(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
446a2(mdo sde): bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus
446a3(mdo sde): te gtan la phab pa/ ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya rat+nA lo ka nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
446a4(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
446a5(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa/ seng+ge'i sgra chen
446a6(mdo sde): po sgrog pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge
446a7(mdo sde): 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
446b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
446b2(mdo sde): po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang / byang
446b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
446b4(mdo sde): 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
446b5(mdo sde): chen po sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang / byang chub sems
446b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
446b7(mdo sde): blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
447a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang
447a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems
447a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan+dan snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka'
447a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
447a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
447a6(mdo sde): dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges
447a7(mdo sde): par byung ba/ dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba
447b1(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ khams gsum la ma chags pa/ g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/ ting
447b2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
447b3(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa
447b4(mdo sde): nyid kyi spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid
447b5(mdo sde): du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ji
447b6(mdo sde): ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni nam
447b7(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rtogs par bya'o//
448a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
448a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings
448a3(mdo sde): ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/ dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
448a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de/ de ni tshad dang ldan par
448a5(mdo sde): bstan par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/ bcom ldan
448a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
448a7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byis pa
448b1(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
448b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi
448b3(mdo sde): bu| gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan
448b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad
448b5(mdo sde): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa
448b6(mdo sde): 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo
448b7(mdo sde): sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ bcom ldan
449a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khor ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
449a2(mdo sde): rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so//
449a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
449a4(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
449a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
449a6(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la
449a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
449b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu/
449b2(mdo sde): khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun
449b3(mdo sde): tu bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
449b4(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal/ nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyi/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'
449b5(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po la dris shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
449b6(mdo sde): po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi
449b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi rgyal po yin gyi/ bdag la ma srungs shig /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas
450a1(mdo sde): ' jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun
450a2(mdo sde): tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
450a3(mdo sde): bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la da bab par shes na dris shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
450a4(mdo sde): bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal
450a5(mdo sde): ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis
450a6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i
450a7(mdo sde): don ni ma spros pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni
450b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no//
450b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'
450b3(mdo sde): kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bstan pa 'di ni bstan tu med pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bstan du med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub
450b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bstan du med pa ni btags te bstan to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ btags pas ci zhig 'dogs
450b5(mdo sde): par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ btags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal
450b6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na/ theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/ byang chub sems
450b7(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
451a1(mdo sde): thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal
451a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni spros pa
451a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med
451a4(mdo sde): do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs kyi bu/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so/ /legs so
451a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin no/ /gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos bstan pa
451a6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'tshal bar mi rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
451a7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
451b1(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
451b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas
451b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo
451b4(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di legs pas smras lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'di
451b5(mdo sde): ni chos thams cad kyi rgya mthun pa yin no/ /'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no/ /de nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
451b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan
451b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang / don kyang mi snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur
452a1(mdo sde): gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gang lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags /
452a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid
452a3(mdo sde): 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir
452a4(mdo sde): stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
452a5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
452a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /
452a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
452b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
452b2(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba lter na/ nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
452b3(mdo sde): kyi bu| nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa'am/ spyod pa'i byin
452b4(mdo sde): gyis brlab par bya pa'i nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shA ra dwa ti'i
452b5(mdo sde): bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
452b6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
452b7(mdo sde): gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pas/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /
453a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci slob pa'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i
453a2(mdo sde): mchog yin nam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang
453a3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na/ de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag
453a4(mdo sde): dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gyi/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad
453a5(mdo sde): ma zer cig / gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid
453a6(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du khyod kyi
453a7(mdo sde): spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho po lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid shes par bya
453b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bal glang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung dus dul
453b2(mdo sde): bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga la nus/ de nas bcom ldan
453b3(mdo sde): 'das la gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni bshul du mchi ba'am/ grong khyer mthong
453b4(mdo sde): bar yang rngo mi thogs na/ khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rngo lta ga la thogs te/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni
453b5(mdo sde): dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ da ci bgyir
453b6(mdo sde): yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de skad ma zer cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis
453b7(mdo sde): sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam
454a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye rgu las sems can dgu khri nyis
454a2(mdo sde): stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha'
454a3(mdo sde): yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi
454a4(mdo sde): k hams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
454a5(mdo sde): snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag go /phyogs gcig ji
454a6(mdo sde): lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chos kyi blo gros/ khyod de ltar byang
454a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
454b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas 'di lta ste/ chos thams
454b2(mdo sde): cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang /
454b3(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya
454b4(mdo sde): ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos
454b5(mdo sde): b stan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mthun par 'di dag
454b6(mdo sde): thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las brtsams te sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
454b7(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thogs pa med pa'i ye
455a1(mdo sde): shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chod pa med pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang / kha na ma tho ba
455a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrog pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
455a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyangs te byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
455a4(mdo sde): kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
455a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam
455a6(mdo sde): mkha' khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
455a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
455b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang
455b2(mdo sde): dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang
455b3(mdo sde): yin| gang las bsam ste de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig /
455b4(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems
455b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
455b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las
455b7(mdo sde): dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyur
456a1(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal tshab dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'
456a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po da dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
456a3(mdo sde): kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
456a4(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag / 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba'am/ mdzes pa'am/
456a5(mdo sde): kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'am/ kun brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i
456a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal bdag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
456a7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes 'dod cing / thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i
456b1(mdo sde): gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las
456b2(mdo sde): dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa
456b3(mdo sde): dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
456b4(mdo sde): par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka'
456b5(mdo sde): ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
456b6(mdo sde): sras dag / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la
456b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang phrad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal
457a1(mdo sde): 'byor tu bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba
457a2(mdo sde): yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du
457a3(mdo sde): gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa 'thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sems dang po
457a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
457a5(mdo sde): sras dag / 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan
457a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang /
457a7(mdo sde): kun tu srung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
457b1(mdo sde): dag / 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung ma nod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mang du
457b2(mdo sde): thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par
457b3(mdo sde): dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par
457b4(mdo sde): gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar
457b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos
457b6(mdo sde): thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal
457b7(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag / 'di ni las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa
458a1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/ bcu gang
458a2(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo
458a3(mdo sde): ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
458a4(mdo sde): nyid du rtog par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
458a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
458a6(mdo sde): brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
458a7(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos
458b1(mdo sde): rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
458b2(mdo sde): 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye
458b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
458b4(mdo sde): nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par gyur pa yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa
458b5(mdo sde): dang / zhing la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dag 'khor ba la rnam par
458b6(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni
458b7(mdo sde): skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la
459a1(mdo sde): sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa
459a2(mdo sde): nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
459a3(mdo sde): 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
459a4(mdo sde): chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i
459a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
459a6(mdo sde): dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
459a7(mdo sde): yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing /
459b1(mdo sde): gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag /'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang
459b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
459b3(mdo sde): 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams
459b4(mdo sde): cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar
459b5(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba dang / sems can
459b6(mdo sde): thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsol te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
459b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
460a1(mdo sde): can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can
460a2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can
460a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin med pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang
460a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag
460a5(mdo sde): pa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la bsam pa phun
460a6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
460a7(mdo sde): bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa
460b1(mdo sde): 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs
460b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
460b3(mdo sde): la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams rgya chung zhes 'chad pa'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can
460b4(mdo sde): zhe'am| sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/
460b5(mdo sde): chos kyi dbying rgya chung zhe'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings
460b6(mdo sde): med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
460b7(mdo sde): dpa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
461a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med
461a2(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / med pa nyid dang / rdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid
461a3(mdo sde): du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrog pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas
461a4(mdo sde): gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i
461a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
461a6(mdo sde): 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa bcu thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
461a7(mdo sde): yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod do
461b1(mdo sde): zhe'am| med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par
461b2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo zhe'am/ nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am/ ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon to zhe'am/ ma
461b3(mdo sde): byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am/ mi zad do
461b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste| kye rgyal ba'i
461b5(mdo sde): sras dag / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/
461b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /mang ba dang / gcig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa
461b7(mdo sde): dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro
462a1(mdo sde): btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pas
462a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par
462a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/
462a4(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye
462a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu
462a6(mdo sde): yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par sgrub
462a7(mdo sde): pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/
462b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ dus ji lta ba
462b2(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhon nur gyur
462b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
462b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
462b5(mdo sde): khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi
462b6(mdo sde): zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag
462b7(mdo sde): thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
463a1(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
463a2(mdo sde): la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa
463a3(mdo sde): yin| nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la
463a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la
463a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs par bya ba la
463a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
463a7(mdo sde): rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod
463b1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu dpyad pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur
463b2(mdo sde): ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /
463b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par sgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi
463b4(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni rgyal tshab gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la dbang
463b5(mdo sde): bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par sgrub
463b6(mdo sde): pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob
463b7(mdo sde): pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yin
464a1(mdo sde): sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems
464a2(mdo sde): can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed
464a3(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /kye
464a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag / rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man chad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par
464a5(mdo sde): mi nus| ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa'i dus la rnam
464a6(mdo sde): par lta ba shes par mi nus/ zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yul shes
464a7(mdo sde): par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la
464b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / chos kyi
464b2(mdo sde): dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed
464b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
464b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni dbang bskur
464b5(mdo sde): ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam
464b6(mdo sde): p ar gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
464b7(mdo sde): gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'ur
465a1(mdo sde): 'ur| rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem che ma/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem che ma mo/ /'khrug /rab tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug
465a2(mdo sde): go / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab pa/ lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi
465a3(mdo sde): char yang mngon par bab po/ lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i pad+ma'i
465a4(mdo sde): sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma bkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /lha'i snang ba
465a5(mdo sde): yang rab tu byung ngo / /lha'i nga ro yang grag go /gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos
465a6(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste/ lhag chad med do/ /tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don nyid ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi
465a7(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
465b1(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bdag cag kyang ming chos
465b2(mdo sde): kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas
465b3(mdo sde): 'dir phyin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis de dag thams cad du yang tshes bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te/ lhag chad
465b4(mdo sde): med do| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to/ /bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin
465b5(mdo sde): p a de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
465b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
465b7(mdo sde): bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ /mdzes
466a1(mdo sde): shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ /rnyed dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /do zla
466a2(mdo sde): med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang / /sdug bsngal bzod glags 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog
466a3(mdo sde): byed| |yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /byang chub don du brtan pa
466a4(mdo sde): sems 'jog byed/ /gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang / /rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang / /gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir//
466a5(mdo sde): byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/ /dge dang mi dge las rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /
466a6(mdo sde): byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang / /de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/ /de dag gnas skabs rtogs par
466a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/ /ci 'dra ci 'dra de yi de dang der/ /rim pa de dag rtogs par bya
466b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang / /lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum nas/ /bstan bcos du ma rtogs par
466b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/ /gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi/ /khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs
466b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems de 'jog /chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gang gyur cing / /dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa/ /yang dag rang bzhin rtogs
466b4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang / /sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes/ /chags med mig ni
466b5(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na/ /sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang / /sngon gyi gnas rnams
466b6(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /ji ltar 'gro ba sems can 'ching byed pa/ /kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i/ /nyon mongs zad pa
466b7(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang / /ngag la ma sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa/ /brda yi bden pa
467a1(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/ /stong pa mig yor rang bzhin ngo bo nyid//
467a2(mdo sde): don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrug pa dang /
467a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs kyis rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu
467a4(mdo sde): 'gyed| |de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa/ /de dag rang gi lag tu mngon
467a5(mdo sde): sprul te| |sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/ /gnod pa med par lag pa'i
467a6(mdo sde): mthil bzhag nas/ /chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa/ /skra rtse'i thigs pa'i
467a7(mdo sde): nang du 'jug par byed/ /ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi grangs/ /gang yod de
467b1(mdo sde): dag ma lus bgrang byed cing / /phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs sreg
467b2(mdo sde): pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa rnams/ /bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /
467b3(mdo sde): ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams//
467b4(mdo sde): skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab
467b5(mdo sde): pa| |skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams
467b6(mdo sde): rnams su/ /skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa brtan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten kun gyi sgra
467b7(mdo sde): rnams ci 'dra ba/ /skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing / /zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten gsum
468a1(mdo sde): po ma lus rtogs par byed/ /sems can kun gyi rab tu rnam par shes/ /lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems
468a2(mdo sde): 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang / /skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed/ /rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du
468a3(mdo sde): brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi /chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i
468a4(mdo sde): phyir| |byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog / rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams/ /rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing / /yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i
468a5(mdo sde): phyir| |byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog /sems kyi skad cig
468a6(mdo sde): gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med/ /tshig rab
468a7(mdo sde): dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba/ /sems kyi
468b1(mdo sde): skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam/ /ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa
468b2(mdo sde): med| |dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/ /gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su
468b3(mdo sde): rgyu byed cing / /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par/ /'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras
468b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ /gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa/ /de
468b5(mdo sde): yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /chos mchog chos rab phul tu phyin pa dang / /khyad par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa/ /de dag byang
468b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med pa/ /'di na byang chub
468b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyor bar byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba/ /byang chub
469a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de la ston par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang / /de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa
469a2(mdo sde): rnams| |de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
469a3(mdo sde): rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/ /shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang / /ngan song sa rnams
469a4(mdo sde): dag tu gnod gyur pa'i/ /gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa/ /de ni
469a5(mdo sde): dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan/ /bslab pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin des byas pa/ /ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin/ /nad bral rnams kyis bstan pa ji bzhin
469a6(mdo sde): du| |'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/ /de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa/ /'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no/ /phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde/ /gnyen
469a7(mdo sde): dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang / /kun tu srung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems/ /slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/ /de 'dra dag la sems
469b1(mdo sde): gnas gyur pa de/ /lung nod kha ton byed par sbyang bar bya/ /mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug /mngon par gyur nas dge bshes sten du gzhug /dge bshes rnams la
469b2(mdo sde): bka' blo bde bar bya/ /dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya/ /dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya/ /'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya/ /don shes gyur nas
469b3(mdo sde): de bzhin chos brjod bya/ /chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya/ /'di ni
469b4(mdo sde): dang po'i las can brjod pa ste/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/ /'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub
469b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor/ /mi rtag pa nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang / /bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang / /de
469b6(mdo sde): bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang / /mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang / /'di dag thams cad rtogs pa med yin par/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par
469b7(mdo sde): byed| |sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang / /rtag par bya phyir de ni gzengs kyang bstod/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu med ces/ /de ltar de ni dpyod du
470a1(mdo sde): gzhug par bya/ /'di na sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang / /phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /
470a2(mdo sde): de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug /rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba/ /de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed
470a3(mdo sde): la| |phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/ /bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed/ /blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos
470a4(mdo sde): po rtogs/ /dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes/ /de ni rang gi sa las yongs mi ldog /sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye/ /rtag tu chos la nges par
470a5(mdo sde): sems dang ldan/ /sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod/ /las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang / /rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/ /rnam
470a6(mdo sde): par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes/ /de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brjod/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang / /ma byon dag kyang chos rnams
470a7(mdo sde): rnam dpyad nas/ /grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang / /rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni/ /dus gsum mnyam
470b1(mdo sde): nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes/ /nam yang mnyam nyid bye phrag 'phyed mi byed/ /de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug /gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/ /de na byang chub sems
470b2(mdo sde): dpa' bzhi ba ste/ /'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de/ /byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par
470b3(mdo sde): brjod pa yin/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ /bsod nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed/ /de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang / /'jig rten kun gyi rten
470b4(mdo sde): du 'gyur pa dang / /phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang / /snying brtse ba dang skye rgu dgrol 'gyur byed/ /'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'dren par byed cing rab tu dang
470b5(mdo sde): par byed/ /sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che/ /'jig rten thams cad tha ma med pa dang / /de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs
470b6(mdo sde): med dang / /mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang / /stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang
470b7(mdo sde): snying brtser ldan/ /de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan/ /de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang / /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa
471a1(mdo sde): med| |shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod
471a2(mdo sde): pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang / /sems can chung ngam yang na che 'o zhes/ /thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur ba med/ /sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag
471a3(mdo sde): gam| |gdul sla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe'am/ /'jig par 'gyur zhe'am chags par 'gyur zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings yod
471a4(mdo sde): ce'am med ces thos gyur kyang / /dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/ /nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin
471a5(mdo sde): tu nges| |mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / /dngos med rang bzhin rdzun zhing dben pa dang / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi/ /chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan
471a6(mdo sde): par byed/ /de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod/ /'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe
471a7(mdo sde): na'am phyir mi ldog / de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe'am ma 'das zhes/ /ma byon ce 'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am/ /byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam/ /de bzhin mtshan nyid
471b1(mdo sde): gcig gam mtshan nyid med/ /gcig dang tha dad rnam pa rnam pa dang / /don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa/ /thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/ /mi ldog byang
471b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yid byed ces/ /mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang / /mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang / /rnam par bye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams/ /thos nas 'di
471b3(mdo sde): la mthar thug 'jug par byed/ /gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing /
471b4(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston/ /pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtog byed cing / /de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par byed/ /sems can dpyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang / /zhing
471b5(mdo sde): rnams 'jig dang 'chags pa rnams kyang shes/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed/ /bde gshegs bsngags pa'i
471b6(mdo sde): chos rnams thos nas kyang / /de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba med/ /yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang / /de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang / /ji ltar skad cig grangs
471b7(mdo sde): med 'go 'gyur ba/ /zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya/ /de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed/ /lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston/ /de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byams
472a1(mdo sde): klas dang / /skad cig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa/ /sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji
472a2(mdo sde): bzhin shes/ /de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang / /spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang / /tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang / /'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon
472a3(mdo sde): mtha' dang / /brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag /ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin/ /pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshang 'byin te/ /de yang ji ltar kun tu spyad
472a4(mdo sde): pa dang / /gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang / /pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang / /dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang / /byin gyi rlabs dang gzhan
472a5(mdo sde): gnod ci 'dra dang / /chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste/ /'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin/ /de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/ /ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan
472a6(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba med/ /tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na/ /tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs/ /dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste/ /thu bo khyad
472a7(mdo sde): 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/ /skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung / /'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di
472b1(mdo sde): 'dra ste| |'di na sems can la las zhing rnams kun/ /phra rab rdul du glags nas ma lus bgrang / /grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa/ /de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems
472b2(mdo sde): dpa' shes/ /'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi/ /sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems
472b3(mdo sde): de skye| |thog mar byang chub sems zhes gang brjod pa/ /de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de/ /'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na/ /de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod/ /de
472b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ba shad pa
472b5(mdo sde): legs par smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
472b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na/ gang dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
472b7(mdo sde): te| de dag nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni/
473a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
473a2(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos
473a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad
473a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzigs su gsol/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
473a5(mdo sde): bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur pa yang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang
473a6(mdo sde): dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa /
473a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
473b1(mdo sde): rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig /chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la 'i zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der
473b2(mdo sde): sgrogs shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas/ brgya byin
473b3(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di skad brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad
473b4(mdo sde): cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang bstan par 'gyur gyi/ 'du bar gyis shig /khyod phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag /mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du
473b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
473b6(mdo sde): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad
