474a1(mdo sde): gsum du gsol ba btab na yang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
474a2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
474a3(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la la dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'debs pa
474a4(mdo sde): d e dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis
474a5(mdo sde): go bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod song la 'jam dpal
474a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba thob cig/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shing blag sha dang / sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar
474a7(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
474b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan

474b7(mdo sde): tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to/ /

479b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don te/ /chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i
479b2(mdo sde): gzhi'i don to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
479b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
479b4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal
479b5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dkon mchog ta la le'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ /de skad ces
479b6(mdo sde): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
479b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos
480a1(mdo sde): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang /
480a2(mdo sde): kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni
480a3(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur
480a4(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
480a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
480a6(mdo sde): mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs
480a7(mdo sde): kyi bu| sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs| 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid
480b1(mdo sde): do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams
480b2(mdo sde): yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
480b3(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
480b4(mdo sde): smras so| |kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis
480b5(mdo sde): kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa gcig gi
480b6(mdo sde): mtha' yang rtog par mi nus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta ci smos/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
480b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyong ba mdzad par de
481a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
481a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ chos smra
481a3(mdo sde): ba de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i
481a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag la bdud
481a5(mdo sde): dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig
481a6(mdo sde): mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur pa las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang gang dag
481a7(mdo sde): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur/ lce dang sna med par gyur/ rkang lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/
481b1(mdo sde): lus nad pu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal/ 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi
481b2(mdo sde): skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ mdor bshad na/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go /gal te mir
481b3(mdo sde): skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la lus 'dze can du 'gyur/ mchu
481b4(mdo sde): 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi dwags 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang mi gti mug pa
481b5(mdo sde): de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
481b6(mdo sde): lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig /'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
481b7(mdo sde): rten myos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di ltar chos nas slan chad kyang dam pa'i
482a1(mdo sde): chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
482a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / rab tu 'bar dang / reg dka' dang /
482a3(mdo sde): drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang /
482a4(mdo sde): rul pa dang / rtag tu dri nga dang / rab 'joms dang / nges 'joms dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal/ mi gti mug ba de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can
482a5(mdo sde): dmyal ba ni 'di dag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos
482a6(mdo sde): nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po/ khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so/ /kun tu bzang po/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
482a7(mdo sde): m o chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan
482b1(mdo sde): par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon
482b2(mdo sde): du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
482b3(mdo sde): kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom
482b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po/ 'di lta bu chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan
482b5(mdo sde): dngags sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes
482b6(mdo sde): 'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro/ /spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar
482b7(mdo sde): pa mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po
483a1(mdo sde): dang / bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro/ /gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe
483a2(mdo sde): rabs thams cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / ltag sgur dang / 'jing pa nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang /
483a3(mdo sde): rtag tu bkres shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus bskams pa dang / kham nam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yang yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
483a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo snga 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i
483a5(mdo sde): sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par 'chags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar
483a6(mdo sde): shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po de
483a7(mdo sde): dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag spangs nas bcom ldan 'das/
483b1(mdo sde): bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu sngangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed
483b2(mdo sde): kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so/ /grogs po dag /nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag /
483b3(mdo sde): chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrugs par mi nus na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan
483b4(mdo sde): dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /dper na/ dkon mchog
483b5(mdo sde): za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/
483b6(mdo sde): 'di ni legs par gsungs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
483b7(mdo sde): stsal pa| 'jam dpal/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa
484a1(mdo sde): gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/ tha na dge 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal gcig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo / /de
484a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/ ring pa
484a3(mdo sde): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni
484a4(mdo sde): bla'i| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir
484a5(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par
484a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /e ma'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal
484a7(mdo sde): lo| |las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma gyur cig/ //bam po gsum pa| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
484b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de snyam ma sems shig /ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi
484b2(mdo sde): bgo skal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi /de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /
484b3(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gro
484b4(mdo sde): ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing / 'phags
484b5(mdo sde): pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang / log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung
484b6(mdo sde): ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can
484b7(mdo sde): gcig gi don du yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ /sems can gcig po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /
485a1(mdo sde): snyam ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs
485a2(mdo sde): bzang pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la
485a3(mdo sde): sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te du zhing smre sngags 'don to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
485a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu gcig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma
485a5(mdo sde): yin no| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon
485a6(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye
485a7(mdo sde): po'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs ni ma gnas te/ ma skyes/ ma 'gags/ 'gag par mi 'gyur ro//
485b1(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te/ mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de
485b2(mdo sde): dag ni yod pa ma yin no/ /dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros
485b3(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ /'on kyang sems can rnams dang mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin
485b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la
485b5(mdo sde): bsnyel ba mi mnga'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa
485b6(mdo sde): dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o/ /rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim pa'ang rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi
485b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
486a1(mdo sde): pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do//
486a2(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de dag gi lce ni dpag
486a3(mdo sde): tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga
486a4(mdo sde): brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs
486a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom
486a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o/ /me tog dang /
486a7(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /bsti stang bgyi'o//
486b1(mdo sde): bla mar bgyi'o/ /ri mor bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /brjed par bgyi'o/ /gsol ba bgyi'o/ /bsti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de'i slad du zhe
486b2(mdo sde): na| de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te/ chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
486b3(mdo sde): bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os dang / phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ /de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang
486b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang / phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
486b5(mdo sde): to| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di
486b6(mdo sde): legs par smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /
486b7(mdo sde): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
487a1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu/ tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
487a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan
487a3(mdo sde): pa| |shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog / yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs smras/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
487a4(mdo sde): bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur/
487a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'thob bo/ /chos
487a6(mdo sde): gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis
487a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / rlom sems med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so/ /
487b1(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
487b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog
487b3(mdo sde): ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye rgu las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to/ /dkon mchog ta la la'i
487b4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
487b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs
487b6(mdo sde): 'di ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
487b7(mdo sde): shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri
488a1(mdo sde): bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
488a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe sems can
488a3(mdo sde): mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
488a4(mdo sde): dga' bo/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la
488a5(mdo sde): zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/ lce na bar mi 'gyur/ sna na bar mi 'gyur/ so na bar mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang rkang pa na bar mi 'gyur/ klad pa
488a6(mdo sde): na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma
488a7(mdo sde): yin pa thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//
488b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad pa'i tshe bdud bar chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
488b2(mdo sde): bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo/ gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du
488b3(mdo sde): 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu 'bar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo/ /kun dga' bo/ sa phyogs
488b4(mdo sde): gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang
488b5(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mchis shing mchis nas kyang sngar de bzhin gshegs
488b6(mdo sde): pa la phyag bgyis nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na/ nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta
488b7(mdo sde): bu bkol te nga la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa
489a1(mdo sde): yin mod kyi/ kun dga' bo/ ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/
489a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin po che dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom
489a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mi'i 'jig rten dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
489a4(mdo sde): p a spyod pa na ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa brtsegs pa'i snying po gser bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las
489a5(mdo sde): mngon du thos te/ kun dga' bo/ bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma myong nas ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung bstan to//
489a6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la/ phyis nga la phyag 'tshal cig /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag
489a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /a la la chos/ a la la chos/ chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam
489b1(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i ming thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta
489b2(mdo sde): smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la kye grogs po dag/
489b3(mdo sde): khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
489b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma
489b5(mdo sde): thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nyi ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang / ji ltar tshong pa thabs mi shes pa dang / ji ltar mi dbul po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/ de dag gi don du
489b6(mdo sde): ngas dpe 'di dag byas na/ ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang / sems can thams cad
489b7(mdo sde): kyi don du nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod spro'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
490a1(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi
490a2(mdo sde): stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mdo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu
490a3(mdo sde): 'gul| kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
490a4(mdo sde): chem mo| |'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sor mo bcu
490a5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te du zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spro lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khyod
490a6(mdo sde): ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/
490a7(mdo sde): ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
490b1(mdo sde): bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de nas
490b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras
490b3(mdo sde): thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /dus
490b4(mdo sde): dus su bsti stang gyis shig / rin po che'i sngon du chug la phrag la thogs shig /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni khyod la rjes
490b5(mdo sde): su bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
490b6(mdo sde): kyi bu| kha rog de skad ma 'dri zhig / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
490b7(mdo sde): gsol| bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyi nyen cig /'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di lta bu dang / 'jam dpal
491a1(mdo sde): dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan
491a2(mdo sde): thong la| phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad
491a3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu bzang po/ rab tu byung ba dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/
491a4(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de dag 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po/ mi gti mug pa de lta bu dag gi don du ngas mdo 'di
491a5(mdo sde): yongs su gtad kyi/ mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
491a6(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar
491a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsti stang du bgyi'o/ /btsun par bgyi'o/ /rim gro bgyi'o/ /mchod pa bgyi'o/ /brjod par bgyi'o/ /gsol ba
491b1(mdo sde): b gyi'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par skul ba'i
491b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /yon tan pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi /yon tan kun bshad thams cad nga la nyon/ /nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i
491b3(mdo sde): yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung / /rang byung mi yi seng+ge bzhugs zhes grags/ /ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas/ /shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na
491b4(mdo sde): bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs cig /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor/ /sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'o ting nge 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas/ /
491b5(mdo sde): mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu shar gyi phyogs logs nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul snyed lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung
491b6(mdo sde): 'ongs| |de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur/
491b7(mdo sde): der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa/ /'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci/
492a1(mdo sde): de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ /rlog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang / /bden yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang / /sems can dam
492a2(mdo sde): pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang / /rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyi/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang / /spyod pa
492a3(mdo sde): gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya/ /rgya
492a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung / /byang chub gzhir gyur ba yi rang byung sems/ /thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te/ /mtshungs
492a5(mdo sde): med kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams/ /bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi /yon tan chu bo
492a6(mdo sde): zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste/ /mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang / /sa chen rnams las
492a7(mdo sde): rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs/ /byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin gyi na ma yin gyi/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la/ /dad dang dang ba bskyed nas
492b1(mdo sde): sems skye ste/ /de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang / /bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems
492b2(mdo sde): skye'o| |rtag tu sems can phan pa bya phyir dang / /zhing rnams sbyang dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / /chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang / /ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems
492b3(mdo sde): de skye| |rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang / /dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas/ /bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal dang
492b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la/ /byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag
492b5(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams/ /bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing / /chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la/ /bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o/ /dad pa sngon 'dren ma
492b6(mdo sde): ltar skyed pa ste/ /yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed/ /dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin/ /dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems
492b7(mdo sde): dang byed/ /nga rgyal spang zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog /lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed/ /dad pa
493a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed/ /dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar
493a2(mdo sde): byed| |dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing / /nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin/ /dad pa rang byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags
493a3(mdo sde): pa med| |mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing / /thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/ /yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul
493a4(mdo sde): pa| |dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin/ /dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi/ /de
493a5(mdo sde): la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag tshul
493a6(mdo sde): khrims bslab pa yod mi 'dor/ /gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba/ /yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod/ /tshul khrims byang chub sems bstod byed pa ste/ /slob pa'i
493a7(mdo sde): sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor/ /tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa/ /de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal la
493b1(mdo sde): mchod pa rgya chen byed/ /gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu chos la dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan ngoms pa med/
493b2(mdo sde): gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/ /de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dad gus pa/ /de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin/ /gang dag mi ldog dge
493b3(mdo sde): 'dun rab dad pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa'i/ /de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/ /gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal
493b4(mdo sde): ba| |de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ /gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs ba/ /de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung / /gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs
493b5(mdo sde): bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen gsog par byed/ /gang dag dge ba rgya chen gsog byed pa/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos
493b6(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur/ /gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs/ /gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems
493b7(mdo sde): kyang skye| |gang dag byang chub don du sems skye ba/ /de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/ /de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/
494a1(mdo sde): gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/ /de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs/ /mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/ /de dag dad dang bsam
494a2(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag / gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/ /de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog /gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa
494a3(mdo sde): spyod| |gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs/ /gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/ /gang dag
494a4(mdo sde): sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi phyed/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /gang dag
494a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba/ /de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /de dag bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur//
494a6(mdo sde): gang dag bar skabs chos las mi nyams pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /gang
494a7(mdo sde): dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod/ /gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /gang dag snying rje
494b1(mdo sde): chen po'i rtsa brtan pa/ /de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can/ /de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor/ /gang dag 'dus byas skyon
494b2(mdo sde): gyis yal bor ba/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /gang dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson
494b3(mdo sde): pa| |de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang dag 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo ba/ /de dag brtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /gang dag brtun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag mngon shes
494b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa skyes/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam par dag skyes pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs/ /gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed
494b5(mdo sde): mkhas| |'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/ /'gro ba sdud shes cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /gang dag bsdu ba'i
494b6(mdo sde): dngos po bzhir brtson pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed/ /gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa/ /de dag shes rab thabs la brten pa yin/ /gang dag shes rab thabs la brten
494b7(mdo sde): gyur pa| |dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa/ /de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa/ /
495a1(mdo sde): de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das/ /gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa/ /de dag mi ldog sa ni rjes su thob/ /gang dag mi ldog sa ni thob gyur pa/ /de
495a2(mdo sde): dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin/ /gang dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang
495a3(mdo sde): mngon sum gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas/ /rgyas gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs
495a4(mdo sde): pa yin| |gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas
495a5(mdo sde): lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnams sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis
495a6(mdo sde): mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa/ /de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras/ /gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras pa/ /de dag lus kyi
495a7(mdo sde): 'od ni mtha' yas so/ /gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang
495b1(mdo sde): 'byung / /gang dag 'od las pad+ma rnams 'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul
495b2(mdo sde): bar byed/ /gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul
495b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas so/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab
495b4(mdo sde): tshim par byed/ /gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ /de dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten
495b5(mdo sde): sems can 'dul/ /gang dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes
495b6(mdo sde): su 'brang / /gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed/ /
495b7(mdo sde): gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig rnams rngod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo / /gang
496a1(mdo sde): dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems
496a2(mdo sde): kyis rnam par shes/ /gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang
496a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing / /nyon mongs rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab tu phye bas
496a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyu/ /gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la
496a5(mdo sde): gnas| |gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa/ /de dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas
496a6(mdo sde): pa rjes su thob/ /gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur
496a7(mdo sde): thams cad ma lus nod par byed/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa/ /de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /
496b1(mdo sde): phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to/ /gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba/ /mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lta bur
496b2(mdo sde): ni| |ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas/ /mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa/ /mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar
496b3(mdo sde): bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yod mi nus/ /mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa/ /de dag brtun pa kun dang mthong
496b4(mdo sde): ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do/ /gang dag brtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin pa sbyin byed kyi/ /sbyin pa thams cad
496b5(mdo sde): don yod 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus/ /chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge ba'i las lam rab tu spyod 'gyur te/ /dkon mchog mthu yang
496b6(mdo sde): dam pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje mkhregs pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams/ /mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha'
496b7(mdo sde): yas yon tan chu/ /gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur ba/ /der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na chos kyang med gyur pa/ /phyogs der chos kyi gter
497a1(mdo sde): ni ston par byed/ /de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtog cing / /de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu/ /zla ba lta bur snang ba rab ston cing / /thabs stong dag
497a2(mdo sde): gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de nas skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang / /ring
497a3(mdo sde): bsrel rab tu rgyas pa'ang dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa/ /sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed
497a4(mdo sde): cing / /theg gsum sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mos pa kun gyis sgrub pa shes pa rnams/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med lus rnams dang / /lha mi lha min klu dang gnod
497a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / /grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos/ /dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang / /rtags dang spyod dang sgra
497a6(mdo sde): skad 'jug pa dag / ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed/ /de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod pa byed/ /gang dag zhing bkod
497a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yas so/ /gang dag
497b1(mdo sde): 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa/ /de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba bsam mi khyab/ /gang
497b2(mdo sde): dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /
497b3(mdo sde): gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / /bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos/ /bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang
497b4(mdo sde): shes rab dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting nge 'dzin/ /rdul rnams kun la mngon
497b5(mdo sde): par sgrub byed cing / /rdul gcig steng na zhing rnams bsam mi khyab/ /ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcu'i zhing dang / /sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang
497b6(mdo sde): kha cig ston/ /nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa kha cig dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang / /la la steng g.yogs med dang mthun pa
497b7(mdo sde): dang / /la la 'chol ba smig rgyu lta bu dang / /la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams/ /ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa/ /de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston/ /drang srong ting
498a1(mdo sde): 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed
498a2(mdo sde): cing / /lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste/ /skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu dag na me tog phreng ba dang / /spos byug rin chen rin che ji snyed pa/ /de dag
498a3(mdo sde): byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin/ /gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /
498a4(mdo sde): gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs/ /phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang / /drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os
498a5(mdo sde): ba| |de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing / /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod/ /phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi wang dang //
498a6(mdo sde): sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrog /phyogs bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi/ /yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang / /
498a7(mdo sde): bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrog /'od zer gang dag las dges yongs bsags pa/ /lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed
498b1(mdo sde): byed cing / spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du/ /'debs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod/ /'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i rgyan phreng bsam yas rab
498b2(mdo sde): 'chang ba/ /pad+ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag /lag nas rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ /me tog phal chen me tog bla re dang / /me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /me tog sna
498b3(mdo sde): tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang / /bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kun
498b4(mdo sde): tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen spos dang spos kyi bla re dang / /spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram
498b5(mdo sde): byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phreng ba phal cher phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid
498b6(mdo sde): chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /na
498b7(mdo sde): bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /na bza' sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen gdugs
499a1(mdo sde): dang gdugs kyi bla re dang / /gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal
499a2(mdo sde): ba mchod/ /rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang / /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /
499a3(mdo sde): pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang / /pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyan phreng phal chen
499a4(mdo sde): rgyan phreng bla re dang / /rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyal mtshan mchog bkod
499a5(mdo sde): 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ /du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan par byed/ /nor bu'i dra ba sna
499a6(mdo sde): tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/ /dar gyi lnga ldi ba dan rab dpyangs shing / /dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin/ /lag pa'i
499a7(mdo sde): mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams/ /rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba ma lus kun la de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro
499b1(mdo sde): ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing / /bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo/ /thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /kha cig de
499b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang / /bzod pa mi bzod mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang / /kha cig
499b3(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang / /bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang / /don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang / /spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i
499b4(mdo sde): gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang / /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang / /bden dang brten dang rnam par thar sgo dang / /kha
499b5(mdo sde): cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang / /nyan thos theg pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang / /skyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang / /theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang / /kha cig mi
499b6(mdo sde): rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang / /zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/ /'gro ba'i spyod
499b7(mdo sde): pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/ /de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /gang dag kun tu rnam thar
500a1(mdo sde): sgo dag nas/ /bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag sus kyang mchan mar gzung mi nus/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra
500a2(mdo sde): 'o| |de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog / 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa/ /dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsam pa bstan nas sems
500a3(mdo sde): can 'dul par byed/ /gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang / /bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa/ /der ni kun gyis bsam bzhin bya ba yis/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro
500a4(mdo sde): ba'i don rnams byed/ /de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/ /sbyin la
500a5(mdo sde): mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ /brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing / /gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te/ /phreng bas spud cing spos kyis bskul
500a6(mdo sde): ba yi| |gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/ /blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba/ /
500a7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag ka la ping+ka'i sgra snyan dang / /khu byug ku nal ngang pa'i sgra skad dang / /
500b1(mdo sde): rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/ /rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo
500b2(mdo sde): mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed/ /bya ba kun
500b3(mdo sde): la grogs su gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing / /'gro
500b4(mdo sde): ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ /gang na mngon 'byung med cing chos med de/ /dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /der ni rgyal srid
500b5(mdo sde): 'byor pa rab spangs te/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung / /de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ /'dod
500b6(mdo sde): pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang / /drang srong
500b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ /yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /gang na sems can dpag med che ldan zhing / /bde bar ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /der ni rga bas
501a1(mdo sde): nyen cing nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/ /'jig rten gti mug me chen rab
501a2(mdo sde): 'bar zhing / /rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang / /chos kyi khyad par
501a3(mdo sde): bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/ /
501a4(mdo sde): gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs tshul
501a5(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin/ /dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/ /de dag snyan mngags
501a6(mdo sde): mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /zhags mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang / /sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun tu
501a7(mdo sde): ston| |grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang / /sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos
501b1(mdo sde): cho ga mkhas/ /de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod sbyin sdong po dang / /lam gol dong ba rnams la lam
501b2(mdo sde): ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos chos tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten
501b3(mdo sde): rjod par byed/ /'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang / /sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/ /drang srong de dag
501b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba/ /drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang / /mkhas pa de dag
501b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /gdung ba gau ta ma dang mi smrar spyod/ /gcer bu gos med lhur lan dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi slob dpon
501b6(mdo sde): mkhas par ston/ /de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang / /bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang / /ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba
501b7(mdo sde): yin| |nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod/ /gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum cu pa/ /de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /
502a1(mdo sde): lha yi shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang / /mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnams su/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang / /bsam yas chos la de dag
502a2(mdo sde): dam pa mchog / tsog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang / /gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang / /de dag tu yang de dag slob
502a3(mdo sde): dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing / /bsnyen dka' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyis/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug
502a4(mdo sde): bsngal spang bar 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis/ /de dag rnams
502a5(mdo sde): la bden pa ston par byed/ /la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag
502a6(mdo sde): la lha yi gsang tshig gis/ /la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don la rnam nges rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang / /bstan bcos thub
502a7(mdo sde): med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi nges
502b1(mdo sde): tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ /la la srin po 'byung po sha za dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye che tshig dang / /mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par
502b2(mdo sde): 'dren pa byed/ /de dag bden dang dres tshig tshul shes te/ /de ltar rgyal pa'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin
502b3(mdo sde): rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ //bsam po bzhi pa ste/ /tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab
502b4(mdo sde): bkye ste| |'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med
502b5(mdo sde): ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing / /chos kyang yongs su bstan te lam bstan cing / /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod
502b6(mdo sde): rten bstan byas pas/ /des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed ces bya ba gtong zhing / /rdul dang mun pa thams
502b7(mdo sde): cad bsal byas te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir
503a1(mdo sde): sgron bzung bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang / /rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang / /spos dang
503a2(mdo sde): bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag / rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/ /sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag
503a3(mdo sde): sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go cha gyon/ /gang dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go gyon pa/ /de
503a4(mdo sde): dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong khyer ston/ /stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru 'byin te/ /'dus byas sun byung
503a5(mdo sde): zhi ba bsngags byas pas/ /des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /'dod pa'i
503a6(mdo sde): yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing / /chos la mos pa'i ro ni don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas/ /bdud rtsi'i char
503a7(mdo sde): pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten skom pa'i sred pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa chu dong dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa smad
503b1(mdo sde): cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ /des na sred pa sel ba grub par gyur/ /dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/
503b2(mdo sde): dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa
503b3(mdo sde): rnams byas shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pas/ /des na dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang
503b4(mdo sde): dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu 'o/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing / /chos la
503b5(mdo sde): dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs
503b6(mdo sde): mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas la/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/ /des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od
503b7(mdo sde): zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed/ /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin
504a1(mdo sde): de byed tshe/ /slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par
504a2(mdo sde): gyur| |ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis khong
504a3(mdo sde): du chud| |chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /don la nges pa'i ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na/ /des na ye shes ldan de'i 'od zer
504a4(mdo sde): grub| |shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos
504a5(mdo sde): la rab tu 'jug / bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing / /rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag /bstan pas shes rab
504a6(mdo sde): sgron ma de grub po/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhes/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi zad mdzod kyi gzungs ni thob gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs
504a7(mdo sde): pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing / /'gro ba chos kyis rjes su bzung byas pas//
504b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par gyur/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul pas/ /longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan
504b2(mdo sde): shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/ /ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can/ /nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar shes nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis
504b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa spel byas pas/ /des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /tshul

506a1(mdo sde): bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom byin pas de thob bo/ /sangs
506a2(mdo sde): rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs

506a6(mdo sde): zhes| |brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten gsum
506a7(mdo sde): na sgra rgyud ji snyed pa/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod de/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don tu sil snyan dang / /sgra chen
506b1(mdo sde): dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/ /rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub bo/ /'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pas/ /
506b2(mdo sde): bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te/ /yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang / /'gog pa
506b3(mdo sde): rtag tu bde zhing zhi skyed ces/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob po/ /khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi
506b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims khyad par dang / /ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos/ /thub chen rgyal po'i khrims kyi mchog gyur cing / /ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces/ /
506b5(mdo sde): byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/ /des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des
506b6(mdo sde): bskul byas pa/ /rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/ /skye bo nyon mongs
506b7(mdo sde): rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ /rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur/ /spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems
507a1(mdo sde): can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi
507a2(mdo sde): dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag /byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/ /
507a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyis bdugs pa yis/ /pho
507a4(mdo sde): brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/ /sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing / /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs
507a5(mdo sde): mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par 'gyur/ /shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par
507a6(mdo sde): byed| |mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des na shin tu dang byed 'od grub po/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs
507a7(mdo sde): sprin rnams kun tu gnas/ /mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob/ /lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /gcer
507b1(mdo sde): bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan par gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag /sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub/ /ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /
507b2(mdo sde): bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab
507b3(mdo sde): gtong zhing / /dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ /dkon mchog gsum la gter bzhi'i mi zad pa/ /dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo/ /mig rnams
507b4(mdo sde): sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /de tshe long ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /
507b5(mdo sde): rna ba rnams sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer
507b6(mdo sde): grub| |sna rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sngon chad mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /spos rab phul bas
507b7(mdo sde): sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lce rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnam spangs te/ /'jam par
508a1(mdo sde): smras pas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lus rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams
508a2(mdo sde): dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /lus btud byas pas lus rnams sbyong ba thob/ /sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan
508a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na/ /sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /gzugs rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi
508a4(mdo sde): dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku mthong ste/ /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo/ /sgra rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer
508a5(mdo sde): rab gtong zhing / /sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes/ /rkyen las byung bas brag ca 'dra 'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po/ /dri rnams sbyong ba'i
508a6(mdo sde): 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ /spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/ /ro
508a7(mdo sde): bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de
508b1(mdo sde): yin| |reg rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /reg na rtsu ba pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/ /phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal
508b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| |bcos bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs bshul bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang / /phreng ba bla re
508b3(mdo sde): phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /chos rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /byung
508b4(mdo sde): ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/ /rkyen las byung bas ma skyes ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/ /chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes/ /brjod pas chos
508b5(mdo sde): rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste/ /kun kyang las sbyor tha dad
508b6(mdo sde): tshul can no/ /ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba/ /ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /
508b7(mdo sde): yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i/ /yon tan de grogs sngon chad gang gyur pa/ /de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/ /drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /de
509a1(mdo sde): dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/ /rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pas/ /de

509a3(mdo sde): 'dun te don gnyer ba/ /de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul/ /dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char/ /mig dang ldan
509a4(mdo sde): pas shar bar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos

509a7(mdo sde): mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/ /dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni
509b1(mdo sde): yon tan che rgyur mi 'gyur zhes/ /de dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do/ /de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul ba/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /phyogs
509b2(mdo sde): bcu kun tu do zla med rnams kyis/ /zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/ /'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa/ /stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /
509b3(mdo sde): skyil krung bcas pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs
509b4(mdo sde): byas shing / /sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor/ /de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas/ /drang srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/ /yongs su smin byas
509b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa/ /de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/ /gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/ /skyes chen rnams
509b6(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid 'di yin te/ /rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing / /zham
509b7(mdo sde): ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra 'o/ /de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/ /
510a1(mdo sde): ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /kha cig mnyam bzhag kha cig ldang bar yang / /phyogs rnams kun tu rang gi lus ston to/ /de dag shar
510a2(mdo sde): gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing / /nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang / /

510a4(mdo sde): 'di 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
510a5(mdo sde): gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag pa bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa
510a6(mdo sde): du ma rab tu byed par snang / /nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /
510a7(mdo sde): zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum
510b1(mdo sde): rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu brtan pa 'jug /kha cig mnyam bzhag kha
510b2(mdo sde): cig langs gyur cing / /'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang / /de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /gzugs kyi lam las bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gzugs

510b6(mdo sde): pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas
